43.5: Yie nyei hnyouv weic haaix diuc ndongc naaiv nzauh? Yie nyei hnyouv weic haaix diuc paan-paan puoqv-puoqv nyei? Oix zuqc kaux Tin-Hungh maaih lamh hnamv dorngx weic zuqc yie aengx duqv ceng ninh, dongh njoux yie yaac zoux yie nyei Tin-Hungh.
43.3: Tov bun meih nyei njang caux zien leiz cuotv daaih yienz yie, dorh yie nzuonx taux meih nyei cing-nzengc mbong, yaac taux meih yiem nyei dorngx.
43.2: Weic zuqc meih zoux yie ndaauh kaux nyei Tin-Hungh. Meih weic haaix diuc guangc yie? Yie weic haaix diuc oix zuqc zanc-zanc nzauh nyiemv, laaix win-wangv hoic jienv yie?
43.1: O Tin-Hungh aah! Tov meih siemv bun cing yie maiv dorngc. Tov tengx yie caengx sic, bun maiv gan Tin-Hungh wuov deix guoqv nyei mienh zuqc suei. Tov njoux yie leih ndutv nduov mienh wuov deix caux maiv baengh fim nyei mienh.
43.4: Yie ziouc mingh taux Tin-Hungh nyei ziec-dorngh, taux bun yie gauh orn-lorqc jiex nyei Tin-Hungh wuov. O Tin-Hungh, yie nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Yie oix patv daanh baah ceng meih.

52.2: Meih daav za'eix mietc mienh. Meih nyei mbietc hnangv teix-do nor laic, kungx longc weic gorngv-baeqc nduov mienh hnangv.
52.1: Mienh henv mienh aah! Meih weic haaix diuc bungx waac-maux meih zoux nyei orqv sic? Tin-Hungh ziangh hnoi ziangh muonz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
52.5: Mv baac Tin-Hungh oix bun meih zuqc mietc taux yietc liuz. Ninh oix zorqv meih yiem ndopv-liuh gu'nyuoz ciev cuotv daaih. Ninh oix yiem yaangh gen baeng meih cuotv hnangv liemh nzungh baeng cuotv nor. Selaa
52.6: Kuv mienh duqv buatc yaac gamh nziex. Ninh mbuo oix jatv ninh yaac gorngv,
52.8: Mv baac yie se hnangv zungh ga'lanv ndiangx nyiemz yiem zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei biauv gu'nyuoz. Yie kaux Tin-Hungh, dongh ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh taux maanc gouv maanc doic.
52.9: Yie oix dor-ziec meih taux yietc liuz weic meih zoux nyei sic. Yie oix dorng jienv meih nyei baeqc fingx zunh meih nyei mengh, weic zuqc meih nyei mengh se longx haic.
52.4: O meih gorngv-baeqc nduov mienh nyei mbietc aah! Meih hnamv yietc zungv hoic mienh nyei waac.
52.3: Meih hnamv orqv sic gauh camv kuv sic, hnamv gorngv-baeqc nyei waac gauh camv gorngv zien leiz. Selaa
52.7: mangc maah! Maiv ndaauh kaux Tin-Hungh nyei mienh, kungx kaux ganh bungx-zuoqc nyei zinh zoih, yaac bangc zoux waaic nyei jauv liepc ganh wuonv.

88.15: Yiem yie lunx taux ih zanc yie zuqc zeqc naanc morh, kaav deix daic mi'aqv. Yie diev jienv meih zoux bun yie gamh nziex nyei sic, yie kouv taux ndoqv.
88.18: Meih zorqv yie hnamv nyei doic caux yie nyei loz-gaeng doic leih guangc yie. Kungx maaih hmuangx zoux yie nyei doic hnangv.
88.12: Yiem hmuangx nyei dorngx ninh mbuo fungc hiuv duqv meih zoux nyei mbuoqc horngh sic? Yiem la'kuqv mienh nyei dorngx ninh mbuo haih hiuv duqv meih ziepc zuoqv nyei jauv fai?
88.13: Mv baac Ziouv aac, yie heuc jienv jouh meih. Lungh ndorm yie daux gaux tov meih.
88.5: Yie hnangv zuqc guangc yiem janx-daic mbu'ndongx nyei mienh nor, hnangv zuqc daix daic nyei mienh bueix jienv zouv gu'nyuoz, dongh meih maiv zoix jangx nyei mienh, yaac nqaeqv ndutv maiv duqv meih tengx.
88.11: Yiem zouv gu'nyuoz ninh mbuo gorngv meih ziepc zuoqv hnamv mienh nyei fai? Yiem zuqc mietc nyei dorngx gorngv taux meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnyouv fai?
88.14: O Ziouv aac, meih weic haaix diuc guangc yie? Weic haaix diuc buang meih nyei hmien, maiv mangc yie?
88.3: Weic zuqc yie nyei hnyouv maaih kuonx naanh buangv nzengc. Yie nyei maengc yiem nitv fatv yiemh gen.
88.10: Meih weic daic mingh nyei mienh zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic fai? Ninh mbuo haih jiez sin ceng meih fai? Selaa
88.2: Tov bun yie daux gaux nyei waac daaih taux meih nyei nza'hmien. Tov baeng m'normh muangx yie heuc jienv tov nyei waac.
88.1: O Ziouv, yie nyei njoux en nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Yie lungh hnoi lungh muonz yiem meih nyei nza'hmien heuc jienv jouh meih.
88.4: Yie funx caux aav lamh bieqc yiemh gen wuov deix fih hnangv nyei. Yie yaac hnangv maiv maaih qaqv nyei mienh. Selaa
88.6: Meih zorqv yie dapv ndo jiex nyei kuotv, youc hmuangx youc ndo nyei dorngx.
88.8: Meih bun yie nyei loz-gaeng doic guangc yie, yaac bun ninh mbuo gamh nziev yie. Yie zuqc kuonx jienv, maiv haih biaux maiv ndutv.
88.9: Laaix nzauh kouv yie nyei m'zing maiv njang. O Ziouv aac, yie hnoi-hnoi heuc jienv tov meih. Yie sung buoz hungx jienv meih daux gaux.
88.7: Meih nouz yie hnangv ngatv jienv yie nyei sin, yaac hnangv wuom-laangc nqomz jienv yie nor. Selaa
88.17: Naaiv deix ziangh hnoi weih jienv yie, hnangv wuom yiemx nor, yiem biei bung dangv jienv yie.
88.16: Meih qiex jiez nouz hnangv ngatv jienv yie. Meih bun yie zuqc gamh nziex nyei sic zorqv yie mietc nzengc.

120.2: O Ziouv aac, tov njoux yie biaux ndutv gorngv-baeqc nyei mienh, caux nduov mienh nyei mienh.
120.1: Yie zuqc kouv naanc nyei ziangh hoc yie heuc Ziouv, ninh yaac dau yie.
120.5: Yie zuqc kouv aqv, weic zuqc yie yiem Mesekv Deic, yaac yiem Ke^ndaa nyei ndopv-liuh mbu'ndongx.
120.6: Yie yiem nzorng baengh orn nyei jauv wuov deix mienh mbu'ndongx lauh jiex ndaangc.
120.4: Ninh oix longc mborqv jaax baeng nyei forng-cang laic nyei, caux maaih douz nyei douz-taanx dingc meih nyei zuiz.
120.3: Meih mbuo gorngv-baeqc nyei mienh aah! Oix zuqc bun haaix nyungc meih? Aengx jaa haaix nyungc bun meih?
120.7: Yie oix taaix-baengh, mv baac yie gorngv nyei ziangh hoc, ninh mbuo oix mborqv jaax.

146.10: Ziouv  yietc liuz zoux hungh. O Si^on aah! Meih nyei Tin-Hungh duqv gunv taux maanc gouv maanc doic. Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.
146.2: Da'faanh yie ziangh jienv nyei hnoi-nyieqc yie oix ceng Ziouv.  Yie yietc seix oix baaux nzung ceng yie nyei Tin-Hungh.
146.1: Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.    Yie nyei hnyouv aac, oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.
146.5: Maaih Yaakopv nyei Tin-Hungh tengx wuov dauh maaih orn-lorqc, se kaux Ziouv, ninh nyei Tin-Hungh, maaih lamh hnamv dorngx,
146.6: dongh zeix lungh zeix ndau zeix koiv, caux yiem naaiv deix gu'nyuoz nyei maanc muotc, ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv ei jienv ninh nyei waac zoux.
146.8: Ziouv bun m'zing maengh nyei mienh haih mangc duqv buatc. Zuqc kouv nyei mienh, Ziouv  yaac liepc jiez.   Ziouv  hnamv kuv mienh.
146.9: Ziouv goux jienv yiem deic-bung nyei ganh fingx mienh, ninh tengx guh hanh fu'jueiv caux auv-guaav, mv baac ninh bun orqv mienh nyei za'eix hoic ninh mbuo zuqc baaic.
146.4: Ninh yietv dangx qiex ziouc nzuonx benx nie. Dongh wuov hnoi ninh daav nyei za'eix zuqc mietc nzengc mi'aqv.
146.3: Meih mbuo maiv dungx kaux zoux hlo nyei mienh, maiv dungx kaux baamh mienh, weic zuqc ninh mbuo maiv haih tengx maiv duqv.
146.7: Ninh baengh fim nyei siemv tengx zuqc zeix nyei mienh yaac ceix nyanc hopv bun hnyouv sie nyei mienh nyanc.   Ziouv bun zuqc wuonx nyei mienh duqv bungx nqoi.

100.5: weic zuqc Ziouv za'gengh longx haic. Ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh. Ninh maaih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnyouv taux maanc gouv maanc doic.
100.3: Oix zuqc hiuv duqv Ziouv se Tin-Hungh, se dongh ninh zeix mbuo daaih, mbuo yaac benx ninh nyei,  mbuo benx ninh nyei baeqc fingx, ninh nyei miev-ciangv nyei ba'gi yungh.
100.2: Oix zuqc a'hneiv nyei fu-sux Ziouv, oix zuqc baaux jienv nzung daaih yiem ninh nyei nza'hmien.
100.1: Lungh ndiev nyei zuangx mienh aah! Oix zuqc njien-youh nyei heuc jienv ceng Ziouv.
100.4: Oix zuqc dor-ziec jienv bieqc ninh nyei singx dinc nyei laatc gaengh, ceng jienv bieqc laatc gu'nyuoz. Oix zuqc dor-ziec ninh, ceng ninh nyei mengh,

66.15: Yie oix fongc horc junc nyei saeng-kuv zoux buov ziec nyei ga'naaiv caux jienv ba'gi yungh gouv zoux ndaang nyei qiex. Yie longc ngongh gouv caux yungh gouv fongc horc bun meih. Selaa
66.18: Se gorngv yie sueih zuiz yiem yie nyei hnyouv, Ziouv zungv maiv muangx yie.
66.12: Meih bun mienh geh mborqv jaax cie nganx yie mbuo nyei m'nqorngv. Yie mbuo zuqc jiex wuom jiex douz, mv baac meih dorh yie mbuo taux norm bungx-zuoqc nyei deic-bung.
66.13: Yie oix dorh buov ziec nyei ga'naaiv bieqc meih nyei biauv. Yie oix jaauv sung yie laengz nyei ngaengc waac
66.19: Mv baac Tin-Hungh za'gengh muangx yie. Ninh baeng m'normh muangx yie daux gaux nyei waac.
66.5: Daaih mangc Tin-Hungh zoux nyei sic maah! Ninh yiem baamh mienh mbu'ndongx zoux domh mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.
66.20: Ceng Tin-Hungh weic zuqc ninh maiv nqemh yie daux gaux nyei waac. Ninh ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv yie, maiv guangc yie.
66.11: Meih bun yie mbuo zuqc mungz zaaux jienv,  bun yie mbuo zuqc siouc kouv hnangv zorqv hniev nyei ga'naaiv bun yie mbuo nyiex.
66.14: ziux zuqc kuonx naanh nyei ziangh hoc caux yie nyei nzuih meix gorngv cuotv nyei waac, se yie nyei nzuih laengz nyei.
66.3: Oix zuqc mbuox Tin-Hungh, “Meih zoux nyei sic za'gengh mbuoqc horngh haic. Meih nyei qaqv henv haic, meih nyei win-wangv ziouc nyiemc faix aengx puoqv njiec meih nyei nza'hmien.
66.10: O Tin-Hungh aah! Meih kauv yie mbuo. Meih sinx yie mbuo hnangv sinx nyaanh nor.
66.2: Baaux nzung ceng ninh njang-laangc nyei mbuox. Ceng ninh bun cing ninh njang-laangc haic.
66.1: Lungh ndiev nyei zuangx mienh aah! Oix zuqc njien-youh nyei heuc jienv ceng Tin-Hungh.
66.4: Lungh ndiev nyei zuangx mienh baaix meih. Ninh mbuo baaux nzung ceng meih. Ninh mbuo baaux nzung ceng meih nyei mengh.” Selaa
66.6: Ninh tiuv koiv benx ndau-nqaai, yie mbuo nyei ong-taaix  yangh jauv jiex ndaaih. Yie mbuo yiem wuov weic ninh zoux nyei sic  njien-youh.
66.8: Maanc fingx mienh aah! Oix zuqc ceng yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh, bun mienh muangx duqv haiz ceng ninh nyei qiex mbui.
66.9: Ninh beu jienv bun yie mbuo maaih maengc ziangh, yaac maiv bun yie mbuo nyei zaux caaiv piatv.
66.7: Ninh longc domh qaqv yietc liuz gunv, ninh nyei m'zing zanc-zanc mangc jienv maanc fingx. Oix ngaengc Tin-Hungh wuov deix maiv dungx ceng ganh hlo. Selaa
66.17: Yie heuc jienv tov ninh, yie longc yie nyei mbietc ceng ninh, taaih ninh.
66.16: Da'faanh taaih Tin-Hungh nyei mienh gunv daaih muangx maah! Yie ziouc mbuox meih mbuo ninh weic yie zoux nyei sic.

56.12: O Tin-Hungh aah! Yie oix zuqc jaauv sung yie caux meih laengz nyei ngaengc waac. Yie oix zorqv ziec weic laengz zingh nyei ga'naaiv fongc horc bun meih.
56.13: Weic zuqc meih njoux yie nyei maengc biaux ndutv zuqc daic nyei jauv, yaac bun yie nyei zaux maiv zuqc ndorpc, weic bun yie yiem Tin-Hungh nyei nza'hmien, maaih ziangh maengc nyei njang ziux jienv.
56.5: Ninh mbuo ziangh hnoi mbienv yie nyei waac. Ninh mbuo hnamv nyei jauv yietc zungv kungx oix hoic yie hnangv.
56.11: Yie kaux Tin-Hungh zungv maiv gamh nziex. Baamh mienh haih zoux haaix nyungc bun yie?
56.3: Yie gamh nziex nyei ziangh hoc yie kaux meih.
56.10: Yie kaux Tin-Hungh, dongh yie ceng ninh nyei waac. Yie kaux Ziouv, dongh yie ceng ninh nyei waac wuov dauh.
56.2: Yie nyei win-wangv ziangh hnoi ki yie, weic zuqc ceng-hlo, mborqv yie nyei mienh camv haic.
56.1: O Tin-Hungh aac, tov korv-lienh yie, weic zuqc mienh caaiv yie. Ninh mbuo ziangh hnoi mborqv yie, zeix yie.
56.4: Yie kaux Tin-Hungh, dongh yie ceng ninh nyei waac wuov dauh, yie kaux Tin-Hungh, yie zungv maiv gamh nziex. Baamh mienh haih zoux haaix nyungc bun yie?
56.6: Ninh mbuo gapv zunv bingx jienv cienh mangc yie zoux nyei nyungc-nyungc jauv, zuov jienv oix zorqv yie nyei maengc.
56.8: Yie buangh nyei kuonx naanh meih saauv jienv. Yie nyei wuom-mueic meih yaac dapv jienv meih nyei ndopv-mbuoqc. Naaiv maiv zeiz fiev jienv meih nyei sou-daan fai?
56.9: Yie heuc jienv tov nyei hnoi-nyieqc, yie nyei win-wangv oix tuix nzuonx nqa'haav. Yie hiuv duqv Tin-Hungh za'gengh oix tengx yie.
56.7: O Tin-Hungh aac, tov dingc ninh mbuo nyei zuiz weic ninh mbuo zoux nyei orqv sic. Tov meih qiex jiez jienv bun wuov deix zuangx mienh zuqc baaic njiec.

63.11: Mv baac hungh diex oix kaux Tin-Hungh njien-youh. Da'faanh ziangv jienv ninh houv waac nyei mienh oix ceng ninh, weic zuqc gorngv-baeqc wuov deix zungv zuqc nqapc jienv nzuih.
63.10: Ninh mbuo oix zuqc nzuqc ndaauv daix, zuqc hieh juv betv nyanc.
63.2: Yie yiem singx dinc buatc jiex meih, buatc meih nyei qaqv caux njang-laangc.
63.1: Tin-Hungh aah! Meih zoux yie nyei Tin-Hungh, yie longc hnyouv zimh lorz meih. Yie nyei hnyouv ngorc haic meih, yie za'gengh! oix haic meih hnangv yiem deic-bung-haanz mborngx nqaai, maiv maaih wuom nyei dorngx nor.
63.5: Yie nyei hnyouv hnangv nyanc beuv yinh wuic nyei lai-hnaangx. Yie nyei nzuih yaac oix njien-youh nyei ceng meih.
63.6: Yie bueix jienv coux jangx taux meih, lungh muonz zanc yaac fei-fangv taux meih.
63.8: Yie nyei hnyouv kaux wuonv meih. Meih nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz baav jienv yie.
63.9: Oix hoic yie nyei maengc wuov deix mienh zungv oix ndortv njiec yiemh gen.
63.4: Da'faanh corc maaih maengc nyei ziangh hoc yie oix ceng meih. Yie oix dengv meih nyei mengh sung yie nyei buoz daux gaux.
63.3: Weic zuqc meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh se gauh longx ziangh maengc, yie nyei nzuih ziouc oix ceng meih.
63.7: Weic zuqc meih zanc-zanc tengx yie, yie yiem meih nyei ndaatv-ndiev nyei dongh linh njien-youh nyei baaux nzung.

111.10: Taaih Ziouv zoux gorn bun mienh maaih cong-mengh. Da'faanh ei jienv ninh nyei lingc wuov deix haih mengh baeqc longx. Oix zuqc yietc liuz ceng ninh.
111.2: Ziouv zoux nyei sic za'gengh hlo haic, da'faanh a'hneiv nyei mienh longc hnyouv zaah.
111.1: Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.    Yie oix yiem hnyouv zingx nyei mienh gapv zunv nyei mbu'ndongx longc nzengc hnyouv dor-ziec Ziouv.
111.5: Ninh ceix nyanc hopv bun taaih ninh wuov deix. Ninh yietc liuz jangx ninh laengz nyei ngaengc waac.
111.6: Ninh bun ninh nyei baeqc fingx buatc ninh longc domh qaqv zoux nyei jauv, ninh zorqv ziex fingx nyei guoqv jiu bun ninh mbuo benx ninh mbuo nzipc nyei buonc.
111.8: Naaiv deix hatc nyei waac liepc daaih wuonv taux yietc liuz, yaac ziepc zuoqv, hnyouv zingx nyei zoux.
111.9: Ninh zuoqc ninh nyei baeqc fingx yaac liepc ninh nyei ngaengc waac taux yietc liuz. Ninh nyei mengh se cing-nzengc, bun mienh gamh nziex nyei.
111.4: Ninh zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic bun mienh jangx,   Ziouv ceix en yaac korv-lienh mienh.
111.3: Ninh zoux nyei sic maaih njang-laangc, maaih haangh daauh buangv nzengc. Ninh zoux horpc nyei jauv yietc liuz yiem.
111.7: Ninh nyei buoz zoux nyei gong se ziepc zuoqv baengh fim nyei, ninh hatc nyei yietc zungv waac kaux duqv wuonv nyei.

33.21: Yie mbuo nyei hnyouv zungv kaux ninh njien-youh, weic zuqc yie mbuo kaux ninh nyei cing-nzengc mbuox.
33.15: Ninh se zeix ziangx ninh mbuo zuangx mienh nyei hnyouv, ninh mengh baeqc ninh mbuo zoux nyei yietc zungv sic.
33.12: Maaih Ziouv zoux ninh mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh wuov norm guoqv nyei mienh maaih orn-lorqc. Se ninh ginv daaih zoux ninh ganh nzipc nyei wuov deix baeqc fingx maaih orn-lorqc.
33.17: Kaux mborqv jaax nyei maaz weic hingh jiex se maiv lamh hnamv aqv. Maiv gunv maaz nyei qaqv hlo, maiv haih njoux mienh.
33.20: Yie mbuo nyei hnyouv maaih lamh hnamv zuov jienv Ziouv. Ninh tengx mbuo yaac zoux mbuo nyei torngv-baaih.
33.4: Weic zuqc Ziouv nyei waac se zien nyei, ninh zoux nyei yietc zungv gong ninh ziepc zuoqv nyei zoux.
33.19: Ninh oix njoux ninh mbuo, bun ninh mbuo maiv zuqc daic, ngorc hnaangx nyei ziangh hoc yaac bun ninh mbuo maaih maengc ziangh jienv.
33.18: Mv baac Ziouv nyei m'zing mangc jienv gamh nziex ninh, taaih ninh wuov deix, dongh kaux ninh ziepc zuoqv hnamv mienh nyei hnyouv wuov deix.
33.22: Ziouv aac, tov meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv yie mbuo, weic zuqc yie mbuo kaux meih maaih lamh hnamv dorngx.
33.13: Ziouv yiem gu'nguaaic lungh mangc njiec, ninh buatc nzengc yietc zungv baamh mienh.
33.9: Weic zuqc ninh yietv gorngv, baamh gen ziouc maaih daaih aqv. Ninh yietv hatc, maanc muotc ziouc cuotv daaih.
33.5: Haaix nyungc horpc nyei, baengh fim nyei, ninh hnamv.   Ziouv ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv gormx lungh ndiev ndau-beih.
33.14: Ninh yiem ninh zueiz nyei weic mangc njiec lungh ndiev maanc mienh yietc zungv.
33.3: Dorng jienv ninh baaux diuh siang-nzung, patv daanh baah liouc nyei, yaac heuc mbui nyei.
33.7: Ninh zorqv koiv nyei wuom siou zunv hnangv dapv gingx-baengh, zorqv ndo haic nyei koiv zaangh jienv yiem siou ga'naaiv nyei dorngx.
33.10: Ziouv bun zuangx fingx caangh laangh nyei jauv maiv lamh longc, ninh bun maanc fingx nyei za'eix zoux maiv cuotv haaix nyungc.
33.2: Oix zuqc patv daanh baah ceng Ziouv, longc maaih ziepc diuh finx nyei daanh baah patv nzung ceng ninh.
33.1: Kuv mienh aah! Oix zuqc kaux Ziouv orn-lorqc. Hnyouv zingx nyei mienh horpc zuqc ceng ninh.
33.6: Ziouv longc ninh nyei waac zeix cuotv lungh, yaac longc ninh nyei nzuih nyei qiex zeix cuotv mba'hnoi caux hlaax caux hleix.
33.8: Tov bun gormx lungh ndiev taaih Ziouv. Tov bun lungh ndiev mienh gamh nziex ninh.
33.11: Ziouv caangh laangh nyei waac yietc liuz yiem, ninh yiem hnyouv hnamv cuotv nyei za'eix yiem taux maanc gouv maanc doic.
33.16: Hungh diex maiv zeiz weic kaux baeng camv duqv hingh. Mborqv jaax henv nyei baeng maiv zeiz weic qaqv hlo duqv njoux.

35.21: Ninh mbuo morngx nqoi nzuih mangc jienv yie gorngv, “Haav, haav! Yie mbuo nyei m'zing zungv buatc liuz aqv.”
35.15: Yie buangh zuqc kouv ninh mbuo lomh nzoih a'hneiv. Ninh mbuo gapv zunv jatv yie. Dongh yie maiv hiuv nyei mienh maiv dingh liouh nyei gorngv doqc yie.
35.12: Weic yie zoux nyei kuv sic ninh mbuo winh orqv bun yie, yie nyei hnyouv ndoqc kouv.
35.17: O Ziouv aah! Meih oix mangc jienv yaac maiv tengx yie ndongc haaix lauh? Tov meih njoux yie biaux ndutv maiv zuqc ninh mbuo zoux doqc hoic, njoux yie nyei maengc leih ndutv naaiv deix sienh.
35.20: Ninh mbuo maiv gorngv baengh orn nyei waac. Daaux nzuonx ninh mbuo hnamv cuotv nduov mienh nyei waac hoic yiem deic-bung sekv nyei mienh.
35.4: Tov bun oix zorqv yie nyei maengc wuov deix zuqc nyaiv, zuqc baaic. Tov bun daav za'eix hoic yie wuov deix tuix nzuonx yaac zuqc nyaiv.
35.28: Yie oix zunh gorngv meih se baengh fim nyei, yie oix ziangh hnoi ceng meih.
35.19: Tov meih maiv dungx bun zoux win-wangv mv baac maiv maaih gorn-baengx wuov deix a'hneiv nyei jatv yie. Maiv dungx bun nzorng yie yaac maiv maaih gorn-baengx wuov deix nzuei kamx-bui bun yie.
35.18: Yie oix yiem gapv zunv nyei domh wuic dor-ziec meih, yie oix yiem mienh camv nyei mbu'ndongx ceng meih.
35.22: O Ziouv aac, meih buatc liuz aqv. Tov meih maiv dungx sekv-sekv nyei yiem. O Ziouv aac, tov meih maiv dungx leih go yie.
35.23: Yie nyei Tin-Hungh, yie nyei Ziouv aah! Tov nyie, dongz sin daaih tengx yie mbenc sung yie nyei sic.
35.13: Yie ganh aeqv, dongh ninh mbuo butv baengc nyei ziangh hoc, yie zuqv la'maah ndie-cou, zei maiv nyanc haaix nyungc, ndoqv m'nqorngv njiec daux gaux,
35.9: Yie nyei hnyouv ziouc kaux Ziouv njien-youh haic, yaac orn-lorqc weic zuqc ninh njoux yie.
35.26: Tov bun a'hneiv yie zuqc kouv naanc wuov deix yietc zungv zuqc nyaiv, zuqc la'nyauv nyei sic. Tov bun ceng ganh gauh hlo yie wuov deix zuqc nyaiv, zuqc baaic hmien.
35.5: Tov bun ninh mbuo hnangv zuqc nziaaux buonc nyei mbieqv nor, maaih Ziouv nyei fin-mienh zunc jienv ninh mbuo mingh.
35.27: Tov bun a'hneiv yie zuqc siemv dingc maiv maaih zuiz wuov deix njien-youh orn-lorqc nyei heuc. Tov bun ninh mbuo zanc-zanc gorngv, “Ziouv se hlo haic. Ninh a'hneiv ninh nyei bou duqv longx.”
35.14: hnangv yie weic yie nyei loz-gaeng doic fai yie nyei muoz-doic nzauh fai hnangv mienh weic ganh nyei cien-maa nzauh nyiemv, yie ndoqv m'nqorngv nyiemv.
35.3: Yaamh jiez cang caux mborqv jaax nyei bouv mborqv zunc yie wuov deix mienh. Tov meih caux yie nyei hnyouv gorngv waac, “Yie se dongh njoux meih wuov dauh.”
35.7: Weic zuqc ninh mbuo zaeng mungz zorqv yie yaac maiv maaih gorn-baengx. Ninh mbuo yaac wetv kuotv ndo nyei oix zorqv yie nyei maengc, yaac maiv maaih gorn-baengx.
35.10: Yie oix longc nzengc hnyouv gorngv, “O Ziouv  aac, haaix dauh hnangv meih? Meih tengx mau nyei mienh biaux ndutv gauh henv ninh mbuo wuov deix, yaac njoux mau nyei, dangx-donx nyei mienh biaux ndutv luv ninh mbuo wuov deix.”
35.2: Tov nanv jienv domh torngv-baaih, fiuv-torngv-baaih daaih tengx yie.
35.1: O Ziouv aac, caux yie doix-dekc nyei mienh, tov meih caux ninh mbuo doix-dekc. Caux yie mborqv jaax nyei mienh, tov meih caux ninh mbuo mborqv.
35.6: Tov bun ninh mbuo nyei jauv youc hmuangx youc mbiaangc, yaac maaih Ziouv nyei fin-mienh zunc ninh mbuo.
35.8: Ninh mbuo jangx maiv zaaic nyei ziangh hoc, tov bun ninh mbuo zuqc mietc, bun ninh mbuo zaeng nyei mungz hlopv ninh mbuo ganh, yaac bun ninh mbuo ndortv njiec ninh mbuo ganh wetv nyei kuotv zuqc mietc.
35.24: Ziouv,  yie nyei Tin-Hungh aac, meih se baengh fim nyei. Tov bun cing yie maiv zoux dorngc zuiz. Maiv dungx bun ninh mbuo a'hneiv nyei jatv yie.
35.25: Tov maiv dungx bun ninh mbuo yiem ninh mbuo nyei hnyouv hnamv cuotv daaih gorngv, “Haav, haav! Ziux yie mbuo oix duqv daaih yie mbuo duqv aqv.” Yaac maiv dungx bun ninh mbuo gorngv, “Yie mbuo duqv naqv ninh mi'aqv.”
35.11: Hiuang orqv nyei mienh cuotv daaih zoux zorng-zengx, gorngv taux yie liemh maiv hiuv nyei sic.
35.16: Hnangv maiv hiuv Tin-Hungh nyei mienh ninh mbuo huotv yie, ninh mbuo ngaatc jienv nyaah mangc yie.

122.2: O Ye^lu^saa^lem Zingh aac, yie mbuo nyei zaux souv jienv meih nyei zingh gaengh gu'nyuoz.
122.1: Maaih mienh mbuox yie, “Mbuo mingh zaangc Ziouv nyei biauv orqc?” Yie ziouc njien-youh haic.
122.5: Yiem naaiv liepc siemv zuiz nyei weic, se Ndaawitv douh zong nyei weic.
122.6: Oix zuqc daux gaux tov bun Ye^lu^saa^lem duqv baengh orn, “Tov bun hnamv meih wuov deix duqv longx,
122.8: Weic yie nyei gorx-youz caux loz-gaeng doic yie oix gorngv, “Tov yiem meih gu'nyuoz taaix-baengh.”
122.9: Weic Ziouv, yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh nyei biauv, yie oix tengx meih duqv longx.
122.4: Zuangx fingx, se Ziouv  nyei fingx, daaih taux naaiv, ziux dingc daaih bun I^saa^laa^en Mienh zoux, weic dor-ziec Ziouv  nyei mengh.
122.3: Ye^lu^saa^lem ceix daaih benx norm zingh zunv nyei, wuonv nyei.
122.7: bun yiem meih nyei zingh laatc gu'nyuoz baengh orn, bun meih nyei hungh dinc taaix-baengh.”

42.11: Yie nyei hnyouv weic haaix diuc ndongc naaiv nzauh? Yie nyei hnyouv weic haaix diuc paan-paan puoqv-puoqv nyei? Oix zuqc kaux Tin-Hungh maaih lamh hnamv dorngx weic zuqc yie aengx duqv ceng ninh, dongh njoux yie yaac zoux yie nyei Tin-Hungh.
42.10: Yie nyei win-wangv huotv yie hnangv zoux bun yie nyei mbungv nauv nzengc. Ninh mbuo maiv dingh liouh nyei naaic, “Meih nyei Tin-Hungh yiem haaix?”
42.2: Yie nyei hnyouv ngorc Tin-Hungh, se ziangh jienv nyei Tin-Hungh. Yie taux haaix zanc cingx duqv mingh buatc Tin-Hungh nyei hmien?
42.1: O Tin-Hungh aac, yie nyei hnyouv ngorc meih hnangv njaih ngorc ndoqv nyei wuom-daaih nor.
42.5: Yie weic haaix diuc ndongc naaiv nzauh? Yie nyei hnyouv weic haaix diuc paan-paan puoqv-puoqv nyei? Oix zuqc kaux Tin-Hungh maaih lamh hnamv dorngx weic zuqc yie aengx duqv ceng ninh, dongh njoux yie yaac zoux yie nyei Tin-Hungh.
42.6: Yie nyei hnyouv za'gengh mun haic, yie ziouc yiem Jor^ndaen Deic, caux Hemon Mbong caux Misaa Mbong jangx zuqc meih.
42.8: Lungh hnoi zanc Ziouv laauc yaangh ninh ziepc zuoqv hnamv nyei jauv, lungh muonz zanc bun yie baaux ninh nyei nzung daux gaux bun yie nyei ziangh maengc nyei Tin-Hungh.
42.9: Yie gorngv mbuox yie nyei La'bieiv, se Tin-Hungh, “Meih weic haaix diuc la'kuqv yie?” Yie weic haaix diuc oix zuqc zanc-zanc nzauh nyiemv, laaix win-wangv hoic jienv yie?
42.4: Yie jangx zuqc naaiv deix ziex nyungc sic yie hnyouv mun jienv yiem. Yie jangx zuqc zinh ndaangc caux mienh camv mingh. Yie dorh jienv ninh mbuo bieqc zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei biauv. Zuangx mienh lomh nzoih jiex zipv, heuc jienv baaux nzung laengz zingh.
42.3: Yie ziangh hnoi ziangh muonz nyanc wuom-mueic dorngx hnaangx. Mienh yaac maiv dingh liouh nyei naaic yie, “Meih nyei Tin-Hungh yiem haaix?”
42.7: Wuom ndortv meih nyei domh mbaengx hnangv mba'ong nor, njunh njunh nyei mbui. Ndo nyei dorngx aengv bieqc ndo nyei dorngx. Meih nyei domh wuom-laangc nqomz jiex yie gu'nguaaic.

4.2: O meih mbuo naaiv deix mienh aah! Meih mbuo oix mangc piex bun yie zuqc nyaiv taux haaix zanc? Meih mbuo oix longc maiv lamh longc nyei waac yaac lorz gorngv-baeqc nyei jauv taux haaix zanc? Selaa
4.1: O yie nyei baengh fim nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Yie heuc nyei ziangh hoc tov meih dau yie. Yie buangh zuqc kuonx naanh nyei ziangh hoc, meih bun yie maaih jauv cuotv. Tov korv-lienh yie, muangx yie daux gaux nyei waac.
4.5: Oix zuqc fongc horc dongh horpc zuqc fongc horc ziec nyei ga'naaiv, yaac sienx kaux Ziouv.
4.6: Maaih mienh camv gorngv, “Haaix dauh haih bun yie mbuo buatc haaix nyungc longx?” O Ziouv, tov bun meih nyei hmien nyei njang ziux yie mbuo.
4.8: Yie oix baengh orn nyei bueix njiec m'njormh weic zuqc Ziouv aac, kungx meih ganh bun yie duqv yiem longx.
4.4: Qiex jiez nyei ziangh hoc maiv dungx baamz zuiz. Bueix jienv coux sekv nzieqc nyei, yiem hnyouv longx-longx nyei hnamv. Selaa
4.3: Oix zuqc hiuv duqv Ziouv ginv cuotv gan longx Tin-Hungh nyei mienh weic ninh ganh. Yie heuc Ziouv nyei ziangh hoc, ninh yaac muangx yie.
4.7: Meih bun yie nyei hnyouv orn-lorqc gauh camv duqv mbiauh caux siang-a'ngunc diuv camv nyei mienh.

131.3: O I^saa^laa^en Mienh aac, oix zuqc kaux Ziouv maaih lamh hnamv dorngx, yiem naaiv mingh taux yietc liuz.
131.2: Mv baac yie bun yie nyei hnyouv sekv nzieqc, baengh orn nyei, hnangv guangc ndutv nyorx nyei gu'nguaaz yiem maa nyei la'kuotv sekv nzieqc, yie nyei hnyouv yiem yie gu'nyuoz baengh orn nyei hnangv dangx ndutv nyorx nyei gu'nguaaz.
131.1: O Ziouv  aac, yie nyei hnyouv maiv ceng-hlo, m'zing yaac maiv mangc hlang. Yie maiv la'nyauv taux haaix nyungc hlo nyei sic fai jiex ndaangc yie haih bieqc hnyouv nyei mbuoqc horngh sic.

29.11: Tov Ziouv ceix qaqv bun ninh nyei baeqc fingx. Tov Ziouv ceix fuqv bun ninh nyei mienh duqv baengh orn.
29.10: Ziouv zueiz jienv weic gunv mbiungc-suiv-imx.   Ziouv zueiz jienv weic, yietc liuz zoux hungh.
29.2: Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv puix ninh njang-laangc nyei mbuox. Oix zuqc zaangc Ziouv weic ninh cing-nzengc nyei mbuox njang-laangc haic.
29.1: Yiem lungh nyei zuangx fin-mienh aah! Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.  Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv  nyei njang-laangc caux qaqv.
29.5: Ziouv nyei qiex wuotv nauv si^ndaa zongh ndiangx.   Ziouv wuotv nauv Le^mbaa^norn nyei si^ndaa zongh ndiangx.
29.6: Ninh bun Le^mbaa^norn Geh dongz hnangv ngongh dorn ndiuh lungh, yaac bun Si^li^on Mbong dongz hnangv hieh ngongh gouv caan biu nor.
29.8: Ziouv nyei sing-qiex ndanc dongz deic-bung-huaang.   Ziouv nqamv dongz Kaa^ndetc nyei deic-bung-huaang.
29.9: Ziouv nyei qiex ndanc domh mba'ong zuei ndiangx, yaac bun lomc nyei ndiangx-normh bioh nzengc. Yiem ninh nyei singx dinc nyei yietc zungv mienh yaac heuc jienv, “Njang-laangc!”
29.4: Ziouv nyei sing-qiex maaih domh qaqv,   Ziouv nyei sing-qiex maaih haangh daauh hlo haic.
29.3: Ziouv nyei sing-qiex yiem wuov koiv gu'nguaaic. Njang-laangc nyei Tin-Hungh nyei qiex mbui hnangv mba'ong mbui nor,   Ziouv  nyei sing-qiex aengv buangv koiv.
29.7: Ziouv nyei sing-qiex njopc cuotv benx douz-mbietc.

150.2: Ceng ninh weic ninh zoux domh qaqv nyei sic. Ceng ninh weic zuqc ninh za'gengh! hlo haic.
150.1: Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.    Oix zuqc yiem ninh nyei singx dinc ceng Tin-Hungh, oix zuqc yiem ninh nernh haic nyei lungh ceng ninh.
150.5: Nqaapv caauh zeiv ceng ninh, longc caauh zeiv nqaapv qom-qaau nyei mbui ceng ninh.
150.6: Yietc zungv haih tauv qiex nyei ga'naaiv oix zuqc ceng Ziouv. Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.
150.4: Mborqv nzoz, cangx heix ceng ninh, patv daanh baah, biomv hlauv-ndongh nux ceng ninh.
150.3: Longc nzatc ceng ninh, longc domh daanh baah, fiuv-daanh baah ceng ninh.

13.2: Yie oix zuqc yiem hnyouv diev mun ndongc haaix lauh? Yie nyei hnyouv oix zuqc nzauh taux haaix zanc? Yie nyei win-wangv oix hingh jiex yie taux haaix zanc?
13.1: O Ziouv aac, meih oix la'kuqv yie taux haaix zanc? Oix yietc liuz la'kuqv fai? Meih oix buang jienv hmien maiv mangc yie taux haaix zanc?
13.5: Mv baac yie kaux meih weic zuqc meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv yie. Yie nyei hnyouv weic meih nyei njoux en orn-lorqc haic.
13.6: Yie oix baaux nzung ceng Ziouv,  weic zuqc ninh za'gengh zoux longx bun yie.
13.4: Nziex yie nyei win-wangv gorngv, “Yie hingh jiex ninh mi'aqv.” Nziex yie nyei win-jaa njien-youh a'hneiv weic zuqc yie zuqc ndortv.
13.3: O Ziouv, yie nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Tov mangc yie yaac dau yie. Tov bun yie maaih qaqv hnangv loz wuov nor. Maiv zei aeqv, nziex yie zuqc daic.

80.15: dongh meih nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz zuangx nyei a'ngunc hmei, se meih weic ganh bun hlo daaih henv nyei.
80.18: Hnangv naaic yie mbuo ziouc yietc liuz maiv tuix nzuonx leih nqoi meih. Tov bun yie mbuo duqv maengc ziangh, yie mbuo ziouc jouh meih, kaux meih nyei mbuox.
80.12: Meih weic haaix diuc mborqv waaic naaiv norm laatc? Jiex jauv nyei yietc zungv mienh ziouc gaeqv biouv.
80.13: Hieh dungz yiem lomc cuotv daaih caaiv waaic, yiem lomc-huaang nyei yietc zungv hieh zoih daaih nyanc aqv.
80.19: O Nernh Jiex nyei Ziouv  Tin-Hungh aac, tov bun yie mbuo aengx duqv longx hnangv loz wuov nor. Tov bun meih nyei hmien aengv cuotv njang, weic bun yie mbuo duqv njoux.
80.5: Meih zorqv wuom-mueic dorngx hnaangx bun ninh mbuo nyanc, aengx hlaau wuom-mueic camv nyei bun ninh mbuo hopv.
80.11: Hmei nyei nquaah mbiorngz mingh taux domh koiv, hmei nyei cunx mingh taux Yu^fe^ditc Ndaaih.
80.14: O Nernh Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh aac, tov meih huin nzuonx. Tov yiem wuov lungh mangc buatc, aengx goux naaiv diuh a'ngunc hmei,
80.3: O Tin-Hungh aac, tov bun yie mbuo aengx duqv longx hnangv loz wuov nor. Tov bun meih nyei hmien aengv cuotv njang, weic bun yie mbuo duqv njoux.
80.10: Naaiv diuh hmei nzie jienv geh zorng, hmei nyei nquaah nzie jiex domh si^ndaa zongh ndiangx.
80.2: yiem E^faa^im, Mben^yaa^min caux Maa^natv^se Fingx nyei nza'hmien. Tov longc meih nyei domh qaqv daaih njoux yie mbuo.
80.1: O goux I^saa^laa^en nyei Ziouv aac, dongh dorh Yosepv nyei zeiv-fun hnangv dorh ba'gi yungh wuov dauh aah! Tov baeng m'normh muangx. Meih yiem wuov deix i dauh ke^lu^mbim mbu'ndongx nyei weic, tov aengv cuotv meih nyei njang,
80.4: O Ziouv, Nernh Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Meih oix qiex jiez meih nyei baeqc fingx daux gaux nyei waac ndongc haaix lauh?
80.6: Meih bun weih gormx yie mbuo wuov deix fingx-fingx mienh nzaeng yie mbuo nyei deic-bung. Yie mbuo nyei win-wangv lomh nzoih jatv.
80.8: Meih dorh diuh a'ngunc hmei cuotv I^yipv, meih zunc cuotv fingx-fingx mienh, zorqv naaiv diuh hmei zuangx jienv.
80.9: Meih fioux ndau bun nzungh njiec ndo, hmei mbiorngz buangv deic-bung nzengc.
80.7: O Nernh Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh aac, tov bun yie mbuo aengx duqv longx hnangv loz wuov nor. Tov bun meih nyei hmien aengv cuotv njang, weic bun yie mbuo duqv njoux.
80.17: Tov bun meih nyei buoz maan jienv yiem meih nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz nyei mienh, se dongh meih ganh liepc daaih henv wuov dauh baamh mienh.
80.16: Ninh mbuo longc douz buov naaiv diuh hmei yaac hngaqv njiec nzengc. Tov bun ninh mbuo buatc meih nyei hmien qiex jiez, ziouc mietc ninh mbuo.

129.2: Ninh mbuo hoic yie zuqc kouv yiem yie hnyangx-jeiv lunx taux ih zanc, mv baac ninh mbuo maiv hingh yie.
129.1: Ninh mbuo hoic yie zuqc kouv yiem yie hnyangx-jeiv lunx taux ih zanc. I^saa^laa^en Mienh aah! Ih zanc gorngv maah!
129.5: Tov bun nzorng Si^on wuov deix yietc zungv mienh zuqc nyaiv yaac zuqc tuix nzuonx nqa'haav.
129.6: Tov bun ninh mbuo hnangv yiem biauv-ngorh cuotv nyei miev, maiv gaengh hlo ziouc kou nqaai mi'aqv.
129.8: Jiex jauv nyei mienh maiv gorngv, “Tov Ziouv  ceix fuqv bun meih mbuo. Yie mbuo dengv Ziouv nyei mbuox buang waac bun meih mbuo.”
129.4: Ziouv  se baengh fim nyei. Ninh hngaqv ndutv orqv mienh ndoh nyei hlaang.
129.3: Ninh mbuo mborqv yie nyei diqc daanz butv mbiuz ndaauv nyei, hnangv laih ndau nyei mienh laih ndau nor.
129.7: Gaatv mbiauh nyei mienh maiv zorqv daaih gaatv, sai mbiauh nyei mienh yaac maiv gaux yietc zeiv.

128.2: Meih duqv nyanc meih ganh nyei buoz zoux daaih nyei ga'naaiv, meih ziouc orn-lorqc yaac duqv fuqv-loqc.
128.1: Dauh dauh taaih Ziouv  nyei mienh, dongh gan ninh nyei jauv yangh wuov deix, maaih orn-lorqc.
128.5: Tov Ziouv yiem Si^on ceix fuqv bun meih. Tov bun meih yietc seix buatc Ye^lu^saa^lem duqv longx.
128.6: Yaac tov bun meih maaih maengc ziangh jienv duqv buatc meih nyei fun-faqv. Tov bun I^saa^laa^en duqv baengh orn.
128.4: Mangc maah! Taaih Ziouv nyei mienh zungv oix hnangv naaic duqv fuqv.
128.3: Meih nyei auv oix yiem meih nyei biauv hnangv a'ngunc hmei ziangh biouv gitv nor. Meih nyei naamh nyouz oix weih gormx meih nyei dieh, hnangv ga'lanv ndiangx nyei cunx nor.

142.2: Yie yiem ninh nyei nza'hmien qaqv gorngv yie nyei kouv-zingh kouv-latc, zorqv yie nyei kuonx naanh mbuox ninh.
142.1: Yie cuotv qiex heuc Ziouv,  yie longc yie nyei sing-qiex jouh Ziouv.
142.5: O Ziouv  aac, yie heuc jienv meih. Yie gorngv, “Meih zoux yie ndaauh kaux nyei dorngx, yiem yaangh seix meih zoux yie nyei fuqv-buonc.”
142.6: Tov muangx yie heuc jienv jouh nyei waac, weic zuqc yie kouv taux ndiev. Tov njoux yie biaux ndutv zeix yie wuov deix, weic zuqc ninh mbuo gauh henv yie.
142.4: Tov meih huin mbiaauc bung mangc, maiv maaih haaix dauh ciepv yie. Yie maiv maaih dorngx kaux, maiv maaih haaix dauh maaih hnyouv tengx yie.
142.3: Yie hnyouv mau jienv njiec nyei ziangh hoc, meih hiuv duqv yie nyei jauv-louc. Yiem yie yangh nyei jauv win-wangv zaeng hlaang oix hlopv yie.
142.7: Tov dorh yie cuotv loh, weic bun yie haih dor-ziec meih nyei mengh. Kuv mienh oix weih gormx yie, weic zuqc meih za'gengh zoux longx bun yie.

149.2: Oix zuqc bun I^saa^laa^en Mienh weic Zeix Ninh Mbuo Daaih Wuov Dauh a'hneiv. Oix zuqc bun Si^on nyei baeqc fingx weic ninh mbuo nyei Hungh Diex orn-lorqc.
149.1: Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.    Oix zuqc baaux diuh siang-nzung bun Ziouv. Oix zuqc yiem ninh ziepc zuoqv nyei baeqc fingx gapv zunv nyei dorngx ceng ninh.
149.5: Tov bun gan longx ninh wuov deix weic ninh mbuo duqv hingh jiex nyei njang-laangc njien-youh. Tov bun ninh mbuo yiem ninh mbuo nyei coux njien-youh nyei baaux nzung.
149.6: Tov bun ninh mbuo baaux nzung mbui nyei ceng Tin-Hungh, yaac bun ninh mbuo nyei buoz nanv jienv i maengx laic nyei nzuqc ndaauv,
149.8: weic zorqv ninh mbuo nyei hungh ndoh jienv, yaac longc hlieqv-limc ndoh ninh mbuo zoux hlo nyei mienh,
149.9: weic zoux ziangx ziux fiev jienv oix hnangv haaix nor dingc ninh mbuo nyei zuiz. Naaiv se Tin-Hungh nyei yietc zungv baeqc fingx duqv nyei njang-laangc. Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.
149.4: Weic zuqc Ziouv a'hneiv ninh nyei baeqc fingx, ninh bun nyiemc ganh zoux faix nyei mienh duqv hingh jiex.
149.3: Oix zuqc bun ninh mbuo cangx heix ceng ninh nyei mengh, mborqv nzoz patv daanh baah ceng ninh.
149.7: weic jaauv win bun maanc guoqv mienh, siemv dingc maanc fingx nyei zuiz,

110.2: Ziouv oix yiem Si^on sung cuotv meih nyei domh qaqv nyei biaav, bun meih yiem meih nyei win-wangv mbu'ndongx gunv.
110.1: Ziouv  gorngv mbuox yie nyei Ziouv, “Zueiz jienv yie nyei mbiaauc maengx bung, zuov yie bun meih nyei win-wangv zoux meih lorngx zaux nyei dorngx.”
110.5: Ziouv yiem meih nyei mbiaauc maengx. Taux ninh qiex jiez wuov hnoi, ninh oix mborqv baaic zuangx hungh.
110.6: Ninh oix dingc maanc guoqv mienh nyei zuiz, oix bun janx-daic nyei sei buangv nzengc naaiv deix guoqv. Ninh oix mborqv baaic ndau-beih norm-norm guoqv nyei hungh diex.
110.4: Ziouv laengz ngaengc waac gorngv, nqa'haav zungv maiv tiuv hnyouv, “Meih yietc liuz zoux sai mienh hnangv Men^ki^se^ndekc wuov nyungc sai mienh nor.”
110.3: Meih dorh meih nyei jun-baeng mingh cing-nzengc mbong gu'nguaaic wuov hnoi, meih nyei baeqc fingx a'hneiv zorqv ganh fungx bun meih. Hnangv lungh ndorm nyei mbiungc-suiv meih nyei mienh lunx mienh oix daaih lorz meih.
110.7: Ninh oix hopv jauv-hlen nyei ndoqv nyei wuom, ninh ziouc cau jiez m'nqorngv.

89.21: Yie nyei buoz oix liepc ninh wuonv, yaac oix bun qaqv ninh henv.
89.15: O Ziouv aac, hiuv duqv njien-youh nyei heuc wuov deix mienh maaih orn-lorqc, se yiem meih nyei nza'hmien nyei njang yangh nyei mienh.
89.23: Yie oix yiem ninh nyei wuov ndaangc maengx mborqv muonc ninh nyei win-wangv, yaac daix nzengc yietc zungv nzorng ninh wuov deix mienh.
89.47: O Ziouv aac, tov jangx jienv yie nyei maengc ndongc haaix nangv. Meih zeix mienh maanh daaih bun ninh mbuo ndongc naaic maiv lamh longc yietc deix.
89.20: Yie lorz buatc yie nyei bou, Ndaawitv, yaac longc yie nyei cing-nzengc youh orn ninh.
89.18: Yie mbuo nyei torngv-baaih benx Ziouv  nyei, yie mbuo nyei hungh diex guei I^saa^laa^en nyei Cing-Nzengc Tin-Hungh.
89.33: Mv baac yie ziepc zuoqv hnamv nyei hnyouv yie maiv zorqv nzuonx, yaac maiv guangc yie ziepc zuoqv zoux nyei jauv.
89.43: Meih zungv bun ninh nyei nzuqc ndaauv nyei nza'hmien mbienv mi'aqv, yaac bun ninh yiem mborqv jaax ciangv zuqc suei.
89.48: Maaih haaix dauh ziangh yaac maiv zuqc daic? Fai haaix dauh haih njoux ninh ganh leih ndutv yiemh gen nyei qaqv? Selaa
89.22: Win-wangv zungv maiv haih noic maiv duqv ninh, orqv mienh yaac maiv haih bun ninh zuqc baaic.
89.42: Meih bun ninh nyei win-wangv duqv hingh jiex, bun ninh nyei yietc zungv win-jaa njien-youh.
89.50: O Ziouv aac, tov jangx jienv meih nyei bou hnangv haaix nor zuqc mienh huotv, yaac jangx jienv yie nyei hnyouv hnangv haaix nor diev maanc mienh ki.
89.31: se gorngv ninh mbuo baamz yie nyei leiz-nyeic, yaac maiv gan yie nyei lingc,
89.4: gorngv, “Yie oix liepc meih nyei zeiv-fun taux yietc liuz, liepc meih nyei hungh weic taux maanc gouv maanc doic.  Selaa
89.29: Yie oix liepc ninh nyei hungh douh taux yietc liuz, yaac bun ninh nyei hungh weic ndongc lungh nyei hnoi-nyieqc lauh.
89.9: Meih gunv seix haic nyei koiv. Koiv jiez domh laangc meih bun sekv nzengc.
89.37: aengx hnangv hlaax nor, liepc daaih taux yietc liuz, yaac yiem wuonv ndongc lungh lauh.  Selaa
89.5: O Ziouv aac, tov bun lungh ceng meih zoux wuov deix mbuoqc horngh nyei sic, yaac bun cing-nzengc wuov deix yiem gapv zunv nyei dorngx ceng meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnyouv.
89.3: Meih gorngv, yie caux yie ginv daaih nyei mienh liepc jiez ngaengc waac, yie caux yie nyei bou, Ndaawitv, houv jienv waac
89.39: Meih tuix meih caux meih nyei bou liepc nyei ngaengc waac. Meih zorqv ninh nyei hungh ningv zoi njiec nie-mbung bun maaih uix.
89.6: Yiem wuov lungh maaih haaix dauh haih hnangv Ziouv? Yiem lungh zaangc wuov deix maaih haaix dauh haih ndongc Ziouv?
89.8: O Nernh Jiex nyei Ziouv Tin-Hungh aac, maiv maaih haaix dauh ndongc meih henv. O Ziouv aac, meih zoux nyei yietc zungv se ziepc zuoqv nyei.
89.46: O Ziouv aac, ndongc haaix lauh? Meih oix zorqv meih ganh bingx taux yietc liuz fai? Meih oix qiex jiez hnangv douz buov jienv taux haaix zanc?
89.7: Se yiem cing-nzengc wuov deix nyei wuic gu'nyuoz ninh mbuo taaih nyei Tin-Hungh. Yiem weih gormx ninh nyei yietc zungv ninh gauh hlo gauh peix fuc jiex.
89.32: yie ziouc longc biaav dingc ninh mbuo baamz nyei zuiz, longc biaav-bin mborqv weic ninh mbuo zoux dorngc nyei sic.
89.25: Yie oix bun ninh nyei buoz sung koiv gu'nguaaic, ninh nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz yaac sung ndaaih gu'nguaaic.
89.17: Meih se ninh mbuo nyei qaqv nyei njang-laangc. Meih ceix en bun yie mbuo nyei qaqv henv jienv faaux.
89.12: Naamh bung caux baqv bung meih zeix daaih. Taa^mbo Mbong caux Hemon Mbong njien-youh nyei ceng meih nyei mengh.
89.34: Yie maiv bungx ndortv yie laengz nyei ngaengc waac, yaac maiv goiv yie nyei nzuih gorngv cuotv nyei waac.
89.30: Se gorngv ninh nyei zeiv-fun guangc yie nyei leiz-latc, maiv gan yie nyei leiz,
89.11: Lungh benx meih nyei. Ndau yaac meih nyei. Baamh gen caux yiem baamh gen nyei maanc muotc meih zeix daaih.
89.28: Yie oix ziepc zuoqv nyei yietc liuz hnamv ninh, yie caux ninh liepc nyei ngaengc waac yaac yietc liuz wuonv nyei.
89.44: Meih bun ninh nyei njang-laangc zitc nzengc, yaac zorqv ninh nyei hungh weic fongv njiec ndau.
89.45: Meih jamv ninh lunx nyei ziangh hoc zoqc njiec, yaac bun ninh buang hmien diev nyaiv. Selaa
89.19: Zinh ndaangc lauh aqv, meih yiem laauc yaangh nyei sic gorngv mbuox meih nyei ziepc zuoqv baeqc fingx, “Yie bun qaqv yietc dauh mborqv jaax henv nyei mienh. Yie yiem baeqc fingx mbu'ndongx ginv dauh yaac taaih ninh zoux hlo.
89.35: Yie ziangv jienv yie nyei cing-nzengc mbuox houv nzunc dorngx yietc liuz, yie maiv gorngv-baeqc nduov Ndaawitv.
89.41: Da'faanh jiex jauv nyei mienh caangv ninh nyei ga'naaiv, laangz zaangc mienh yaac huotv ninh.
89.13: Meih nyei buoz maaih qaqv henv haic. Meih nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz yaac sung faaux hlang.
89.40: Meih caeqv nzengc ninh nyei yietc zungv zingh laatc, bun ninh weih jienv wuonv nyei dorngx baaic waaic nzengc.
89.26: Ninh oix heuc jienv mbuox yie, “Meih se yie nyei die, yie nyei Tin-Hungh, caux bun yie duqv njoux nyei La'bieiv.”
89.52: Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv taux yietc liuz.   Aamen caux Aamen.
89.14: Zoux horpc nyei jauv caux baengh fim nyei sic zoux meih nyei weic nyei gorn-ndoqv. Meih zoux nyei yietc zungv se meih hnamv mienh yaac ziepc zuoqv nyei zoux.
89.27: Yie oix bun ninh zoux yie nyei dorn-la'gauv, yiem lungh ndiev zoux gauh hlo jiex nyei hungh.
89.38: Mv baac meih qiex jiez meih longc youh orn daaih wuov dauh ziouc guangc aengx nqemh ninh.
89.49: Ziouv aac, meih zinh ndaangc ziepc zuoqv hnamv nyei hnyouv jiex haaix? Se meih ziepc zuoqv nyei caux Ndaawitv laengz jiex nyei waac yiem haaix?
89.36: Ninh nyei hungh douh oix yietc liuz yiem, ninh nyei hungh weic oix yiem yie nyei nza'hmien ndongc mba'hnoi lauh,
89.10: Meih mborqv huv Laa^hapc hnangv daix daic nyei mienh, meih longc meih henv haic nyei buoz mborqv meih nyei win-wangv nzaanx nzengc.
89.2: Yie oix gorngv meih oix yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh. Meih maaih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnyouv ndongc lungh wuonv.
89.1: O Ziouv aac, yie oix yietc liuz baaux nzung ceng meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh. Yie oix longc yie nyei nzuih zunh meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnyouv gorngv mbuox yietc doic jiex yietc doic.
89.24: Yie oix hnamv ninh yaac ziepc zuoqv nyei caux ninh yiem. Weic yie nyei mengh ninh nyei qaqv oix henv jienv faaux.
89.16: Ninh mbuo weic meih nyei mbuox ziangh hnoi njien-youh. Ninh mbuo yaac ceng meih weic meih zoux horpc nyei jauv.
89.51: O Ziouv aac, meih nyei win-wangv huotv meih longc youh orn daaih wuov dauh. Maiv gunv mingh taux haaix ninh mbuo jatv ninh.

73.21: Yie nyei hnyouv kouv wuov zanc, yie haiz hnangv mba'nziu zuqc baqv jienv mun nor.
73.15: Se gorngv yie gorngv, “Yie oix hnangv naaiv nor gorngv,” yie ziouc zuqc zoux maiv zingx bun meih nyei zuangx baeqc fingx.
73.12: Mangc maah! Orqv mienh se hnangv naaiv nor. Ninh mbuo zanc-zanc kuh yiem kuh nyanc, gunv zoux gunv benx jienv faaux.
73.17: taux yie bieqc Tin-Hungh nyei singx dinc, yie ziouc mengh baeqc orqv mienh nyei setv mueiz hnoi.
73.20: Hnangv mienh mbeix buatc liuz nyie daaih maiv buatc mi'aqv. O Ziouv aah! Meih nyie daaih meih la'kuqv ninh mbuo nyei fangx mi'aqv.
73.4: Ninh mbuo daic nyei ziangh hoc maiv zuqc diev mun, ninh mbuo nyei sin yaac wangc siangx, henv nyei.
73.28: Mv baac yie nor, yie yiem nitv Tin-Hungh fatv se longx haic. Yie bun Ziouv Tin-Hungh  zoux yie ndaauh kaux nyei dorngx, weic bun yie zunh gorngv ninh zoux nyei yietc zungv sic.
73.19: Ninh mbuo nduqc dangh hnangv zuqc mietc mi'aqv. Zuqc gamh nziex haic nyei sic guaatv ninh mbuo mingh nzengc.
73.18: Meih za'gengh bun ninh mbuo yiem mbiaangc nyei dorngx, bun ninh mbuo ndorpc, zuqc mietc nzengc.
73.22: Yie ziouc hngongx, maiv hiuv haaix nyungc, hnangv dauh hieh zoih yiem meih nyei nza'hmien.
73.23: Mv baac yie zanc-zanc caux meih yiem. Meih nanv jienv yie nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz.
73.13: Wuov nyungc yie goux longx yie nyei hnyouv cing-nzengc yaac maiv baamz zuiz se maiv lamh longc.
73.9: Ninh mbuo nyei nzuih gorngv doqc yiem gu'nguaaic lungh nyei Tin-Hungh. Ninh mbuo nyei mbietc zoux maux gorngv doqc lungh ndiev mienh.
73.26: Yie nyei sin caux yie nyei hnyouv haih mau jienv njiec, mv baac Tin-Hungh se yie nyei hnyouv nyei qaqv yaac yietc liuz zoux yie nyei buonc.
73.5: Ninh mbuo maiv zuqc siouc kouv hnangv nyiec nyei mienh, yaac maiv hnangv nyiec nyei mienh zuqc zeqc naanc.
73.27: Mangc maah! Leih meih go nyei mienh zungv oix zuqc mietc. Meih oix mietc nzengc maiv ziepc zuoqv nyei zoux bun meih wuov deix mienh.
73.14: Weic zuqc yie ziangh hnoi kungx zuqc kouv hnangv, ndorm-ndorm yaac zuqc dingc zuiz.
73.3: Weic zuqc yie buatc orqv mienh duqv longx wuov zanc, yie ziouc mueic jieqv zoux maux nyei mienh.
73.7: Ninh mbuo nyei hnyouv ngaengc, kungx zoux waaic nyei sic hnangv. Ninh mbuo nyei hnyouv hnamv cuotv orqv nyei za'eix camv haic.
73.10: Weic naaiv baeqc fingx huin nzuonx ceng ninh mbuo, lorz maiv duqv dorngx nqemh ninh mbuo.
73.2: Mv baac yie ganh aeqv, yie nyei zaux aav lamh ndiqv zuqc ndorpc, yie nyei zaux-caaiv kaav deix piatv.
73.1: Tin-Hungh za'gengh! zoux longx bun I^saa^laa^en Mienh, zoux longx bun maaih hnyouv cing-nzengc nyei mienh.
73.6: Weic naaiv ninh mbuo zoux maux nyei jauv beiv jiem-limc dangh jienv jaang. Zoux doqc nyei sic buang jienv ninh mbuo hnangv zuqv lui nor.
73.8: Ninh mbuo jatv mienh, gorngv doqc ki mienh. Ninh mbuo ceng-hlo, gorngv oix zeix mienh.
73.24: Meih tengx yie caangh laangh weic dorh yie nyei jauv. Nqa'haav meih oix zipv yie, bun yie duqv njang-laangc.
73.25: Yiem wuov gu'nguaaic lungh, cuotv liuz meih, yie maiv maaih haaix dauh. Yiem naaiv lungh ndiev, cuotv liuz meih, yie maiv oix longc haaix nyungc.
73.11: Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Tin-Hungh hnangv haaix nor haih hiuv? Yiem Hlang Jiex Wuov Dauh maaih wuonh zaang nyei fai?”
73.16: Yie hnamv mangc gaax hnangv haaix nor haih bieqc hnyouv naaiv deix sic, mv baac yie gengh haiz aqc haic,

147.15: Ninh bun ninh nyei lingc cuotv mingh gormx lungh ndiev, ninh nyei waac mingh siepv nyei.
147.18: Ninh yietv gorngv cuotv waac, naaiv deix yuqc nzengc. Ninh bun ninh nyei nziaaux buonc daaih, wuom ziouc liouc.
147.12: O Ye^lu^saa^lem aah! Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.  O Si^on aah! Oix zuqc ceng meih nyei Tin-Hungh.
147.13: Ninh bun meih nyei zingh laatc nyei gaengh sorn wuonv, ceix fuqv bun yiem meih gu'nyuoz nyei naamh nyouz.
147.19: Ninh zorqv ninh nyei waac bun Yaakopv, ninh nyei leiz-nyeic caux leiz jiu bun I^saa^laa^en.
147.5: Yie mbuo nyei Ziouv za'gengh hlo haic, maaih domh qaqv. Ninh nyei cong-mengh jiex ndaangc haih ndorqc duqv taux.
147.20: Ninh maiv hnangv naaiv zoux weic ganh fingx mienh, ninh mbuo maiv hiuv duqv ninh nyei leiz. Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.
147.11: Ziouv a'hneiv nyei se taaih ninh nyei mienh, dongh kaux ninh ziepc zuoqv hnamv mienh nyei hnyouv wuov deix.
147.14: Ninh bun meih nyei gapv-jaaix gu'nyuoz taaix-baengh, bun gauh longx jiex nyei mbiauh meih mbuo duqv nyanc beuv.
147.3: Zuqc hnyouv mun kouv nyei mienh ninh zorc longx yaac beu jienv ninh mbuo zuqc mun nyei dorngx.
147.10: Ninh a'hneiv nyei se maiv zeiz maaz nyei qaqv, yaac maiv zeiz a'hneiv baamh mienh nyei zaux.
147.2: Ziouv ceix Ye^lu^saa^lem jiez daaih. Ninh siou zunv zuqc guaatv mingh nzaanx nzengc nyei I^saa^laa^en Mienh.
147.1: Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.    Baaux nzung ceng yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh se za'gengh longx haic. Ceng ninh se za'gengh horpc yaac puix haic.
147.4: Ninh dingc ziangx hleix nyei soux mouc, tengx norm-norm hleix cuotv mbuox.
147.6: Ziouv bouh zuqc zeix nyei mienh faaux, zorqv orqv mienh zoi njiec ndau.
147.8: Ninh longc mbuonx om jienv lungh, ninh liuc leiz mbiungc duih njiec ndau, bun miev cuotv yiem mbong gu'nguaaic.
147.9: Ninh ceix nyanc hopv bun saeng-kuv, caux heuc jienv nyei norqc aa dorn.
147.7: Oix zuqc dor-ziec, baaux nzung ceng Ziouv, longc daanh baah patv nzung bun yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh.
147.17: Ninh bun duih borqc njiec hnangv la'bieiv-muonc nor. Ninh bun nziaaux-namx buonc daaih, haaix dauh haih diev duqv!
147.16: Ninh bun sorng hnangv ba'gi yungh biei, bun mbiungc-suiv gitv daaih nzaanx mingh hnangv saaiv nor.

76.12: Ninh zatv jienv zoux hlo wuov deix nyei hnyouv, bun lungh ndiev nyei hungh diex gamh nziex ninh.
76.5: Ninh mbuo hnyouv henv nyei mienh nyei ga'naaiv zungv zuqc caangv nzengc. Ninh mbuo daic nzengc mi'aqv. Mborqv jaax nyei zuangx mienh, maiv maaih haaix dauh haih cau duqv buoz jiez aqv.
76.11: Meih mbuo oix zuqc laengz ngaengc waac bun Ziouv,  meih mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh, yaac ei jienv naaiv deix laengz nyei waac zoux. Oix zuqc bun weih gormx nyei mienh dorh zingh nyeic daaih bun mienh oix zuqc taaih nyei Ziouv.
76.3: Yiem wuov ninh wuotv nauv maaih douz nyei forng-cang, torngv-baaih, nzuqc ndaauv caux yietc zungv mborqv jaax nyei wuoqc ginc. Selaa
76.10: Baamh mienh qiex jiez, haih bun mienh gauh oix ceng meih. Zuqc meih nouz zengc njiec nyei mienh, oix yiem nitv fatv meih.
76.2: Yiem Saalem ninh liepc ninh nyei ndopv-liuh, ninh yiem nyei dorngx se Si^on.
76.1: Yiem Yu^ndaa Deic mienh hiuv duqv Tin-Hungh. Yiem I^saa^laa^en ninh nyei mengh hlo haic.
76.4: O Tin-Hungh aac, meih za'gengh njang-laangc haic. Meih gauh hlo gauh njang-laangc jiex yietc liuz yiem nyei mbong.
76.6: O Yaakopv nyei Tin-Hungh aac, meih hatc ninh mbuo wuov zanc ninh mbuo nyei maaz caux geh maaz mienh ziouc daic mi'aqv.
76.8: Meih yiem gu'nguaaic lungh gorngv siemv zuiz nyei waac, lungh ndiev gamh nziex, yaac sekv nzieqc nyei,
76.9: dongh Tin-Hungh daaih dingc zuiz, oix njoux yietc zungv yiem baamh gen zuqc zeix nyei mienh. Selaa
76.7: Mv baac mienh gamh nziex nyei se kungx meih ganh hnangv. Meih qiex jiez nyei ziangh hoc haaix dauh haih yiem meih nyei nza'hmien?

3.2: Maaih mienh camv hnangv naaiv gorngv yie, “Tin-Hungh maiv tengx ninh aqv.” Selaa
3.1: O Ziouv aac, yie nyei win-wangv ndongc naaiv camv! Oix hoic yie wuov deix jaa camv jienv faaux.
3.5: Yie bueix njiec m'njormh mingh, yie aengx nyie daaih, weic zuqc Ziouv beu jienv yie.
3.6: Maiv gunv maaih waanc-waanc dauh win-wangv weih gormx yie, yie yaac maiv gamh nziex.
3.8: Njoux en se yiem Ziouv  daaih, tov ceix fuqv bun meih nyei baeqc fingx. Selaa
3.4: Yie heuc jienv tov Ziouv.  Ninh yaac yiem ninh nyei cing-nzengc mbong dau yie. Selaa
3.3: Mv baac Ziouv aac, meih zoux yie nyei torngv-baaih weih gormx yie. Meih zoux yie nyei njang-laangc, tengx yie cau duqv m'nqorngv jiez.
3.7: O Ziouv  aah! Daaih maah! O yie nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Njoux yie maah! Weic zuqc meih mbaix yie nyei yietc zungv win-wangv nyei kamx-bui, mborqv orqv mienh nyei nyaah nauv.

124.2: Se gorngv Ziouv maiv caux yie mbuo yiem naaiv bung, win-wangv daaih mborqv yie mbuo wuov zanc,
124.1: Se gorngv Ziouv maiv caux yie mbuo yiem naaiv bung hnangv haaix nor? I^saa^laa^en Mienh dau maah!
124.5: domh wuom beqv yaac oix guaatv yie mbuo mingh.
124.6: Ceng Ziouv weic zuqc ninh maiv bun yie mbuo zuqc win-wangv hoic hnangv zuqc hieh ga'naaiv nyei nyaah betv nor.
124.8: Tengx yie mbuo wuov dauh se Ziouv,    dongh Zeix Lungh Zeix Ndau Wuov Dauh.
124.4: Wuom yiemx oix torngx yie mbuo mingh, wuom-seix oix yiemx yie mbuo gu'nguaaic,
124.3: se ninh mbuo qiex jiez yie mbuo hnangv njopc douz nor, ninh mbuo haih zorqv yie mbuo liemh nangh nyei naqv nzengc.
124.7: Yie mbuo hnangv norqc yiem zaeng norqc mienh nyei koux biaux ndutv. Koux dangx, yie mbuo biaux ndutv daaih.

139.21: O Ziouv aac, yie nzorng haic dongh nzorng meih wuov deix mienh. Yie yaac youx dongh ngaengc jienv meih wuov deix.
139.15: Yie yiem maa nyei ga'sie zeix cuotv, se yiem gem jienv nyei dorngx gapv yie nyei mbungv-qorng nyei ziangh hoc, zungv bingx meih maiv mbueiz.
139.12: Weic meih nor, liemh hmuangx yaac maiv zeiz hmuangx, lungh muonz zanc yaac ndongc lungh hnoi zanc njang, weic meih aeqv, hmuangx se hnangv njang.
139.17: O Tin-Hungh aac, meih hnamv nyei sic weic yie nor za'gengh jaaix haic. Gapv daaih nyei soux mouc ndongc haaix camv aqv.
139.20: Ninh mbuo gorngv orqv nyei waac daanh meih, yaac gorngv doqc meih nyei mengh.
139.4: O Ziouv aac, yie liemh maiv gaengh gorngv cuotv yietc joux waac meih zungv hiuv nzengc mi'aqv.
139.19: O Tin-Hungh aac, feix duqv meih daix nzengc orqv mienh, feix duqv daix mienh nyei mienh leih nqoi yie.
139.18: Se gorngv yie saauv nor, maaih gauh camv saa-ziou. Yie nyie daaih nyei ziangh hoc, yie corc caux meih yiem.
139.22: Yie nzorng ninh mbuo taux mbungv-fim, yaac funx ninh mbuo benx yie nyei win-wangv.
139.23: O Tin-Hungh aac, tov zaah mangc yie, seix yie yaac hiuv duqv yie hnyouv hnamv nyei jauv.
139.13: Meih zeix yiem yie gu'nyuoz nyei nyungc-nyungc. Yiem maa nyei ga'sie meih gapv yie daaih.
139.9: Se gorngv yie ndaix mingh mba'hnoi cuotv nyei dorngx, fai yiem wuov bung ziqc koiv,
139.5: Meih yiem yie nyei nza'hmien maengx caux yie nyei nqa'haav nqaang, yaac longc meih nyei buoz maan jienv yie.
139.14: Yie ceng meih weic zuqc meih zeix yie cuotv daaih peix fuc haic, mbuoqc horngh haic. Meih zoux nyei nyungc-nyungc za'gengh peix fuc haic. Yie nyei hnyouv zien-zien hiuv duqv.
139.3: Yie bieqc cuotv fai bueix njiec meih mangc muonc nyei, yaac hiuv toux yie zoux nyei yietc zungv jauv.
139.7: Yie haih mingh haaix cingx haih biaux ndutv meih nyei Singx Lingh? Fai yie haih biaux mingh haaix cingx leih ndutv meih nyei hmien?
139.10: meih zungv yiem wuov dorh yie, yaac yiem wuov tengx yie.
139.2: Yie zueiz njiec fai jiez sin meih hiuv nyei. Meih yiem go nyei dorngx hiuv duqv yie nyei hnyouv hnamv nyei jauv.
139.1: O Ziouv  aac, meih zaah mangc yie, yaac hiuv yie.
139.6: Meih ndongc naaiv hiuv yie, yie gengh! mbuoqc horngh haic, se gauh hlang yie haih bieqc hnyouv nyei.
139.8: Se gorngv yie faaux lungh, meih yiem wuov. Se gorngv yie njiec yiemh gen, meih yaac yiem wuov.
139.24: Mangc gaax yiem yie maaih haaix nyungc orqv nyei sic, yaac tov dorh yie yangh yietc liuz nyei jauv.
139.11: Se gorngv yie gorngv, “Tov bun hmuangx torngv jienv yie, bun weih gormx yie nyei njang tiuv benx lungh muonz zanc.”
139.16: Yie nyei sin maiv gaengh benx fangx zeiv, meih nyei m'zing zungv buatc yie mi'aqv. Yie liemh maiv gaengh maaih yietc norm hnoi wuov zanc, meih weic yie dingc daaih nyei hnoi-nyieqc yietc zungv fiev jienv meih nyei sou-daan.

46.11: Nernh Jiex nyei Ziouv  caux yie mbuo yiem. Yaakopv nyei Tin-Hungh zoux yie mbuo ndaauh kaux nyei dorngx. Selaa
46.10: Dingh njiec aqv, yaac hiuv duqv yie se Tin-Hungh. Yie yiem maanc fingx mbu'ndongx duqv mienh taaih. Yiem gormx lungh ndiev yie yaac duqv mienh taaih.
46.2: Weic naaiv, yie mbuo maiv gamh nziex maiv gunv lungh ndiev goiv yienc, mbong yaac dongz, ndortv njiec taux koiv-ndoqv,
46.1: Tin-Hungh zoux yie mbuo ndaauh kaux nyei dorngx yaac zoux yie mbuo nyei qaqv. Yie mbuo haaix zanc buangh zuqc kouv naanc ninh yaac tengx.
46.5: Tin-Hungh yiem naaiv norm zingh gu'nyuoz, zingh ziouc maiv zuqc ndanc dongz, lungh ndorm yietv njang Tin-Hungh oix tengx naaiv norm zingh.
46.6: Maanc fingx mbiouh mbiouh nyei lunc nzengc, maanc guoqv dongz nzengc, Tin-Hungh heuc cuotv qiex, ndau-beih yuqc nzengc.
46.8: Daaih maah! Daaih mangc Ziouv zoux nyei sic. Mangc gaax ninh hnangv haaix nor zoux bun ndau huaang nzengc.
46.9: Ninh bun mborqv jaax nyei jauv dingh taux jomc lungh ndiev, wuotv nauv juang-zinx, bun cang muonc nzengc, longc douz buov mborqv jaax cie.
46.4: Maaih diuh ndaaih bun njiec nyei ndoqv liouc mingh bun Tin-Hungh nyei zingh a'hneiv. Naaiv norm zingh se Yiem Hlang Jiex Wuov Dauh nyei dinc.
46.3: maiv gunv wuom jiez laangc njunh njunh zoz-zoz nyei, zungv ndanc zuqc mbong dongz. Selaa
46.7: Nernh Jiex nyei Ziouv  caux yie mbuo yiem. Yaakopv nyei Tin-Hungh zoux yie mbuo ndaauh kaux nyei dorngx. Selaa

32.11: Meih mbuo kuv mienh aah! Oix zuqc kaux Ziouv  njien-youh orn-lorqc. Meih mbuo hnyouv zingx nyei zuangx mienh aah! Oix zuqc njien-youh nyei heuc mbui.
32.10: Orqv mienh zuqc siouc kouv camv, mv baac kaux Ziouv nyei mienh zungv oix duqv Ziouv ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv, goux jienv ninh.
32.2: Ziouv funx maiv maaih zuiz nyei mienh, se ganh nyei hnyouv maiv maaih haaix nyungc nduov mienh, wuov dauh maaih orn-lorqc.
32.1: Haaix dauh zoux dorngc zuiz mv baac duqv Tin-Hungh guangc nqoi,, se duqv ninh nyei zuiz sortv guangc, wuov dauh maaih orn-lorqc.
32.5: Yie ziouc nyiemc yie nyei zuiz bun meih aqv. Yie maiv bingx yie zoux dorngc nyei sic. Yie gorngv, “Yie oix dorng jienv Ziouv nyiemc yie zoux dorngc nyei sic.” Meih ziouc guangc nqoi yie zoux dorngc nyei zuiz. Selaa
32.6: Tov bun gan longx meih wuov deix mienh dorng jienv meih daux gaux. Doix zuqc buangh kuonx naanh nyei ziangh hoc, hnangv wuom yiemx wuov zanc ziouc yiemx maiv taux ninh wuov.
32.8: Yie oix njaaux meih, bun meih hiuv duqv horpc zuqc yangh nyei jauv. Yie oix bungx m'zing mangc jienv tengx meih caangh laangh.
32.9: Maiv dungx zoux hnangv maiv hiuv haaix nyungc nyei lorh maaz. Oix zuqc longc hlieqv fapv jienv nzuih, ndoh jienv hlaang, ninh cingx daaih mbuoqc meih gunv.
32.4: Meih nyei buoz ziangh hnoi ziangh muonz ngatv jienv yie, yie nyei qaqv ziouc zitc nzengc, hnangv nqaai gorng yuoqv nyei ziangh hoc nor. Selaa
32.3: Yie nyienz jienv maiv nyiemc yie nyei zuiz wuov zanc, yie nyei sin hei jienv njiec, weic zuqc yie ziangh hnoi njunh jienv yiem.
32.7: Meih zoux yie bingx nyei dorngx. Meih beu jienv yie leih ndutv kouv naanc, meih bun weih gormx yie nyei mienh baaux njoux en nyei nzung. Selaa

25.21: Meih hnyouv zaqc hnyouv zingx nyei ziouc tov meih beu jienv yie, weic zuqc yie zuov jienv meih.
25.15: Yie nyei m'zing zanc-zanc mangc Ziouv, weic zuqc kungx ninh ganh haih tengx yie nyei zaux leih ndutv, maiv zuqc mungz nzenc.
25.12: Haaix dauh taaih Ziouv,  ninh oix njaaux wuov dauh ginv yangh horpc nyei jauv.
25.17: Yie nyei hnyouv nzauh duqv kouv haic. Tov tengx yie biaux ndutv yie nyei kouv naanc.
25.20: Tov meih beu jienv yie nyei maengc aengx njoux yie, bun yie maiv zuqc nyaiv, weic zuqc yie ndaauh kaux meih.
25.4: O Ziouv aac, tov bun yie hiuv duqv meih nyei za'eix yaac njaaux yie hiuv duqv meih nyei jauv.
25.19: Tov meih hnamv mangc gaax, yie nyei win-wangv ndongc haaix camv, yaac mangc gaax ninh mbuo nzorng duqv yie doqc haic.
25.18: Tov meih tengx corngh yie nyei kouv naanc caux naanc zingh, aengx guangc yie nyei yietc zungv zuiz.
25.22: O Tin-Hungh aah! Tov meih njoux I^saa^laa^en mienh biaux ndutv ninh mbuo nyei yietc zungv kouv naanc.
25.13: Yiem ninh nyei seix zeiv ninh duqv siouc fuqv-loqc, ninh nyei hoz doic yaac duqv nzipc naaiv norm deic-bung.
25.9: Ninh dorh nyiemc ganh zoux faix nyei mienh zoux horpc nyei sic, yaac njaaux ninh mbuo hiuv duqv ninh nyei jauv.
25.5: Tov meih dorh yie gan meih nyei zien leiz yaac njaaux yie, weic zuqc meih zoux njoux yie wuov dauh Tin-Hungh. Yie ziangh hnoi ziangh muonz zuov meih.
25.14: Ziouv caux taaih ninh wuov deix zoux doic. Ninh bun ninh mbuo hiuv duqv ninh laengz nyei ngaengc waac.
25.3: Da'faanh zuov jienv meih nyei mienh yietc liuz maiv zuqc nyaiv. Mv baac ngaengc jienv meih yaac maiv maaih gorn-baengx wuov deix zungv oix zuqc nyaiv aqv.
25.7: Maiv dungx jangx yie lunx nyei ziangh hoc zoux dorngc, baamz nyei zuiz. O Ziouv aac, ziux meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh tov meih jangx yie, weic zuqc meih se longx haic.
25.10: Da'faanh ei jienv Ziouv nyei ngaengc waac caux ninh gorngv nyei waac nyei mienh ninh hnamv yaac ziepc zuoqv nyei dorh.
25.2: O yie nyei Tin-Hungh aac, yie kaux meih. Tov maiv dungx bun yie zuqc nyaiv, yaac maiv dungx bun yie nyei win-wangv hingh jiex yie.
25.1: O Ziouv aac, yie bungx dingc hnyouv kaux meih.
25.6: O Ziouv aac, tov meih jangx jienv meih korv-lienh mienh yaac ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh, weic zuqc loz-hnoi m'daaih hnangv naaic.
25.8: Ziouv  se longx nyei, baengh fim nyei, ninh ziouc njaaux zuiz-mienh yangh horpc nyei jauv.
25.11: O Ziouv aah! Weic meih ganh nyei mengh tov guangc yie nyei zuiz, weic zuqc yie nyei zuiz hlo haic.
25.16: Tov meih huin nzuonx daaih mangc yie, korv-lienh yie, weic zuqc yie ndoqc yaac kuonx naanh.

47.2: Oix zuqc gamh nziex Ziouv, dongh Yiem Hlang Jiex Wuov Dauh. Ninh zoux domh Hungh Diex gunv gormx lungh ndiev.
47.1: Maanc fingx mienh aah! Oix zuqc mbaix buoz longc njien-youh nyei qiex heuc Tin-Hungh.
47.5: Mienh heuc mbui houc Tin-Hungh faaux weic. Nzatc nyei qiex mbui houc Ziouv  faaux.
47.6: Oix zuqc baaux nzung ceng Tin-Hungh, baaux nzung ceng. Oix zuqc baaux nzung ceng yie mbuo nyei Hungh Diex, baaux nzung ceng maah!
47.8: Tin-Hungh gunv maanc guoqv. Tin-Hungh zueiz jienv ninh nyei cing-nzengc weic.
47.9: Gunv maanc guoqv nyei jien gapv zunv caux jienv Apc^laa^ham nyei Tin-Hungh nyei baeqc fingx. Weic zuqc lungh ndiev nyei torngv-baaih benx Tin-Hungh nyei. Oix zuqc taaih ninh zoux hlo jiex.
47.4: Ninh weic yie mbuo ginv yie mbuo nzipc nyei buonc. Se Yaakopv, dongh ninh hnamv wuov dauh, a'hneiv nyei buonc. Selaa
47.3: Ninh bun maanc fingx yiem yie mbuo nyei buoz-ndiev. Bun maanc guoqv yiem yie mbuo nyei zaux-ndiev.
47.7: Weic zuqc Tin-Hungh zoux Hungh gunv gormx lungh ndiev, oix zuqc baaux diuh singx nzung ceng ninh.

87.2: Ninh hnamv Si^on nyei zingh gaengh, gauh camv Yaakopv yiem nyei norm-norm dorngx.
87.1: Ziouv  liepc nyei zingh yiem cing-nzengc mbong gu'nguaaic.
87.5: Ninh mbuo oix zorqv Si^on nyei jauv-louc daaih gorngv, “Naaiv laanh caux wuov laanh yiem naaic cuotv seix,” weic zuqc Yiem Hlang Jiex Wuov Dauh ganh oix liepc naaiv norm zingh.
87.6: Ziouv  faaux maanc fingx nyei mienh hoz daan nyei ziangh hoc ninh fiev jienv, “Naaiv laanh yiem Si^on cuotv seix.” Selaa
87.4: Mangc maah! Yiem hiuv duqv yie nyei mienh yie lengc jeiv oix tih taux Laa^hapc caux Mbaa^mbi^lon. Fi^li^saa^die caux Tailaqv caux jienv E^ti^o^bie. Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Naaiv laanh mienh yiem Si^on cuotv seix.”
87.3: O Tin-Hungh nyei zingh aac, mienh nuqv jienv gorngv meih njang-laangc nyei jauv. Selaa
87.7: Baaux nzung caux cangx heix nyei mienh oix gorngv, “Yie nyei yietc zungv wuom-zingv yiem meih gu'nyuoz.”

12.2: Dauh dauh gorngv-baeqc nduov ganh nyei juangc laangz mienh. Ninh mbuo nyei nzuih gorngv waac mbiaangc ceng mienh, yaac maaih i diuc hnyouv.
12.1: O Ziouv aah! Tov meih tengx yie mbuo, weic zuqc maiv maaih kuv mienh aqv. Yiem baamh mienh mbu'ndongx ziepc zuoqv nyei mienh zutc nzengc mi'aqv.
12.5: Ziouv gorngv, “Yie ih zanc oix jiez daaih weic zuqc jomc nyei mienh zuqc zeix, doh naanc mienh njunh jienv yiem. Yie oix bun ninh mbuo baengh orn nyei yiem dongh ninh mbuo maaih lamh hnamv oix duqv yiem nyei dorngx.”
12.6: Ziouv  nyei waac se cing-nzengc nyei waac, hnangv longc louh douz sinx jiex siec nzunc zien haic nyei nyaanh nor.
12.8: Baamh mienh ceng orqv nyei, waaic nyei jauv wuov zanc, orqv mienh youh jienv mingh faam-bung feix louc.
12.4: Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Yie mbuo haih bangc yie mbuo nyei mbietc hingh jiex. Yie mbuo nyei nzuih meix benx yie mbuo ganh nyei. Haaix dauh zoux yie mbuo nyei ziouv?”
12.3: Tov Ziouv gaatv guangc ceng weic nduov mienh a'hneiv nyei yietc zungv nzuih meix caux bungx waac-maux, ceng-hlo wuov deix mienh nyei mbietc.
12.7: O Ziouv aac, meih zungv beu jienv yie mbuo, meih oix goux jienv yie mbuo, bun yie mbuo biaux ndutv naaiv doic mienh.

148.12: houh saeng caux sieqv, mienh gox mienh caux fu'jueiv oix zuqc ceng ninh.
148.13: Tov bun naaiv deix yietc zungv ceng Ziouv nyei mengh, weic zuqc kungx maaih ninh nyei mbuox ganh hlo jiex hnangv. Ninh nyei njang-laangc yiem lungh caux ndau gu'nguaaic.
148.5: Tov bun naaiv deix yietc zungv ceng Ziouv nyei mengh, weic zuqc ninh yietv hatc ziouc cuotv daaih aqv.
148.11: Lungh ndiev nyei hungh diex caux maanc fingx mienh, zoux jien nyei caux yietc zungv zoux hlo nyei mienh,
148.14: Ninh bun ninh nyei baeqc fingx henv weic bun ninh nyei cing-nzengc baeqc fingx ceng ninh, se dongh nitv ninh fatv nyei baeqc fingx, I^saa^laa^en Mienh. Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.
148.3: Mba'hnoi aah! Hlaax aah! Oix zuqc ceng ninh. Ziux njang nyei yietc zungv hleix aah! Oix zuqc ceng ninh.
148.10: hieh zoih caux yietc zungv saeng-kuv, nyorng ndau nyei ga'naaiv caux haih ndaix nyei norqc oix zuqc ceng ninh.
148.2: Ninh nyei zuangx fin-mienh oix zuqc ceng ninh. Ninh nyei zuangx fin-mienh baeng oix zuqc ceng ninh.
148.1: Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.    Oix zuqc yiem gu'nguaaic lungh ceng Ziouv, yiem hlang nyei dorngx ceng ninh.
148.4: Hlang jiex nyei lungh caux yiem lungh gu'nguaaic nyei wuom aah! Oix zuqc ceng ninh.
148.6: Ninh liepc naaiv deix daaih yietc liuz taux yietc liuz. Ninh njiec nyei lingc yietc liuz maiv haih jiex.
148.8: Douz caux borqc, sorng caux mbuonx, caux ei jienv ninh nyei lingc nyei domh nziaaux,
148.9: domh mbong fiuv-mbong yietc zungv, ziangh biouv nyei ndiangx caux yietc zungv si^ndaa zongh ndiangx,
148.7: Oix zuqc yiem ndau-beih ceng Ziouv.  Koiv nyei domh mbiauz caux yiem koiv ndo nyei dorngx yietc zungv oix zuqc ceng.

65.12: Yiem deic-bung-huaang nyei miev-ciangv nyiemz haic, mbong-aiv yaac njien-youh, orn-lorqc nzengc.
65.13: Miev-ciangv hnangv maaih yungh guanh zorng jienv, horngz yaac maaih mbiauh cuotv buangv, nyungc-nyungc lomh nzoih njien-youh nyei heuc yaac baaux nzung.
65.5: O yie mbuo njoux en nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Meih longc mbuoqc horngh nyei sic njoux yie mbuo, dau yie mbuo. Yiem jomc lungh ndiev caux go jiex nyei koiv nyei mienh kaux meih maaih lamh hnamv dorngx.
65.11: Meih bun hnyangx-daauh bungx-zuoqc, maiv gunv meih mingh taux haaix, yaac maaih siou-sengh.
65.3: weic mienh baamz zuiz. Yie mbuo nyei zuiz-nipc hingh yie mbuo nyei ziangh hoc meih zungv guangc mi'aqv.
65.10: Meih bun lungh duih mbiungc njiec laih ziangx nyei ndau, bun laih liuz nyei nie yuonh nzengc. Meih duih mbiungc-mbuonv njiec bun ndau mau, ceix fuqv bun ga'naaiv-zuangx hlo.
65.2: Meih muangx baamh mienh daux gaux nyei waac. Baamh mienh yietc zungv oix daaih lorz meih
65.1: Tin-Hungh aah! Yie mbuo horpc zuqc yiem Si^on ceng meih, yaac jaauv sung yie mbuo laengz nyei ngaengc waac.
65.4: Meih ginv dorh daaih yiem nitv fatv meih wuov deix, se bun yiem meih nyei singx dinc nyei laatc gu'nyuoz nyei mienh, duqv orn-lorqc. Yie mbuo ziouc buangv eix weic yiem meih nyei biauv, se yiem meih cing-nzengc nyei singx dinc, duqv nyungc-nyungc longx.
65.6: Meih longc meih nyei qaqv liepc mbong jiez daaih, bun cing meih henv haic.
65.8: Yiem lungh ndiev go jiex nyei dorngx nyei mienh ziouc weic meih zoux nyei jangx-hoc gamh nziex. Meih bun mba'hnoi cuotv caux mba'hnoi muotv wuov deix dorngx nyei mienh njien-youh nyei heuc.
65.9: Meih goux ndau-beih yaac bun mbiungc njiec daaih bun ndau junc haic. Tin-Hungh nyei ndaaih maaih wuom buangv nzengc. Meih yaac bun mienh duqv laangh ziqc weic zuqc meih hnangv naaic liuc leiz ziangx ndau.
65.7: Meih bun koiv mbui nyei qiex caux wuom-laangc nyei qiex sekv, yaac bun maanc fingx nauc nyei qiex sekv mi'aqv.

132.15: Yie oix ceix fuqv bun naaiv norm zingh nyei laangh ziqc bungx-zuoqc, yaac bun naaiv norm zingh nyei mienh jomc mienh duqv nyanc beuv.
132.18: Yie oix bun ninh nyei win-wangv zuqc nyaiv, mv baac ninh ganh ndongx nyei hungh ningv oix aengv cuotv njang.
132.12: Se gorngv meih nyei dorn mbuo ei jienv yie laengz nyei ngaengc waac, yaac gan yie oix njaaux ninh mbuo nyei yietc zungv waac, ninh mbuo nyei zeiv-fun ziouc duqv yietc liuz zueiz jienv meih nyei weic.”
132.13: Weic zuqc Ziouv ginv Si^on. Ninh oix longc weic zoux ninh yiem nyei dorngx.
132.5: Zuov taux yie weic Ziouv lorz duqv dorngx yiem, se lorz dorngx bun Yaakopv nyei Nernh Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh.”
132.11: Ziouv dorng jienv Ndaawitv ziepc zuoqv nyei laengz ngaengc waac, ninh yaac maiv haih tuix. Ninh gorngv, “Yie oix liepc dauh meih ganh nyei dorn zueiz jienv meih nyei weic.
132.14: Ninh gorngv, “Naaiv se yie yietc liuz hitv nyei dorngx, yie oix yiem naaiv. Naaiv se yie nyei eix.
132.3: “Yie zungv maiv bieqc yie nyei biauv yaac maiv faaux yie nyei coux.
132.10: Tov weic meih nyei bou, Ndaawitv, maiv dungx nqemh guangc meih longc youh orn daaih wuov dauh.
132.2: Jangx jienv ninh hnangv haaix nor caux Ziouv houv jienv laengz waac, se caux Yaakopv nyei Nernh Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh.
132.1: O Ziouv aac, tov meih jangx jienv Ndaawitv, dongh ninh diev nyei yietc zungv kouv naanc.
132.4: Yie maiv bun yie nyei m'zing m'njormh, yaac maiv bun m'zing-ndopv njipv.
132.6: Muangx gaax, yie mbuo haiz gorngv Laengz Ngaengc Waac Faang yiem E^faa^taa, yie mbuo lorz buatc yiem Yaa^aa nyei ndeic.
132.8: Ziouv aac, daaih maah! Liemh meih caux biux mengh meih nyei qaqv wuov norm Laengz Ngaengc Waac Faang daaih bieqc meih hitv kuonx nyei dorngx.
132.9: Tov bun meih nyei sai mienh zanc-zanc zoux horpc, yaac tov bun meih nyei cing-nzengc baeqc fingx njien-youh nyei heuc.”
132.7: “Mbuo oix zuqc bieqc ninh yiem nyei dorngx, yiem ninh lorngx zaux nyei dorngx baaix.
132.17: Yie oix bun Ndaawitv nyei yietc dauh zeiv-fun yiem wuov zoux hungh. Yie weic yie longc youh orn daaih wuov dauh liepc dauh nzipc jienv zoux hungh.
132.16: Yie oix bun ninh nyei sai mienh duqv njoux en. Ninh nyei baeqc fingx yaac oix njien-youh nyei heuc.

39.12: “O Ziouv aah! Tov muangx yie daux gaux nyei waac. Tov muangx yie heuc jienv jouh nyei waac. Yie nyei wuom-mueic liouc jienv tov maiv dungx zoux hnangv maiv haiz nor. Weic zuqc yie zoux hnangv meih nyei jiex jauv nyei kaeqv mienh, dingh zepv dangh baav hnangv yie nyei zuangx ong-taaix nor.
39.13: Tov huin ganh bung maiv mangc yie weic bun yie aengx duqv deix orn-lorqc. Yie cingx daaih leih nqoi, maiv yiem aqv.”
39.5: Meih bun yie ziangh nyei hnoi-nyieqc ndongc i ziex buoz-zaangv jangv. Ziux meih mangc yie yietc seix nyei maengc se hnangv maiv maaih haaix nyungc aqv. Gorqv-mienh nyei maengc kungx hnangv tauv nzunc qiex nor. Selaa
39.11: Laaix mienh zoux zuiz meih gorngv-hemx weic mborqv njaaux. Meih mietc mienh hnamv nyei ga'naaiv hnangv gaeng ngaatc waaic nzengc nor. Dauh dauh baamh mienh nyei maengc se hnangv tauv yietc nzunc qiex hnangv. Selaa
39.3: Yie nyei hnyouv gu'nyuoz za'gengh nzauh duqv kouv haic. Yie hnamv nyei ziangh hoc hnangv douz zieqc jienv yie nyei hnyouv nor, yie ziouc gorngv cuotv waac.
39.10: Tov meih zorqv nqoi meih bun yie zuqc nyei zeqc naanc. Yie zuqc meih nyei buoz mborqv taux aav lamh daic aqv.
39.2: Yie sekv nzieqc nyei, maiv ko lo. Yie maiv gorngv waac mv baac maiv tengx haaix nyungc yie. Yie nyei hnyouv nzauh kouv jienv faaux.
39.1: Yie gorngv, “Yie oix mbungh yie nyei jauv, weic bun yie nyei nzuih maiv baamz zuiz. Da'faanh orqv mienh yiem yie nyei nza'hmien yie oix nqapc jienv yie nyei nzuih, maiv ko lo.
39.4: O Ziouv aah! Tov bun yie hiuv duqv yie setv mueiz nyei hnoi-nyieqc. Yie haih ziangh duqv ndongc haaix lauh? Tov bun yie hiuv duqv yie nyei maengc oix jiex ndongc haaix siepv.
39.6: Baamh mienh mingh mingh daaih daaih hnangv dongh linh nor, ninh mbuo lunc jienv yiem yaac maiv lamh longc. Baamh mienh zornc daaih nyei ga'naaiv ndui jienv mv baac maiv hiuv duqv haaix dauh duqv siou.
39.8: Tov njoux yie leih ndutv yie nyei yietc zungv zuiz, maiv dungx bun mienh hngongx mienh jatv yie.
39.9: Yie sekv nzieqc nyei, maiv gorngv waac, weic zuqc se meih ganh bun yie hnangv naaiv siouc kouv.
39.7: “Ziouv aah! Yie ih zanc zuov haaix nyungc? Yie kaux meih maaih lamh hnamv dorngx.

11.2: Mangc maah! Orqv mienh baeng juang-zinx, zorqv forng paanx jienv hlaang, oix yiem hmuangx nyei dorngx, buonv hnyouv zingx nyei mienh.
11.1: Yie ndaauh kaux Ziouv,  wuov nyungc, meih mbuo hnangv haaix nor haih gorngv mbuox yie, “Meih oix zuqc hnangv norm norqc biaux mingh taux meih nyei mbong.”
11.5: Ziouv kauv kuv mienh caux orqv mienh, ninh nzorng haic a'hneiv zoux doqc nyei mienh.
11.6: Ninh oix zorqv zieqc jienv nyei douz-taanx caux hungh bungx njiec mienh waaic mienh gu'nguaaic, yaac bun nziaaux-jorm benx ninh mbuo nyei buonc.
11.4: Ziouv yiem ninh nyei cing-nzengc biauv gu'nyuoz,   Ziouv nyei weic yiem gu'nguaaic lungh. Ninh nyei m'zing zaah mangc baamh mienh, ziouc hiuv duqv ninh mbuo zoux nyei sic.
11.3: Se gorngv gorn-ndoqv zuqc baaic waaic, kuv mienh haih zoux haaix nyungc?”
11.7: Weic zuqc Ziouv  zoux duqv horpc, ninh yaac a'hneiv mienh zoux horpc nyei sic. Hnyouv zingx nyei mienh ziouc duqv buatc ninh nyei hmien.

28.2: Tov muangx haiz yie daux gaux heuc jienv tov meih tengx, dongh yie sung jienv buoz hungx jienv meih Gauh Cing-Nzengc Jiex nyei Singx Dinc tov nyei ziangh hoc.
28.1: O Ziouv  aah! Yie heuc jienv meih, yie nyei La'bieiv aah! Tov meih muangx yie, maiv dungx zoux hnangv m'normh ndung. Nziex meih maiv dau yie, yie ziouc hnangv njiec yiemh gen wuov deix mienh nor.
28.5: Weic zuqc ninh mbuo maiv maaih hnyouv taaih Ziouv zoux nyei gong, fai ninh nyei buoz zoux daaih nyei, ninh oix baaic waaic ninh mbuo, yaac maiv ceix ninh mbuo jiez aqv.
28.6: Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv,  weic zuqc ninh muangx haiz yie tov nyei waac.
28.8: Ziouv se ninh nyei baeqc fingx nyei qaqv, ninh se wuonv nyei dorngx njoux ninh longc youh orn daaih zoux hungh wuov dauh.
28.9: Tov njoux meih nyei baeqc fingx, yaac ceix fuqv bun meih nzipc nyei mienh. Tov meih goux ninh mbuo hnangv goux ba'gi yungh mienh goux ninh mbuo nyei yungh nor. Tov yietc liuz dorh ninh mbuo.
28.4: Tov meih ei ninh mbuo zoux nyei jauv, yaac ziux ninh mbuo zoux nyei orqv sic winh bun ninh mbuo. Ziux ninh mbuo nyei buoz zoux nyei, yaac ziux ninh mbuo horpc zuqc duqv nyei, tov winh bun ninh mbuo.
28.3: Tov maiv dungx zorqv yie caux mienh waaic mienh caux zoux orqv nyei mienh yietc njiec dingc zuiz. Ninh mbuo caux juangc laangz mienh gorngv baengh orn nyei waac, mv baac hnyouv gu'nyuoz ninh mbuo oix zoux doqc.
28.7: Ziouv se yie nyei qaqv caux yie nyei torngv-baaih, yie nyei hnyouv kaux ninh, ninh ziouc tengx yie. Yie nyei hnyouv yaac njien-youh haic, yie ziouc baaux nzung dor-ziec ninh.

72.15: Tov bun hungh diex ziangh duqv ndaauv. Tov bun ninh duqv Qe^mbaa nyei jiem. Tov bun mienh maiv dingh liouh nyei weic ninh daux gaux, yaac tov Tin-Hungh ziangh hnoi ceix fuqv bun ninh.
72.18: Ceng Ziouv, I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei Tin-Hungh. Kungx ninh ganh haih zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.
72.12: Weic zuqc dangx-donx nyei mienh heuc jienv tov nyei ziangh hoc ninh njoux, yaac njoux mienh jomc mienh caux maiv maaih haaix dauh tengx nyei mienh.
72.13: Ninh korv-lienh mau nyei mienh caux mienh jomc mienh, yaac njoux jomc kouv mienh nyei maengc.
72.19: Oix zuqc yietc liuz ceng ninh njang-laangc nyei mbuox, tov bun ninh nyei njang-laangc buangv lungh ndiev.   Aamen caux Aamen.
72.5: Mba'hnoi caux hlaax corc yiem jienv nyei ziangh hoc, tov bun ninh mbuo taaih meih taux maanc gouv maanc doic.
72.20: Jetc^si nyei dorn, Ndaawitv, daux gaux nyei waac dorng mi'aqv.
72.11: Tov bun zuangx hungh diex puoqv njiec ninh nyei nza'hmien, yaac bun maanc guoqv fu-sux ninh.
72.14: Ninh zuoqc ninh mbuo nyei maengc leih ndutv zuqc zeix, zuqc zoux doqc nyei jauv. Ziux ninh mangc, ninh mbuo nyei maengc funx jaaix nyei.
72.3: Weic baeqc fingx zoux horpc nyei jauv tov bun domh mbong fiuv-mbong duqv bungx-zuoqc.
72.10: Tov bun Taansitv caux zuangx koiv-nzou nyei hungh diex cuotv korx-zinh bun ninh. Yaac bun Qe^mbaa caux Se^mbaa nyei hungh diex dorh zingh nyeic bun ninh.
72.2: Tov bun ninh longc gong-fim siemv meih nyei baeqc fingx, yaac baengh fim nyei siemv meih nyei mienh jomc mienh.
72.1: O Tin-Hungh aah! Tov ceix bun hungh diex baengh fim nyei siemv hnangv meih nor, yaac bun hungh dorn hnangv meih nor, zoux duqv horpc.
72.4: Tov bun hungh diex baengh fim nyei tengx baeqc fingx mbu'ndongx nyei mienh jomc mienh, njoux dangx-donx nyei mienh yaac zatv jienv zeix ninh mbuo wuov deix.
72.6: Tov bun hungh diex hnangv mbiungc duih njiec mbietv liuz miev nyei ndau, yaac hnangv mbiungc-mbuonv puonx ndau-beih nor.
72.8: Tov bun ninh gunv nyei guoqv yiem naaiv bung koiv taux wuov bung koiv, yiem Yu^fe^ditc Ndaaih taux jomc lungh ndiev.
72.9: Tov bun yiem deic-bung-huaang nyei mienh yiem ninh nyei nza'hmien gueic njiec baaix, yaac bun ninh nyei win-wangv mbiec nie-mbung.
72.7: Ninh yiem nyei hnoi-nyieqc, tov bun kuv mienh hiaangx jienv faaux, yaac maaih baengh orn camv ndongc maaih hlaax yiem.
72.17: Tov bun hungh diex nyei mbuox yietc liuz yiem, ninh nyei mengh hoc yiem jienv ndongc mba'hnoi lauh. Maanc guoqv mienh oix weic hungh diex duqv fuqv, maanc fingx mienh yaac heuc ninh zoux maaih fuqv nyei mienh.
72.16: Tov bun deic-bung nyei ndau cuotv laangh ziqc bungx-zuoqc, yiem mbong gu'nguaaic jiex laangc paan-paan nyei, cuotv daaih gitv yaac jauh nyei hnangv Le^mbaa^norn nyei gemh, yaac bun zingh gu'nyuoz nyei mienh hiaangx hnangv lomc huaang nyei miev nor.

127.5: Maaih forng buangv forng-ndongh nyei mienh orn-lorqc haic. Yiem zingh gaengh caux win-wangv dunx sic nyei ziangh hoc yaac maiv zuqc nyaiv.
127.3: Naamh nyouz se Ziouv bun nzipc nyei buonc, yungz daaih nyei fu'jueiv benx ninh nyei zingh nyeic.
127.2: Lungh ndorm jiez sin nziouv, lungh muonz zanc bueix hmuangx lauh, cuotv qaqv zoux kouv weic yungz maengc se maiv lamh longc, weic zuqc Ziouv bun ninh hnamv nyei mienh bueix duqv njormh.
127.1: Se gorngv maiv zeiz Ziouv  zoux biauv, zoux biauv nyei mienh baeqc baeqc ndortv qaqv. Se gorngv maiv zeiz Ziouv zuov zingh, zuov zingh nyei mienh maiv njormh mv baac maiv lamh longc.
127.4: Mienh hnyangx-jeiv lunx nyei ziangh hoc yungz nyei naamh nyouz, se hnangv forng-cang yiem mborqv jaax baeng nyei buoz.

90.15: Tov bun yie mbuo duqv njien-youh ndongc meih bun yie mbuo zuqc kouv nyei hnoi-nyieqc lauh, yaac ndongc yie mbuo zuqc ciouv nyei zeqc naanc nyei hnyangx-daauh.
90.12: Tov njaaux yie mbuo saauv ganh nyei hnoi-nyieqc, weic bun yie mbuo haih maaih cong-mengh nyei hnyouv.
90.13: O Ziouv aac, meih oix qiex jiez ndongc haaix lauh? Tov huin nzuonx daaih. Tov korv-lienh meih nyei bou.
90.5: Meih guaatv mienh mingh mi'aqv. Ninh mbuo hnangv mbeix norm mbeix nor, yaac hnangv lungh ndorm nziouv cuotv daaih nyei miev,
90.11: Haaix dauh mengh baeqc meih qiex jiez nyei qaqv? Haaix dauh hiuv meih nouz nyei jauv hnangv taaih meih nyei mienh?
90.14: Tov bun yie mbuo ndorm-ndorm buangv eix meih ziepc zuoqv hnamv nyei hnyouv, weic bun yie mbuo yietc seix njien-youh a'hneiv.
90.3: Meih bun mienh nzuonx benx nie-mbung. Meih gorngv, “Baamh mienh nyei naamh nyouz aac, oix zuqc nzuonx benx nie-mbung.”
90.10: Yie mbuo nyei hnyangx-daauh ziangh duqv taux cietv ziepc, henv nyei nor, haih ziangh taux betv ziepc, mv baac naaiv deix ziangh hoc gu'nyuoz kungx laauh luic, nzauh kouv hnangv, maiv lauh jiex liuz aqv. Yie mbuo yaac fih hnangv nyei jiex mi'aqv.
90.2: Zinh ndaangc meih maiv gaengh zeix cuotv mbong, yaac maiv gaengh zeix ndau-beih caux baamh gen, yiem loz! hnoi taux nqa'haav hingv meih m'daaih zoux Tin-Hungh taux yietc liuz.
90.1: Ziouv aac, maanc gouv maanc doic meih zoux yie mbuo yiem nyei dorngx.
90.4: Weic zuqc ziux meih mangc, yietc cin hnyangx se hnangv jiex liuz nyei yietc hnoi, fai hnangv lungh muonz zanc yietc gaeng nor.
90.6: lungh ndorm nziouv baetv cuotv hlo daaih, lungh maanz-hmuangx nyaux, kou nqaai mi'aqv.
90.8: Meih zorqv yie mbuo nyei zuiz baaiv jienv meih nyei nza'hmien, zorqv yie mbuo bingx jienv zoux nyei zuiz an meih nyei nza'hmien, njang nyei dorngx.
90.9: Yie mbuo ziangh jienv nyei yietc zungv hnoi-nyieqc zuqc meih nouz. Yie mbuo ziangh nyei hnyangx-daauh jiex liuz hnangv tauv nzunc qiex-ndoqc nor.
90.7: Yie mbuo zuqc meih qiex jiez, mietc nzengc yie mbuo. Zuqc meih nouz ziouc haeqv yie mbuo gamh nziex haic.
90.17: Tov Ziouv, yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh, bun yie mbuo duqv longx. Tov liepc wuonv yie mbuo nyei buoz zoux nyei gong. Tov za'gengh liepc wuonv yie mbuo nyei buoz zoux nyei gong.
90.16: Tov bun meih nyei bou buatc meih zoux nyei sic, yaac bun ninh mbuo nyei zeiv-fun buatc meih nyei njang-laangc nyei qaqv.

19.12: Haaix dauh haih zieqv duqv ganh zoux dorngc nyei jauv? Tov guangc nqoi yie zoux dorngc, zieqv maiv duqv nyei sic.
19.13: Tov dangv jienv bun meih nyei bou maiv dungx duqv-eix baamz zuiz. Maiv dungx bun naaiv deix zuiz gunv yie. Hnangv naaic yie ziouc maiv maaih dorngx nqemh, yaac biaux duqv ndutv domh zuiz.
19.5: Mba'hnoi cuotv daaih hnangv siang-laangh yiem ninh nyei gen cuotv. Yaac hnangv saaix tiux nyei mienh henv mienh njien-youh nyei gan saaix nyei jauv mingh.
19.11: Naaiv deix leiz-latc kuinx meih nyei bou. Mienh ei jienv naaiv deix waac zoux ziouc maaih domh zingh nyeic.
19.14: O Ziouv aac, meih zoux yie nyei La'bieiv, yaac zoux Zuoqc Yie Wuov Dauh. Tov bun yie nyei nzuih gorngv cuotv nyei waac, caux yie yiem hnyouv hnamv nyei jauv, ziux meih mangc haih zoux duqv horpc.
19.3: Mouc nyinh mouc waac, mouc sing-qiex maiv haiz,
19.10: Se gauh jaaix jiex jiem, zungv gauh jaaix zien jiem. Yaac gauh gaam jiex mueiz-dorngh, dongh yiem mueiz-pengx liouc cuotv nyei mueiz-dorngh.
19.2: Yietc hnoi zunh mbuox jiex yietc hnoi, yietc muonz zunh wuonh zaang jiex yietc muonz.
19.1: Lungh zunh yaangh Tin-Hungh nyei njang-laangc, lungh zaangc biux mengh ninh nyei buoz-dauh.
19.4: mv baac ninh nyei fienx mingh gormx baamh gen, ninh nyei nyinh nyouz mingh jomc lungh ndiev. Tin-Hungh yiem wuov lungh weic mba'hnoi corng ndopv-liuh.
19.6: Mba'hnoi yiem naaiv bung lungh cuotv daaih, aengx youh taux wuov bung lungh. Maiv maaih haaix nyungc haih bingx duqv ninh jorm nyei qiex.
19.8: Ziouv  hatc nyei waac horpc nyei, bun gan nyei mienh maaih njien-youh.   Ziouv  nyei lingc cing-nzengc nyei, bun mienh haih mengh baeqc.
19.9: Mienh taaih Ziouv  se longx haic, oix zuqc taaih taux maanc gouv maanc doic.   Ziouv  nyei leiz se zien nyei, diuh diuh baengh fim nyei.
