19.7: Ziouv nyei leiz-latc se dunh yunh nyei, bun mienh nyei hnyouv fingv jiez daaih.   Ziouv nyei leiz-nyeic se kaux duqv wuonv nyei, bun maiv maaih cong-mengh nyei mienh maaih cong-mengh.

54.2: O Tin-Hungh aah! Tov meih muangx yie daux gaux, muangx haiz yie nyei nzuih gorngv nyei waac.
54.1: Tin-Hungh aah! Tov longc meih nyei mengh njoux yie. Tov longc meih nyei domh qaqv bun cing yie maiv dorngc.
54.5: Tov Tin-Hungh ziux win-wangv zoux nyei orqv sic winh bun ninh mbuo. Weic zuqc meih ziepc zuoqv nyei, tov mietc ninh mbuo.
54.6: Yie oix cuotv fim zorqv fongc horc ziec nyei ga'naaiv bun meih. O Ziouv aac, yie oix ceng meih nyei mengh, weic zuqc meih nyei mengh se longx haic.
54.4: Tin-Hungh se dongh tengx yie wuov dauh. Ziouv yaac baav jienv yie nyei maengc.
54.3: Weic zuqc maaih deix ceng-hlo nyei mienh cuotv daaih mborqv yie. Mienh doqc mienh oix zorqv yie nyei maengc. Ninh mbuo yaac maiv gamh nziex Tin-Hungh.  Selaa
54.7: Meih njoux yie biaux ndutv yie nyei yietc zungv kouv naanc. Yie ganh nyei m'zing yaac buatc jienv yie nyei win-wangv zuqc suei.

113.2: Yiem naaiv mingh oix zuqc ceng Ziouv nyei mbuox taux yietc liuz.
113.1: Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.    O Ziouv nyei zuangx bou aah! Oix zuqc ceng, oix zuqc ceng Ziouv  nyei mengh.
113.5: Maiv maaih haaix dauh hnangv Ziouv, yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh, dongh zueiz jienv gauh hlang jiex nyei dorngx wuov dauh.
113.6: Ninh mangc njiec aiv nyei dorngx, mangc lungh caux ga'ndiev ndau.
113.8: bun ninh mbuo caux zoux hlo nyei mienh yiem, se caux ninh nyei baeqc fingx zoux hlo nyei mienh.
113.9: Ninh bun maiv haih maaih gu'nguaaz nyei m'sieqv dorn duqv biauv yiem, bun ninh duqv fu'jueiv ziouc orn-lorqc. Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.
113.4: Ziouv yiem gauh hlang jiex maanc fingx, ninh nyei njang-laangc gauh hlang jiex lungh.
113.3: Yiem mba'hnoi cuotv taux mba'hnoi muotv nyei dorngx horpc zuqc ceng Ziouv  nyei mengh.
113.7: Ninh bouh mienh jomc mienh cuotv nie-mbung, aengx bouh dangx-donx nyei mienh cuotv saaiv-ndui,

26.12: Yie nyei zaux souv jienv ndau-baengh nyei dorngx, yiem zuangx mienh gapv zunv nyei dorngx yie oix ceng Ziouv.
26.5: Yie nzorng haic gapv zunv nyei orqv mienh, yaac simv nqoi mienh waaic mienh.
26.11: Mv baac yie ganh kungx zoux hnyouv zingx. Tov meih njoux yie, korv-lienh yie.
26.3: Weic zuqc meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv yie yaac dorh yie, yie yaac zanc-zanc ei jienv meih nyei zien leiz yangh.
26.10: Ninh mbuo nyei buoz zanc-zanc zoux orqv sic. Ninh mbuo nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz kungx nzuiz nyaanh hmuangx hnangv.
26.2: O Ziouv aac, tov meih zaah mangc yie yaac seix yie, tov kauv yie nyei hnyouv caux yie hnamv nyei sic.
26.1: Ziouv aac, tov meih siemv bun cing yie maiv zoux dorngc, weic zuqc yie kungx zoux zingx nyei sic hnangv. Yie kaux Ziouv, hnyouv yaac maiv mbungh mbienv.
26.4: Yie yaac maiv caux nduov mienh nyei mienh juangc jauv yangh, yaac maiv caux beih zaqc hnyouv njuotv nyei mienh zoux doic.
26.6: O Ziouv aac, yie nzaaux yie nyei buoz bun cing yie maiv zoux dorngc. Yie yaac yangh huing meih nyei ziec-dorngh.
26.8: O Ziouv aac, yie hnamv meih yiem nyei biauv, dongh meih nyei njang-laangc yiem nyei dorngx.
26.9: Tov meih maiv dungx zorqv yie caux zuiz-mienh yietc njiec guaatv mingh. Yaac maiv dungx zorqv yie nyei maengc caux daix mienh nyei mienh zuqc daic.
26.7: Yie baaux nzung dor-ziec meih, nzamc jienv gorngv meih zoux nyei yietc zungv mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.

9.15: Maanc fingx mienh ndortv njiec ninh mbuo ganh wetv nyei kuotv. Ninh mbuo nyei zaux yaac zuqc ninh mbuo ganh zaeng nyei mungz nzenc jienv.
9.18: Ninh maiv zeiz yietc liuz la'kuqv dangx-donx nyei mienh. Mienh jomc mienh maiv zeiz yietc liuz maiv lamh hnamv dorngx.
9.12: Weic zuqc ninh zoux jaauv mienh maengc win wuov dauh, yaac jangx ninh mbuo. Ninh maiv la'kuqv zuqc zeix zuqc hoic, heuc jienv tov nyei mienh.
9.13: O Ziouv aah! Tov meih korv-lienh yie. Tov meih mangc nzorng yie wuov deix mienh bun yie zuqc nyei kouv naanc. Se meih njoux yie yiem zuqc daic nyei gaengh cuotv daaih,
9.19: O Ziouv aah! Daaih maah! Maiv dungx bun baamh mienh duqv hingh. Tov bun maanc fingx yiem meih nyei nza'hmien zuqc siemv.
9.5: Meih hemx ganh fingx mienh, bun orqv mienh zuqc mietc. Meih sortv ninh mbuo nyei mbuox guangc taux maanc gouv maanc doic.
9.20: O Ziouv aah! Tov bun ninh mbuo gamh nziex. Tov bun maanc fingx zieqv duqv ninh mbuo benx baamh mienh hnangv. Selaa
9.11: Oix zuqc baaux nzung ceng yiem Si^on nyei Ziouv,  oix zuqc yiem maanc fingx mbu'ndongx zunh ninh zoux nyei jauv-louc.
9.14: weic bun yie yiem Si^on nyei zingh gaengh, zunh yaangh ceng meih nyei sic, yaac orn-lorqc haic weic zuqc meih njoux yie.
9.3: Yie nyei win-wangv daaux sin tuix nzuonx nyei ziangh hoc, ninh mbuo yiem meih nyei nza'hmien ndiqv zuqc ndorpc yaac zuqc mietc.
9.10: O Ziouv aac, nyiemc meih nyei mbuox wuov deix oix kaux meih, weic zuqc meih maiv guangc lorz meih wuov deix mienh.
9.2: Yie oix weic meih a'hneiv njien-youh. O Yiem Hlang Jiex Wuov Dauh aac, yie oix baaux nzung ceng meih nyei mengh.
9.1: Yie oix longc nzengc hnyouv dor-ziec Ziouv,  yie oix zunh meih zoux yietc zungv mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.
9.4: Meih zueiz jienv siemv zuiz nyei weic baengh fim nyei siemv, meih yaac baengh fim siemv bun yie duqv longx.
9.6: Win-wangv zuqc baaic zuqc mbaang taux yietc liuz, meih baaic waaic ninh mbuo nyei yietc zungv zingh hnangv liemh nzungh baeng cuotv nor, liemh maiv maaih haaix dauh jangx ninh mbuo.
9.8: Ninh baengh fim nyei siemv lungh ndiev mienh, hnyouv zingx nyei siemv maanc fingx.
9.9: Ziouv zoux wuonv nyei dorngx bun zuqc zeix zuqc hoic nyei mienh kaux, zuqc kuonx naanh nyei ziangh hoc maaih lamh kaux dorngx.
9.7: Mv baac Ziouv yietc liuz zueiz jienv ninh nyei weic gunv, ninh liepc ninh nyei weic daaih siemv zuiz.
9.17: Orqv mienh, se la'kuqv Tin-Hungh nyei fingx-fingx mienh, zungv zuqc mingh yiem yiemh gen.
9.16: Ziouv bun mienh hiuv duqv ninh ganh, ninh baengh fim nyei siemv zuiz. Orqv mienh nyei buoz zoux nyei sic hlopv jienv ninh mbuo ganh. Hikv^gai^on,     Selaa

96.12: Lingh deic caux yiem lingh deic gu'nyuoz nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv, oix zuqc njien-youh a'hneiv. Wuov zanc lomc zaangc nyei yietc zungv ndiangx ziouc njien-youh nyei baaux nzung,
96.13: yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien, weic zuqc ninh oix daaih siemv lungh ndiev. Ninh oix baengh fim nyei siemv baamh gen, yaac longc ninh nyei zien leiz siemv maanc fingx.
96.5: Weic zuqc zuangx fingx nyei yietc zungv zienh benx miuc-fangx hnangv, mv baac Ziouv  zeix lungh.
96.11: Lungh aah! Oix zuqc njien-youh. Ndau aah! Oix zuqc orn-lorqc. Koiv caux yiem koiv nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv oix zuqc zoz-zoz nyei mbui.
96.3: Yiem maanc guoqv zunh yaangh ninh nyei njang-laangc. Yiem maanc fingx mbu'ndongx gorngv ninh zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.
96.10: Yiem maanc guoqv mbu'ndongx oix zuqc gorngv, “Ziouv  zoux hungh.” Baamh gen liepc duqv wuonv, maiv maaih haaix nyungc haih ndanc duqv dongz. Ninh yaac oix baengh fim nyei siemv maanc fingx.
96.2: Baaux nzung bun Ziouv, baaux ceng ninh nyei mengh, hnoi-hnoi zunh yaangh ninh nyei njoux en.
96.1: Oix zuqc baaux diuh siang-nzung bun Ziouv.  Lungh ndiev oix zuqc baaux nzung bun Ziouv.
96.4: Weic zuqc Ziouv se hlo haic, horpc zuqc camv-camv nyei ceng, oix zuqc taaih ninh gauh camv maanc zienh.
96.6: Maaih njang-laangc caux haangh daauh yiem ninh nyei nza'hmien, yiem ninh nyei singx dinc bun cing ninh maaih qaqv yaac nzueic haic.
96.8: Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv puix ninh njang-laangc nyei mbuox, dorh fongc horc nyei ga'naaiv daaih bieqc ninh nyei singx dinc nyei laatc gu'nyuoz.
96.9: Zaangc Ziouv nyei ziangh hoc oix zuqc zuqv cing-nzengc nyei lui-houx. Lungh ndiev mienh aah! Oix zuqc sin zinx jienv yiem Ziouv  nyei nza'hmien.
96.7: O maanc fingx mienh aah! Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv. Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv nyei njang-laangc caux qaqv.

70.5: Mv baac yie kouv yaac jomc haic. O Tin-Hungh aah! Tov siepv-siepv nyei daaih yie naaiv. Meih se dongh tengx yie, njoux yie wuov dauh. O Ziouv  aah! Tov maiv dungx ngaih.
70.3: Tov bun gorngv, “Haav! Haav!” wuov deix, zuqc nyaiv zuqc baaic.
70.2: Tov bun oix zorqv yie nyei maengc wuov deix mienh zuqc nyaiv zuqc lunc. Tov bun dongh a'hneiv yie zuqc kouv wuov deix zuqc tuix nzuonx nqa'haav yaac zuqc baaic hmien.
70.1: O Tin-Hungh aah! Tov gaanv daaih njoux yie. O Ziouv aah! Tov siepv-siepv nyei tengx yie.
70.4: Tov bun yietc zungv daaih lorz meih wuov deix, njien-youh orn-lorqc, tov bun hnamv meih nyei njoux en wuov deix, zanc-zanc gorngv, “Tin-Hungh za'gengh hlo haic.”

77.15: Meih longc meih nyei qaqv njoux meih nyei mienh, se njoux Yaakopv caux Yosepv nyei zeiv-fun. Selaa
77.18: Mba'ong yiem domh nziaaux-zunc mbui cuotv. Meih nyei mba'lingc bun lungh ndiev njang nzengc. Ndau-beih ndanc dongz nzengc.
77.12: Yie yiem hnyouv buih meih zoux nyei yietc zungv gong, yie oix longx-longx nyei hnamv taux meih zoux jiex maaih qaqv nyei sic.
77.13: O Tin-Hungh aac, meih zoux nyei jauv-louc se cing-nzengc haic, maiv maaih haaix dauh zienh ndongc yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh hlo.
77.19: Meih nyei jauv se yiem koiv jiex, meih mingh nyei jauv gan domh wuom mingh, mv baac meih nyei zaux-mienv maiv maaih mienh buatc.
77.5: Yie hnamv taux jiex daaih nyei hnoi-nyieqc, yaac jangx zuqc loz-hnoi nyei hnyangx-daauh.
77.20: Meih dorh meih nyei baeqc fingx hnangv goux yungh mienh dorh ba'gi yungh guanh nor, yaac bangc Mose caux Aalon nyei buoz dorh.
77.11: Yie oix jangx taux Ziouv zoux jiex nyei sic, za'gengh oix jangx meih loz-hnoi zoux wuov deix mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.
77.14: Meih se zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic wuov dauh Tin-Hungh. Meih yiem maanc fingx mbu'ndongx bun ninh mbuo buatc meih nyei domh qaqv.
77.3: Yie hnamv taux Tin-Hungh ziouc tauv domh qiex. Yie jangx taux naaiv deix jauv, haiz hnyouv mau nzengc aqv. Selaa
77.10: Yie aengx gorngv, “Bun yie hnyouv nzauh nyei se Yiem Hlang Jiex Wuov Dauh nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz goiv yienc mi'aqv.
77.2: Yie zuqc kouv naanc nyei hnoi-nyieqc yie lorz Ziouv, yie ziangh muonz sung jienv buoz maiv dingh liouh nyei daux gaux, mv baac maiv duqv orn hnyouv.
77.1: Yie heuc jienv jouh Tin-Hungh. Yie heuc jienv tov, ninh zungv oix muangx yie.
77.4: Meih bun yie maiv haih m'njormh. Yie hnyouv nzauh kouv haic, zungv maiv haih gorngv waac.
77.6: Yie lungh muonz zanc yiem hnyouv hnamv, yie yiem hnyouv fei-fangv yaac naaic gaax ganh,
77.8: Ninh yietc liuz maiv aengx hnamv yie mbuo fai? Ninh laengz nyei waac yietc liuz yietc seix baac nzengc mi'aqv fai?
77.9: Tin-Hungh la'kuqv ceix en bun yie mbuo fai? Ninh qiex jiez ziouc maiv korv-lienh fai?” Selaa
77.7: “Ziouv oix yietc liuz guangc yie mbuo, yietc liuz maiv aengx a'hneiv yie mbuo fai?
77.17: Mbuonx dox cuotv wuom, yiem wuov lungh maaih mba'ong mbui. Mba'lingc yaac njapc njapc nyei biei bung.
77.16: O Tin-Hungh aac, wuom buatc meih, wuom buatc meih wuov zanc ziouc gamh nziex. Ndo haic nyei koiv yaac dongz.

40.15: Tov bun gorngv, “Haav, haav!” bun yie wuov deix zuqc nyaiv, zuqc baaic.
40.12: Maaih ciouv nyei zeqc naanc, zungv saauv maiv hingh, weih gormx yie, yie nyei zuiz zunc zaaic yie, taux yie mangc maiv buatc haaix nyungc. Zuiz gauh camv jiex yie nyei m'nqorngv nyei mba'biei, yie nyei mba'nziu yuqc nzengc.
40.13: O Ziouv aah! Tov meih nqoi eix njoux yie. Tov Ziouv siepv-siepv nyei tengx yie.
40.5: O Ziouv,  yie nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Meih weic yie mbuo zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic camv. Meih weic yie mbuo hnamv cuotv nyei za'eix maiv maaih haaix dauh haih beiv duqv taux meih. Se gorngv yie mingh zunh mbuox mienh, zungv maiv haih saauv maiv zienz.
40.11: Ziouv aac, tov meih maiv dungx ngaengc jienv maiv korv-lienh yie. Meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv yie yaac bun meih nyei zien leiz zanc-zanc beu jienv yie.
40.14: Tov bun oix zorqv yie nyei maengc wuov deix mienh zuqc nyaiv zuqc lunc. Tov bun dongh a'hneiv yie zuqc kouv wuov deix tuix nzuonx nqa'haav yaac zuqc baaic hmien.
40.3: Ninh bun yie nyei nzuih baaux diuh siang-nzung, se ceng yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh nyei nzung. Maaih mienh camv nyei duqv buatc ziouc gamh nziex aengx sienx kaux Ziouv.
40.10: Yie maiv zorqv meih tengx yie mbuo nyei njoux en bingx jienv yie nyei hnyouv. Yie gorngv meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnyouv caux meih nyei njoux en. Yie yiem mienh camv gapv zunv nyei dorngx, maiv gem jienv meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh caux hnyouv zingx nyei jauv.
40.2: Ninh cie yie yiem zuqc mietc nyei kuotv cuotv daaih, se ndo haic, nyouh haic nyei wuom-bamc, bun yie nyei zaux souv wuonv yiem la'bieiv-zorng gu'nguaaic, bun yie nyei zaux-mbiec caaiv duqv wuonv.
40.1: Yie longc noic zuov jienv Ziouv,  ninh bungx m'normh muangx haiz yie tov nyei waac.
40.4: Haaix dauh sienx kaux Ziouv,  maiv huin mingh lorz zoux maux, ceng-hlo nyei mienh, caux dorngc jauv gan jaav zienh nyei mienh, wuov dauh duqv orn-lorqc aqv.
40.6: Meih maiv zeiz oix mienh buov ziec caux fongc horc nyei ga'naaiv, meih maiv zeiz lorz ziangh dauh buov ziec nyei saeng-kuv fai fiqv zuiz nyei ga'naaiv, mv baac meih bun yie maaih m'normh muangx duqv haiz meih nyei qiex.
40.8: O yie nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Meih nyei leiz-latc yiem yie nyei hnyouv gu'nyuoz. Yie a'hneiv ei jienv meih nyei eix zoux.
40.9: Yie yiem mienh camv gapv zunv nyei dorngx zunh njoux en nyei kuv fienx. O Ziouv aah! Meih hiuv duqv yie nyei nzuih meix maiv dingh liouh nyei zunh.
40.7: Yie ziouc gorngv, “Mangc maah! Yie daaih aqv. Yiem wuov sou-njunc fiev jienv yie nyei jauv-louc.”
40.17: Mv baac yie se kouv, jomc haic, tov Ziouv jangx yie. Meih se dongh tengx yie, njoux yie wuov dauh. O yie nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Tov meih maiv dungx ngaih.
40.16: Tov bun yietc zungv daaih lorz meih wuov deix, njien-youh orn-lorqc. Tov bun hnamv meih nyei njoux en wuov deix, maiv dingh liouh nyei gorngv, “Ziouv za'gengh hlo haic.”

81.15: Nzorng Ziouv nyei mienh zungv zuqc mbaapv njiec ninh nyei nza'hmien, ninh mbuo yaac zuqc dingc zuiz taux yietc liuz.
81.12: Yie ziouc sueih binc ninh mbuo ziux ninh mbuo hnyouv ngaengc nyei eix zoux. Sueih ninh mbuo ei ninh mbuo ganh nyei za'eix.
81.13: “Feix duqv yie nyei baeqc fingx muangx yie nyei waac. Feix duqv I^saa^laa^en Mienh yangh yie nyei jauv.
81.5: Ninh cuotv mingh mborqv I^yipv Deic-Bung wuov zanc, ninh yiem Yosepv nyei zeiv-fun mbu'ndongx liepc naaiv diuh lingc. Yiem wuov yie mbuo duqv haiz yie mbuo muangx maiv mengh baeqc nyei waac gorngv,
81.11: “Mv baac yie nyei mienh maiv muangx yie nyei waac. I^saa^laa^en Mienh zungv maiv longc yie.
81.14: Yie ziouc siepv-siepv nyei hingh jiex ninh mbuo nyei win-wangv, huin nzuonx cau buoz mborqv ninh mbuo nyei win-jaa.
81.3: Siang-Hlaax caux ziepc hmz, dongh hlaax junh wuov hnoi, jiex zipv oix zuqc biomv nzatc.
81.10: Yie se Ziouv, meih mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh, dongh dorh meih mbuo cuotv I^yipv wuov dauh. Meih mbuo oix zuqc morngx nzuih hlo nyei, yie ziouc uix meih mbuo beuv.
81.2: Jiez gorn baaux nzung, mborqv nzoz, longc domh daanh baah caux fiuv-daanh baah patv kuh muangx nyei nzung.
81.1: Baaux nzung ceng Tin-Hungh, yie mbuo nyei qaqv. Njien-youh nyei heuc jienv ceng Yaakopv nyei Tin-Hungh.
81.4: Naaiv se weic I^saa^laa^en benx diuh leiz-nyeic, benx Yaakopv nyei Tin-Hungh nyei leiz.
81.6: “Yie zorqv meih mbuo nyiex hniev nyei ga'naaiv bouh njiec, yaac zorqv meih mbuo nyei buoz bouh nyei ndaan bungx njiec mingh.
81.8: “O yie nyei baeqc fingx aah! Muangx yie kuinx meih mbuo. O I^saa^laa^en Mienh aah! Feix duqv meih mbuo muangx yie gorngv nyei waac.
81.9: Yiem meih mbuo mbu'ndongx maiv dungx maaih nyiec nyei zienh, maiv dungx gueic njiec baaix ganh fingx nyei zienh.
81.7: Zuqc naanc zingh nyei ziangh hoc meih mbuo heuc, yie yaac njoux meih mbuo. Yie yiem mbuonx-jieqv, mba'ong bingx nyei dorngx, dau meih mbuo. Yie yiem Me^li^mbaa Wuom seix meih mbuo.  Selaa
81.16: Ziouv oix zorqv gauh longx jiex nyei mbiauh bun meih mbuo nyanc, yaac zorqv yiem la'bieiv-mbaengx nyei mueiz-dorngh bun meih mbuo buangv hnyouv.

91.15: Se gorngv ninh heuc yie, yie ziouc dau ninh. Ninh buangh zuqc haaix nyungc naanc zingh, yie oix caux ninh yiem. Yie oix njoux ninh yaac taaih ninh.
91.12: Ninh mbuo oix longc buoz bouh jienv meih, maiv bun meih nyei zaux zong zuqc la'bieiv.
91.13: Meih oix caaiv sienh caux naang-jieqv, oix ndamc sienh lunx caux domh naang.
91.5: Meih yaac maiv zuqc gamh nziex lungh muonz-zanc nyei heiv sic, fai lungh hnoi zanc buonv daaih nyei forng-cang,
91.11: weic zuqc Tin-Hungh oix paaiv ninh nyei fin-mienh goux jienv meih, beu jienv meih maiv gunv meih mingh taux haaix.
91.14: Tin-Hungh gorngv, “Weic zuqc ninh longc hnyouv hnamv yie, yie ziouc dau ninh. Yie oix beu jienv ninh, weic zuqc ninh nyiemc yie nyei mbuox.
91.3: Ninh oix njoux meih simv ndutv zaeng norqc mienh nyei koux, caux doqc haic nyei wuon-baengc.
91.10: maiv maaih haaix nyungc ciouv nyei sic ndortv zuqc meih. Maiv maaih haaix nyungc siem nyei zeqc naanc daaih nitv fatv meih nyei biauv,
91.2: wuov dauh ziouc gorngv mbuox Ziouv,  “Meih se yie ndaauh kaux nyei dorngx, caux weih wuonv nyei dorngx, yie nyei Tin-Hungh, dongh yie kaux wuov dauh.”
91.1: Haaix dauh yiem Hlang Jiex Wuov Dauh nyei torngv laangh dorngx, se zanx yiem Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh nyei dongh linh gu'nyuoz,
91.4: Ninh zungv longc ninh nyei ndaatv gomv jienv meih. Yiem ninh nyei ndaatv ga'ndiev ziouc bun meih maaih ndaauh kaux nyei dorngx. Ninh ziepc zuoqv nyei hnyouv zoux domh torngv-baaih, fiuv-torngv-baaih beu jienv.
91.6: fai lungh muonz zanc daaih nyei domh wuon-baengc, fai lungh aanx zanc bun mienh zuqc mietc nyei zeqc naanc.
91.8: Meih ganh nyei m'zing ziouc mangc buatc winh bun orqv mienh zuqc dingc nyei zuiz.
91.9: Weic zuqc meih bun Ziouv, zoux meih ndaauh kaux wuov dauh, se Yiem Hlang Jiex Wuov Dauh, benx meih yiem nyei dorngx,
91.7: Nziex haih maaih yietc cin dauh mienh king njiec meih nyei ga'hlen, yietc waanc dauh king njiec meih nyei mbiaauc maengx, mv baac naaiv deix sic maiv daaih nitv fatv meih.
91.16: Yie oix bun ninh buangv eix duqv siouc nyuonh ndaauv, yaac bun ninh buatc yie nyei njoux en.”

14.2: Ziouv  yiem tin-dorngh mangc njiec, mangc baamh mienh, oix mangc gaax, maaih haaix dauh maaih cong-mengh, maaih haaix dauh lorz Tin-Hungh.
14.1: Mienh hngongx mienh yiem hnyouv gorngv, “Maiv maaih Tin-Hungh lorqc.” Ninh mbuo yietc zungv waaic nzengc, ninh mbuo zoux orqv haic, waaic haic nyei sic. Maiv maaih yietc dauh zoux longx.
14.5: Mv baac ninh mbuo yiem wuov gengh! gamh nziex haic, weic zuqc Tin-Hungh caux kuv mienh yiem.
14.6: Meih mbuo zoux orqv nyei mienh oix bun mienh jomc mienh nyei za'eix ndortv, mv baac Ziouv zoux ninh mbuo ndaauh kaux nyei dorngx.
14.4: Yietc zungv zoux orqv nyei mienh maiv hiuv haaix nyungc fai? Ninh mbuo naqv yie nyei baeqc fingx hnangv ninh mbuo nyanc hnaangx. Ninh mbuo yaac maiv tov Ziouv.
14.3: Ninh mbuo yietc zungv yangh pien jauv, dauh dauh fih hnangv nyei waaic nzengc. Maiv maaih haaix dauh zoux longx, yietc dauh yaac maiv maaih.
14.7: Tov bun I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei njoux en yiem Si^on cuotv daaih.   Ziouv bun ninh nyei baeqc fingx nzuonx daaih duqv longx hnangv zinh ndaangc wuov zanc, Yaakopv nyei zeiv-fun ziouc maaih orn-lorqc, I^saa^laa^en Mienh oix njien-youh.

27.12: Tov meih maiv dungx zorqv yie jiu bun win-wangv. Maiv dungx sueih win-wangv nyei eix zoux bun yie. Weic zuqc zoux jaav zorng-zengx nyei mienh cuotv daaih, ninh mbuo gorngv cuotv nyei waac hoic yie kouv.
27.13: Yie sienx dingc yie corc yiem yaangh gen nyei ziangh hoc, yie oix duqv buatc Ziouv  zoux longx.
27.5: Yie zuqc kouv nyei ziangh hoc ninh oix beu jienv yie yiem ninh ganh nyei dorngx. Se zorqv yie bingx jienv yiem ninh nyei ndopv-liuh gu'nyuoz, ninh oix zorqv yie an jienv la'bieiv-zorng gu'nguaaic.
27.11: O Ziouv aac, tov meih njaaux yie yangh meih nyei jauv, yaac dorh yie gan jauv-baengh mingh, weic zuqc yie maaih win-wangv camv.
27.14: Oix zuqc zuov Ziouv,  oix zuqc henv yaac zungx jienv daamv, zungv oix zuqc zuov Ziouv.
27.3: Maiv gunv maaih jun-baeng daaih weih gormx yie, yie nyei hnyouv maiv gamh nziex. Maiv gunv zuqc mborqv domh jaax, yie corc kaux Tin-Hungh.
27.10: Yie nyei diex maac guangc yie, mv baac Ziouv  oix zipv yie.
27.2: Zoux orqv nyei mienh daaih hoic yie, oix nyanc yie nyei orv nyei ziangh hoc, se yie nyei win-jaa win-wangv daaih wuov zanc, ninh mbuo oix ndiqv zuqc ndorpc.
27.1: Ziouv zoux yie nyei njang caux njoux yie wuov dauh, yie oix zuqc gamh nziex haaix dauh?   Ziouv se yie nyei maengc kaux wuonv nyei dorngx, yie oix zuqc gamh nziex haaix dauh?
27.4: Yie tengx Ziouv  tov nduqc nyungc hnangv, wuov nyungc yie oix lorz, se yie yietc liuz yietc seix oix yiem Ziouv  nyei biauv, yiem wuov mangc jienv Ziouv ndongc naaic longx yaac yiem ninh nyei biauv jouh ninh.
27.6: Ih zanc yie oix cau jiez m'nqorngv, yiem weih gormx yie wuov deix win-wangv gu'nguaaic. Yie oix yiem Tin-Hungh nyei ndopv-liuh gu'nyuoz, njien-youh nyei heuc jienv fongc horc ziec. Yie oix baaux nzung, oix baaux nzung ceng Ziouv.
27.8: Meih gorngv mbuox yie, “Daaih lorz yie maah!” Yie nyei hnyouv gorngv mbuox meih, “Ziouv aac, yie za'gengh oix lorz meih.”
27.9: Tov maiv dungx bingx meih nyei hmien maiv mangc yie. Maiv dungx qiex jiez jienv zunc meih nyei bou biaux nqoi, weic zuqc meih m'daaih zoux tengx yie wuov dauh. O yie nyei Njoux Ziouv, Tin-Hungh aah! Maiv dungx leih yie, maiv dungx guangc yie.
27.7: O Ziouv aah! Yie heuc nyei ziangh hoc tov muangx yie, tov korv-lienh yie, yaac dau yie.

51.15: O Ziouv aac, tov tengx yie nyei nzuih haih gorngv waac, yie ziouc longc yie nyei nzuih ceng meih.
51.18: Tov ziux meih nyei kuv za'eix bun Si^on Zingh duqv longx. Tov ceix jiez Ye^lu^saa^lem nyei zingh laatc.
51.12: Tov bun yie duqv meih nyei njoux en nyei njien-youh hnangv loz nor. Yaac bun yie maaih hnyouv oix gan longx meih.
51.13: Yie ziouc zorqv meih nyei jauv njaaux zuiz-mienh, ninh mbuo zungv oix nzuonx daaih lorz meih.
51.19: Wuov zanc meih ziouc a'hneiv mienh ziec duqv horpc nyei ga'naaiv, caux buov ziec caux ziangh dauh buov ziec nyei ga'naaiv. Mienh yaac oix zorqv ngongh gouv an meih nyei ziec-dorngh gu'nguaaic buov.
51.5: Yie cuotv seix daaih benx zuiz-mienh, yiem maa nyei ga'sie wuov zanc zungv maaih jienv zuiz.
51.11: Maiv dungx zunc yie biaux, leih nqoi meih nyei nza'hmien, yaac maiv dungx zorqv yiem yie nyei Singx Lingh cuotv.
51.14: O Tin-Hungh aac, meih zoux njoux yie wuov dauh Tin-Hungh. Tov njoux yie leih ndutv daix mienh nyei zuiz. Yie nyei mbietc ziouc baaux nzung gorngv meih se baengh fim nyei.
51.3: Yie zieqv duqv yie zoux dorngc nyei sic, yaac zanc-zanc jangx zuqc yie nyei zuiz.
51.10: Tin-Hungh aah! Tov yiem yie gu'nyuoz zeix cing-nzengc nyei hnyouv, yaac bun yie maaih ziepc zuoqv nyei siang-hnyouv.
51.2: Tov meih nzaaux nzengc yie nyei zuiz-nipc, tov saax nzengc zuiz bun yie cing-nzengc daaih.
51.1: Tin-Hungh aah! Tov meih korv-lienh yie, ziux meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh. Ziux meih ndongc naaic korv-lienh mienh, tov sortv guangc yie zoux dorngc nyei zuiz.
51.4: Yie baamz zuiz dorngc meih, kungx dorngc meih hnangv, yaac ziux meih buatc, yie zoux orqv sic. Weic naaiv meih dingc yie nyei zuiz se baengh fim nyei, meih dunx yie nyei sic yaac dunx duqv horpc.
51.6: Meih oix nyei se mienh hnyouv zingx, weic naaiv tov meih njaaux yie, bun yie maaih cong-mengh yiem hnyouv ndo nyei dorngx.
51.8: Tov bun yie aengx muangx duqv haiz njien-youh, a'hneiv nyei qiex. Maiv gunv meih bun yie zuqc kouv, tov bun yie aengx maaih orn-lorqc.
51.9: Tov meih buang jienv hmien, maiv dungx mangc yie nyei zuiz, yaac tov sortv guangc yie zoux nyei yietc zungv zuiz-nipc.
51.7: Tov longc husopc miev saax yie, yie ziouc cing-nzengc daaih. Tov nzaaux yie, yie ziouc gauh baeqc jiex sorng.
51.17: Tin-Hungh oix nyei ga'naaiv-ziec se mienh hnyouv mun, hiuv duqv ganh zoux dorngc. O Tin-Hungh aac, hnyouv mun, hiuv duqv ganh zoux dorngc nyei mienh, meih maiv mangc piex.
51.16: Meih maiv zeiz a'hneiv fongc horc ziec nyei ga'naaiv. Se gorngv yie fongc horc buov ziec ga'naaiv, meih yaac maiv horpc hnyouv.

74.21: Tov maiv dungx bun zuqc zeix nyei mienh zuqc nyaiv. Tov bun mienh jomc mienh caux dangx-donx nyei mienh ceng meih nyei mengh.
74.15: Meih bun wuom-zingv caux ndoqv nyei wuom liouc cuotv. Zanc-zanc maaih wuom liouc jienv nyei ndaaih meih bun nqaai mingh.
74.12: Mv baac Tin-Hungh aac, yiem loz-hnoi daaih meih zoux yie nyei hungh. Meih yiem lungh ndiev zoux gong weic njoux mienh.
74.17: Ndau-beih nyei yietc zungv gapv-jaaix se meih dingc daaih. Meih yaac bun maaih haac gueix caux dong gueix.
74.20: Tov jangx jienv meih liepc nyei ngaengc waac weic zuqc ndau-beih norm-norm hmuangx nyei dorngx maaih zoux doqc hoic mienh nyei sic buangv nzengc.
74.4: Meih nyei win-wangv yiem meih nyei wuic dorngh qaqv heuc. Ninh mbuo cie ninh mbuo ganh nyei geh faaux weic zoux jangx-hoc.
74.19: Maiv dungx zorqv meih nyei norqc nqo nyei maengc jiu bun hieh zoih. Tov maiv dungx yietc liuz la'kuqv meih nyei mienh jomc mienh nyei maengc.
74.18: O Ziouv aah! Tov meih jangx jienv win-wangv ndongc haaix huotv meih. Mienh hngongx mienh yaac gorngv doqc meih nyei mengh.
74.22: O Tin-Hungh aah! Tov meih jiez daaih maah! Tov weic ganh caengx sic. Jangx jienv mienh hngongx mienh hnangv haaix nor ziangh hnoi huotv meih.
74.23: Maiv dungx la'kuqv meih nyei win-wangv qaqv heuc nyei qiex. Se meih nyei win-jaa maiv dingh liouh nyei nauc jienv heuc mbui nyei qiex.
74.13: Meih longc meih nyei domh qaqv zorqv koiv bun nqoi, mborqv yiem koiv gu'nyuoz nyei jung-hungh nyei m'nqorngv huv.
74.9: Yie mbuo maiv buatc yie mbuo nyei jangx-hoc, yaac maiv zengc yietc dauh douc waac mienh, yiem yie mbuo mbu'ndongx yaac maiv maaih haaix dauh hiuv duqv oix zuqc hnangv naaiv nor ndongc haaix lauh.
74.5: Buatc ninh mbuo hnangv mienh yiem lomc yaamh bouv hngaqv ndiangx nor.
74.14: Meih zienv Le^wi^aa^taan nyei m'nqorngv huv, yaac zorqv ninh jiu bun yiem deic-bung-huaang nyei hieh zoih nyanc.
74.3: Tov meih laamx mingh mangc naaiv deix yietc liuz baaic huaang nyei dorngx. Win-wangv mietc nzengc yiem singx dinc nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv.
74.7: Ninh mbuo longc douz buov meih nyei singx dinc njiec taux ndau, ninh mbuo bun meih nyei Mengh yiem nyei dorngx maaih uix.
74.10: O Tin-Hungh aah! Win-jaa oix huotv ndongc haaix lauh? Win-wangv oix yietc liuz gorngv doqc meih nyei mengh fai?
74.2: Tov meih jangx jienv meih loz-hnoi ginv daaih nyei baeqc fingx, dongh meih zuoqc nzuonx weic zoux meih ganh nzipc nyei buonc. Jangx jienv Si^on Mbong, dongh meih yiem jiex nyei dorngx.
74.1: O Tin-Hungh aah! Meih weic haaix diuc yietc liuz guangc yie mbuo? Meih weic haaix diuc qiex jiez meih nyei yungh ciangv nyei ba'gi yungh hnangv cuotv douz-sioux?
74.6: Yiem singx dinc gu'nyuoz yietc zungv diu daaih nyei ndiangx, ninh mbuo longc bouv longc zueih mborqv waaic nzengc.
74.8: Ninh mbuo yiem hnyouv hnamv, “Yie mbuo oix hingh jiex nzengc ninh mbuo.” Ninh mbuo ziouc zorqv yiem gormx deic-bung, Tin-Hungh nyei norm-norm wuic dorngh, buov nzengc.
74.11: Meih weic haaix diuc nyuotv jienv buoz, se meih nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz. Meih weic haaix diuc maiv zorqv buoz yiem la'kuotv sung cuotv daaih mietc ninh mbuo?
74.16: Lungh hnoi zanc benx meih nyei, lungh muonz zanc yaac meih nyei. Meih liuc leiz hlaax caux mba'hnoi.

49.15: Mv baac Tin-Hungh oix njoux yie nyei maengc leih ndutv yiemh gen nyei qaqv, weic zuqc ninh oix zipv yie. Selaa
49.18: Maiv gunv ninh ziangh jienv nyei ziangh hoc, ninh funx ninh maaih orn-lorqc, yaac maiv gunv maaih mienh ceng weic zuqc ninh butv zoih jienv faaux,
49.12: Mienh butv zoih mv baac maiv tengx ninh mbuo maiv zuqc daic. Ninh ziouc hnangv saeng-kuv zuqc mietc mi'aqv.
49.13: Naaiv se kaux ganh hngongx nyei jauv nyei mienh, caux gan jienv ninh mbuo, a'hneiv ninh mbuo gorngv nyei waac wuov deix oix zuqc buangh nyei sic. Selaa
49.19: ninh oix zuqc guei seix hnangv ninh nyei ong-taaix mbuo nor, yietc liuz maiv duqv buatc njang.
49.5: Buangh zuqc kouv naanc nyei ziangh hoc yie maiv gamh nziex, dongh zoux doqc hoic yie wuov deix win-wangv, weih gormx yie.
49.20: Mienh butv zoih mv baac maiv tengx ninh maiv zuqc daic. Ninh m'daaih caux saeng-kuv fih hnangv nyei zuqc mietc mi'aqv.
49.11: Ninh mbuo nyei zouv benx ninh mbuo yietc liuz yiem nyei biauv, dongh ninh mbuo yiem nyei dorngx taux maanc gouv maanc doic. Maiv gunv ninh mbuo longc ninh mbuo ganh nyei mbuox cuotv bun ninh mbuo nyei ndau.
49.14: Ninh mbuo hnangv dingc ziangx daix nyei ba'gi yungh. Zuqc daic nyei qaqv yaac oix zoux ninh mbuo goux yungh nyei mienh. Taux lungh ndorm kuv mienh oix gunv jienv ninh mbuo. Ninh mbuo nyei sin oix huv jienv njiec. Yiemh gen yaac oix zoux ninh mbuo nyei biauv.
49.3: Yie nyei nzuih oix gorngv cong-mengh nyei waac. Yie nyei hnyouv hnamv duqv tong, oix gorngv cuotv mengh nyei.
49.10: Ninh buatc cong-mengh mienh fih hnangv nyei daic, hngongx caux maiv hiuv nyei mienh yaac daic, guangc ninh mbuo nyei zinh zoih bun ganh dauh.
49.2: maiv gunv zoux hlo zoux faix, butv zoih fai mienh jomc mienh.
49.1: Maanc mienh aah! Muangx naaiv deix waac oc. Lungh ndiev mienh aah! Oix zuqc baeng m'normh muangx,
49.4: Yie oix bungx m'normh muangx waac-beiv, yie oix patv daanh baah porv mengh eix leiz.
49.6: Se kaux ninh mbuo nyei zinh zoih yaac bungx waac-maux gorngv zinh zoih camv nyei mienh.
49.8: weic zuqc yietc diuh maengc se jaaix haic. Bun mbu'ziex yaac maiv haih gaux,
49.9: weic bun ninh yietc liuz ziangh jienv, maiv zuqc mingh yiem yiemh gen.
49.7: Maiv maaih haaix dauh haih zuoqc ninh nyei gorx-youz nzuonx, fai tengx ninh cuotv zuoqc nyei jaax-zinh bun Tin-Hungh,
49.17: weic zuqc ninh daic nyei ziangh hoc ninh maiv haih dorh haaix nyungc mingh, ninh nyei njang-laangc maiv haih gan ninh njiec mingh.
49.16: Meih buatc mienh butv zoih, benx jienv faaux, maiv dungx gamh nziex,

145.21: Yie nyei nzuih oix gorngv cuotv ceng Ziouv nyei waac. Zuangx mienh oix zuqc lomh nzoih yietc liuz ceng ninh nyei cing-nzengc mengh taux yietc liuz.
145.15: Da'faanh maaih maengc nyei ga'naaiv mangc jienv meih, ziux horpc zuqc bun nyei ziangh hoc meih yaac bun nyanc hopv ninh mbuo.
145.18: Ziouv yiem nitv fatv dauh dauh heuc jienv jouh ninh nyei mienh, dongh yietc zungv longc hnyouv zingx nyei heuc wuov deix.
145.12: weic bun zuangx mienh hiuv duqv meih zoux henv haic nyei sic, caux meih nyei guoqv nyei domh njang-laangc.
145.13: Meih nyei guoqv se yietc liuz nyei guoqv. Meih yietc liuz duqv gunv taux maanc gouv maanc doic.   Ziouv ziepc zuoqv ei jienv ninh yietc zungv laengz nyei waac zoux. Yiem ninh zoux nyei yietc zungv sic ninh korv-lienh.
145.19: Ninh oix ei jienv taaih ninh wuov deix nyei hnyouv oix nyei zoux ziangx. Ninh yaac muangx haiz ninh mbuo heuc jienv tov ziouc njoux ninh mbuo.
145.5: Yie oix fei-fangv meih domh njang-laangc nyei haangh daauh caux zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei jauv.
145.20: Ziouv beu jienv yietc zungv hnamv ninh nyei mienh, mv baac da'faanh orqv mienh ninh oix mietc nzengc.
145.11: Ninh mbuo oix zunh gorngv meih nyei guoqv nyei njang-laangc, yaac gorngv taux meih nyei domh qaqv,
145.14: Ziouv oix baav jienv yietc zungv zuqc ndorpc nyei mienh. Zuqc kouv nyei mienh ninh yaac liepc jiez daaih.
145.3: Ziouv za'gengh hlo haic, horpc zuqc camv-camv nyei ceng. Ninh gengh! hlo haic, zungv hnamv maiv zaaic aqv.
145.10: O Ziouv aac, meih zeix daaih nyei maanc muotc zungv oix dor-ziec meih. Meih nyei yietc zungv baeqc fingx yaac oix ceng meih.
145.2: Yie oix hnoi-hnoi ceng meih. Yie oix ceng meih nyei mengh yietc liuz yietc seix.
145.1: Yie nyei Tin-Hungh, yie nyei Hungh Diex aac, yie oix ceng meih weih hlo. Yie oix yietc liuz ceng meih nyei mengh taux maanc gouv maanc doic.
145.4: Naaiv doic oix ceng meih zoux nyei sic bun wuov doic muangx, yaac oix zunh yaangh meih nyei domh qaqv zoux nyei sic.
145.6: Mienh oix zunh gorngv Ziouv zoux mbuoqc horngh, gamh nziex nyei sic, yaac zunh yaangh Ziouv za'gengh hlo haic.
145.8: Ziouv ceix en yaac korv-lienh mienh. Ninh maiv qiex jiez siepv yaac maaih hnamv mienh nyei hnyouv buangv nzengc.
145.9: Ziouv  zoux longx bun maanc mienh. Ninh yaac korv-lienh ninh zeix daaih nyei yietc zungv.
145.7: Ninh mbuo oix zunh gorngv meih longx haic nyei jauv, yaac oix cuotv qiex baaux nzung gorngv meih se baengh fim nyei.
145.17: Ziouv yiem ninh zoux nyei diuc-diuc jauv baengh fim nyei. Yiem ninh zoux nyei yietc zungv sic ninh yaac korv-lienh.
145.16: Meih zoux hnyouv jangv bun nyungc-nyungc maaih maengc nyei ga'naaiv duqv nyanc beuv.

125.5: Mv baac haaix dauh huin mingh gan hnyouv njuotv mienh nyei jauv,   Ziouv oix dorh ninh mbuo caux jienv orqv mienh yietc jauv mingh. Tov bun I^saa^laa^en duqv baengh orn.
125.3: Orqv mienh maiv duqv yietc liuz gunv paaiv bun kuv mienh nyei buonc deic-bung. Nzauh heix kuv mienh haih sung buoz zoux orqv sic.
125.2: Zuangx mbong hnangv haaix nor weih gormx Ye^lu^saa^lem,   Ziouv hnangv wuov nor weih gormx ninh nyei baeqc fingx, yiem naaiv mingh taux yietc liuz.
125.1: Da'faanh kaux Ziouv nyei mienh hnangv Si^on Mbong maiv zuqc ndanc dongz, zungv yiem taux yietc liuz.
125.4: O Ziouv aac, tov zoux longx bun longx nyei, caux hnyouv zingx nyei mienh.

140.12: Yie hiuv duqv Ziouv baav jienv ndortv naanc nyei mienh, yaac baengh fim nyei dunx weic mienh jomc mienh.
140.13: Kuv mienh zungv oix ceng meih nyei mengh, hnyouv zingx nyei mienh yaac oix yiem meih nyei nza'hmien.
140.5: Zoux maux nyei mienh bingx jienv zaeng koux zorqv yie, ninh mbuo longc hlaang corng mungz, yiem jauv-hlen zaeng koux hlopv yie. Selaa
140.11: Tov maiv dungx bun gorngv waac-huv nyei mienh liepc nguaaz-gorn yiem deic-bung. Tov bun orqv nyei sic siepv-siepv zorqv jienv zoux doqc nyei mienh.
140.3: Ninh mbuo bun ninh mbuo nyei mbietc laic hnangv naang nyei mbietc laic nor. Ninh mbuo nyei nzuih meix maaih naang-jieqv nyei ndie-doqc.  Selaa
140.10: Tov bun zieqc jienv douz nyei taanx ndortv njiec ninh mbuo. Tov bun ninh mbuo zuqc zoi njiec ndo nyei kuotv, yietc liuz maiv haih cuotv.
140.2: Ninh mbuo yiem hnyouv daav cuotv waaic nyei za'eix, yaac zanc-zanc coqv-huv mborqv jaax.
140.1: O Ziouv aac, tov njoux yie biaux ndutv orqv mienh. Tov beu jienv yie, maiv bun mienh doqc mienh hoic.
140.4: O Ziouv aac, tov njoux yie biaux ndutv orqv mienh nyei buoz-ndiev, beu yie maiv zuqc doqc nyei mienh hoic, ninh mbuo daav za'eix bun yie nyei zaux ndiqv zuqc ndorpc.
140.6: Yie gorngv mbuox Ziouv, “Meih zoux yie nyei Tin-Hungh. O Ziouv aac, tov baeng m'normh muangx yie jouh nyei sing-qiex.
140.8: O Ziouv aac, tov maiv dungx ei jienv orqv mienh nyei eix zoux, maiv dungx bun ninh mbuo orqv nyei za'eix cuotv, nziex ninh mbuo haih ceng-hlo. Selaa
140.9: Tov maiv dungx bun weih jienv yie wuov deix mienh hingh jiex. Tov bun ninh mbuo nyei nzuih gorngv nyei waac nzuonx daaih hoic ninh mbuo ganh.
140.7: O Ziouv,  yie nyei Ziouv, dongh maaih qaqv henv njoux yie wuov dauh aac, mborqv domh jaax nyei hnoi-nyieqc meih torngv jienv yie nyei m'nqorngv.

138.2: Yie hungx jienv meih nyei singx dinc baaix, yaac dor-ziec meih, weic meih se ziepc zuoqv nyei yaac ziepc zuoqv hnamv meih nyei mienh, weic zuqc meih taaih meih nyei mengh caux meih nyei waac gauh hlo jiex maanc muotc.
138.1: O Ziouv aac, yie longc nzengc hnyouv dor-ziec meih. Yie dorng jienv zuangx zienh nyei nza'hmien baaux nzung ceng meih.
138.5: Ninh mbuo oix baaux nzung ceng Ziouv zoux nyei jauv, weic zuqc Ziouv nyei njang-laangc gengh hlo haic.
138.6: Maiv gunv Ziouv  yiem hlang, ninh ziux goux haac dangv nyei mienh, mv baac ninh yiem go nyei dorngx mangc duqv hiuv zoux maux nyei mienh.
138.8: Ziouv  oix zoux ziangx nyungc-nyungc ziux ninh weic yie maaih nyei za'eix. O Ziouv aac, meih ziepc zuoqv hnamv mienh taux yietc liuz. Tov meih maiv dungx guangc meih nyei buoz zoux nyei gong.
138.4: O Ziouv aac, lungh ndiev nyei zuangx hungh oix ceng meih, weic zuqc ninh mbuo haiz meih nyei nzuih gorngv nyei waac.
138.3: Yie heuc meih wuov hnoi meih dau yie, meih longc meih nyei qaqv bun yie nyei hnyouv henv jiez daaih.
138.7: Maiv gunv yie yiem naanc zingh gu'nyuoz, meih beu yie nyei maengc. Yie nyei win-wangv qiex jiez, meih sung meih nyei buoz cuotv mborqv hingh, meih nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz njoux yie.

1.2: Daaux nzuonx ninh a'hneiv Ziouv nyei leiz-latc, ziu yiex fei-fangv ninh nyei leiz.
1.1: Maaih orn-lorqc nyei mienh se maiv muangx mienh waaic mienh nyei za'eix, maiv yangh zuiz-mienh nyei zaux-mbiec, yaac maiv caux huotv Tin-Hungh nyei mienh juangc jauv yangh.
1.5: Taux siemv zuiz nyei ziangh hoc mienh waaic mienh oix zuqc Tin-Hungh dingc zuiz, zuiz-mienh yaac maiv duqv caux gapv zunv nyei kuv mienh yiem.
1.6: Weic zuqc Ziouv  ziux goux kuv mienh nyei jauv, mv baac orqv mienh nyei jauv-louc zungv oix zuqc mietc.
1.4: Mv baac mienh waaic mienh zungv maiv hnangv naaic. Ninh mbuo se hnangv mbieqv zuqc nziaaux buonc nzaanx mingh nor.
1.3: Ninh se hnangv diuh ndiangx zuangx wuov ndoqv-hlen, ziux ziangh hoc cuotv biouv, normh yaac maiv nqaai. Yiem ninh zoux nyei nyungc-nyungc duqv longx.

137.2: Yie mbuo zorqv yie mbuo nyei daanh baah kuangx jienv yiem naaiv nyei suiv-liemh ndiangx,
137.1: Yie mbuo zueiz jienv Mbaa^mbi^lon nyei ndoqv-hlen, yietv jangx zuqc Si^on ziouc nyiemv.
137.5: O Ye^lu^saa^lem aah! Se gorngv yie la'kuqv meih, tov bun yie nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz hngongx mingh.
137.6: Se gorngv yie maiv jangx Ye^lu^saa^lem, yaac maiv funx Ye^lu^saa^lem weih bun yie gauh duqv njien-youh jiex, tov bun yie nyei mbietc naetv jienv yie nyei nzuih dungz.
137.8: O Mbaa^mbi^lon aah! Weic meih zoux bun yie mbuo nyei sic, jaauv win bun meih wuov dauh oix zuqc orn-lorqc.
137.9: Zorqv meih nyei gu'nguaaz-faix guaeqv la'bieiv wuov dauh yaac maaih orn-lorqc aqv.
137.4: Yie mbuo yiem ganh fingx mienh nyei deic-bung, hnangv haaix nor haih baaux Ziouv nyei nzung?
137.3: weic zuqc caangv yie mbuo daaih wuov deix oix yie mbuo baaux nzung, hoic yie mbuo wuov deix oix yie mbuo tengx ninh mbuo zoux nauc nyitc ziouc gorngv, “Baaux diuh Si^on nyei nzung bun yie mbuo muangx maah!”
137.7: O Ziouv aac, tov jangx E^ndom Mienh hnangv haaix nor zoux. Ye^lu^saa^lem mbaang wuov hnoi ninh mbuo gorngv, “Oix zuqc baaic, oix zuqc baaic aqv, oix zuqc caeqv njiec taux gorn-ndoqv.”

108.12: Tov meih tengx yie mbuo mborqv win-wangv, weic zuqc baamh mienh tengx se maiv lamh longc.
108.13: Yie mbuo kaux Tin-Hungh yie mbuo ziouc duqv hingh jiex. Se dongh ninh oix caaiv yie mbuo nyei win-wangv njiec.
108.5: O Tin-Hungh aac, tov bun mienh taaih meih gauh hlang jiex lungh. Tov bun meih nyei njang-laangc yiem buangv lungh ndiev.
108.11: O Tin-Hungh aah! Meih maiv zeiz guangc yie mbuo fai? O Tin-Hungh aah! Meih maiv caux yie mbuo nyei jun-baeng cuotv mingh mborqv jaax fai?
108.3: O Ziouv aac, yie oix yiem maanc fingx mbu'ndongx dor-ziec meih. Yie oix yiem maanc guoqv mbu'ndongx baaux nzung ceng meih.
108.10: Haaix dauh oix dorh yie mingh taux wuov norm weih wuonv nyei zingh? Haaix dauh oix dorh yie mingh taux E^ndom Deic-Bung?
108.2: Domh daanh baah, fiuv-daanh baah aah! Nyie daaih maah! Yie oix bun mba'hnoi nyie daaih.
108.1: O Tin-Hungh aac, yie nyei hnyouv kaux wuonv, yie nyei hnyouv kaux wuonv. Yie oix baaux nzung, oix baaux nzung ceng meih. Yie nyei hnyouv aah! Nyie daaih maah!
108.4: Meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh gauh hlang jiex lungh. Meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnyouv yaac mbaengc mbuonx hlang.
108.6: Tov dau yie mbuo, longc meih nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz njoux yie mbuo, weic bun meih hnamv nyei mienh duqv njoux.
108.8: Gi^le^aatc se yie nyei, Maa^natv^se yaac yie nyei. E^faa^im se yie mborqv jaax nyei muoc. Yu^ndaa se yie nyei hungh biaav.
108.9: Mo^apc se yie nyei nzaaux buoz-zaux bunh. Yie yaac zoi yie nyei heh njiec E^ndom. Yie heuc jienv gorngv, ‘Fi^li^saa^die aah! Yie hingh jiex meih aqv.’+”
108.7: Tin-Hungh yiem ninh nyei singx dinc gorngv, “Yie oix a'hneiv nyei zorqv Sekem bun nqoi, yaac ndorqc Sukc^kotv Horngz paaiv bun nqoi.

21.12: Weic zuqc meih baeng meih nyei juang-zinx hungx jienv ninh mbuo nyei hmien, meih ziouc bun ninh mbuo daaux nqaang biaux.
21.13: O Ziouv aac, yie mbuo ceng meih weic zuqc meih henv haic. Yie mbuo oix baaux nzung ceng meih nyei qaqv.
21.5: Weic meih tengx ninh, ninh duqv domh njang-laangc. Meih yaac ceix bun ninh duqv mengh hoc yaac maaih haangh daauh.
21.11: Maiv gunv ninh mbuo daav za'eix hoic meih, maiv gunv ninh mbuo hnamv cuotv zoux waaic sic, ninh mbuo maiv haih zoux maiv ziangx.
21.3: Meih ceix longx haic nyei fuqv bun ninh, meih zorqv zien jiem nyei ningv ndongx jienv ninh nyei m'nqorngv.
21.10: Meih ziouc bun ninh mbuo nyei zeiv-fun yiem lungh ndiev zutc nzengc, yiem baamh mienh mbu'ndongx mietc nzengc ninh mbuo nyei hoz doic.
21.2: Ziux ninh nyei hnyouv oix nyei meih ceix bun ninh. Ziux ninh nyei nzuih tov nyei waac meih yaac dau. Selaa
21.1: Ziouv aac, hungh diex a'hneiv haic weic meih ceix bun nyei qaqv. Ninh orn-lorqc haic weic zuqc meih tengx ninh hingh jiex.
21.4: Ninh tov meih bun ninh maaih siouc nyuonh, meih yaac ceix bun ninh, bun ninh nyei siouc nyuonh ndaauv yietc liuz taux yietc liuz.
21.6: Meih bun ninh maaih fuqv taux yietc liuz, weic zuqc meih caux ninh yiem ninh duqv njien-youh orn-lorqc.
21.8: Meih nyei buoz oix lorz buatc meih nyei yietc zungv win-wangv. Meih nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz haih lorz buatc nzorng meih nyei mienh.
21.9: Meih hinc cuotv nyei ziangh hoc meih ziouc bun ninh mbuo hnangv jorm haic nyei douz-louh.   Ziouv nouz ninh mbuo ziouc oix naqv ninh mbuo. Douz yaac oix buov ninh mbuo qui nzengc.
21.7: Hungh diex sienx kaux Ziouv,  weic Yiem Hlang Jiex Wuov Dauh ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv ninh, ninh liemh maiv zuqc ndanc dongz.

15.5: Ninh bungx zaeqv, maiv longc leic zinh, yaac maiv nyanc nyaanh hmuangx maaic maiv zoux dorngc nyei mienh nyei m'nqorngv. Zoux naaiv deix sic nyei mienh yietc liuz nqamv maiv dongz.
15.3: Ninh maiv longc ninh nyei mbietc gorngv doqc mienh, maiv zoux dorngc ninh nyei gorx-youz, yaac maiv zunh mienh nyei mengh dauh waaic.
15.2: Dongh yiem seix zaangc zoux nyei sic maiv maaih dorngx daanh wuov dauh. Ninh haaix zanc yaac kungx zoux horpc hnangv. Ninh hnyouv zingx gorngv zien waac nyei mienh.
15.1: O Ziouv aac, haaix dauh haih yiem zaangc meih nyei ndopv-liuh? Haaix dauh haih yiem meih nyei cing-nzengc mbong?
15.4: Ninh mangc piex waaic haic, orqv haic nyei mienh, mv baac taaih dongh taaih Ziouv wuov deix. Ninh haaix zanc ei ninh laengz nyei ngaengc waac zoux, maiv gunv kuei zuqc ninh ganh, ninh yaac maiv hnamv-nzuonx.

98.2: Ziouv bun mienh hiuv duqv ninh hingh jiex ninh bun maanc fingx hiuv duqv ninh baengh fim nyei.
98.1: Oix zuqc baaux diuh siang-nzung ceng Ziouv  weic zuqc ninh zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic. Ninh nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz caux cing-nzengc qaqv bun ninh duqv hingh jiex.
98.5: Patv daanh baah baaux nzung ceng Ziouv, longc daanh baah patv puix nzung nyei sing-qiex.
98.6: Longc nzatc caux jorng nyei qiex, cuotv njien-youh nyei qiex mbui fungx bun Ziouv,  mbuo nyei Hungh Diex.
98.8: Bun zuangx ndaaih mbaix ninh mbuo nyei buoz, zuangx mbong oix zuqc lomh nzoih njien-youh nyei baaux nzung
98.9: yiem Ziouv  nyei nza'hmien, weic zuqc ninh oix daaih siemv lungh ndiev. Ninh oix baengh fim nyei siemv baamh gen, yaac longc gong-fim siemv maanc fingx.
98.4: Lungh ndiev mienh aah! Oix zuqc njien-youh nyei heuc jienv ceng Ziouv.  Cuotv qiex njien-youh nyei baaux nzung ceng ninh.
98.3: Ninh jangx taux ninh weic I^saa^laa^en Mienh maaih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnyouv yaac hnamv ninh mbuo. Gormx lungh ndiev duqv buatc mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh duqv hingh jiex.
98.7: Koiv caux yiem koiv nyei ga'naaiv, lungh ndiev caux yiem lungh ndiev nyei ga'naaiv oix zuqc cuotv qiex mbui.

93.5: O Ziouv aac, meih nyei lingc se wuonv nyei. Meih nyei biauv puix duqv cing-nzengc, taux maanc gouv maanc doic.
93.3: O Ziouv aac, domh wuom jiez laangc seix, domh wuom cuotv qiex mbui, domh wuom mbui zoz-zoz nyei.
93.2: Meih nyei weic yiem dongh cor liepc daaih, loz-hnoi meih m'daaih yietc liuz yiem.
93.1: Ziouv  zoux hungh. Haangh daauh benx ninh nyei zorng-zuqv.   Ziouv zuqv jienv aengx longc domh qaqv sai jienv. Baamh gen liepc duqv wuonv, maiv haih zuqc ndanc dongz.
93.4: Yiem Hlang Jiex nyei Ziouv  maaih domh qaqv, gauh henv jiex domh wuom nyei qiex mbui, gauh henv jiex koiv nyei domh wuom-laangc.

23.2: Ninh bun yie bueix njiec miev nyiemz nyei dorngx, dorh yie yiem wuom sienc nyei ndoqv-hlen.
23.1: Ziouv goux yie hnangv goux ba'gi yungh nyei mienh goux ninh nyei ba'gi yungh nor, yie ziouc maiv caa haaix nyungc.
23.5: Meih yiem yie nyei win-wangv nyei nza'hmien meih mbenc nyanc hopv bun yie. Meih longc youh hietv yie nyei m'nqorngv, yie nyei zaanv buangv mienz nzengc.
23.6: Yie hiuv dingc Ziouv yietc seix korv-lienh yaac zoux longx bun yie. Yie yaac duqv yiem Ziouv  nyei biauv taux maanc gouv maanc doic.
23.4: Maiv gunv yie yangh zuqc daic nyei dongh linh, hmuangx nyei horngz mingh, yie maiv gamh nziex zuqc haaix nyungc hoic, weic zuqc meih caux yie yiem. Meih longc biaav-mbiaac caux ndaangh ngau goux jienv yie.
23.3: Ninh bun yie nyei hnyouv fingv jiez daaih. Weic ninh ganh nyei mbuox ninh yienz yie yangh zoux horpc nyei jauv.

71.21: Meih oix taaih yie zoux gauh hlo zinh ndaangc yaac aengx orn nzunc yie nyei hnyouv.
71.15: Yie nyei nzuih oix gorngv meih zoux nyei kuv sic, oix ziangh hnoi gorngv taux meih nyei njoux en, maiv gunv yie hiuv maiv toux naaiv deix jauv nyei soux mouc.
71.12: O Tin-Hungh aah! Maiv dungx leih go yie. O yie nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Siepv-siepv nyei daaih tengx yie.
71.17: O Tin-Hungh aah! Yie yiem hnyangx-jeiv lunx taux ih zanc meih njaaux yie. Yie corc zunh meih zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.
71.20: Meih bun yie zuqc domh kouv naanc, mv baac oix bun yie aengx fingv jiez daaih. Meih oix yiem ndau, ndo haic nyei dorngx, aengx zorqv yie cuotv.
71.4: O yie nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Tov njoux yie biaux ndutv orqv mienh nyei buoz-ndiev, biaux ndutv hnyouv njuotv, doqc haic nyei mienh.
71.19: O Tin-Hungh aah! Meih zoux horpc nyei jauv mbaengc lungh hlang. O Tin-Hungh aah! Se meih zoux hlo haic nyei sic. Haaix dauh haih hnangv meih?
71.18: O Tin-Hungh aah! Yie taux hnyangx-jeiv gox, mba'biei baeqc nyei ziangh hoc, tov maiv dungx guangc yie. Zuov yie zorqv meih zoux henv haic nyei sic mbuox hoz doic, yaac zunh meih nyei qaqv mbuox nqa'haav cuotv seix nyei mienh.
71.22: O yie nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Yie yaac oix longc daanh baah ceng meih, oix ceng meih weic zuqc meih ziepc zuoqv nyei. I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei Cing-Nzengc Ziouv aah! Yie oix longc ziepc diuh finx nyei daanh baah ceng meih.
71.23: Yie baaux nzung ceng meih nyei ziangh hoc yie nyei nzuih meix oix njien-youh nyei heuc. Yie nyei hnyouv yaac oix njien-youh nyei heuc, weic zuqc meih zuoqc yie.
71.13: Tov bun yie nyei win-wangv zuqc nyaiv zuqc baaic nzengc. Tov bun lorz jauv hoic yie wuov deix baaic hmien diev nyaiv.
71.9: Yie gox nyei ziangh hoc, tov maiv dungx guangc yie. Sin zaangc nyei qaqv nzengc, maiv dungx leih nqoi yie.
71.5: O Ziouv aah! Meih zoux yie maaih lamh hnamv nyei dorngx.   Ziouv aah! Yiem yie lunx taux ih zanc yie kaux meih hnangv.
71.14: Mv baac yie nor, oix zanc-zanc kaux meih maaih lamh hnamv dorngx, yaac oix jaa ceng meih camv jienv faaux.
71.3: Tov meih zoux yie ndaauh kaux nyei la'bieiv, zoux yie wuonv haic nyei dorngx njoux yie, weic zuqc meih zoux yie nyei la'bieiv, zoux wuonv nyei dorngx beu yie.
71.7: Mienh camv nyei mbuoqc horngh haic yie mv baac meih zoux yie kaux wuonv nyei dorngx.
71.10: Yie nyei win-wangv lorz jauv gorngv yie, dongh zuov jienv oix zorqv yie nyei maengc wuov deix, lomh nzoih caangh laangh.
71.2: Weic zuqc meih maaih gong-fim nyei, tov njoux yie, tengx yie. Tov bungx m'normh muangx yaac njoux yie.
71.1: O Ziouv  aah! Yie ndaauh kaux meih. Tov bun yie yietc liuz maiv zuqc nyaiv.
71.6: Yiem yie cuotv seix taux ih zanc yie bangc meih, se dongh meih bun yie cuotv maa nyei ga'sie, yie zanc-zanc ceng meih.
71.8: Yie ziangh hnoi longc yie nyei nzuih ceng meih, yaac zunh meih nyei njang-laangc.
71.24: Yie nyei mbietc ziangh hnoi oix gorngv meih zoux horpc nyei jauv tengx mienh, weic zuqc oix lorz jauv hoic yie wuov deix zuqc nyaiv zuqc baaic mi'aqv.
71.11: Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Tin-Hungh guangc ninh mi'aqv. Zunc jienv zorqv ninh maah! Weic zuqc maiv maaih haaix dauh njoux ninh aqv.”
71.16: Ziouv  Tin-Hungh aah! Yie oix dorh meih zoux henv haic nyei sic daaih gorngv, yie oix ceng meih zoux horpc nyei jauv, kungx meih ganh nyei hnangv.

20.2: Tov ninh yiem singx dinc tengx meih, yaac yiem Si^on Mbong beu jienv meih.
20.1: Meih buangh zuqc kouv naanc nyei hnoi-nyieqc tov Ziouv  dau, tov Yaakopv nyei Tin-Hungh beu jienv meih.
20.5: Yie mbuo ziouc njien-youh nyei heuc weic meih hingh jiex, yie mbuo yaac dengv yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh nyei mbuox liepc yie mbuo nyei geh. Tov Ziouv dau meih tov nyei yietc zungv waac.
20.6: Ih zanc yie hiuv duqv Ziouv oix tengx ninh longc youh orn daaih wuov dauh. Ninh oix yiem ninh cing-nzengc nyei tin-dorngh dau. Ninh longc ninh nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz nyei domh qaqv tengx hingh jiex.
20.8: Ninh mbuo ziouc ndorpc, king njiec, mv baac yie mbuo duqv jiez sin souv wuonv.
20.9: O Ziouv aac, tov tengx hungh diex hingh jiex. Yie mbuo heuc nyei ziangh hoc, tov dau yie mbuo.
20.4: Tov ninh bun meih duqv ziux meih nyei hnyouv oix nyei, yaac ei jienv meih nyei yietc zungv za'eix zoux ziangx.
20.3: Tov ninh jangx meih fongc horc nyei nyungc-nyungc ga'naaiv, yaac a'hneiv meih buov ziec nyei yietc zungv. Selaa
20.7: Maaih deix kaux ninh mbuo nyei mborqv jaax cie, maaih deix kaux ninh mbuo nyei maaz, mv baac yie mbuo kaux Ziouv, yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh.

61.2: Yie nyei hnyouv maiv lamh hnamv nyei ziangh hoc, yie yiem jomc lungh ndiev heuc meih. Tov dorh yie mingh taux gauh hlang jiex yie nyei la'bieiv.
61.1: Tin-Hungh aah! Tov muangx yie heuc nyei qiex. Tov muangx yie daux gaux nyei waac.
61.5: O Tin-Hungh aah! Meih muangx haiz yie laengz nyei ngaengc waac. Meih zorqv dongh taaih meih nyei mienh nzipc nyei buonc ceix bun yie.
61.6: Tov jaa hungh diex nyei siouc nyuonh ndaauv, bun ninh nyei hnyangx-jeiv ziangh duqv maanc doic.
61.8: Hnangv naaic, yie oix yietc liuz baaux nzung ceng meih nyei mengh, yaac hnoi jiex hnoi jaauv sung yie laengz nyei ngaengc waac.
61.4: Tov bun yie yietc liuz yiem meih nyei ndopv-liuh. Tov bun yie yiem meih nyei ndaatv ga'ndiev bingx jienv. Selaa
61.3: Weic zuqc meih zoux yie ndaauh kaux nyei dorngx, zoux yie wuonv haic nyei laauh weic biaux ndutv win-wangv.
61.7: Tov bun ninh yietc liuz zueiz weic yiem Tin-Hungh nyei nza'hmien. Tov meih hnyouv zingx caux ziepc zuoqv hnamv nyei jauv beu jienv ninh.

112.10: Orqv mienh buatc hnangv naaic ziouc qiex jiez, ngaatc jienv nyaah yaac baaic jienv njiec. Orqv mienh hnamv oix duqv nyei, ziang naaic baac mi'aqv.
112.2: Ninh nyei hoz doic yiem deic-bung zungv oix henv, hnyouv zingx mienh nyei hoz doic oix duqv fuqv.
112.1: Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.    Taaih Ziouv nyei mienh, se za'gengh a'hneiv muangx ninh nyei lingc wuov deix, maaih orn-lorqc.
112.5: Zoux hnyouv jangv gaav ga'naaiv bun mienh wuov dauh duqv longx, ninh zoux nyei jauv yietc zungv baengh fim nyei.
112.6: Weic zuqc kuv mienh yietc liuz maiv zuqc ndanc dongz, mienh yietc liuz oix jangx ninh.
112.8: Ninh zunv dingc hnyouv, maiv gamh nziex. Zuov taux buatc ninh nyei win-wangv zuqc suei nzengc.
112.9: Ninh zoux hnyouv jangv tengx mienh jomc mienh. Ninh zoux horpc nyei jauv yietc liuz yiem, ninh ziouc henv yaac duqv mienh taaih.
112.4: Kuv mienh yiem hmuangx gu'nyuoz maaih njang cuotv daaih.   Ziouv    ceix en, maaih hnyouv korv-lienh mienh, yaac maaih gong-fim.
112.3: Ninh nyei biauv zong butv zoih, benx haic, ninh zoux horpc nyei jauv yietc liuz yiem.
112.7: Ninh maiv gamh nziex ciouv nyei fienx, ninh bungx dingc hnyouv wuonv nyei kaux Ziouv.

79.12: O Ziouv aac, tov bun gorngv doqc ki meih wuov deix weih gormx nyei fingx-fingx mienh aengx zuqc jaa hniev taux siec gouv.
79.13: Hnangv naaic yie mbuo, meih nyei baeqc fingx, oix yietc liuz dor-ziec meih. Yie mbuo oix ceng meih taux maanc gouv maanc doic.
79.5: O Ziouv aac, meih oix qiex jiez yie mbuo ndongc haaix lauh? Taux yietc liuz fai? Meih oix qiex jiez hanc haic hnangv douz buov jienv taux haaix zanc?
79.11: Tov meih muangx haiz zuqc wuonx nyei mienh njunh nyei qiex, yaac ziux meih nyei domh qaqv beu jienv wuov deix oix zuqc daic nyei mienh.
79.3: Ninh mbuo bun meih nyei baeqc fingx nyei nziaamv liouc cuotv hnangv wuom nor, gormx nzengc Ye^lu^saa^lem. Zungv maiv maaih mienh biopv sei.
79.10: Ganh fingx mienh weic haaix diuc naaic, “Meih mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh yiem haaix?” Tov bun yie mbuo ganh nyei m'zing buatc meih jaauv maanc guoqv mienh nyei win, weic zuqc ninh mbuo bun meih nyei bou nyei nziaamv liouc cuotv.
79.2: Ninh mbuo zorqv meih nyei bou nyei sei zoux lungh zaangc norqc nyei nyanc hopv, zorqv meih nyei cing-nzengc baeqc fingx nyei orv bun ndau-beih nyei hieh zoih nyanc.
79.1: O Tin-Hungh aac, ganh fingx mienh daaih bieqc meih ganh nzipc nyei deic-bung. Ninh mbuo bun meih nyei cing-nzengc biauv maaih uix, bun Ye^lu^saa^lem Zingh mbaang nzengc.
79.4: Yie mbuo zuqc juangc laangz mienh ki yie mbuo, zuqc weih gormx nyei mienh jatv yaac huotv yie mbuo.
79.6: Tov bun maiv nyiemc meih wuov deix fingx-fingx mienh caux maiv heuc meih nyei mbuox wuov deix maanc guoqv, zuqc meih nyei ga'qiex baetv cuotv bun ninh mbuo.
79.8: Tov meih maiv dungx jangx yie mbuo nyei ong-taaix zoux nyei zuiz, bun yie mbuo maiv zuqc laaix ninh mbuo dingc zuiz. Tov siepv-siepv nyei korv-lienh yie mbuo weic zuqc yie mbuo kouv taux ndiev, maiv lamh hnamv dorngx.
79.9: O yie mbuo nyei Njoux Ziouv, Tin-Hungh aac, tov meih weic meih nyei mengh nyei njang-laangc tengx yie mbuo. Tov weic meih nyei mengh njoux yie mbuo, yaac guangc yie mbuo nyei zuiz.
79.7: Weic zuqc ninh mbuo naqv nzengc Yaakopv nyei zeiv-fun, yaac bun ninh yiem nyei dorngx benx ndau-huaang.

123.3: O Ziouv aac, tov korv-lienh yie mbuo, tov korv-lienh yie mbuo oc, weic zuqc yie mbuo zuqc mienh mangc piex taux ndiev.
123.2: Hnangv m'jangc bou kaux ganh nyei ziouv, yaac hnangv m'sieqv bou kaux ganh nyei biauv-ziouv maac, yie mbuo hnangv wuov nor kaux Ziouv, yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh, zuov taux ninh korv-lienh yie mbuo.
123.1: Yiem lungh gu'nguaaic zueiz weic nyei Ziouv aac, yie cau hmien mangc meih.
123.4: Yie mbuo zuqc butv zoih butv zieqv nyei mienh huotv yie mbuo, zuqc zoux maux nyei mienh mangc piex yie mbuo lauh haic.

48.12: Yangh gormx Si^on maah! Huing gormx nzengc. Saauv zingh nyei laauh.
48.13: Samx mangc zingh nyei zingh laatc, zaah mangc zingh wuonv jiex nyei dorngx, weic gorngv mbuox hoz doic mienh.
48.5: Ninh mbuo yietv buatc naaiv norm zingh ninh mbuo mbuoqc horngh haic. Gamh nziex gau, huaang-huaang zaang-zaang nyei biaux.
48.11: Tov bun Si^on Mbong nyei mienh a'hneiv, bun Yu^ndaa Zingh nyei mienh njien-youh, weic zuqc meih baengh fim nyei siemv.
48.14: Weic zuqc naaiv dauh Tin-Hungh, se yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh taux maanc gouv maanc doic. Ninh yietc liuz yietc seix dorh yie mbuo.
48.3: Tin-Hungh yiem zingh gu'nyuoz yietc norm wuonv nyei dorngx, bun cing ninh ganh benx wuonv nyei dorngx.
48.10: O Tin-Hungh aac, hnangv meih nyei mengh zunh jomc lungh ndiev, mienh yaac hnangv wuov nor ceng meih taux lungh gorn. Meih longc baengh fim nyei jauv gunv.
48.2: Mangc naaiv norm mbong youc hlang youc nzueic, bun lungh ndiev nyei zuangx mienh njien-youh. Se Domh Hungh Diex nyei zingh, Si^on Mbong, yiem baqv bung go nyei dorngx,
48.1: Ziouv za'gengh weih hlo, yaac puix duqv mienh camv-camv nyei ceng yiem yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh nyei zingh, se yiem ninh nyei cing-nzengc mbong.
48.4: Mangc maah! Zuangx hungh diex gapv zunv daaih, lomh nzoih cuotv mingh oix mborqv naaiv norm zingh.
48.6: Ninh mbuo gamh nziex haic, sin zinx nzengc, kouv gau, hnangv m'sieqv dorn mun gu'nguaaz nor,
48.8: Yie mbuo haiz jiex hnangv haaix nor, ih zanc yie mbuo buatc hnangv wuov nor, yiem Nernh Jiex nyei Ziouv nyei zingh, se yiem yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh nyei zingh. Naaiv norm zingh Tin-Hungh liepc taux yietc liuz. Selaa
48.9: O Tin-Hungh aac, yie mbuo yiem meih nyei biauv jangx zuqc meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
48.7: yaac hnangv Taansitv nyei nzangv zuqc dong bung nyei domh nziaaux buonc waaic.

101.2: Yie oix longc hnyouv yangh maiv maaih dorngx nqemh nyei jauv. Meih taux haaix zanc cingx daaih yie naaiv? Yie oix hnyouv zingx nyei yiem yie nyei biauv.
101.1: Yie oix baaux nzung gorngv ziepc zuoqv nyei caux baengh fim nyei jauv. O Ziouv aac, yie oix baaux nzung bun meih.
101.5: Haaix dauh beic ndiev gorngv doqc ninh juangc laangz nyei gorx-youz yie oix mietc nzengc. Zoux maux, ceng-hlo nyei mienh yie diev maiv duqv.
101.6: Yie nyei m'zing oix mangc jienv yiem deic-bung ziepc zuoqv nyei mienh, weic bun ninh mbuo duqv caux yie yiem. Haaix dauh yangh maiv maaih dorngx nqemh nyei jauv, ziouc duqv fu-sux yie.
101.8: Ndorm-ndorm yie oix mietc yiem deic-bung nyei yietc zungv orqv mienh. Yie oix zorqv dauh dauh zoux waaic sic nyei mienh pai guangc, maiv bun yiem Ziouv  nyei zingh.
101.4: Yie yaac maiv nyiemc hnyouv njuotv nyei mienh, maiv bun haaix nyungc orqv sic guen zuqc yie.
101.3: Orqv haic nyei ga'naaiv yie zungv maiv bun doix hmien doix minc. Yie nzorng leih Tin-Hungh nyei mienh zoux nyei sic, yie zungv maiv bun guoqv zuqc yie.
101.7: Haaix dauh zoux nduov mienh nyei mienh maiv duqv yiem yie nyei biauv. Haaix dauh gorngv-baeqc, maiv duqv yiem yie nyei nza'hmien.

50.21: Meih zoux naaiv deix sic, yie yaac maiv ko lo. Meih hnamv daaih yie hnangv meih nor, mv baac ih zanc yie oix hemx meih, zorqv naaiv deix sic baaiv jienv meih nyei nza'hmien.
50.15: Buangh zuqc kouv naanc nyei ziangh hoc oix zuqc tov yie. Yie ziouc njoux meih, meih yaac oix taaih yie.
50.12: Se gorngv yie hnyouv sie, yie maiv mbuox meih, weic zuqc baamh gen caux yiem baamh gen nyei yietc zungv ga'naaiv benx yie nyei.
50.17: Meih nzorng yie mborqv njaaux nyei waac, yaac zorqv yie nyei waac zoi guangc meih nyei nqa'haav nqaang.
50.20: Meih zueiz jienv sueih binc gorngv ganh nyei muoz-doic, yaac gorngv waac-huv hoic cien maa nyei fu'jueiv.
50.4: Ninh heuc lungh caux ndau zoux zorng-zengx, weic ninh oix siemv ninh nyei baeqc fingx.
50.19: Meih nyei nzuih sueih gorngv orqv nyei waac, meih nyei mbietc hec duqv gorngv-baeqc.
50.18: Se gorngv meih buatc dauh janx-zaqc, meih a'hneiv caux ninh zoux doic. Meih yaac caux hienx auv hienx nqox nyei mienh zoux doic.
50.22: “Meih mbuo la'kuqv Tin-Hungh nyei mienh aah! Longx-longx nyei hnamv mangc gaax! Maiv zei aeqv, yie oix zorqv meih mbuo mietc nzengc, yaac maiv maaih mienh haih njoux.
50.23: Haaix dauh dor-ziec weic zoux fongc horc ziec nyei ga'naaiv bun yie, wuov dauh taaih yie. Haaix dauh liepc dingc hnyouv yangh horpc nyei jauv, yie oix bun ninh duqv Tin-Hungh nyei njoux en.
50.13: Yie nyanc ngongh nyei orv fai? Yie hopv yungh nyei nziaamv fai?
50.9: Yie maiv qiemx zuqc yietc dauh yiem meih mbuo nyei ngongh laanh nyei ngongh gouv, fai yiem meih mbuo nyei yungh guanh nyei yungh gouv.
50.5: Ninh gorngv, “Dorh yie ziepc zuoqv nyei baeqc fingx daaih yie naaiv, dongh longc ziec nyei ga'naaiv caux yie liepc jiez ngaengc waac nyei mienh.”
50.14: Oix zuqc longc dor-ziec nyei waac benx fongc horc ziec bun Tin-Hungh nyei ga'naaiv, yaac jaauv sung meih caux Yiem Hlang Jiex Wuov Dauh laengz nyei ngaengc waac.
50.3: Yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh daaih, ninh yaac maiv zeiz sekv-sekv nyei, maaih douz yiem ninh wuov ndaangc maengx buov qui nzengc, maaih domh nziaaux-jieqv weih gormx ninh.
50.7: “O yie nyei baeqc fingx aah! Muangx maah! Yie ziouc gorngv, I^saa^laa^en Mienh aah! Yie oix zoux zorng-zengx gox meih mbuo aqv. Yie se Tin-Hungh, meih mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh.
50.10: Weic zuqc yiem lomc nyei yietc zungv hieh zoih benx yie nyei, liemh yietc cin norm mbong nyei saeng-kuv yaac benx yie nyei.
50.2: Yiem gauh nzueic jiex nyei Si^on Zingh, Tin-Hungh ziux cuotv ninh nyei njang.
50.1: Ziouv, Nernh Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh, gorngv. Ninh gorngv heuc lungh ndiev yiem mba'hnoi cuotv taux mba'hnoi muotv nyei dorngx.
50.6: Zuangx lungh bun cing Tin-Hungh se baengh fim nyei, weic zuqc ninh se siemv zuiz jien. Selaa
50.8: Yie maiv zeiz weic meih mbuo ziec nyei ga'naaiv gorngv-hemx meih mbuo. Meih mbuo buov ziec bun yie nyei ga'naaiv zanc-zanc yiem yie nyei nza'hmien.
50.11: Yiem lungh nyei yietc zungv norqc yie yaac hiuv nyei, yiem ndau maaih maengc nyei ga'naaiv benx nzengc yie nyei.
50.16: Mv baac Tin-Hungh gorngv mbuox orqv mienh, “Meih maaih haaix nyungc leiz zunh gorngv yie nyei leiz-nyeic, fai bun meih nyei nzuih laengz yie nyei ngaengc waac?

31.21: Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv,  weic zuqc yie yiem zuqc weih jienv nyei zingh nyei ziangh hoc, meih bun cing meih za'gengh! ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv yie.
31.15: Yie ziangh nyei hnoi-nyieqc yiem meih nyei buoz, tov njoux yie biaux ndutv yie nyei win-wangv caux zeix yie wuov deix mienh nyei buoz-ndiev.
31.12: Ninh mbuo la'kuqv yie, maiv jangx yie hnangv yie daic mi'aqv nor. Yie hnangv mborqv huv nyei nie-mor.
31.17: O Ziouv aac, tov bun yie maiv zuqc nyaiv, weic zuqc yie heuc meih. Tov bun orqv mienh zuqc nyaiv, sekv nzieqc nyei mingh yiem yiemh gen.
31.20: Meih dorh ninh mbuo bingx jienv meih nyei nza'hmien mbueiz nyei dorngx, biaux ndutv mienh daav waaic nyei za'eix. Meih bun ninh mbuo yiem norm dorngx beu jienv ninh mbuo, biaux ndutv gorngv doqc nzaeng jaax nyei waac.
31.4: Tov bun yie biaux ndutv mienh weic yie zaeng nyei mungz, weic zuqc meih zoux yie ndaauh kaux nyei dorngx.
31.19: Meih za'gengh longx haic. Meih siou longx nyei ga'naaiv yaac bungx-zuoqc, aengx yiem baamh mienh nyei nza'hmien bun taaih meih, ndaauh kaux meih nyei mienh.
31.18: Tov bun gorngv-baeqc mienh nyei nzuih, dongh ninh mbuo ceng-hlo, bungx waac-maux, gorngv doqc kuv mienh wuov deix nyei nzuih hngongx mingh, maiv haih gorngv waac.
31.22: Yie zuqc haeqv gamh nziex nyei ziangh hoc yie gorngv, “Yie yiem meih nyei nza'hmien zuqc zunc leih go.” Mv baac yie heuc jienv tov meih tengx, meih yaac haiz yie tov nyei waac.
31.23: Ziouv nyei zuangx cing-nzengc baeqc fingx aah! Oix zuqc hnamv Ziouv.  Ninh beu jienv ziepc zuoqv nyei mienh, mv baac hniev-hniev nyei winh bun zoux maux nyei mienh.
31.13: Yie haiz mienh camv nyei gorngv waac-sapv, maaih gamh nziex haic nyei sic weih gormx yie. Ninh mbuo caangh laangh hoic yie, daav za'eix zorqv yie nyei maengc.
31.9: O Ziouv aac, tov meih korv-lienh yie, weic zuqc yie kouv haic. Yie nzauh nyiemv, m'zing zungv maiv njang aqv. Yie nyei sin caux hnyouv kouv nzengc.
31.5: Yie zorqv yie nyei lingh wuonh jiu bun yiem meih nyei buoz gu'nyuoz. O Ziouv, ziepc zuoqv nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Meih zungv zuoqc yie daaih aqv.
31.14: Mv baac Ziouv  aac, yie kaux meih. Yie gorngv, “Meih zoux yie nyei Tin-Hungh.”
31.3: Meih zoux yie nyei la'bieiv caux yie wuonv nyei dorngx. Weic meih ganh nyei mengh tov dorh yie, yienz yie nyei jauv.
31.7: Meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv yie, yie ziouc njien-youh a'hneiv, weic zuqc meih buatc yie nyei kouv naanc, yaac hiuv duqv yie nyei hnyouv nzauh nyei jauv.
31.10: Yie nyei maengc zuqc nzauh kouv hnangv, hnyangx jiex hnyangx kungx njunh jienv yiem. Laaix yie zuqc nyei kouv naanc yie nyei qaqv mau jienv njiec, zungv kouv taux mbungv nqaai.
31.2: Tov baeng m'normh muangx yie, siepv-siepv nyei njoux yie. Tov zoux yie ndaauh kaux nyei la'bieiv, zoux weih jienv wuonv nyei dorngx njoux yie.
31.1: Ziouv  aac, yie ndaauh kaux meih. Tov bun yie yietc liuz maiv zuqc nyaiv. Meih se baengh fim nyei Tin-Hungh, tov meih njoux yie.
31.6: Meih nzorng haic baaix maiv lamh longc nyei miuc-fangx wuov deix, mv baac yie kaux Ziouv.
31.8: Meih yaac maiv zorqv yie jiu bun yiem win-wangv nyei buoz-ndiev. Meih bun yie nyei zaux caaiv jienv jangv nyei dorngx.
31.24: Da'faanh zuov jienv Ziouv nyei mienh oix zuqc henv, zungx jienv daamv.
31.11: Yie nyei yietc zungv win-wangv huotv yie, yie nyei juangc laangz mienh mangc piex yie. Hiuv duqv yie wuov deix gengh! gamh nziex yie. Liemh yiem jauv zaangc buangh yie wuov deix yaac biaux yie.
31.16: Tov bun meih nyei hmien nyei njang ziux yie, meih nyei bou, weic zuqc meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv yie, tov njoux yie.

78.21: Ziouv muangx haiz ninh mbuo nyei waac ziouc qiex jiez haic. Ninh longc douz buov Yaakopv nyei zeiv-fun. Ninh yietc zei gauh fatv qiex jiez I^saa^laa^en Mienh,
78.15: Ninh yiem deic-bung-huaang mborqv mbaaix la'bieiv, bun wuom camv-camv nyei ninh mbuo hopv, hnangv yiem ndo haic nyei dorngx cuotv.
78.23: Mv baac ninh hatc lungh, yaac koi nqoi lungh gaengh.
78.47: Ninh bun borqc mborqv waaic ninh mbuo nyei a'ngunc hmei, yaac longc sorng hoic waaic ninh mbuo nyei ngongh nyorx ndiangx.
78.56: Mv baac ninh mbuo corc seix yaac ngaengc jienv Yiem Hlang Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh, maiv ei jienv ninh nyei leiz-latc zoux.
78.20: Ninh mborqv la'bieiv-zorng bun wuom baetv cuotv, wuom liouc mingh benx ndoqv buangv mienz nzengc. Ninh aengx haih ceix laangh ziqc fai lorz orv juang ninh nyei baeqc fingx fai?
78.18: Ninh mbuo yiem hnyouv duqv-eix seix Tin-Hungh, ngaengc jienv ceuv ninh mbuo ngorc oix nyanc nyei ga'naaiv.
78.33: Ninh ziouc zoux bun ninh mbuo setv mueiz nyei hnoi-nyieqc maiv lamh longc, bun ninh mbuo setv mueiz nyei hnyangx-daauh zuqc domh heiv sic.
78.43: dongh yiem I^yipv ninh zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei jangx-hoc, se yiem So^an Ndau-Baengh zoux nyei sic.
78.48: Ninh zorqv ninh mbuo nyei ngongh bun borqc mborqv, aengx bun ninh mbuo nyei ba'gi yungh guanh zuqc mba'ong piqv.
78.22: weic zuqc ninh mbuo maiv sienx Tin-Hungh yaac maiv kaux ninh nyei njoux en.
78.42: Ninh mbuo maiv jangx ninh nyei domh qaqv, fai zuoqc ninh mbuo leih ndutv win-wangv nyei hnoi,
78.50: Ninh liuc leiz ziangx bun qiex jiez nyei jauv cuotv. Ninh maiv liouh ninh mbuo nyei maengc, zungv jiu bun ninh mbuo butv domh wuon-baengc.
78.31: Tin-Hungh qiex jiez! haic ninh mbuo, ninh yiem ninh mbuo mbu'ndongx daix ninh mbuo gauh henv jiex nyei mienh, mborqv baaic I^saa^laa^en nyei mienh lunx mienh.
78.4: Yie mbuo maiv zorqv naaiv deix sic bingx yie mbuo nyei dorn-jueiv, zungv oix mbuox jiex mingh wuov doic. Oix gorngv Ziouv zoux puix duqv ceng nyei sic, yaac gorngv taux ninh nyei qaqv caux ninh zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.
78.63: Douz mietc nzengc ninh mbuo nyei houh saeng, ninh mbuo nyei sieqv lorz maiv duqv jaa dorng.
78.29: Ninh mbuo ziouc nyanc yaac nyanc duqv beuv. Tin-Hungh ziux ninh mbuo ngorc nyanc nyei ceix bun ninh mbuo.
78.9: E^faa^im Mienh nanv jienv juang-zinx forng-cang, mv baac taux mborqv jaax nyei hnoi-nyieqc tuix nqaang nzuonx.
78.37: Ninh mbuo maiv liepc dingc hnyouv kaux ninh, yaac maiv ziepc zuoqv nyei ei jienv ninh laengz nyei ngaengc waac.
78.58: Ninh mbuo ceix yiem hlang zaangc zienh nyei dorngx cuoqv ninh qiex jiez haic. Laaix ninh mbuo zoux miuc-fangx, cuoqv ninh hanc haic ninh mbuo.
78.5: Ninh yiem Yaakopv nyei zeiv-fun mbu'ndongx liepc leiz-nyeic, yiem I^saa^laa^en njiec lingc, dongh ninh hatc yie mbuo nyei ong-taaix oix zuqc njaaux ninh mbuo nyei fun-faqv,
78.62: Ninh qiex jiez haic ninh nzipc nyei baeqc fingx, ziouc jiu bun ninh mbuo zuqc nzuqc ndaauv daix.
78.71: Ndaawitv goux dorh jienv dorn nyei ba'gi yungh nyeiz wuov zanc, Tin-Hungh heuc ninh daaih goux ninh nyei baeqc fingx, Yaakopv nyei zeiv-fun, se Tin-Hungh nzipc nyei buonc, I^saa^laa^en Mienh, hnangv goux ba'gi yungh nor.
78.3: Se yie mbuo duqv haiz duqv hiuv nyei jauv, dongh yie mbuo nyei ong-taaix gorngv mbuox yie mbuo nyei sic.
78.64: Ninh mbuo nyei sai mienh zuqc nzuqc ndaauv daix, ninh mbuo nyei auv-guaav maiv haih nzauh nyiemv.
78.39: Ninh jangx ninh mbuo kungx benx haih daic nyei baamh mienh, yaac hnangv gorng nziaaux nor, buonc mingh maiv nzuonx.
78.69: Ninh ceix ninh nyei singx dinc hnangv hlang haic nyei lungh, yaac hnangv ninh liepc yietc liuz yiem nyei ndau-beih.
78.6: weic bun nqa'haav wuov doic zeiv-fun, dongh maiv gaengh cuotv seix wuov deix, hiuv duqv ziouc nzipc jienv gorngv mbuox ninh mbuo ganh nyei dorn-jueiv zeiv-fun.
78.8: Ninh mbuo ziouc maiv hnangv ninh mbuo nyei ong-taaix nor, dongh hnyouv ngaengc faanv lunc wuov doic mienh. Wuov doic mienh maiv kaux wuonv Tin-Hungh, ninh mbuo nyei hnyouv yaac maiv ziepc zuoqv gan Tin-Hungh.
78.57: Daaux nzuonx ninh mbuo ngaengc hnangv ninh mbuo nyei ong-taaix, maiv ziepc zuoqv nyei zoux. Ninh mbuo goiv yienc hnangv juang-zinx nor ngau.
78.46: Ninh zorqv ninh mbuo nyei gaeng-zuangx bun jopv-nyeic lunx, yaac zorqv ninh mbuo ndortv qaqv duqv daaih nyei buonc bun domh jopv-nyeic hoic.
78.67: Ninh nqemh Yosepv nyei zeiv-fun, ninh yaac maiv ginv E^faa^im Fingx.
78.7: Hnangv naaic ninh mbuo ziouc kaux Tin-Hungh maaih lamh hnamv dorngx, yaac maiv la'kuqv Tin-Hungh zoux nyei sic, mv baac ei jienv ninh nyei leiz-latc zoux.
78.32: Maiv gunv maaih naaiv deix sic, ninh mbuo corc baamz zuiz. Maiv gunv ninh zoux naaiv deix mbuoqc horngh nyei sic, ninh mbuo maiv sienx kaux ninh.
78.25: Baamh mienh duqv nyanc fin-mienh nyei laangh ziqc, Tin-Hungh bun ninh mbuo duqv nyanc hopv bungx-zuoqc.
78.17: Mv baac ninh mbuo corc baamz zuiz dorngc Tin-Hungh. Ninh mbuo yiem deic-bung-huaang ngaengc jienv Yiem Hlang Jiex Wuov Dauh.
78.61: Ninh zorqv ninh nyei Laengz Ngaengc Waac Faang jiu bun mienh caangv mingh, bun ninh nyei njang-laangc yiem win-wangv nyei buoz-ndiev.
78.12: Yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung, So^an nyei ndau-baengh, Tin-Hungh dorng jienv ninh mbuo nyei ong-taaix zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.
78.65: Wuov zanc Ziouv nyie hnangv mienh m'njormh mingh nyie daaih nor, ninh heuc mbui hnangv mienh henv mienh hopv diuv heuc nor.
78.34: Tin-Hungh daix ninh mbuo nyei ziangh hoc ninh mbuo ziouc lorz ninh aqv. Ninh mbuo goiv hnyouv, qaqv lorz Tin-Hungh.
78.30: Mv baac ninh mbuo nyanc ngorc nyei ga'naaiv maiv gaengh gaux, corc yiem jienv ninh mbuo nyei nzuih nyei ziangh hoc,
78.11: Ninh mbuo la'kuqv ninh zoux jiex nyei sic, caux ninh bun ninh mbuo buatc jiex wuov deix mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.
78.28: Ninh bun norqc ndortv njiec ninh mbuo nyei ciangv mbu'ndongx, huing gormx ninh mbuo nyei ndopv-liuh.
78.44: Ninh zorqv ninh mbuo nyei ndaaih goiv benx nziaamv, ninh mbuo nyei ndoqv zungv maiv haih hopv.
78.72: Ndaawitv longc hnyouv zingx nyei goux ninh mbuo, yaac longc cong-mengh dorh ninh mbuo.
78.68: Mv baac ninh ginv Yu^ndaa Fingx, ninh hnamv nyei se Si^on Mbong.
78.45: Ninh bun mungz faanv daaih hoic, aengx bun gaengv hoic ninh mbuo kouv.
78.19: Ninh mbuo gorngv doqc Tin-Hungh ziouc gorngv, “Yiem naaiv deic-bung-huaang Tin-Hungh haih bun nyanc hopv fai?”
78.54: Ninh dorh ninh mbuo mingh taux ninh cing-nzengc deic-bung nyei gapv-jaaix dorngx, taux ninh nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz duqv daaih nyei mbong.
78.35: Ninh mbuo jangx zuqc Tin-Hungh se ninh mbuo nyei La'bieiv. Yiem Hlang Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh dongh Zuoqc Ninh Mbuo Wuov Dauh.
78.41: Ninh mbuo seix ninh yietc nzunc jiex yietc nzunc. Ninh mbuo cuoqv I^saa^laa^en nyei Cing-Nzengc Tin-Hungh.
78.13: Ninh zorqv koiv bun nqoi, bun ninh mbuo jiex mingh, aengx bun wuom ndui jienv hnangv zingh laatc nor.
78.60: Yiem Silo, Tin-Hungh guangc ninh nyei ndopv-liuh yiem nyei dorngx, se ninh yiem baamh mienh mbu'ndongx corng nyei ndopv-liuh.
78.59: Tin-Hungh muangx haiz ziouc qiex jiez! haic, guangc nzengc I^saa^laa^en Mienh aqv.
78.70: Ninh ginv ninh nyei bou, Ndaawitv, yiem ba'gi yungh ciangv dorh ninh cuotv daaih.
78.40: Yiem deic-bung-huaang ninh mbuo ngaengc ninh ndongc wuov camv, yiem ndau-huaang ninh mbuo bun ninh hnyouv mun.
78.55: Ninh zunc fingx-fingx mienh yiem ninh nyei wuov ndaangc maengx cuotv mingh. Ninh ndorqc ndau bun nqoi weic benx ninh mbuo nzipc nyei buonc, yaac bun fingx-fingx I^saa^laa^en Mienh yiem jienv ninh mbuo nyei ndopv-liuh.
78.26: Tin-Hungh bun dong bung nyei nziaaux yiem wuov lungh buonc daaih, aengx longc ninh nyei qaqv dorh naamh bung nyei nziaaux cuotv daaih.
78.52: Nqa'haav ninh dorh ninh nyei baeqc fingx cuotv daaih hnangv ba'gi yungh. Ninh dorh ninh mbuo jiex deic-bung-huaang hnangv yungh guanh nor.
78.14: Lungh hnoi zanc ninh longc mbuonx, ziangh muonz longc douz nyei njang dorh ninh mbuo.
78.27: Ninh bun orv njiec ndongc nie-mbung camv, se bun norqc ndaix daaih ndongc saa-ziou camv.
78.38: Mv baac ninh corc korv-lienh ninh mbuo, guangc ninh mbuo nyei zuiz, yaac maiv mietc ninh mbuo. Ninh qiex jiez mv baac ninh nyienz jienv ziex nzunc. Ninh zatv jienv ga'qiex, maiv nouz taux daauh.
78.49: Ninh nyei ga'qiex biuih cuotv, ninh qiex jiez haic, nouz haic, bun ninh mbuo zuqc ciouv nyei sic, bun ninh mbuo zuqc guanh zoux mietc nyei fin-mienh.
78.66: Ninh mborqv ninh nyei win-wangv tuix nzuonx, bun ninh mbuo yietc liuz zuqc nyaiv.
78.36: Ninh mbuo longc nzuih gorngv waac-gaam ceng ninh, yaac longc mbietc gorngv-baeqc nduov ninh hnangv.
78.53: Ninh dorh longx ninh mbuo, ninh mbuo ziouc maiv gamh nziex, mv baac koiv nyei wuom yiemx daic ninh mbuo nyei win-wangv.
78.10: Ninh mbuo maiv ei Tin-Hungh liepc nyei ngaengc waac, yaac maiv kangv gan ninh nyei leiz-latc.
78.2: Yie oix gorngv waac-beiv, yaac oix gorngv cuotv loz-hnoi gem jienv nyei sic.
78.1: O yie nyei baeqc fingx aah! Meih mbuo oix zuqc muangx yie njaaux nyei jauv, oix zuqc baeng m'normh muangx yie nyei nzuih gorngv nyei waac.
78.24: Ninh bun maa^naa duih njiec bun ninh nyei baeqc fingx nyanc, yaac bun lungh nyei laangh ziqc ninh mbuo.
78.16: Ninh bun wuom yiem la'bieiv mbeux cuotv benx ndoqv, bun wuom liouc njiec hnangv ndaaih nor.
78.51: Yiem I^yipv ninh daix mouz dauh dorn-la'gauv, se Haam nyei dauh dauh zeiv-fun nyei daauh toi dorn.

18.21: Weic zuqc yie gan nzengc Ziouv nyei doz yie maiv zoux waaic ngaengc yie nyei Tin-Hungh.
18.15: O Ziouv  aac, meih hatc hniev nyei, meih biomv meih nyei qiex yangh meih nyei mba'zorng cuotv. Koiv-ndoqv ziouc hinc cuotv daaih, ndau nyei gorn-ndoqv yaac cuotv daaih nqaengc nyei.
18.23: Yie yiem ninh nyei nza'hmien maiv maaih dorngc nyei dorngx. Yie yaac goux longx ganh, maiv zoux dorngc zuiz.
18.47: Se naaiv dauh Tin-Hungh tengx yie jaauv win, yaac bun maanc fingx zuqc yiem yie nyei buoz-ndiev.
18.20: Ziux yie zoux duqv horpc, Ziouv bun zingh nyeic yie. Ziux yie maiv zoux dorngc, ninh winh bun yie.
18.18: Yie zuqc zeqc naanc nyei hnoi-nyieqc ninh mbuo daaih hoic yie, mv baac Ziouv zoux yie kaux nyei dorngx.
18.33: Ninh bun yie nyei zaux hnangv njaih nyeiz nyei deih nor caaiv duqv jienv, yaac bun yie haih yiem hlang nyei dorngx souv duqv wuonv.
18.43: Meih njoux yie biaux ndutv, maiv zuqc baeqc fingx fiuv-nzaeng nyei sic. Meih bun yie zoux maanc guoqv nyei bieiv zeiv. Dongh yie maiv hiuv jiex nyei baeqc fingx fu-sux yie.
18.48: Ninh njoux yie biaux ndutv yie nyei win-wangv, yaac bouh yie faaux gauh hlang jiex yie nyei win-jaa, meih njoux yie biaux ndutv doqc nyei mienh.
18.22: Ninh nyei yietc zungv leiz yiem yie nyei nza'hmien, yie yaac maiv guangc ninh nyei leiz-nyeic.
18.42: Yie mborqv ninh mbuo muonc hnangv nziaaux buonc nyei nie-mbung. Yie zorqv ninh mbuo zoi guangc hnangv jauv zaangc nyei wuom-bamc ndorngh nor.
18.50: Ninh ceix hlo haic nyei njoux en bun ninh nyei hungh diex, yaac bun cing ninh ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv ninh longc youh orn daaih wuov dauh, se Ndaawitv caux ninh nyei hoz doic taux yietc liuz.
18.31: Cuotv liuz Ziouv, haaix dauh zoux Tin-Hungh? Cuotv liuz mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh, haaix dauh benx wuov norm La'bieiv?
18.4: Maaih haih daic nyei qaqv hnangv hlaang nzenc jienv yie, zuqc mietc nyei jauv hnangv wuom-laangc beqv yiemx jienv yie.
18.29: Yie bangc meih ziouc haih mborqv duqv jun-baeng. Yie kaux yie nyei Tin-Hungh haih biu jiex zingh laatc.
18.9: Ninh bun lungh nqoi ziouc njiec daaih, maaih mbuonx-jieqv yiem ninh nyei zaux-ndiev.
18.37: Yie zunc yie nyei win-wangv yaac zunc zaaic ninh mbuo. Yie maiv daaux sin nzuonx taux ninh mbuo zuqc baaic nzengc.
18.5: Yiemh gen nyei hlaang nzenc jienv yie, haih daic nyei qaqv hnangv mungz nor zaaux jienv yie.
18.3: Yie heuc Ziouv, dongh puix duqv mienh ceng wuov dauh. Ninh yaac njoux yie biaux ndutv yie nyei win-wangv.
18.39: Weic zuqc meih bun yie maaih qaqv mborqv jaax, meih bun daaih mborqv yie wuov deix zuqc yiem yie nyei buoz-ndiev.
18.6: Zuqc kouv nyei ziangh hoc yie heuc jienv tov Ziouv. Yie heuc jienv tov yie nyei Tin-Hungh tengx. Ninh yiem ninh nyei singx dinc gu'nyuoz muangx haiz yie nyei qiex. Yie heuc jienv ninh nyei qiex bieqc taux ninh nyei m'normh.
18.8: Douz-sioux yangh ninh nyei mba'zorng cuotv. Ninh nyei nzuih cuotv haih buov qui nyei douz, douz-taanx yaac zuqc wuov deix douz zieqc jienv.
18.46: Ziouv ziangh jienv. Oix zuqc ceng yie nyei La'bieiv. Oix zuqc taaih yie nyei Tin-Hungh, dongh njoux yie wuov dauh.
18.7: Wuov zanc ndau-beih zuqc mbungh mbungh mbienv-mbienv nyei, mbong nyei gorn-ndoqv yaac zuqc ndanc dongz nyanh nyanh nyei, weic zuqc ninh qiex jiez.
18.32: Naaiv dauh Tin-Hungh bun yie maaih qaqv yaac bun yie nyei jauv baengh orn.
18.25: Weic ziepc zuoqv nyei mienh meih ziepc zuoqv nyei daaix ninh mbuo. Weic maiv maaih dorngx nqemh nyei mienh, meih bun cing meih ganh maiv maaih dorngx nqemh.
18.17: Ninh njoux yie biaux ndutv yie nyei henv haic nyei win-wangv caux nzorng yie wuov deix mienh, weic zuqc ninh mbuo gauh henv jiex yie.
18.12: Yiem ninh nyei nza'hmien nyei njang, maaih borqc caux zieqc jienv douz nyei taanx cunx tong ninh nyei mouc.
18.34: Ninh njaaux yie hoqc linc mborqv jaax, yie nyei buoz cingx daaih haih baeng dongh siqv juang-zinx.
18.30: Naaiv dauh Tin-Hungh, ninh nyei doz dunh yunh nyei.   Ziouv laengz nyei waac, buatc za'gengh zien nyei. Ninh zoux torngv-baaih weic yietc zungv ndaauh kaux ninh nyei mienh.
18.11: Ninh bun hmuangx om ninh nyei sin, maaih wuom nyei mbuonx-jieqv torngv jienv ninh.
18.28: Meih diemv zieqc yie nyei dang.   Ziouv,  yie nyei Tin-Hungh, ziux yie hmuangx nyei dorngx njang daaih.
18.44: Ninh mbuo yietv muangx haiz yie nyei mengh dauh ninh mbuo muangx yie. Ganh fingx mienh daaih mbaapv njiec yie nyei nza'hmien.
18.45: Ganh fingx mienh hnyouv mau nzengc, sin zinx nyanh nyanh nyei yiem ninh mbuo wuonv nyei dorngx cuotv daaih.
18.19: Ninh dorh yie cuotv daaih taux norm jangv nyei dorngx. Ninh njoux yie weic zuqc ninh a'hneiv yie.
18.35: Meih bun meih nyei njoux en weic zoux yie nyei torngv-baaih. Meih nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz baav jienv yie. Meih tengx yie, bun yie duqv zoux hlo.
18.41: Ninh mbuo heuc jienv tov tengx, mv baac maiv maaih mienh njoux ninh mbuo. Ninh mbuo heuc Ziouv, mv baac ninh maiv dau ninh mbuo.
18.13: Ziouv yiem gu'nguaaic lungh gorngv cuotv hnangv mba'ong mbui. Yiem Hlang Jiex Wuov Dauh heuc cuotv ziouc maaih borqc caux zieqc jienv douz nyei douz-taanx.
18.40: Meih yaac bun yie nyei win-wangv huin nqaang biaux. Yie duqv mietc nzengc nzorng yie wuov deix.
18.26: Weic cing-nzengc wuov deix, meih bun cing meih ganh cing-nzengc. Weic hnyouv njuotv nyei mienh, meih yaac bun cing meih ngaengc ninh mbuo.
18.14: Ninh buonv cuotv ninh nyei forng-cang zoux bun win-wangv nzaanx. Ninh borngz mba'lingc njapc njapc nyei, haeqv win-wangv lunc nzengc.
18.27: Meih njoux nyiemc ganh zoux faix nyei baeqc fingx, mv baac m'zing-jaax hlang wuov deix, meih zatv ninh mbuo njiec.
18.38: Yie mborqv ninh mbuo, ninh mbuo ziouc maiv haih jiez sin. Ninh mbuo king njiec yie nyei zaux-hlen.
18.49: O Ziouv aac, weic naaiv yie ziouc yiem maanc fingx mienh mbu'ndongx ceng meih, yaac baaux nzung ceng meih nyei mengh.
18.36: Meih bun yie nyei zaux caaiv nyei dorngx jangv, yie nyei zaux ziouc maiv piatv.
18.10: Ninh geh ke^lu^mbim ndaix mingh, ninh bangc nziaaux nyei qaqv siepv-siepv nyei daaih.
18.2: Ziouv zoux yie nyei la'bieiv, yie kaux wuonv nyei dorngx caux njoux yie wuov dauh. Yie nyei Tin-Hungh, se yie nyei la'bieiv, dongh yie ndaauh kaux wuov dauh. Ninh zoux yie nyei torngv-baaih, zoux qaqv njoux yie, zoux wuonv nyei dorngx beu yie.
18.1: O Ziouv aac, meih zoux yie nyei qaqv. Yie hnamv meih.
18.24: Weic naaiv, ziux yie zoux duqv horpc, yaac ziux ninh mangc, buatc yie cing-nzengc,  Ziouv  winh bun yie.
18.16: Ninh yiem gu'nguaaic hlang nyei dorngx sung buoz zorqv yie, yiem wuom-ndo nyei dorngx baeng cuotv daaih.

99.2: Ziouv  yiem Si^on zoux hlo, ninh zungv zoux gauh hlo jiex maanc fingx.
99.1: Ziouv zoux hungh. Oix zuqc bun maanc fingx sin zinx. Ninh yiem wuov deix i dauh ke^lu^mbim mbu'ndongx nyei weic, bun ndau-beih zuqc ndanc dongz.
99.5: Ceng Ziouv, yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh. Yiem ninh lorngx zaux nyei dorngx baaix ninh. Ninh se cing-nzengc nyei.
99.6: Yiem ninh nyei sai mienh mbu'ndongx maaih Mose caux Aalon. Saa^mu^en yaac benx dauh jouh ninh nyei mbuox nyei mienh. Ninh mbuo heuc Ziouv, ninh yaac dau ninh mbuo.
99.8: O Ziouv, yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh aac, meih dau ninh mbuo. Meih se guangc ninh mbuo nyei zuiz nyei Tin-Hungh, mv baac ziux ninh mbuo zoux dorngc nyei jauv meih winh bun ninh mbuo.
99.9: Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv, yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh. Yiem ninh nyei cing-nzengc mbong zaangc ninh, weic zuqc Ziouv, yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh, se cing-nzengc nyei.
99.4: Henv nyei Hungh Diex aah! Meih hnamv baengh fim nyei jauv yaac liepc gong-fim. Yiem I^saa^laa^en Mienh mbu'ndongx meih zoux horpc caux baengh fim nyei sic.
99.3: Dauh dauh oix zuqc ceng meih hlo haic caux mbuoqc horngh nyei mbuox. Ninh se cing-nzengc.
