99.7: Ninh yiem mbuonx-ndiouh gu'nyuoz caux ninh mbuo gorngv waac. Ninh mbuo ei jienv ninh gorngv nyei waac caux jiu bun ninh mbuo nyei leiz-nyeic.

103.21: Ninh nyei zuangx baeng, se fu-sux ninh, ei jienv ninh nyei eix nyei bou aah! Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.
103.15: Baamh mienh aeqv, ninh nyei hnoi-nyieqc hnangv miev nor, ninh hnangv lomc-huaang nyei miev-biangh,
103.12: Dong bung leih fai bung ndongc haaix go, ninh zorqv mbuo zoux dorngc nyei zuiz guangc ndongc wuov go.
103.17: Mv baac Ziouv ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv taaih ninh wuov deix yietc liuz taux yietc liuz, ninh baengh fim nyei jauv yaac njiec taux ninh mbuo nyei zeiv-fun zeiv-faqv,
103.20: Meih mbuo, ninh nyei fin-mienh aah! Dongh ei jienv ninh hatc nyei waac, se muangx ninh nyei waac, maaih domh qaqv nyei fin-mienh, oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.
103.4: Ninh zuoqc yie nyei maengc leih ndutv ndo haic nyei kuotv, ninh ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv yie, korv-lienh yie.
103.19: Ziouv yiem gu'nguaaic lungh liepc ninh nyei weic, ninh nyei guoqv gunv maanc muotc.
103.18: se ei jienv ninh nyei ngaengc waac caux jangx ninh nyei leiz-latc wuov deix.
103.22: Meih mbuo yietc zungv zeix daaih nyei maanc muotc aah! Yiem ninh gunv nyei norm-norm dorngx, oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.  O yie nyei hnyouv aac, oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.
103.13: Die hnangv haaix nor korv-lienh ninh nyei fu'jueiv,   Ziouv yaac hnangv wuov nor korv-lienh taaih ninh nyei mienh,
103.9: Ninh maiv zanc-zanc hemx, yaac maiv yietc liuz qiex jiez.
103.5: Ninh ceix longx nyei ga'naaiv bun yie buangv eix, yie ziouc nzuonx-lunx daaih hnangv domh jaangv nor henv.
103.14: weic zuqc ninh hiuv duqv mbuo nyei sin zaangc, jangx duqv mbuo benx nie-mbung.
103.3: Ninh guangc yie nyei yietc zungv zuiz, yaac zorc yie nyei yietc zungv baengc.
103.7: Ninh bun Mose hiuv duqv ninh nyei za'eix, bun I^saa^laa^en Mienh hiuv duqv ninh zoux nyei sic.
103.10: Ninh maiv ziux mbuo zoux nyei zuiz dingc, yaac maiv ziux mbuo zoux dorngc nyei jauv winh bun.
103.2: Yie nyei hnyouv oix ceng Ziouv,  yaac maiv dungx la'kuqv ninh nyei yietc zungv en-zingh.
103.1: Yie nyei hnyouv aac, oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.  Yie longc nzengc hnyouv ceng ninh nyei cing-nzengc mbuox.
103.6: Ziouv  zoux kuv sic yaac baengh fim nyei tengx zuqc zeix nyei mienh.
103.8: Ziouv korv-lienh mienh, ceix en bun mienh, ninh maiv qiex jiez siepv, yaac maaih hnamv mienh nyei hnyouv buangv nzengc.
103.11: Lungh leih ndau ndongc haaix hlang, ninh hnamv taaih ninh wuov deix ndongc wuov hlo.
103.16: zuqc nziaaux buonc, ziang naaic maiv maaih aqv. Ninh nyei loz-dorngx yaac maiv nyiemc ninh aqv.

107.21: Ninh mbuo horpc zuqc dor-ziec Ziouv weic ninh ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh, ninh yaac weic baamh mienh zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.
107.15: Ninh mbuo horpc zuqc dor-ziec Ziouv weic ninh ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh, ninh yaac weic baamh mienh zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.
107.37: Ninh mbuo zoux ndeic zuangx ga'naaiv, zuangx a'ngunc biouv, yaac duqv bungx-zuoqc nyei siou.
107.12: Ninh bun ninh mbuo zuqc zoux gong kouv weic zatv ninh mbuo nyei hnyouv njiec. Ninh mbuo ndorpc, yaac maiv maaih haaix dauh tengx.
107.17: Maaih deix butv baengc laaix ninh mbuo zoux nyei zuiz, yaac laaix ninh mbuo zoux waaic sic zuqc siouc kouv.
107.30: Ninh mbuo ziouc a'hneiv weic zuqc sekv nzieqc nyei. Ninh yaac dorh ninh mbuo mingh taux ninh mbuo oix mingh nyei nzangv-bouc.
107.20: Ninh gorngv cuotv waac zorc ninh mbuo longx, yaac njoux ninh mbuo biaux ndutv zuqc daic nyei kuotv.
107.4: Ninh mbuo yiem deic-bung-huaang, deic-bung haanz, youh jienv mingh, lorz maiv duqv jauv mingh horpc ninh mbuo yiem nyei zingh.
107.28: Ninh mbuo yiem naanc zingh gu'nyuoz heuc jienv tov Ziouv.  Ninh ziouc tengx ninh mbuo biaux ndutv ninh mbuo nyei kouv naanc.
107.43: Haaix dauh maaih cong-mengh oix zuqc longc hnyouv muangx naaiv deix sic, yaac oix zuqc samx mangc Ziouv ziepc zuoqv hnamv mienh nyei jauv.
107.33: Ninh bun ndaaih tiuv benx deic-bung-huaang, bun wuom-zingv tiuv benx mborngx nqaai nyei ndau,
107.35: Ninh bun deic-bung-huaang benx wuom-domh, bun ndau-nqaai benx wuom-zingv.
107.42: Hnyouv zingx nyei mienh buatc ninh mbuo ziouc a'hneiv. Zoux orqv nyei mienh nqapc jienv nzuih, maiv maaih waac gorngv aqv.
107.19: Ninh mbuo yiem naanc zingh gu'nyuoz heuc jienv tov Ziouv, ninh ziouc njoux ninh mbuo biaux ndutv ninh mbuo nyei kouv naanc.
107.34: bun ndau-junc tiuv benx ndau-nzaaih ndau-huaang, laaix yiem wuov nyei mienh waaic haic.
107.18: Ninh mbuo youx haic nyungc-nyungc nyanc nyei ga'naaiv, yaac taux fatv zuqc daic nyei gaengh.
107.22: Oix zuqc bun ninh mbuo fongc horc ziec weic dor-ziec, yaac njien-youh nyei baaux nzung gorngv ninh zoux nyei sic.
107.23: Maaih deix bieqc nzangv, yiem domh wuom bangc nzangv lorz nyanc.
107.13: Ninh mbuo yiem naanc zingh gu'nyuoz heuc jienv tov Ziouv.  Ninh ziouc njoux ninh mbuo biaux ndutv ninh mbuo nyei kouv naanc.
107.9: Ninh bun jaang nqaatv nyei mienh jaiv nqaatv, bun hnyouv sie nyei mienh duqv longx nyei ga'naaiv nyanc beuv.
107.40: ninh bun zeix ninh nyei baeqc fingx wuov deix zoux hlo nyei mienh zuqc mangc piex, yaac bun ninh mbuo youh jienv mingh maiv maaih jauv nyei deic-bung-huaang.
107.26: Ninh mbuo nyei nzangv faaux taux ndaamv-lungh, aengx ndortv njiec wuom-laangc taux ndo nyei dorngx. Ninh mbuo hnyouv waaic nzengc, laaix ninh mbuo zuqc gamh nziex nyei sic.
107.41: Mv baac ninh bouh mienh jomc mienh faaux hlaang, bun ninh mbuo leih ndutv kouv naanc, bun ninh mbuo nyei hmuangv doic hiaangx, hnangv yungh guanh nor camv.
107.5: Ninh mbuo youc hnyouv sie youc jaang nqaatv, ninh mbuo nyei hnyouv mau nzengc mi'aqv.
107.27: Ninh mbuo laih mingh laih daaih hnangv diuv nquin nyei mienh nor, ninh mbuo jomc za'eix aqv.
107.38: Ninh ceix fuqv bun ninh nyei baeqc fingx hiaangx camv, yaac maiv bun ninh mbuo nyei saeng-kuv zoqc njiec.
107.14: Ninh dorh ninh mbuo yiem hmuangx caux zuqc daic nyei dongh linh gu'nyuoz cuotv daaih, yaac cutv ninh mbuo zuqc ndoh nyei limc dangx.
107.3: yaac yiem norm-norm deic-bung, se yiem dong naamh fai baqv bung siou nzuonx daaih nyei mienh.
107.7: Ninh dorh ninh mbuo yangh diuh jauv-zaqc, taux horpc ninh mbuo yiem nyei zingh.
107.39: Baeqc fingx zuqc zeix, zuqc kouv, zuqc nzauh, ninh mbuo ziouc zoqc yaac ndortv njiec aiv nyei ziangh hoc,
107.36: Ninh bun ngorc nyei mienh yiem wuov, ninh mbuo yaac ceix norm zingh yiem.
107.10: Maaih deix mienh yiem hmuangx zong, yiem-yiem nyei dorngx, se zuqc wuonx loh nyei caux zuqc limc ndoh nyei mienh,
107.2: Tov bun Ziouv zuoqc nzuonx nyei mienh hnangv naaic nor gorngv, se dongh ninh yiem win-wangv nyei buoz-ndiev zuoqc nzuonx nyei mienh,
107.1: Oix zuqc dor-ziec Ziouv weic zuqc ninh longx haic, ninh ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh taux yietc liuz.
107.31: Ninh mbuo horpc zuqc dor-ziec Ziouv weic zuqc ninh ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh. Ninh yaac weic baamh mienh zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.
107.6: Ninh mbuo yiem naanc zingh gu'nyuoz heuc jienv tov Ziouv, ninh ziouc njoux ninh mbuo biaux ndutv ninh mbuo nyei kouv naanc.
107.8: Ninh mbuo horpc zuqc dor-ziec Ziouv weic ninh ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh, ninh yaac weic baamh mienh zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.
107.24: Ninh mbuo buatc Ziouv zoux nyei gong, se ninh yiem wuom ndo nyei dorngx zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.
107.25: Ninh yietv hatc, domh nziaaux buonc daaih bun koiv jiez laangc.
107.29: Ninh bun domh nziaaux dingh, bun koiv nyei wuom-laangc sekv nzengc.
107.11: weic zuqc ninh mbuo ngaengc Tin-Hungh nyei waac, mangc piex Yiem Hlang Jiex Wuov Dauh njaaux nyei za'eix.
107.32: Ninh mbuo oix zuqc yiem baeqc fingx gapv zunv nyei dorngx zunh gorngv ninh zoux hlo, yaac yiem zuangx mienh gox mbu'ndongx ceng ninh.
107.16: Ninh mborqv huv dongh siqv gaengh, yaac hngaqv ndutv hlieqv-gaengh sorn.

118.21: Yie dor-ziec meih weic zuqc meih dau yie. Yaac benx yie nyei njoux en.
118.15: Muangx maah! Yiem kuv mienh nyei ndopv-liuh maaih njien-youh caux hingh jiex nyei qiex aengv cuotv gorngv, “Ziouv nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz tengx hingh jiex.
118.12: Ninh mbuo hnangv mueiz nor, weih gormx yie. Ninh mbuo hnangv buov njimv-lomc nyei douz daic siepv. Yie dengv Ziouv nyei mbuox mietc ninh mbuo.
118.17: Yie ziouc maiv daic mv baac duqv ziangh jienv yaac zunh Ziouv  zoux nyei sic.
118.20: Naaiv se Ziouv  nyei gaengh. Kuv mienh duqv yangh naaiv bieqc.
118.4: Bun yietc zungv taaih Ziouv nyei mienh gorngv, “Ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.”
118.28: Meih zoux yie nyei Tin-Hungh. Yie oix dor-ziec meih. Meih zoux yie nyei Tin-Hungh. Yie oix taaih meih weih hlo.
118.19: Tengx yie koi nqoi zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei gaengh weic bun yie haih bieqc mingh dor-ziec Ziouv.
118.18: Ziouv  dingc yie nyei zuiz hniev nyei mv baac maiv bun yie zuqc daic.
118.22: Gomv biauv zaangc nqemh cuotv wuov norm la'bieiv, zungv benx an biauv-gorqv gauh longc jienv jiex wuov norm.
118.23: Naaiv se Ziouv  zoux nyei sic. Ziux yie mbuo nyei m'zing mangc, yie mbuo buatc mbuoqc horngh haic.
118.13: Yie zuqc ninh mbuo fongv seix nyei, bun yie kaav deix ndorpc, mv baac Ziouv  tengx yie.
118.9: Ndaauh kaux Ziouv  se gauh longx kaux zoux hlo nyei mienh.
118.26: Tov ceix fuqv bun dengv Ziouv nyei mbuox bieqc daaih nyei mienh. Yie mbuo yiem Ziouv nyei biauv tov Ziouv ceix fuqv bun meih mbuo.
118.5: Zuqc kouv naanc wuov zanc yie heuc Ziouv.    Ziouv  dau yie yaac bungx nqoi yie.
118.27: Ziouv  se dongh Tin-Hungh. Ninh yaac ceix njang bun yie mbuo. Longc hlaang ndoh jienv fongc horc ziec weic jiex zipv nyei saeng-kuv yaac dorh mingh taux ziec-dorngh nyei jorng.
118.14: Ziouv se yie nyei qaqv caux yie nyei nzung, ninh benx yie nyei njoux en.
118.3: Bun Aalon nyei zeiv-fun gorngv, “Ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.”
118.7: Ziouv  caux yie yiem yaac tengx yie, yie ziouc mangc buatc nzorng yie wuov deix win-wangv zuqc suei.
118.10: Maanc guoqv nyei mienh weih gormx yie. Yie dengv Ziouv nyei mbuox mietc ninh mbuo.
118.2: Bun I^saa^laa^en Mienh gorngv, “Ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.”
118.1: Oix zuqc dor-ziec Ziouv weic zuqc ninh longx haic. Ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
118.6: Maaih Ziouv tengx yie, yie ziouc maiv gamh nziex. Baamh mienh haih zoux haaix nyungc bun yie?
118.8: Ndaauh kaux Ziouv  se gauh longx kaux baamh mienh.
118.24: Naaiv se Ziouv liepc daaih nyei hnoi. Yie mbuo oix zuqc yiem naaiv norm hnoi njien-youh, a'hneiv.
118.25: O Ziouv aah! Njoux yie mbuo maah! O Ziouv aah! Tov tengx yie mbuo haih zoux duqv ziangx nyei.
118.29: Oix zuqc dor-ziec Ziouv weic zuqc ninh longx haic. Ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
118.11: Ninh mbuo weih gormx yie, feix bung weih gormx yie. Yie dengv Ziouv nyei mbuox mietc ninh mbuo.
118.16: Ziouv sung ninh nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz faaux hlang.   Ziouv sung ninh nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz tengx hingh jiex.”

75.10: Yie oix zoux waaic orqv mienh nyei qaqv, mv baac bun kuv mienh nyei qaqv henv jienv faaux.
75.2: Tin-Hungh gorngv, “Ziux yie dingc daaih nyei ziangh hoc yie oix baengh fim nyei siemv zuiz.
75.1: O Tin-Hungh aac, yie mbuo dor-ziec meih aqv. Yie mbuo dor-ziec meih, weic zuqc meih yiem nitv fatv. Yie mbuo zunh yaangh meih zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.
75.5: Maiv dungx taaih ganh hlo, bungx waac-maux, fai ngorngz jienv jaang gorngv waac.”
75.6: Bouh mienh faaux hlang maiv zeiz yiem dong bung fai bung daaih, yaac maiv zeiz yiem deic-bung-huaang daaih.
75.8: Weic zuqc yiem Ziouv nyei buoz maaih norm zaanv, dapv buangv maaih mbiaauz nyei diuv, peux duqv longx nyei. Ninh oix dox cuotv daaih, baamh gen nyei yietc zungv orqv mienh oix hopv nqaai nzengc.
75.9: Mv baac yie nor, yie oix yietc liuz zunh yaangh naaiv deix sic. Yie oix baaux nzung ceng Yaakopv nyei Tin-Hungh.
75.4: Yie gorngv mbuox ceng-hlo nyei mienh, “Maiv dungx ceng-hlo.” Yaac gorngv mbuox orqv mienh, “Maiv dungx bungx waac-maux.
75.3: Baamh gen caux yiem baamh gen nyei yietc zungv mienh lungh lungh laih laih wuov zanc, se yie ganh baav jienv baamh gen nyei ndiouh. Selaa
75.7: Se Tin-Hungh dunx sic. Ninh zatv yietc dauh njiec aiv, bouh yietc dauh faaux hlang.

37.21: Mienh waaic mienh gaav mingh yaac maiv jaauv, mv baac kuv mienh hnyouv jangv, fungx zingh nyeic bun mienh.
37.15: Mv baac ninh mbuo nyei nzuqc ndaauv oix nzopv ninh mbuo ganh nyei mba'nziu, ninh mbuo nyei juang-zinx yaac oix zuqc wuotv nauv.
37.37: Samx mangc maiv maaih dorngx nqemh nyei mienh, yaac mangc longx kuv mienh, weic zuqc hnamv baengh orn nyei mienh maaih hoz doic zeiv-fun,
37.12: Mienh waaic mienh daav za'eix hoic kuv mienh, yaac dorng jienv ninh mbuo ngaatc nyaah.
37.17: Weic zuqc mienh waaic mienh nyei buoz oix zuqc nauv, mv baac Ziouv zoux longx bun kuv mienh.
37.30: Kuv mienh nyei nzuih gorngv cong-mengh nyei waac, ninh nyei mbietc gorngv baengh fim nyei jauv.
37.20: Mv baac mienh waaic mienh oix zuqc mietc.   Ziouv nyei win-wangv se hnangv lomc nyei miev-biangh nyei njang-laangc ziec nzengc, hnangv douz-sioux nor, mitc mi'aqv.
37.4: Oix zuqc a'hneiv lorz Ziouv nyei orn-lorqc, ninh ziouc ziux meih nyei hnyouv oix nyei ceix bun meih.
37.28: Weic zuqc Ziouv a'hneiv baengh fim nyei jauv, ninh yaac maiv guangc ninh nyei cing-nzengc baeqc fingx. Ninh oix yietc liuz beu jienv kuv mienh, mv baac mienh waaic mienh nyei zeiv-fun oix zuqc pai guangc.
37.33: Ziouv maiv guangc ninh yiem win-wangv nyei buoz-ndiev, fai zuqc siemv nyei ziangh hoc yaac maiv bun ninh zuqc dingc zuiz.
37.35: Yie buatc jiex mienh waaic mienh maaih hatc maaz hlo haic, hnangv Le^mbaa^norn Mbong nyei yietc diuh hlang jiex nyei domh si^ndaa zongh ndiangx nor.
37.19: Ninh mbuo yiem kuonx naanh nyei hnoi-nyieqc maiv zuqc nyaiv, ngorc hnaangx nyei ziangh hoc ninh mbuo duqv nyanc beuv.
37.34: Zuov jienv Ziouv,  ei jienv ninh nyei jauv zoux, ninh ziouc taaih meih, bun meih duqv nzipc naaiv norm deic-bung, mienh waaic mienh zuqc pai guangc wuov zanc, meih ziouc duqv buatc aqv.
37.18: Ziouv hiuv duqv maiv maaih dorngx nqemh nyei mienh nyei hnoi-nyieqc. Ninh mbuo nzipc nyei buonc oix yietc liuz yiem.
37.22: Weic zuqc Ziouv ceix fuqv nyei mienh oix duqv nzipc naaiv norm deic-bung, mv baac zuqc ninh zioux wuov deix oix zuqc pai guangc.
37.23: Ziouv liepc wuonv mienh yangh nyei zaux-caaiv. Ninh yaac a'hneiv wuov dauh yangh nyei jauv.
37.13: Ziouv kuh jatv haic zoux waaic nyei mienh weic zuqc ninh hiuv duqv ninh mbuo zuqc mietc nyei ziangh hoc oix taux aqv.
37.9: Zoux orqv nyei mienh oix zuqc pai guangc mingh, mv baac zuov jienv Ziouv wuov deix duqv nzipc naaiv norm deic-bung.
37.40: Ziouv tengx ninh mbuo, njoux ninh mbuo. Ninh tengx ninh mbuo biaux ndutv mienh waaic mienh yaac njoux ninh mbuo, weic zuqc ninh mbuo ndaauh kaux ninh.
37.26: Ninh zoux hnyouv jangv yaac a'hneiv bun mienh gaav, ninh nyei fun-faqv bun ninh duqv fuqv.
37.5: Oix zuqc zorqv meih nyei jauv fungx bun Ziouv, yaac kaux ninh, ninh ziouc tengx meih zoux ziangx.
37.27: Oix zuqc leih nqoi orqv sic, zoux kuv sic, meih ziouc duqv yietc liuz yiem.
37.38: mv baac baamz zuiz nyei mienh zungv oix zuqc mietc nzengc. Orqv mienh nyei zeiv-fun oix zuqc pai guangc mingh.
37.14: Orqv mienh baeng cuotv nzuqc ndaauv yaac baeng juang-zinx, oix hoic mienh jomc mienh caux dangx-donx nyei mienh, yaac daix zoux horpc nyei mienh.
37.3: Oix zuqc kaux Ziouv yaac zoux kuv sic, meih ziouc duqv baengh orn nyei yiem naaiv norm deic-bung.
37.7: Oix zuqc yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien sekv-sekv nyei longc noic zuov ninh. Maiv dungx weic ei ganh nyei jauv duqv longx fai ei waaic nyei za'eix zoux wuov deix guaax hnyouv.
37.39: Kuv mienh duqv njoux se yiem Ziouv  daaih, zuqc kouv naanc nyei ziangh hoc, ninh zoux ninh mbuo ndaauh kaux nyei dorngx.
37.36: Mv baac yie aengx yangh naaic jiex, ninh zitc mi'aqv. Maiv gunv yie lorz ninh, yaac lorz maiv buatc.
37.10: Maiv lauh maiv maaih orqv mienh aqv. Maiv gunv meih longx-longx nyei mangc ninh yiem nyei dorngx, ninh maiv yiem naaic aqv.
37.2: Weic zuqc ninh mbuo hnangv miev nor, siepv-siepv nyei nyaux mingh. Yaac hnangv miev-maeng nor, nqaai nzengc.
37.1: Maiv dungx weic zoux orqv nyei mienh guaax hnyouv. Yaac maiv dungx mueic jieqv zoux dorngc nyei mienh.
37.31: Tin-Hungh nyei leiz-latc yiem ninh nyei hnyouv, ninh nyei zaux maiv caaiv piatv.
37.6: Ninh oix bun meih zoux baengh fim nyei jauv hnangv njang nor ziux cuotv daaih, bun meih nyei gong-fim hnangv lungh aanx zanc nyei njang.
37.8: Maiv dungx qiex jiez, oix zuqc guangc nqoi nouz mienh nyei hnyouv. Maiv dungx guaax hnyouv, naaiv kungx dorh mienh mingh zoux orqv sic hnangv.
37.24: Maiv gunv ninh ndorpc, ninh maiv ziangh dauh king njiec, weic zuqc Ziouv nyei buoz baav jienv ninh.
37.25: Zinh ndaangc yie lunx, ih zanc yie gox aqv, mv baac yie maiv buatc jiex kuv mienh zuqc guangc, yaac maiv buatc jiex ninh nyei zeiv-fun tov nyanc.
37.29: Kuv mienh zungv oix nzipc naaiv norm deic-bung, yaac duqv yiem naaiv weic yietc liuz.
37.11: Mv baac nyiemc ganh zoux faix wuov deix oix duqv nzipc naaiv norm deic-bung. Ninh mbuo yaac bungx-zuoqc, baengh orn nyei yiem.
37.32: Mienh waaic mienh cienh kuv mienh, oix lorz qangx daix ninh.
37.16: Kuv mienh maaih nyei deix baav ga'naaiv, corc gauh longx mienh waaic mienh maaih nyei yietc zungv zinh zoih.

58.11: Mienh ziouc gorngv, “Kuv mienh ndongc haaix zungv oix duqv zingh nyeic. Ndongc haaix zungv maaih dauh Tin-Hungh siemv lungh ndiev.”
58.10: Kuv mienh buatc orqv mienh zuqc jaauv win, ninh mbuo a'hneiv. Ninh mbuo yaac longc orqv mienh nyei nziaamv nzaaux zaux.
58.2: Zungv maiv zeiz! Meih mbuo nyei hnyouv kungx hnamv zoux orqv nyei sic hnangv. Meih mbuo yiem ndau-beih longc buoz zoux cuotv doqc haic nyei sic.
58.1: Meih mbuo zoux hlo nyei mienh aah! Meih mbuo baengh fim nyei gorngv fai? Meih mbuo hnyouv zingx nyei siemv baamh mienh fai?
58.5: ninh mbuo ziouc muangx maiv haiz zoux faatv bun naang hngongx nyei mienh nyei qiex maiv gunv zoux faatv ndongc haaix guv guaix.
58.6: O Tin-Hungh aah! Tov mborqv nquaqv ninh mbuo nyei nzuih nyei nyaah. O Ziouv aac, tov baeng naaiv deix sienh lunx nyei nyaah ngau cuotv.
58.8: Tov bun ninh mbuo hnangv korng gueiv manc-manc huv yuqc nzengc. Yaac bun ninh mbuo hnangv gu'nguaaz-mbaang nor, maiv duqv buatc mba'hnoi.
58.9: Longc njimv buov douz, maiv gunv njimv nyiemz fai nqaai, caeng zungv maiv gaengh haiz jorm, ninh ziouc guaatv orqv mienh mingh nzengc mi'aqv.
58.4: Ninh mbuo nyei doqc qiex hnangv naang nyei ndie-doqc. Ninh mbuo zotv jienv m'normh hnangv m'normh ndung nyei naang-jieqv,
58.3: Zoux orqv nyei mienh cuotv seix daaih m'daaih yangh orqv nyei jauv. Yiem ninh mbuo cuotv seix daaih ninh mbuo kungx gorngv-baeqc hnangv.
58.7: Tov bun ninh mbuo zutc nzengc hnangv wuom liouc mingh nzengc nor. Ninh mbuo baeng jienv juang-zinx oix buonv wuov zanc, tov bun ninh mbuo nyei forng-cang nauv ndutv.

114.2: Yu^ndaa benx Tin-Hungh nyei singx dinc, I^saa^laa^en benx ninh gunv nyei guoqv.
114.1: I^saa^laa^en Mienh yiem I^yipv cuotv wuov zanc, se Yaakopv nyei zeiv-fun leih nqoi gorngv ganh nyungc waac nyei fingx,
114.5: O koiv aac, meih weic haaix diuc biaux? O Jor^ndaen Ndaaih aac, meih weic haaix diuc liouc daaux nqaang?
114.6: Domh mbong aac, meih weic haaix diuc biu hnangv ba'gi yungh gouv? Fiuv-mbong aac, meih weic haaix diuc tiux hnangv ba'gi yungh dorn?
114.8: dongh bun la'bieiv tiuv benx wuom-domh, bun la'bieiv-mbaengx tiuv benx wuom-zingv wuov dauh.
114.4: Zuangx mbong biu hnangv ba'gi yungh gouv nor, mbong-aiv tiux hnangv ba'gi yungh dorn.
114.3: Koiv mangc buatc liuz ziouc biaux, Jor^ndaen Ndaaih yaac liouc daaux nqaang.
114.7: Ndau-beih aac, oix zuqc yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien dongz, se dorng jienv Yaakopv nyei Tin-Hungh,

5.12: O Ziouv aac, meih ceix fuqv bun zoux horpc nyei mienh. Meih korv-lienh, beu jienv ninh mbuo hnangv torngv-baaih nor.
5.5: Ceng-hlo nyei mienh maiv duqv souv meih nyei nza'hmien. Da'faanh zoux orqv nyei mienh meih nzorng haic.
5.11: Mv baac da'faanh kaux meih wuov deix oix zuqc orn-lorqc, bun ninh mbuo zanc-zanc njien-youh nyei baaux nzung. Tov beu jienv ninh mbuo, weic bun hnamv meih nyei mengh wuov deix kaux meih duqv njien-youh.
5.3: O Ziouv aac, lungh ndorm meih muangx duqv haiz yie nyei qiex, lungh ndorm nziouv yie jouh meih yaac zuov meih dau yie.
5.10: O Tin-Hungh aah! Tov dingc ninh mbuo nyei zuiz, bun ninh mbuo daav nyei za'eix hoic ninh mbuo ganh. Laaix ninh mbuo baamz nyei zuiz camv, zorqv ninh mbuo zunc cuotv mingh, weic zuqc ninh mbuo ngaengc meih.
5.2: Yie nyei Hungh, yie nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Tov muangx yie heuc jienv nyei qiex weic zuqc yie dorng jienv meih daux gaux.
5.1: O Ziouv aac, tov meih baeng m'normh muangx yie nyei waac. Tov muangx haiz yie njunh nyei qiex.
5.4: Meih se maiv zeiz a'hneiv waaic sic nyei Tin-Hungh. Orqv mienh maiv haih caux meih yiem.
5.6: Meih mietc nzengc gorngv-baeqc nyei mienh. Daix mienh nyei mienh caux nduov mienh nyei mienh,   Ziouv  youx haic.
5.8: O Ziouv aac, laaix yie nyei win-wangv, tov meih yienz yie gan meih zoux horpc nyei jauv. Tov bun yie yangh meih weic yie liuc leiz nyei jauv.
5.9: Win-wangv nyei nzuih maiv maaih zien waac. Ninh mbuo nyei hnyouv kungx oix zoux mietc. Ninh mbuo nyei jaang-hoh hnangv wetv tong nyei janx-daic zouv nor, ninh mbuo longc mbietc gorngv waac nduov mienh hnangv.
5.7: Mv baac yie ganh aeqv, weic zuqc meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv haic mienh, yie ziouc duqv bieqc meih nyei biauv. Yie oix taaih meih, yaac hungx jienv meih nyei cing-nzengc biauv baaix.

104.21: Sienh lunx heuc jienv mingh lorz nyanc, lorz Tin-Hungh ceix bun nyei ga'naaiv.
104.15: Aengx cuotv a'ngunc diuv tengx mienh njien-youh, yaac duqv hmei tengx ninh nyei hmien njang, duqv laangh ziqc weic bun sin zaangc henv.
104.12: Yiem wuom-hlen maaih norqc zoux lauz, yiem ndiangx-nquaah maaih norqc heuc.
104.17: Norqc zoux lauz yiem wuov deix ndiangx. Norqc nyieh yiem zongh ndiangx zoux ninh nyei biauv.
104.30: Meih bun meih nyei Singx Lingh cuotv mingh wuov zanc ninh mbuo duqv zeix cuotv daaih aqv. Meih yaac bun ndau-beih goiv yienc siang daaih.
104.20: Meih zeix hmuangx benx lungh muonz zanc, lomc gu'nyuoz yietc zungv hieh zoih ziouc cuotv daaih.
104.4: Meih longc nziaaux zoux meih nyei douc fienx mienh, longc douz-mbietc zoux meih nyei bou.
104.28: Meih bun ninh mbuo, ninh mbuo ziouc zorqv daaih, meih sung meih nyei buoz ninh mbuo ziouc duqv longx nyei ga'naaiv beuv.
104.33: Yie yietc seix oix baaux nzung ceng Ziouv. Yie corc ziangh jienv nyei ziangh hoc, yie oix baaux nzung bun yie nyei Tin-Hungh.
104.35: Tov bun zuiz-mienh yiem baamh gen zuqc mietc nzengc, yaac bun orqv mienh zutc nzengc. Yie nyei hnyouv aac, oix zuqc ceng Ziouv. Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.
104.19: Meih zeix hlaax weic dingc gueix, mba'hnoi hiuv duqv ziangh hoc muotv.
104.34: Tov ninh weic yie buih nyei waac horpc hnyouv, weic zuqc Ziouv  bun yie njien-youh.
104.18: Mbong-hlang benx hieh yungh nyei dinc, la'bieiv-mbaengx zoux naauz nyei ndaauh kaux dorngx.
104.22: Mba'hnoi cuotv nyei ziangh hoc ninh mbuo ziouc mingh aqv. Mingh bueix ninh mbuo ganh nyei kuotv.
104.23: Mienh ziouc cuotv mingh zoux ninh mbuo nyei gong, yaac zoux jienv mingh taux lungh hmuangx.
104.13: Yiem lungh gu'nguaaic meih bun mbiungc duih njiec mbong, weic meih zoux nyei yietc zungv gong, ndau-beih duqv bungx-zuoqc.
104.9: Meih dingc ziangx gapv-jaaix bun wuom maiv haih jiex ndaangc, weic maiv bun wuom aengx buang jienv ndau-beih.
104.26: Yiem wuov maaih nzangv mingh daaih, aengx maaih meih zeix daaih nyei Le^wi^aa^taan yiem wuov nyienx.
104.5: Meih zorqv ndau liepc yiem gorn-ndoqv gu'nguaaic, weic bun yietc liuz maiv dongz.
104.27: Naaiv deix yietc zungv kaux meih ziux ziangh hoc bun ga'naaiv ninh mbuo nyanc.
104.14: Meih bun miev-maeng cuotv daaih yungz saeng-kuv, bun lai-coix cuotv daaih bun mienh longc, bun ndau cuotv gaeng-zuangx ga'naaiv bun mienh nyanc.
104.3: Yiem lungh gu'nguaaic maengx nyei wuom meih liepc meih yiem nyei dorngx. Meih longc mbuonx zoux meih nyei cie, yaac bangc nziaaux nyei ndaatv mingh.
104.7: Meih yietv hatc, wuom ziouc biaux. Yietv haiz meih nyei qiex mbui, wuom ziouc mingh nzengc.
104.10: Meih bun wuom-zingv yiem horngz baetv cuotv, liouc njiec mbong mbu'ndongx,
104.2: Meih buix jienv njang hnangv buix lui-ndaauv. Meih corng lungh hnangv corng ndopv-liuh wuov nor.
104.1: Yie nyei hnyouv aac, oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.  O Ziouv,  yie nyei Tin-Hungh aac, meih za'gengh hlo! haic. Meih maaih njang-laangc caux mengh hoc zuqv jienv zoux meih nyei lui.
104.31: Tov Ziouv nyei njang-laangc yietc liuz yiem. Tov Ziouv a'hneiv ninh zeix daaih nyei ga'naaiv.
104.6: Meih longc ndo nyei wuom yiemx ndau-beih gu'nguaaic hnangv lui nor, wuom jiex mbong gu'nguaaic.
104.8: Geh zorng baetv faaux, horngz biopc njiec taux meih dingc bun ninh mbuo yiem nyei dorngx.
104.24: O Ziouv aac, meih zoux nyei gong camv haic, yietc zungv se meih longc cong-mengh zeix daaih. Meih zeix daaih nyei maanc muotc buangv nzengc ndau-beih.
104.25: Yiem wuov maaih koiv youc hlo youc jangv. Koiv gu'nyuoz maaih haih dongz nyei ga'naaiv saauv maiv hingh, se maaih maengc nyei ga'naaiv hlo-hlo faix-faix.
104.29: Meih buang hmien maiv mangc ninh mbuo, ninh mbuo gamh nziex haic. Meih zorqv cuotv ninh mbuo tauv nyei qiex ninh mbuo daic mi'aqv, nzuonx mingh benx nie-mbung.
104.11: bun zuangx hieh zoih duqv hopv, bun hieh lorh jaiv nqaatv.
104.32: Ninh mangc ndau, ndau ziouc dongz, ninh hluo zuqc mbong, mbong ziouc cuotv douz-sioux.
104.16: Ziouv  nyei ndiangx duqv wuom gaux, se yiem Le^mbaa^norn ninh zuangx nyei si^ndaa zongh ndiangx.

62.12: O Ziouv aah! Se dongh meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh. Weic zuqc meih ziux gorqv-mienh zoux nyei winh zingh nyeic bun mienh.
62.5: Yie nyei hnyouv sekv nzieqc nyei zuov Tin-Hungh ganh nduqc dauh hnangv, weic zuqc se ninh bun yie maaih lamh hnamv dorngx.
62.11: Tin-Hungh gorngv nzunc, yie duqv haiz i nzunc, se domh qaqv benx Tin-Hungh nyei.
62.3: Meih mbuo zuangx mienh oix mborqv oix baaic waaic yietc laanh mienh ndongc haaix lauh? Ninh hnangv zingh laatc laih mingh, yaac hnangv laatc nor tong huv nzengc.
62.10: Maiv dungx bangc niouv mienh nyei sic weic duqv nyaanh, yaac maiv dungx hnamv kaux caangv daaih nyei ga'naaiv. Se gorngv butv zoih camv jienv faaux yaac maiv dungx bungx hnyouv.
62.2: Kungx ninh ganh zoux yie nyei La'bieiv yaac zoux yie nyei Njoux En. Ninh se yie wuonv nyei dorngx, yie maiv zuqc ndanc dongz.
62.1: Yie nyei hnyouv sekv nzieqc nyei zuov Tin-Hungh ganh nduqc dauh hnangv. Yie nyei njoux en yiem ninh daaih.
62.4: Ninh mbuo daav za'eix oix tuix ninh nyei baaih njiec. Ninh mbuo a'hneiv gorngv-baeqc. Ninh mbuo nyei nzuih gorngv buang nyei waac mv baac hnyouv gu'nyuoz kungx zioux hnangv. Selaa
62.6: Kungx ninh ganh zoux yie nyei la'bieiv yaac zoux yie nyei njoux en. Ninh se yie wuonv nyei dorngx, yie maiv zuqc ndanc dongz.
62.8: O meih mbuo zuangx baeqc fingx aah! Oix zuqc zanc-zanc kaux Tin-Hungh. Zorqv ganh nyei hnyouv yietc zungv mbuox Ninh. Ninh zoux yie mbuo ndaauh kaux nyei dorngx. Selaa
62.9: Haac horngh mienh beiv tauv yietc nzunc qiex. Zaangc horngh mienh yaac kungx jaav nyei hnangv. Longc tin-baengh dangv nziang ninh mbuo yaac maiv maaih hniev-daauh. I nyungc gapv daaih gauh heng tauv yietc nzunc nyei qiex.
62.7: Tin-Hungh se yie nyei njoux en caux yie nyei njang-laangc. Tin-Hungh yaac zoux yie henv haic nyei la'bieiv, zoux ndaauh kaux nyei dorngx.

105.21: liepc ninh zoux hungh dinc nyei ziouv, bun ninh gunv hungh dinc maaih nyei yietc zungv,
105.15: Ninh gorngv, “Maiv dungx zoux haaix nyungc bun yie longc youh orn daaih nyei mienh, yaac maiv dungx hoic yie nyei douc waac mienh.”
105.23: Nqa'haav I^saa^laa^en daaih taux I^yipv, Yaakopv dingh zepv yiem Haam nyei deic-bung.
105.20: Hungh diex paaiv mienh mingh bungx nqoi ninh, gunv zuangx fingx wuov dauh bungx ninh cuotv,
105.18: Yosepv nyei zaux zuqc hlieqv-limc ndoh jienv mun, yaac zuqc hlieqv-kou kou jienv jaang,
105.33: Ninh mborqv waaic ninh mbuo nyei a'ngunc hmei caux ngongh nyorx ndiangx, mborqv ninh mbuo nyei deic-bung nyei ndiangx nauv nzengc.
105.43: Ninh dorh ninh nyei baeqc fingx njien-youh nyei cuotv, dorh jienv ninh ginv daaih nyei mienh baaux jienv nzung mingh.
105.22: bun ninh sueih eix njaaux hungh diex nyei jien, njaaux hungh diex nyei mienh gox maaih cong-mengh.
105.42: weic zuqc ninh jangx ninh caux ninh nyei bou, Apc^laa^ham, laengz nyei cing-nzengc waac.
105.31: Ninh gorngv ziouc maaih mungz faanv, maaih gaeng-mbung faanv buangv deic-bung.
105.4: Oix zuqc zimh lorz Ziouv caux ninh nyei qaqv, zanc-zanc oix yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien.
105.29: Ninh bun ninh mbuo nyei wuom benx nziaamv, bun ninh mbuo nyei mbiauz daic nzengc.
105.9: se caux Apc^laa^ham liepc nyei ngaengc waac, dongh ninh houv jienv laengz bun I^sakc nyei ngaengc waac.
105.37: Nqa'haav ninh dorh I^saa^laa^en Mienh, caux jienv jiem nyaanh cuotv, yiem ninh mbuo nyei fingx-fingx maiv maaih haaix dauh mau.
105.3: Oix zuqc weic ninh nyei cing-nzengc mbuox bungx waac-maux. Bun zimh lorz Ziouv nyei mienh nyei hnyouv njien-youh.
105.39: Tin-Hungh bun mbuonx om jienv, lungh muonz zanc bun douz ziux njang.
105.6: Ninh nyei bou, Apc^laa^ham, nyei hoz doic, se ninh ginv daaih nyei mienh, Yaakopv nyei zeiv-fun aah! Oix zuqc jangx jienv ninh zoux liuz wuov deix mbuoqc horngh nyei sic, caux ninh zoux peix fuc nyei sic, caux ninh nyei nzuih siemv nyei waac.
105.8: Ninh jangx ninh laengz nyei ngaengc waac taux yietc liuz, ninh paaiv nyei waac weic yietc cin doic,
105.7: Ninh se Ziouv, yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh. Ninh siemv nyei waac yiem gormx lungh ndiev.
105.32: Ninh bun borqc div mbiungc duih njiec, bun mba'lingc njapc njapc nyei gormx deic-bung.
105.25: Ninh bun win-wangv nyei hnyouv nzorng ninh nyei baeqc fingx, zoux guv guaix nyei sic hoic ninh nyei bou.
105.17: ninh paaiv laanh mienh mingh ndaangc ninh mbuo, se Yosepv, zuqc maaic mingh zoux nouh.
105.12: Ninh mbuo mienh zoqc wuov zanc, se mienh za'gengh zoqc nyei, kungx dingh zepv yiem wuov norm deic-bung hnangv,
105.34: Ninh gorngv yietc joux, jopv-nyeic ziouc daaih, jopv-nyeic lunx saauv maiv hingh,
105.30: Yiem ninh mbuo nyei deic-bung, liemh ninh mbuo nyei hungh dinc gu'nyuoz maaih gaengv buangv nzengc.
105.11: Ninh gorngv, “Yie oix zorqv Kaa^naa^an Deic-Bung jiu bun meih benx meih nzipc nyei buonc.”
105.28: Ninh bun hmuangx daaih om jienv deic-bung, I^yipv Mienh yaac ngaengc ninh nyei waac.
105.44: Ninh zorqv ganh fingx mienh nyei deic-bung jiu bun ninh mbuo. Ninh mbuo duqv nzipc wuov deix mienh ndortv qaqv zoux nyei buonc
105.45: weic bun ninh mbuo gan ninh nyei leiz-nyeic yaac ei nzengc ninh nyei leiz-latc. Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.
105.19: zuov taux ninh gorngv oix cuotv nyei sic cuotv daaih zien.   Ziouv  nyei waac seix ninh.
105.35: nyanc ninh mbuo nyei deic-bung nyei nyungc-nyungc lai-coix, caux yiem lingh deic cuotv nyei gaeng-zuangx.
105.41: Ninh mborqv nqoi la'bieiv, wuom ziouc baetv cuotv liouc jiex deic-bung-huaang benx diuh ndaaih,
105.13: ninh mbuo yiem naaiv norm deic-bung jiex wuov norm deic-bung, yiem yietc norm guoqv mingh taux ganh norm guoqv.
105.40: Ninh mbuo tov, ninh ziouc bun norqc mbunh ndaix daaih, yaac bun laangh ziqc yiem lungh daaih bun ninh mbuo nyanc beuv.
105.26: Ninh paaiv ninh nyei bou, Mose, caux ninh ginv daaih wuov dauh Aalon.
105.14: Ninh maiv bun haaix dauh mienh zeix ninh mbuo, weic ninh mbuo nyei gorn ninh hemx ziex dauh hungh diex.
105.27: Ninh mbuo yiem wuov deix mienh mbu'ndongx zoux jangx-hoc, yiem Haam nyei deic-bung zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.
105.38: Ninh mbuo biaux cuotv, I^yipv Mienh a'hneiv nyei, weic zuqc ninh mbuo gamh nziex haic I^saa^laa^en Mienh.
105.36: Ninh daix yiem ninh mbuo nyei deic-bung gu'nyuoz nyei yietc zungv dorn-la'gauv, se mouz buonc nyei daauh dauh dorn.
105.10: Ninh zorqv naaiv deix ngaengc waac caux Yaakopv liepc benx leiz-nyeic, jiu bun I^saa^laa^en weic zoux yietc liuz nyei ngaengc waac.
105.2: Oix zuqc dorng jienv ninh baaux nzung, baaux nzung ceng ninh. Oix zuqc zunh yaangh ninh zoux yietc zungv mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.
105.1: Oix zuqc dor-ziec Ziouv, oix zuqc jouh ninh nyei mengh, yiem maanc fingx mbu'ndongx zunh yaangh ninh zoux nyei sic.
105.24: Ziouv bun ninh nyei baeqc fingx hiaangx camv, yaac bun ninh mbuo gauh henv jiex ninh mbuo nyei win-wangv.
105.16: Ninh bun wuov norm deic-bung zuqc domh huaang domh ngorc, dongh ninh mbuo kaux nyei laangh ziqc dangx nzengc,

109.21: Mv baac yie nyei Ziouv Tin-Hungh aac, tov weic meih nyei mengh zoux longx bun yie. Weic zuqc meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh se longx haic, tov njoux yie.
109.15: Tov bun naaiv deix zuiz zanc-zanc yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien, mv baac bun yiem naaiv lungh ndiev maiv maaih haaix dauh jangx duqv ninh nyei mbuox.
109.12: Tov maiv dungx bun haaix dauh zoux longx bun ninh, yaac maiv dungx bun haaix dauh korv-lienh ninh nyei guh hanh fu'jueiv.
109.17: Ninh oix zioux, tov bun ninh zioux nyei waac ndortv zuqc ninh ganh. Ninh maiv oix buang waac bun mienh, tov bun fuqv leih ninh go.
109.30: Yie oix longc yie nyei nzuih camv-camv nyei dor-ziec Ziouv.  Yie oix yiem zuangx mienh camv nyei mbu'ndongx ceng ninh,
109.20: Tov Ziouv bun gox yie caux gorngv doqc hoic yie nyei maengc wuov deix, hnangv naaiv nor zuqc daaih weic benx ninh mbuo nyei zingh nyeic.
109.4: Maiv gunv yie hnamv ninh mbuo yaac weic ninh mbuo daux gaux, ninh mbuo gox yie.
109.28: Sueih ninh mbuo zioux, mv baac tov meih ceix fuqv. Tov bun jiez daaih oix mborqv yie wuov deix zuqc nyaiv, yaac tov bun yie, meih nyei bou, a'hneiv.
109.19: Tov bun zioux nyei waac hnangv domh lui buang jienv ninh, yaac hnangv houx-hlaang zanc-zanc sai jienv ninh nyei jaaiv.
109.18: Ninh zorqv zioux nyei waac dorngx lui zuqv, tov bun naaiv deix waac saamx bieqc ninh nyei sin hnangv wuom, yaac hnangv hmei saamx bieqc ninh nyei mbungv.
109.22: Weic zuqc yie jomc, ga'naanh haic, yie nyei hnyouv gu'nyuoz za'gengh mun haic aqv.
109.23: Yie nyei maengc jiex jienv mingh hnangv lungh maanz-hmuangx nyei dongh linh nor, yie hnangv norm jopv-nyeic zuqc nziaaux buonc mingh.
109.13: Tov bun ninh nyei hoz doic zeiv-fun zutc nzengc. Tov bun ninh nyei mbuox zuqc sortv guangc, maiv bun da'nyeic doic mienh jangx ninh.
109.9: Tov bun ninh nyei fu'jueiv benx guh hanh fu'jueiv, bun ninh nyei auv benx auv-guaav.
109.26: O Ziouv, yie nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Tov tengx yie. Ziux meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh, tov njoux yie.
109.5: Yie zoux longx nyei ninh mbuo winh orqv nyei bun yie, yie hnamv nyei ninh mbuo winh nzorng nyei.
109.27: Tov bun ninh mbuo hiuv duqv naaiv se meih nyei buoz zoux nyei. O Ziouv aac, naaiv se meih zoux nyei sic.
109.14: Tov Ziouv jangx jienv ninh nyei ong-taaix mbuo zoux nyei zuiz. Yaac maiv dungx sortv ninh nyei maa nyei zuiz guangc.
109.3: Ninh mbuo weih gormx yie gorngv nzorng nyei waac yaac mborqv yie mv baac maiv maaih gorn-baengx.
109.7: Siemv nyei ziangh hoc, tov bun ninh zuqc dingc zuiz, tov bun liemh ninh daux gaux nyei waac funx benx zuiz.
109.10: Tov bun ninh nyei naamh nyouz benx njouh huaax mienh youh jienv mingh tov nyanc. Ninh mbuo yiem baaic waaic nyei dorngx, tov bun ninh mbuo zuqc zunc cuotv mingh.
109.2: weic zuqc orqv mienh caux guv guaix nyei mienh gorngv yie. Ninh mbuo longc gorngv-baeqc nyei waac hoic yie.
109.1: O yie ceng nyei Tin-Hungh aac, tov meih maiv dungx sekv-sekv nyei yiem,
109.31: weic zuqc ninh souv jienv mienh jomc mienh nyei mbiaauc maengx, weic njoux ninh mbuo biaux ndutv dingc bun ninh mbuo zuqc daix daic wuov deix.
109.6: Tov paaiv dauh orqv mienh daaih caux ninh doix-dekc, bun dauh ninh ganh nyei win-wangv gox ninh.
109.8: Tov bun ninh nyei siouc nyuonh nangv, bun ganh dauh duqv ninh nyei weic.
109.24: Yie zei maiv nyanc haaix nyungc cingh mborqc ziouc mau. Yie nyei sin zaangc jaic jienv njiec.
109.25: Gox yie wuov deix kungx huotv yie hnangv. Ninh mbuo buatc yie, ninh mbuo huangx m'nqorngv.
109.29: Tov bun gox yie wuov deix zuqc buang hmien diev nyaiv, bun ninh mbuo baaic hmien beiv hnangv buix domh lui-ndaauv nor.
109.11: Tov bun zaeqv-ziouv daaih zorqv ninh maaih nyei yietc zungv, tov bun dongh ninh maiv hiuv nyei mienh daaih caangv ninh ndortv qaqv duqv daaih nyei ga'naaiv.
109.16: Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz maiv hnamv taux zoux longx bun mienh, zungv zoux doqc hoic mienh jomc mienh, ndortv naanc mienh, caux hnyouv mun nyei mienh, bun ninh mbuo zuqc daic.

136.21: Ninh zorqv ninh mbuo nyei deic-bung bun ninh nyei baeqc fingx nzipc,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.15: Ninh zorqv Faalo Hungh caux ninh nyei baeng-guanh mbienv njiec Koiv-Siqv.   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.12: Ninh sung cuotv ninh domh qaqv nyei buoz,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.17: Ninh daix domh hungh diex,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.20: Ninh aengx daix Mbaasaan Deic nyei Okc Hungh,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.4: Kungx ninh ganh zoux domh mbuoqc horngh nyei sic,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.19: Ninh daix Aa^mo^lai Mienh nyei Si^honx Hungh,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.18: Ninh daix ziex dauh maaih mengh hoc nyei hungh,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.22: Se jiu bun ninh nyei bou, I^saa^laa^en Mienh, nzipc nyei buonc,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.23: Yie mbuo ndortv njiec zuqc kouv nyei ziangh hoc ninh jangx yie mbuo,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.13: Ninh bun nqoi Koiv-Siqv nyei wuom,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.9: Ninh zeix hlaax caux hleix gunv lungh muonz zanc,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.26: Oix zuqc dor-ziec lungh zaangc nyei Tin-Hungh,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.5: Ninh longc ninh ganh nyei wuonh zaang zeix lungh,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.14: Ninh dorh I^saa^laa^en Mienh yangh koiv mbu'ndongx jiex   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.3: Oix zuqc dor-ziec maanc ziouv nyei Ziouv,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.7: Ninh zeix domh njang cuotv daaih,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.10: Ninh daix I^yipv Mienh nyei dorn-la'gauv,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.2: Oix zuqc dor-ziec maanc zienh nyei Zienh,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.1: Meih mbuo oix zuqc dor-ziec Ziouv weic zuqc ninh longx haic.   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.6: Ninh ceix ndau yiem wuom-minc gu'nguaaic,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.8: Ninh zeix mba'hnoi gunv lungh hnoi zanc,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.24: Ninh njoux yie mbuo biaux ndutv win-wangv,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.25: Ninh ceix nyanc hopv bun maaih maengc nyei ga'naaiv,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.11: Ninh dorh I^saa^laa^en Mienh yiem ninh mbuo mbu'ndongx cuotv daaih,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
136.16: Mv baac ninh yienz ganh nyei baeqc fingx jiex deic-bung-huaang,   Weic zuqc ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.

86.15: Mv baac Ziouv aac, meih se korv-lienh mienh, ceix en bun mienh nyei Tin-Hungh. Meih maiv qiex jiez siepv, maaih hnyouv zien-zien hnamv mienh, yaac ziepc zuoqv nyei.
86.12: O Ziouv, yie nyei Tin-Hungh aac, yie longc nzengc hnyouv dor-ziec meih. Yie oix yietc liuz ceng meih nyei mbuox.
86.13: Weic zuqc meih ziepc zuoqv hnamv mienh nyei hnyouv se hlo haic. Meih yaac njoux yie, bun yie maiv zuqc mingh yiemh gen, ndo haic nyei dorngx.
86.5: O Ziouv aac, meih se longx haic yaac maaih hnyouv guangc mienh nyei zuiz. Meih ziepc zuoqv nyei zien-zien hnamv yietc zungv heuc jienv jouh meih nyei mienh.
86.11: O Ziouv aac, tov meih njaaux yie hiuv duqv meih nyei jauv weic bun yie haih ei meih nyei zien leiz yangh. Tov bun yie zunv dingc hnyouv, weic taaih meih nyei mbuox.
86.14: Tin-Hungh aac, zoux maux nyei mienh cuotv daaih oix hoic yie. Maaih guanh mienh doqc mienh oix zorqv yie nyei maengc. Ninh mbuo yaac maiv zorqv meih an jienv ninh mbuo nyei nza'hmien.
86.3: O Ziouv aac, tov korv-lienh yie, weic zuqc yie ziangh hnoi heuc jienv tov meih.
86.10: Weic zuqc meih za'gengh hlo haic yaac zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic. Kungx meih ganh se Tin-Hungh.
86.2: Tov beu yie nyei maengc weic zuqc yie gan longx meih. Tov njoux yie, meih nyei bou. Yie sienx kaux meih. Meih zoux yie nyei Tin-Hungh.
86.1: O Ziouv aac, tov meih baeng m'normh muangx yie yaac dau yie, weic zuqc yie jomc yaac dangx-donx.
86.4: O Ziouv aac, tov bun yie, meih nyei bou, nyei hnyouv maaih njien-youh, weic zuqc yie nyei hnyouv kaux meih maaih lamh hnamv dorngx.
86.6: O Ziouv aac, tov baeng m'normh muangx yie daux gaux nyei waac. Tov muangx haiz yie qaqv heuc jienv jouh nyei sing-qiex.
86.8: O Ziouv aac, yiem yietc zungv zienh mbu'ndongx, maiv maaih haaix dauh hnangv meih. Meih zoux nyei gong, maiv maaih haaix nyungc haih beiv duqv.
86.9: O Ziouv aac, meih zeix daaih nyei maanc guoqv maanc fingx oix daaih yiem meih nyei nza'hmien gueic njiec baaix, yaac oix ceng meih nyei mengh.
86.7: Buangh zuqc kouv naanc nyei hnoi-nyieqc yie heuc meih, weic zuqc meih dau yie.
86.17: Tov biux mengh meih zoux longx weic bun nzorng yie wuov deix mienh buatc ziouc nyaiv. Weic zuqc Ziouv aac, meih tengx yie yaac orn yie nyei hnyouv.
86.16: Tov huin nzuonx korv-lienh yie, tov ceix meih nyei qaqv bun yie, meih nyei bou, yaac njoux meih nyei m'sieqv bou nyei dorn.

57.11: O Tin-Hungh aac, tov bun mienh taaih meih gauh hlang jiex lungh. Tov bun meih nyei njang-laangc yiem buangv lungh ndiev.
57.10: Meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh mbaengc lungh hlang. Meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnyouv yaac mbaengc mbuonx hlang.
57.2: Yie heuc Yiem Hlang Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh, se weic yie zoux ziangx nyungc-nyungc sic nyei Tin-Hungh.
57.1: Tin-Hungh aah! Tov korv-lienh yie. Tov! korv-lienh yie maah! Weic zuqc yie ndaauh kaux meih. Yie ndaauh kaux meih, yiem meih nyei ndaatv-ndiev nyei dongh linh zuov domh zeqc naanc jiex nzengc.
57.5: O Tin-Hungh aac, tov bun mienh taaih meih gauh hlang jiex lungh. Tov bun meih nyei njang-laangc yiem buangv lungh ndiev.
57.6: Ninh mbuo zaeng mungz yie nyei zaux caaiv nyei dorngx. Yie zuqc naanc zingh ngatv jienv yie nyei hnyouv. Ninh mbuo wetv kuotv yie yangh nyei jauv, mv baac ninh mbuo ganh ndortv njiec. Selaa
57.8: Yie nyei hnyouv aah! Nyie daaih maah! Domh daanh baah, fiuv-daanh baah aah! Nyie daaih maah! Yie oix bun mba'hnoi nyie daaih.
57.9: O Ziouv aac, yie oix yiem maanc fingx mbu'ndongx dor-ziec meih, yie oix yiem maanc guoqv mbu'ndongx baaux nzung ceng meih.
57.4: Yie bueix jienv sienh mbu'ndongx, se naqv baamh mienh nyei sienh. Ninh mbuo nyei nyaah se hnangv cang caux forng nor. Ninh mbuo nyei mbietc yaac hnangv nzuqc ndaauv nor laic.
57.3: Ninh oix yiem gu'nguaaic lungh dau yie, njoux yie. Ninh oix bun zeix yie wuov deix zuqc nyaiv. Selaa Tin-Hungh oix bun cing ninh ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv yie yaac zoux hnyouv zingx.
57.7: O Tin-Hungh aac, yie nyei hnyouv kaux wuonv. Yie nyei hnyouv kaux wuonv. Yie oix baaux nzung, oix baaux nzung ceng meih.

119.52: O Ziouv aac, yie jangx duqv meih loz-hnoi bun daaih nyei leiz, ziouc orn yie nyei hnyouv.
119.91: Ziux meih hatc nyei waac yietc zungv yiem jienv taux ih hnoi weic zuqc maanc muotc se benx meih nyei bou.
119.89: O Ziouv aac, meih nyei waac yiem lungh gu'nguaaic liepc wuonv taux yietc liuz.
119.87: Ninh mbuo kaav deix mietc yie, bun yie maiv maaih maengc yiem lungh ndiev, mv baac yie maiv guangc meih hatc nyei waac.
119.72: Meih nyei nzuih gorngv cuotv nyei leiz-latc weic yie gauh maaih lamh longc jiex cin-cin waanc-waanc jiem nyaanh. Yotv
119.150: Daav orqv za'eix zeix yie wuov deix mienh taux fatv aqv. Ninh mbuo leih go meih nyei leiz-latc.
119.86: Meih nyei yietc zungv lingc kaux duqv wuonv nyei. Ninh mbuo gorngv-baeqc hoic yie, tov tengx yie.
119.165: Hnamv meih nyei leiz nyei mienh duqv baengh orn camv, yaac maiv maaih haaix nyungc haih bun ninh mbuo ndiqv zuqc ndorpc.
119.120: Yie sin zinx weic zuqc yie gamh nziex meih. Yie yaac gamh nziex meih siemv nyei waac. Aayin
119.124: Tov meih ziux meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh dorh meih nyei bou, yaac tov njaaux meih nyei leiz-nyeic yie.
119.164: Weic meih baengh fim nyei leiz yie yietc hnoi ceng meih siec nzunc.
119.32: Yie oix tiux gan jienv meih nyei lingc nyei jauv, weic zuqc meih bun yie bieqc hnyouv camv jienv faaux. He
119.175: Tov bun yie duqv ziangh jienv weic bun yie haih ceng meih, tov bun meih nyei leiz tengx yie.
119.64: O Ziouv aac, meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv lungh ndiev mienh, tov njaaux meih nyei leiz-nyeic yie. Tetc
119.170: Tov bun yie jouh nyei waac taux meih nyei nza'hmien, tov ziux meih nyei waac njoux yie.
119.11: Yie zorqv meih nyei waac zaangh jienv yie nyei hnyouv, weic bun yie maiv baamz zuiz dorngc meih.
119.28: Yie nyei hnyouv nzauh duqv kouv hnangv yuqc nzengc nor, tov ziux meih nyei waac tengx yie henv jiez daaih.
119.54: Yie yiem lungh ndiev dingh zepv nyei dorngx, meih nyei leiz-nyeic benx yie nyei nzung.
119.113: Maaih i diuc hnyouv nyei mienh yie nzorng haic, mv baac yie hnamv meih nyei leiz-latc.
119.167: Yie nyei hnyouv ei jienv meih nyei waac. Yie za'gengh! hnamv haic meih nyei waac.
119.13: Yie oix longc yie nyei nzuih meix zunh yaangh meih nyei nzuih gorngv nyei yietc zungv leiz.
119.40: Yie ngorc meih hatc nyei waac. Weic zuqc meih baengh fim nyei, tov bun yie duqv ziangh jienv. Waau
119.26: Yie gorngv yie zoux nyei jauv, meih yaac dau yie. Tov zorqv meih nyei leiz-nyeic njaaux yie.
119.51: Zoux maux nyei mienh maiv dingh liouh nyei huotv yie, mv baac yie maiv leih nqoi meih nyei leiz-latc.
119.145: O Ziouv aac, yie longc nzengc hnyouv heuc jienv meih. Tov dau yie, yie ziouc ei jienv meih nyei leiz-nyeic.
119.125: Yie se meih nyei bou. Tov bun yie bieqc hnyouv, weic bun yie mengh baeqc meih njaaux nyei waac.
119.71: Yie zuqc kouv se longx nyei, weic bun yie hoqc linc meih nyei leiz-nyeic.
119.151: Mv baac Ziouv aac, meih yiem nitv fatv. Meih nyei yietc zungv lingc yaac zien.
119.21: Meih hemx ceng ganh hlo, se zuqc zioux nyei mienh, dongh yangh pien, leih meih nyei lingc wuov deix.
119.93: Yie yietc liuz maiv la'kuqv meih hatc nyei waac, weic zuqc meih longc meih hatc nyei waac bun yie duqv ziangh jienv.
119.158: Yie buatc maiv ziepc zuoqv nyei mienh ziouc youx haic weic zuqc ninh mbuo maiv ei meih nyei waac.
119.20: Yie gengh! jorm hnyouv zanc-zanc jangx meih nyei leiz, taux mba'nziu zungv oix mbaaix nyei.
119.157: Zeix yie, caux yie doix-dekc nyei mienh camv haic, mv baac yie maiv leih nqoi meih hatc nyei waac.
119.48: Yie taaih meih nyei lingc, se dongh yie hnamv nyei, yie yaac fei-fangv meih nyei leiz-nyeic. Zaa^yin
119.168: Yie ei jienv meih hatc nyei, paaiv nyei waac, weic zuqc yie nyei diuc-diuc jauv yiem meih nyei nza'hmien. Tau
119.153: Tov mangc buatc yie nyei kouv naanc yaac njoux yie, weic zuqc yie maiv la'kuqv meih nyei leiz-latc.
119.18: Tov bun yie nyei m'zing mangc duqv cuotv yiem meih nyei leiz-latc mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.
119.99: Yie gauh hnamv duqv tong yie nyei yietc zungv fin-saeng, weic zuqc yie fei-fangv meih njaaux nyei waac.
119.103: Yie seix liuz meih nyei waac, za'gengh gaam haic, yiem yie nyei nzuih zungv gauh gaam mueiz-dorngh.
119.107: O Ziouv aac, yie za'gengh siouc kouv naanc hniev haic, tov meih ziux meih nyei waac bun yie duqv ziangh jienv.
119.118: Meih nqemh maiv ei meih nyei leiz-nyeic nyei mienh. Ninh mbuo guv guaix nyei za'eix se maiv lamh longc.
119.154: Tov tengx mbenc yie nyei sic yaac zuoqc yie. Ziux meih laengz nyei waac tov bun yie duqv ziangh jienv.
119.75: O Ziouv aac, yie hiuv duqv meih siemv nyei waac se baengh fim nyei, yaac hiuv duqv yie zuqc siouc kouv se meih ziepc zuoqv nyei zoux.
119.37: Tov maiv dungx bun yie huin mangc maiv lamh longc nyei sic. Tov bun yie yiem meih nyei jauv duqv ziangh maengc.
119.97: O yie za'gengh hnamv meih nyei leiz-latc, yie ziangh hnoi maiv dingh liouh nyei fei-fangv.
119.5: Tov bun yie nyei jauv wuonv, haih gan longx meih nyei leiz-nyeic.
119.126: Ziouv dingc zuiz nyei ziangh hoc taux aqv, weic zuqc mienh baamz meih nyei leiz-latc.
119.62: Ndaamv muonz yie jiez sin daaih ceng meih, weic meih baengh fim nyei leiz.
119.176: Yie mingh dorngc jauv hnangv ba'gi yungh dingx laaih nor, tov daaih lorz meih nyei bou, weic zuqc yie maiv la'kuqv meih nyei lingc.
119.136: Yie nyei wuom-mueic liouc njiec hnangv ndoqv nor, weic zuqc mienh maiv ei meih nyei leiz-latc. Zaa^nde
119.57: Ziouv  benx yie nyei buonc, yie laengz ei jienv meih nyei waac.
119.8: Yie oix gan meih nyei leiz-nyeic. Tov yietc liuz maiv dungx guangc ziangh yie. Mbetc
119.161: Zoux hlo nyei mienh maiv longc leiz nyei hoic yie, mv baac yie nyei hnyouv gamh nziex nyei se meih nyei waac.
119.137: O Ziouv  aac, meih se baengh fim nyei, meih nyei leiz-latc yaac zingx nyei.
119.133: Tov meih longc meih nyei waac bun yie nyei zaux-mbiec haih caaiv duqv jienv, yaac maiv dungx bun haaix nyungc zuiz gunv yie.
119.82: Yie zuov gau meih ei meih laengz nyei waac zoux, m'zing zungv mbuov mi'aqv. Yie naaic gaax, “Meih haaix zanc cingx orn yie nyei hnyouv?”
119.69: Zoux maux nyei mienh gorngv-baeqc hoic yie, mv baac yie longc nzengc hnyouv gan meih hatc nyei waac.
119.30: Yie ginv ziepc zuoqv nyei jauv yangh. Yie zorqv meih nyei leiz an jienv yie nyei nza'hmien.
119.95: Orqv mienh zuov jienv oix daix yie, mv baac yie oix samx mangc meih nyei leiz-latc.
119.44: Yie oix zanc-zanc ei jienv meih nyei leiz-latc taux yietc liuz yietc seix.
119.35: Tov dorh yie gan meih nyei lingc nyei jauv, weic zuqc naaiv diuh jauv yie a'hneiv haic.
119.171: Yie nyei nzuih meix oix gorngv cuotv ceng nyei waac, weic zuqc meih njaaux meih nyei leiz-nyeic yie.
119.60: Yie siepv-siepv nyei gan meih nyei lingc, zungv maiv ngaih.
119.140: Meih laengz nyei waac seix liuz, hiuv duqv kaux duqv wuonv nyei, yie, meih nyei bou, yaac hnamv haic.
119.55: O Ziouv aac, yie lungh muonz zanc jangx meih nyei mengh, yaac ei jienv meih nyei leiz-latc.
119.41: O Ziouv aac, tov bun cing meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv yie, tov ziux meih laengz nyei waac njoux yie.
119.115: Zoux orqv nyei mienh aah! Biaux nqoi yie maah! Weic bun yie haih gan longx yie nyei Tin-Hungh hatc nyei lingc.
119.106: Yie houv jienv liepc ngaengc waac yaac laengz ei jienv baengh fim nyei leiz zoux.
119.108: O Ziouv aac, tov zipv yie nyei nzuih ceng nyei waac benx ziec nyei ga'naaiv, yaac njaaux yie hiuv duqv meih nyei leiz.
119.121: Yie zoux nyei se baengh fim, horpc nyei. Tov maiv dungx guangc yie yiem zeix yie wuov deix nyei buoz-ndiev.
119.163: Yie nzorng haic, youx haic yietc zungv gorngv-baeqc nyei waac, mv baac yie hnamv haic meih nyei leiz-latc.
119.36: Tov bun yie maaih hnyouv oix longc meih njaaux nyei waac, maiv zeiz kungx douh leic zinh.
119.98: Meih nyei lingc zanc-zanc yiem yie nyei hnyouv, ziouc bun yie maaih cong-mengh gauh camv yie nyei win-wangv.
119.2: Gan longx ninh gorngv nyei waac, se longc nzengc hnyouv lorz ninh wuov deix, maaih orn-lorqc.
119.162: Yie weic meih nyei waac a'hneiv, hnangv mienh duqv caangv daaih nyei ga'naaiv camv nor.
119.134: Tov tengx yie biaux ndutv zeix yie wuov deix mienh, weic bun yie haih ei jienv meih hatc nyei waac.
119.143: Yie zuqc doh naanc, nzauh kouv, mv baac meih nyei lingc bun yie njien-youh.
119.24: Meih njaaux nyei yietc zungv waac bun yie a'hneiv, yaac zoux yie caangh laangh nyei mienh. Ndaa^letv
119.141: Yie zoux faix, zuqc mienh mangc piex, mv baac yie maiv la'kuqv meih hatc nyei waac.
119.43: Tov meih maiv dungx zorqv zien leiz nyei waac cuotv nzengc yie nyei nzuih, weic zuqc meih nyei leiz bun yie maaih lamh hnamv dorngx.
119.88: Meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh ziouc tov siex cuotv yie nyei maengc weic bun yie haih ei jienv meih nyei nzuih gorngv nyei waac. Laa^metv
119.146: Yie heuc jienv meih, tov njoux yie, weic bun yie haih ei jienv meih njaaux nyei waac.
119.100: Beiv mienh gox mienh yie gauh mengh baeqc weic zuqc yie ei jienv meih hatc nyei waac.
119.15: Yie oix fei-fangv meih hatc nyei waac yaac mangc dingc meih nyei jauv-louc.
119.56: Yie ei jienv meih hatc nyei waac zoux. Naaiv se yie nyei orn-lorqc. Hetc
119.152: Yie weic hoqc meih njaaux nyei waac hiuv duqv lauh aqv, meih njaaux nyei waac yietc liuz liepc wuonv. Letv
119.63: Da'faanh taaih meih, ei jienv meih hatc nyei waac zoux wuov deix, yie caux ninh mbuo zoux doic.
119.111: Meih njaaux nyei waac se yie yietc liuz nzipc nyei buonc, yaac bun yie nyei hnyouv a'hneiv haic.
119.33: O Ziouv aac, tov njaaux yie gan meih nyei leiz-nyeic, yie ziouc gan meih taux daauh taux mueiz.
119.116: Tov ziux meih laengz nyei waac baav jienv yie, bun yie duqv ziangh jienv. Yie maaih lamh hnamv nyei yaac tov maiv dungx bungx ndortv weic bun yie maiv zuqc nyaiv.
119.122: Tov beu jienv meih nyei bou bun yie duqv longx, maiv dungx bun zoux maux nyei mienh zeix yie.
119.42: Yie ziouc maaih waac dau huotv yie wuov deix mienh, weic zuqc yie kaux meih nyei waac.
119.173: Tov liuc leiz ziangx meih nyei buoz tengx yie, weic zuqc yie ginv liuz meih hatc nyei waac.
119.4: Meih zorqv meih hatc nyei waac paaiv bun yie mbuo jienh ei jienv zoux.
119.29: Tov meih bun yie leih nqoi jaav nyei jauv yaac nqoi eix njaaux meih nyei leiz-latc yie.
119.172: Yie nyei mbietc oix baaux nzung gorngv meih nyei waac, weic zuqc meih nyei yietc zungv lingc se baengh fim nyei.
119.80: Tov bun yie nyei hnyouv ei jienv meih nyei leiz-nyeic yaac maiv maaih dorngx nqemh, weic bun yie maiv zuqc nyaiv. Kapv
119.129: Meih njaaux nyei waac gengh peix fuc haic, weic naaiv yie longc hnyouv gan jienv mingh.
119.169: O Ziouv aac, tov bun yie heuc nyei sing-qiex taux meih nyei nza'hmien, yaac ziux meih nyei waac bun yie bieqc hnyouv.
119.142: Meih se baengh fim nyei, yaac yietc liuz baengh fim. Meih nyei leiz-latc yaac zien.
119.73: Meih nyei buoz zeix yie daaih aengx liepc yie, tov bun yie bieqc hnyouv weic bun yie duqv hoqc linc meih nyei lingc.
119.147: Lungh maiv gaengh njang yie jiez sin heuc meih tengx. Yie kaux meih nyei waac maaih lamh hnamv dorngx.
119.76: Tov ziux meih laengz bun meih nyei bou nyei waac longc meih ziepc zuoqv hnamv mienh nyei hnyouv orn yie nyei hnyouv.
119.3: Naaiv nyungc mienh maiv zoux dorngc haaix nyungc, ninh mbuo kungx yangh Ziouv nyei jauv hnangv.
119.160: Meih nyei waac nzutv zunv gorngv se zien leiz, meih nyei yietc zungv gong-fim nyei leiz yietc liuz yiem. Sin
119.149: Ziux meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh tov muangx yie nyei qiex. O Ziouv aac, tov ziux meih nyei leiz beu yie nyei maengc.
119.139: Yie nyei hnyouv qiex jiez haic hnangv douz buov jienv nor, weic zuqc yie nyei win-wangv la'kuqv meih nyei waac.
119.46: Yie oix yiem hungh diex nyei nza'hmien gorngv meih hatc nyei waac, yie zungv maiv zuqc nyaiv,
119.166: O Ziouv aac, yie zuov jienv meih njoux yie, yie yaac ei meih hatc nyei lingc zoux.
119.25: Yie nyei maengc se hnangv zuqc njiec taux nie-mbung. Tov ziux meih nyei waac tengx yie nyei maengc aengx fingv jiez daaih.
119.47: weic zuqc yie a'hneiv meih nyei lingc, se dongh yie hnamv nyei.
119.61: Maiv gunv orqv mienh zaeng hlaang ndoh yie, yie zungv maiv la'kuqv meih nyei leiz-latc.
119.12: O Ziouv  aac, yie ceng meih. Tov njaaux meih nyei leiz-nyeic yie.
119.65: O Ziouv  aac, meih ziux meih nyei waac zoux longx bun meih nyei bou.
119.39: Tov tengx yie leih nqoi gamh nziex zuqc nyaiv nyei sic, weic zuqc meih nyei leiz se longx haic.
119.90: Doic jiex doic meih se ziepc zuoqv nyei. Meih liepc baamh gen daaih, baamh gen ziouc yiem jienv taux ih zanc.
119.19: Yie yiem lungh ndiev zoux dingh zepv dangh baav nyei mienh, tov maiv dungx zorqv meih nyei lingc bingx yie.
119.9: Houh saeng mienh oix zuqc hnangv haaix nor goux duqv ninh ganh nyei jauv cing-nzengc? Se oix zuqc ei jienv meih nyei waac zoux.
119.96: Yie buatc maanc sic maaih ninh nyei soux mouc, mv baac meih nyei lingc za'gengh! jangv haic. Mem
119.70: Ninh mbuo nyei hnyouv hngongx, mv baac yie a'hneiv meih nyei leiz-latc.
119.77: Tov meih korv-lienh yie, bun yie duqv ziangh jienv, weic zuqc meih nyei leiz-latc bun yie a'hneiv.
119.81: Yie nyei hnyouv za'gengh zuov jienv oix duqv meih nyei njoux en, yie kaux meih nyei waac maaih lamh hnamv dorngx.
119.14: Yie a'hneiv meih gorngv nyei waac ndongc a'hneiv yietc zungv zinh zoih.
119.27: Tov meih tengx yie mengh baeqc meih hatc nyei waac, yie ziouc fei-fangv meih zoux nyei mbuoqc horngh sic.
119.74: Taaih meih wuov deix mienh buatc yie ziouc a'hneiv haic, weic zuqc yie kaux meih nyei waac maaih lamh hnamv dorngx.
119.49: Jangx jienv meih caux meih nyei bou laengz nyei waac, weic zuqc meih nyei waac bun yie maaih lamh hnamv dorngx.
119.138: Meih dingc daaih nyei leiz-nyeic se horpc nyei, yaac baengh fim nzengc.

102.9: Yie nyanc saaiv dorngx hnaangx, yie hopv nyei ga'naaiv yaac zorpc jienv wuom-mueic,
102.26: Lungh ndau zungv oix zuqc mietc, mv baac meih corc yiem jienv. Lungh caux ndau oix hnangv lui-houx nor, pei nzengc. Meih oix yienc lungh ndau hnangv yienc lui-houx, lungh ndau ziouc jiex nzengc aqv.

6.10: Yie nyei yietc zungv win-wangv oix zuqc nyaiv, gamh nziex duqv kouv haic. Ninh mbuo oix zuqc tuix nzuonx, ndongc nziepv dangh m'zing zuqc nyaiv aqv.

84.1: O Nernh Jiex nyei Ziouv  aac, yie hnamv haic meih yiem nyei dorngx.

17.12: Ninh mbuo hnangv sienh nor, oix betv yie, yaac hnangv sienh lunx bingx jienv mbueiz nyei dorngx oix hoic yie.
17.13: Ziouv aah! Tov daaih caux ninh mbuo mborqv jaax, bun ninh mbuo zuqc suei. Tov longc meih nyei nzuqc ndaauv njoux yie nyei maengc biaux ndutv orqv mienh.
17.5: Yie nyei zaux-mbiec kungx gan meih nyei jauv mingh, yie nyei zaux yaac maiv caaiv piatv.
17.11: Ninh mbuo zimh jienv yie mingh, ih zanc weih gormx yie. Ninh mbuo bungx m'zing cienh mangc, fongv yie king njiec ndau.
17.14: O Ziouv aah! Tov longc meih nyei buoz njoux yie leih ndutv dongh yiem naaiv seix zaangc duqv liuz ninh mbuo nyei buonc nyei mienh. Tov bun dongh meih weic ninh mbuo siou daaih nyei buangv ninh mbuo nyei ga'sie. Tov bun ninh mbuo nyei dorn-jueiv duqv gaux nzengc. Zengc njiec wuov deix liouh njiec bun ninh mbuo nyei fu'jueiv.
17.3: Meih zungv kauv yie nyei hnyouv, lungh muonz zanc yaac zaah yie, meih seix liuz yie, meih maiv buatc yie dorngc haaix nyungc. Yie nyei nzuih yaac maiv gorngv orqv nyei sic.
17.10: Ninh mbuo nyei hnyouv maiv korv-lienh mienh, ninh mbuo nyei nzuih gorngv waac-maux.
17.2: Tov meih bun cing yie se maiv dorngc, tov bun meih nyei m'zing mangc buatc haaix nyungc se horpc.
17.1: O Ziouv aah! Tov meih muangx haiz yie tov baengh fim nyei jauv. Tov muangx yie heuc jienv gorngv. Baeng m'normh muangx yie daux gaux nyei waac, se maiv zeiz yiem gorngv-baeqc nduov mienh nyei nzuih gorngv nyei waac.
17.4: Gorngv taux mienh zoux nyei sic, yie bangc meih nyei nzuih gorngv nyei waac. Yie simv jienv, maiv gan zoux doqc nyei mienh nyei jauv.
17.6: O Tin-Hungh aah! Yie jouh meih weic zuqc meih zungv oix dau yie. Tov baeng m'normh muangx yie nyei waac.
17.8: Tov beu yie hnangv beu meih nyei m'zing-mienh nor, tov bun yie bingx yiem meih nyei ndaatv-ndiev,
17.9: bun yie biaux ndutv zeix yie wuov deix orqv mienh nyei buoz-ndiev caux weih gormx oix hoic yie nyei maengc wuov deix win-wangv.
17.7: Meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh, tov bun meih hnamv nyei jauv hinc cuotv daaih. Meih nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz njoux ndaauh kaux meih wuov deix biaux ndutv ninh mbuo nyei win-wangv.

16.11: Meih oix bun yie hiuv duqv ziangh maengc nyei jauv. Yiem meih nyei nza'hmien meih bun yie maaih njien-youh taux daauh. Yiem meih nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz maaih yietc liuz nyei orn-lorqc.
16.10: weic zuqc meih maiv guangc yie yiem yiemh gen, yaac maiv bun meih nyei Cing-Nzengc Mienh zuqc huv.
16.2: Yie gorngv mbuox Ziouv, “Meih zoux yie nyei Ziouv, cuotv liuz meih yie maiv maaih haaix nyungc longx.”
16.1: O Tin-Hungh aac, tov meih beu jienv yie, weic zuqc yie ndaauh kaux meih.
16.5: Ziouv  se yie nzipc nyei buonc, dongh meih paaiv ziangx bun yie nyei buonc. Yie oix duqv nyei buonc meih tengx yie goux.
16.6: Longc hlaang ndorqc bun yie nyei gapv-jaaix ndortv zuqc kuh yiem nyei dorngx. Yie duqv nzipc longx haic nyei buonc.
16.8: Yie zanc-zanc bun Ziouv yiem yie nyei nza'hmien. Weic zuqc ninh yiem yie nyei mbiaauc maengx maiv maaih haaix nyungc ging-dongz yie.
16.9: Weic naaiv yie nyei hnyouv njien-youh a'hneiv haic. Yie nyei sin yaac yiem duqv wuonv nyei,
16.4: Ginv gan nyiec nyei zienh wuov deix jaa nzauh camv. Ninh mbuo dox ziec zienh nyei nziaamv, yie maiv dox. Yie nyei nzuih meix yaac maiv gorngv cuotv naaiv deix zienh nyei mbuox.
16.3: Yiem baamh gen nyei cing-nzengc baeqc fingx, se gauh longx jiex, dongh yie gauh a'hneiv jiex nyei mienh.
16.7: Yie oix ceng Ziouv weic zuqc ninh dorh yie. Lungh muonz zanc yie nyei hnyouv yaac njaaux yie.

133.3: Se hnangv Hemon Mbong nyei mbiungc-suiv duih njiec Si^on Mbong. Weic zuqc yiem wuov maaih Ziouv ceix nyei fuqv, se yietc liuz ziangh nyei maengc.
133.2: Naaiv beiv jaaix haic nyei youh dox jienv Aalon nyei m'nqorngv aengx liouc njiec siaam, aengx liouc njiec taux ninh nyei lui-ndaauv nyei lui-jaang.
133.1: Mangc maah! Gorx-youz horpc fim dongh eix nyei yiem se za'gengh longx nyei, orn-lorqc haic.

82.2: “Meih mbuo oix longc maiv baengh fim nyei leiz siemv yaac bouc orqv mienh nyei leiz ndongc haaix lauh? Selaa
82.1: Tin-Hungh yiem lungh zaangc nyei wuic zueiz ninh nyei weic, yiem zuangx zienh mbu'ndongx dunx sic. Ninh gorngv,
82.5: “Ninh mbuo maiv hiuv yaac maiv mengh baeqc, ninh mbuo yiem hmuangx yangh mingh yangh daaih. Baamh gen nyei gorn-ndoqv zungv zuqc ndanc dongz nzengc.
82.6: “Yie gorngv, ‘Meih mbuo se zienh. Meih mbuo yietc zungv zoux Yiem Hlang Jiex Wuov Dauh nyei dorn.’
82.8: O Tin-Hungh aac. Tov meih daaih siemv lungh ndiev, weic zuqc maanc guoqv benx meih nyei.
82.4: Oix zuqc njoux mau nyei caux jomc kouv nyei mienh, tengx ninh mbuo biaux ndutv orqv mienh nyei buoz-ndiev.
82.3: Oix zuqc baengh fim nyei tengx mau nyei mienh caux guh hanh fu'jueiv yaac bouc doh naanc caux guh hanh fu'jueiv nyei leiz.
82.7: Mv baac meih mbuo oix zuqc daic hnangv baamh mienh nor, yaac king njiec hnangv zuangx jien mbu'ndongx nyei yietc dauh.”

69.21: Ninh mbuo zorqv daamv dorngx nyanc hopv bun yie. Yie jaang nqaatv ninh mbuo bun a'ngunc diuv-sui yie hopv.
69.15: Tov maiv dungx bun wuom yiemx yie, fai bun wuom-ndo naqv yie, fai bun yie zuqc yiem yiemh gen.
69.12: Zueiz jienv zingh gaengh ndaangc nyei mienh kuanv yie, diuv nquin nyei mienh yaac dorh yie zoux nzung baaux.
69.17: Maiv dungx bingx meih nyei hmien, maiv mangc meih nyei bou. Yie zuqc kouv, tov siepv-siepv nyei dau yie.
69.30: Yie oix baaux nzung ceng Tin-Hungh nyei mengh, yie oix dor-ziec, ceng ninh weih hlo.
69.20: Yie zuqc mienh huotv, yie nyei hnyouv za'gengh mun haic, yie ziouc haiz suei aqv. Yie lorz mienh korv-lienh yie, yaac maiv maaih yietc dauh. Lorz mienh orn hnyouv, yaac lorz maiv duqv haaix dauh.
69.4: Nzorng yie yaac maiv maaih gorn-baengx wuov deix mienh gauh camv yie nyei m'nqorngv nyei mba'biei. Maiv maaih gorn-baengx mv baac oix hoic yie nyei maengc wuov deix win-wangv henv haic, maiv zeiz yie nimc nyei ga'naaiv ih zanc yie oix zuqc fungx nzuonx fai?
69.28: Tov sortv ninh mbuo nyei mbuox cuotv ziangh maengc daan, yaac maiv dungx faaux ninh mbuo nyei mbuox yiem kuv mienh nyei daan.
69.33: Weic zuqc Ziouv muangx dangx-donx nyei mienh, ninh maiv mangc piex ninh nyei baeqc fingx, se zuqc wuonx loh wuov deix.
69.35: Weic zuqc Tin-Hungh oix njoux Si^on, aengx liepc Yu^ndaa nyei zingh jiez daaih. Ninh nyei baeqc fingx oix yiem naaic weih benx ninh mbuo nyei buonc.
69.19: Meih hiuv duqv yie zuqc mienh huotv, zuqc nyaiv, zuqc baaic hmien. Meih yaac hiuv duqv yie nyei yietc zungv win-wangv.
69.34: Tov lungh caux ndau caux koiv caux yiem naaiv deix yietc zungv gu'nyuoz haih dongz nyei ga'naaiv ceng ninh.
69.18: Tov daaih nitv fatv yie, zuoqc yie, njoux yie biaux ndutv yie nyei win-wangv.
69.22: Tov bun ninh mbuo nyei yinh wuic benx koux hlopv ninh mbuo, bun ninh mbuo baengh orn yiem nyei ziangh hoc zoux hlaang hlopv ninh mbuo.
69.23: Tov bun ninh mbuo nyei m'zing mbuov, mangc maiv buatc, yaac bun ninh mbuo nyei jaaiv yietc liuz jutv mingh.
69.13: Mv baac Ziouv aah! Yie daux gaux tov meih. O Tin-Hungh aah! Weic zuqc meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh, tov meih dau yie ziux meih buatc horpc nyei ziangh hoc, weic zuqc meih ziepc zuoqv nyei tengx mienh.
69.9: Yie weic meih nyei biauv jorm hnyouv hnangv douz zieqc jienv yie nor. Mienh gorngv doqc meih mv baac ninh mbuo nyei waac gorngv zuqc yie.
69.26: Weic zuqc ninh mbuo hoic meih mborqv nyei mienh, yaac gorngv meih bun zuqc mun wuov deix mienh nyei kouv naanc.
69.5: O Tin-Hungh aah! Meih hiuv duqv yie ndongc haaix hngongx. Yie zoux dorngc nyei sic yaac bingx maiv mbueiz meih.
69.27: Tov meih dingc ninh mbuo nyei zuiz aengx jaa dingc, yaac maiv dungx guangc ninh mbuo nyei zuiz.
69.14: Tov njoux yie maiv zuqc zemh njiec wuom-bamc gu'nyuoz. Tov tengx yie biaux ndutv yie nyei win-wangv caux ndo nyei wuom.
69.3: Yie heuc jienv tov gau kouv nzengc, jaang-hoh nqaai mi'aqv. Yie zuov jienv Tin-Hungh tengx. Mangc gau, m'zing zungv maiv njang aqv.
69.7: Se weic meih yie cingx zuqc mienh gorngv doqc, oix zuqc buang hmien diev nyaiv.
69.36: Ninh nyei bou nyei zeiv-fun oix duqv nzipc wuov norm deic-bung. Hnamv ninh nyei mengh nyei mienh yaac oix duqv yiem wuov.
69.10: Yie zei maiv nyanc haaix nyungc weic zatv ganh zoux faix, yie zuqc mienh jatv yie.
69.2: Yie zemh njiec ndo haic nyei wuom-bamc gu'nyuoz, maiv maaih dorngx bun zaux souv duqv wuonv. Yie bieqc wuom ndo nyei dorngx, wuom yaac yiemx jienv yie.
69.1: Tin-Hungh aah! Tov meih njoux yie. Wuom hlo jienv faaux, yiemx taux yie nyei jaang-ndiev.
69.31: Hnangv naaic ziouc bun Ziouv gauh horpc hnyouv fongc horc ngongh gouv, fai fongc horc maaih jorng, maaih deih nyei ngongh gouv.
69.6: O Ziouv, Nernh Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh  aah! Tov maiv dungx bun kaux meih wuov deix laaix yie zuqc nyaiv. O I^saa^laa^en nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Tov maiv dungx bun lorz meih wuov deix laaix yie zuqc baaic hmien.
69.8: Yie nyei gorx-youz buatc yie benx ninh mbuo maiv hiuv nyei mienh. Caux yie juangc maa nyei muoz-doic yaac funx yie benx ganh fingx mienh.
69.24: Meih bun mienh nyei ga'qiex baetv cuotv bun ninh mbuo. Tov bun meih qiex jiez, nouz nyei sic zunc zaaic ninh mbuo.
69.25: Tov bun ninh mbuo yiem nyei ciangv benx ndau-huaang, bun ninh mbuo nyei ndopv-liuh maiv maaih mienh yiem.
69.29: Mv baac yie zuqc kouv naanc yaac zuqc mun. O Tin-Hungh aah! Tov bun meih nyei njoux en bouh yie faaux hlang.
69.11: Yie zuqv la'maah ndie-cou dorngx lui, ninh mbuo dorh yie zoux gouv gorngv.
69.32: Zuqc zeix nyei mienh buatc liuz ziouc a'hneiv. Lorz Tin-Hungh nyei mienh aah! Tov bun meih nyei hnyouv fingv jiez daaih maah!
69.16: O Ziouv  aah! Tov dau yie, weic zuqc meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh se longx haic. Ziux meih korv-lienh haic mienh tov huin nzuonx daaih mangc yie.

34.21: Orqv mienh oix zuqc orqv nyei sic daic, hanc kuv mienh nyei mienh oix zuqc dingc zuiz.
34.15: Ziouv nyei m'zing mangc jienv kuv mienh. Ninh nyei m'normh yaac muangx ninh mbuo heuc jienv tov nyei waac.
34.12: Haaix dauh baamh mienh oix ziangh jienv, oix duqv siouc nyuonh ndaauv yaac duqv longx?
34.17: Kuv mienh heuc jienv tov, Ziouv muangx haiz mi'aqv, bun ninh mbuo biaux ndutv yietc zungv kuonx naanh.
34.20: Ninh beu jienv kuv mienh nyei sin, maiv bun yietc diuh mbungv nauv.
34.4: Yie daux gaux tov Ziouv, ninh ziouc dau yie. Yaac njoux yie biaux ndutv yietc zungv gamh nziex nyei sic.
34.19: Kuv mienh buangh kuonx naanh camv nyei, mv baac Ziouv njoux ninh biaux ndutv nzengc.
34.18: Ziouv yiem nitv fatv hnyouv mun nyei mienh, yaac njoux hnyouv mun, mba'nziu yuqc nyei mienh.
34.22: Ziouv yaac njoux ninh nyei bou nyei maengc. Ndaauh kaux ninh wuov deix, maiv maaih haaix dauh zuqc dingc zuiz.
34.13: Oix zuqc faix fim, maiv dungx bun mbietc gorngv orqv nyei waac. Nzuih meix yaac maiv dungx gorngv-baeqc nduov mienh.
34.9: Ziouv nyei cing-nzengc baeqc fingx aah! Oix zuqc taaih ninh, weic zuqc taaih ninh wuov deix maiv caa haaix nyungc.
34.5: Zuqc zeix nyei mienh mangc jienv ninh, hmien ziouc njang-laangc aqv. Ninh mbuo maiv zuqc buang hmien diev nyaiv.
34.14: Orqv nyei oix zuqc simv nqoi, kungx zoux longx nyei jauv. Oix zuqc longc hnyouv zimh lorz baengh orn nyei jauv.
34.3: Tov caux yie ceng Ziouv  weih hlo. Tov bun mbuo lomh nzoih taaih ninh nyei mengh.
34.7: Ziouv nyei fin-mienh beu jienv taaih Ziouv nyei mienh yaac njoux ninh mbuo.
34.10: Liemh sienh lunx haih dangx haih ngorc nyanc nyei ga'naaiv, mv baac lorz Ziouv nyei mienh maiv caa haaix nyungc longx nyei ga'naaiv.
34.2: Yie nyei hnyouv oix weic Ziouv bungx waac-maux, bun zuqc zeix nyei mienh muangx haiz ziouc a'hneiv.
34.1: Yie maiv dingh liouh nyei oix ceng Ziouv.  Ceng ninh nyei waac zanc-zanc yiem yie nyei nzuih.
34.6: Naaiv dauh mienh jomc mienh heuc jienv tov,   Ziouv  yaac haiz mi'aqv, yaac njoux ninh biaux ndutv ninh nyei yietc zungv kouv naanc.
34.8: Gunv seix mueix ziouc hiuv duqv Ziouv se longx haic. Ndaauh kaux ninh nyei mienh maaih orn-lorqc.
34.11: Yie nyei naamh nyouz aac, daaih muangx yie nyei waac maah! Yie oix njaaux meih mbuo taaih Ziouv.
34.16: Ziouv ngaengc jienv zoux orqv nyei mienh, bun yiem naaiv lungh ndiev maiv maaih haaix dauh jangx duqv ninh mbuo.

30.12: bun yie nyei hnyouv haih ceng meih, zungv maiv haih sekv. O Ziouv,  yie nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Yie oix zongc zingh meih taux yietc liuz.
30.5: Ninh nouz mienh se weic nduqc dangh hnangv, mv baac ninh nyei en-zingh se weic yietc seix. Maiv gunv ziangh muonz nyiemv, mv baac taux lungh ndorm njien-youh aqv.
30.11: Yie nzauh nyiemv, meih bun yie cangx heix, meih jaiv nqoi yie nyei la'maah ndie-cou nyei lui, goiv benx njien-youh,
30.3: O Ziouv aac, meih njoux yie yiem yiemh gen cuotv daaih, bun yie duqv maengc ziangh, maiv zuqc njiec yiemh gen.
30.10: O Ziouv aah! Tov meih muangx yie yaac korv-lienh yie. O Ziouv  aah! Tov meih tengx yie.
30.2: O Ziouv,  yie nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Yie heuc jienv meih tengx, meih yaac zorc yie longx.
30.1: Ziouv  aac, yie ceng meih weic zuqc meih zorqv yie yiem ndo nyei dorngx cuotv daaih, maiv bun yie nyei win-wangv jatv yie.
30.4: O Ziouv nyei cing-nzengc baeqc fingx aah! Oix zuqc baaux nzung ceng ninh. Oix zuqc dor-ziec ninh nyei cing-nzengc mbuox.
30.6: Yie ganh aeqv, yiem maanc sic bungx-zuoqc nyei ziangh hoc yie gorngv, “Yie yietc liuz maiv zuqc ging-dongz.”
30.8: O Ziouv  aah! Yie heuc jienv meih. Yie dorng jienv Ziouv  tov meih tengx.
30.9: “Se gorngv yie daic aengx zuqc mingh yiem yiemh gen, maaih haaix nyungc maaih lamh longc? Nie-mbung haih ceng meih nyei fai? Haih gorngv meih ziepc zuoqv nyei jauv fai?
30.7: O Ziouv  aac, meih nyei en-zingh liepc yie hnangv norm wuonv nyei mbong nor. Mv baac meih buang meih nyei hmien maiv mangc yie, yie ziouc gamh nziex haic.

95.11: Weic naaiv yie qiex jiez ziouc houv jienv gorngv, “Ninh mbuo yietc liuz maiv duqv bieqc yie nyei hitv kuonx dorngx.”
95.10: Feix ziepc hnyangx gu'nyuoz yie nouz haic naaic doic mienh. Yie gorngv, “Ninh mbuo benx yietc fingx hnyouv maiv zingx nyei mienh. Ninh mbuo yaac maiv bieqc hnyouv yie nyei jauv.”
95.2: Mbuo oix zuqc daaih yiem ninh nyei nza'hmien dor-ziec ninh, yaac oix zuqc njien-youh nyei heuc jienv baaux nzung ceng ninh.
95.1: Daaih maah! Mbuo oix zuqc daaih baaux nzung ceng Ziouv.  Mbuo njien-youh nyei heuc jienv ceng njoux yie mbuo nyei La'bieiv.
95.5: Koiv benx ninh nyei, weic zuqc ninh ganh zeix daaih. Ninh nyei buoz zeix cuotv ndau-beih.
95.6: Daaih maah! Mbuo oix zuqc puoqv njiec baaix ninh. Mbuo oix zuqc gueic njiec Zeix Mbuo Daaih Wuov Dauh Ziouv  nyei nza'hmien.
95.8: Maiv dungx zoux hnyouv ngaengc hnangv zinh ndaangc yiem Me^li^mbaa, yaac hnangv yiem deic-bung-huaang, Matv^saax, wuov hnoi nor.
95.9: Wuov zanc meih mbuo nyei ong-taaix seix yie yaac cuoqv yie, maiv gunv ninh mbuo buatc yie zoux nyei sic.
95.4: Ndau-ndiev ndo jiex nyei dorngx yiem ninh nyei buoz gu'nyuoz. Hlang jiex nyei mbong yaac benx ninh nyei.
95.3: Weic zuqc Ziouv se hlo haic nyei Tin-Hungh, yaac zoux domh Hungh Diex, gauh hlo jiex maanc zienh.
95.7: Weic zuqc ninh benx mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh. Mbuo se ninh nyei miev-ciangv nyei baeqc fingx, yiem ninh nyei buoz-ndiev nyei ba'gi yungh. Tov meih mbuo ih hnoi muangx ninh nyei qiex.

117.2: Ziouv ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mbuo camv nyei, ninh yaac ziepc zuoqv taux yietc liuz. Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.
117.1: Maanc guoqv mienh aah! Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv. Maanc fingx mienh aah! Oix zuqc ceng ninh.

144.15: Duqv naaiv nyungc fuqv nyei baeqc fingx maaih orn-lorqc. Maaih Ziouv zoux ninh mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh wuov deix baeqc fingx maaih orn-lorqc.
144.12: Tov bun yie mbuo nyei dorn yiem hnyangx-jeiv lunx nyei ziangh hoc hnangv ndiangx hlo dingc nor. Tov bun yie mbuo nyei sieqv hnangv zuqc daaih zoux hungh dinc biauv-gorqv nyei ndiouh.
144.13: Tov bun yie mbuo nyei lamz dapv buangv nyungc-nyungc laangh ziqc. Tov bun yie mbuo nyei ba'gi yungh yiem yie mbuo nyei ciangv njiec dorn cin-cin waanc-waanc.
144.5: O Ziouv aac, koi nqoi lungh njiec daaih, hluo mbong bun mbong cuotv sioux.
144.11: Tov meih njoux yie, tengx yie biaux ndutv ganh fingx mienh nyei buoz-ndiev. Ninh mbuo nyei nzuih kungx gorngv-baeqc hnangv. Liemh sung mbiaauc jieqv buoz laengz waac yaac jaav nyei.
144.14: Tov bun yie mbuo nyei ngongh njiec dorn camv, maiv waaic, maiv dingx laaih. Yaac tov bun yie mbuo nyei jaai-horngc maiv maaih zuqc kouv, nyiemv nyei sing-qiex.
144.3: O Ziouv aac, baamh mienh benx haaix nyungc meih cingx jangx taux ninh? Seix zaangc mienh benx haaix nyungc meih cingx hnamv taux ninh?
144.10: Meih bun hungh diex duqv hingh, yaac njoux meih nyei bou, Ndaawitv, biaux ndutv hoic maengc nyei nzuqc ndaauv.
144.2: Ninh se ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv yie wuov dauh Ziouv, zoux beu yie nyei dorngx, dongh yie kaux wuonv nyei dorngx, caux njoux yie wuov dauh. Ninh zoux yie nyei torngv-baaih, zoux yie ndaauh kaux nyei dorngx. Ninh bun ganh fingx zuqc yiem yie nyei buoz-ndiev.
144.1: Ceng Ziouv,  yie nyei La'bieiv. Ninh tengx yie hoqc linc mborqv jaax, njaaux yie haih mborqv domh jaax.
144.4: Mienh se hnangv tauv nzunc qiex. Ninh nyei hnoi-nyieqc jiex hnangv dongh linh siepv-siepv nyei jiex mingh nor.
144.6: Tov borngz mba'lingc cuotv bun win-wangv nzaanx nzengc. Buonv meih nyei forng-cang bun ninh mbuo faatv nzaanx nyei biaux.
144.8: Ninh mbuo nyei nzuih kungx gorngv-baeqc hnangv, liemh sung mbiaauc jieqv buoz laengz waac yaac jaav nyei.
144.9: O Tin-Hungh aac, yie oix baaux diuh siang-nzung bun meih, oix longc ziepc diuh finx nyei daanh baah patv bun meih.
144.7: Tov meih yiem hlang nyei dorngx sung buoz cuotv daaih, njoux yie, baeng yie cuotv wuom ndo nyei dorngx, aengx njoux yie biaux ndutv ganh fingx nyei buoz-ndiev.

44.21: Tin-Hungh maiv zeiz haih zaah cuotv naaiv deix sic fai? Weic zuqc ninh hiuv duqv mienh nyei hnyouv gem jienv nyei sic.
44.15: Yie ziangh hnoi zuqc diev nyaiv, yaac zuqc baaic hmien,
44.12: Meih laanh zaanc maaic meih nyei baeqc fingx hnangv maiv maaih jaax-zinh nyei ga'naaiv. Ziux maaic nyei jaax-zinh zungv maiv duqv yietc deix leic.
44.17: Yie mbuo zuqc naaiv deix yietc zungv sic maiv gunv yie mbuo maiv la'kuqv meih fai ngaengc meih caux yie mbuo laengz nyei ngaengc waac.
44.20: Se gorngv yie mbuo la'kuqv yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh nyei mbuox, fai sung yie mbuo nyei buoz cuotv zaangc nyiec nyei zienh,
44.4: Meih zoux yie nyei Hungh caux yie nyei Tin-Hungh. Tov paaiv bun Yaakopv duqv hingh.
44.19: Mv baac meih zaax jienv yie mbuo, bun yie mbuo benx hieh juv yiem nyei dorngx, bun zuqc daic nyei dongh linh gomv jienv yie mbuo.
44.18: Yie mbuo nyei hnyouv maiv daaux nqaang. Yie mbuo nyei zaux yaac maiv caaiv piatv meih nyei jauv.
44.22: Weic meih yie mbuo ziangh hnoi zuqc mienh daix jienv yiem. Mienh funx yie mbuo hnangv benx oix zuqc daix nyei ba'gi yungh nor.
44.23: O Ziouv aah! Nyie daaih maah! Meih weic haaix diuc m'njormh? Jiez sin aqv, maiv dungx yietc liuz guangc yie mbuo.
44.13: Meih bun yie mbuo zuqc laangz zaangc mienh ki, zuqc weih gormx nyei mienh jatv yaac mangc piex.
44.9: Mv baac ih zanc meih guangc yie mbuo, bun yie mbuo zuqc suei. Meih maiv caux yie mbuo nyei zuangx jun-baeng cuotv.
44.26: Tov meih daaih tengx yie mbuo. Weic zuqc meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh, tov njoux yie mbuo.
44.5: Yie mbuo kaux meih fongv yie mbuo nyei win-wangv njiec. Yie mbuo kaux meih nyei mengh caaiv jienv caux yie mbuo mborqv jaax wuov deix.
44.14: Meih bun yie mbuo yiem maanc fingx mbu'ndongx zoux gouv gorngv, yiem fingx-fingx mbu'ndongx zuqc ninh mbuo huangx m'nqorngv jatv yie mbuo.
44.3: Weic zuqc ninh mbuo maiv zeiz weic ganh nyei nzuqc ndaauv duqv wuov norm deic-bung, yaac maiv zeiz ninh mbuo ganh nyei buoz tengx ninh mbuo duqv hingh, mv baac se weic meih nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz caux meih nyei hmien nyei njang-laangc, weic zuqc meih a'hneiv ninh mbuo.
44.7: mv baac meih njoux yie mbuo leih ndutv yie mbuo nyei win-wangv, bun nzorng yie mbuo wuov deix zuqc nyaiv.
44.10: Meih bun yie mbuo tuix nzuonx biaux win-wangv. Nzorng yie mbuo wuov deix win-jaa caangv yie mbuo nyei ga'naaiv.
44.2: Meih longc meih ganh nyei buoz zunc cuotv yiem wuov nyei norm-norm guoqv nyei mienh, yaac liepc yie mbuo nyei ong-taaix yiem wuov. Meih bun wuov deix ganh fingx zuqc kouv, mv baac bun yie mbuo nyei ong-taaix zoux bungx nqoi nyei mienh.
44.1: Tin-Hungh aah! Yie mbuo ganh nyei m'normh duqv haiz jiex, yie mbuo nyei ong-taaix mbuox jiex yie mbuo, loz-hnoi yiem ninh mbuo nyei seix zeiv meih zoux jiex hlo haic nyei sic.
44.6: Yie maiv kaux yie nyei juang-zinx, yie nyei nzuqc ndaauv yaac maiv haih njoux yie,
44.8: Yie mbuo ziangh hnoi weic Tin-Hungh bungx waac-maux. Yie mbuo yaac oix yietc liuz dor-ziec meih nyei mbuox. Selaa
44.24: Meih weic haaix diuc buang meih nyei hmien maiv mangc yie? Meih weic haaix diuc la'kuqv yie mbuo zuqc kouv naanc, zuqc seix nyei sic.
44.25: Yie mbuo zuqc mbaapv njiec taux nie-mbung, ziangh sin naetv jienv ndau-beih.
44.11: Meih bun yie mbuo hnangv zuqc daix nyanc nyei ba'gi yungh, yaac bun yie mbuo nzaanx mingh yiem maanc fingx mbu'ndongx.
44.16: laaix mienh gorngv doqc gorngv ki, yaac laaix buatc win-wangv caux jaauv win nyei mienh.

68.21: Mv baac Tin-Hungh oix mborqv huv ninh nyei win-wangv nyei m'nqorngv, se dongh maaih mba'biei nyei m'nqorngv-baengh, zanc-zanc baamz jienv zuiz nyei mienh.
68.15: Mbaasaan Mbong benx hlo hlang nyei domh mbong. Mbaasaan Mbong maaih ziex norm mbong-ningv.
68.12: “Gunv jun-baeng nyei hungh tiux biaux nzengc. Biaux nzengc aqv loh!” Yiem biauv wuov deix m'sieqv dorn bun nqoi caangv daaih nyei ga'naaiv.
68.17: Ziouv yiem Sinaai Mbong dorh jienv cin-cin waanc-waanc norm mborqv jaax cie bieqc cing-nzengc nyei dorngx.
68.30: Tov meih hemx I^yipv, dongh yiem luoqc diqc lomc gu'nyuoz nyei hieh zoih. Hemx ngongh gouv caux ngongh dorn, se fingx-fingx mienh. Caaiv njiec mauv aapv mienh fungx nyaanh bun ninh mbuo wuov deix, bun a'hneiv mborqv jaax nyei fingx-fingx mienh nzaanx nzengc.
68.20: Yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh se njoux yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh. Se Ziouv Tin-Hungh, njoux yie mbuo biaux ndutv maiv zuqc daic.
68.4: Baaux nzung ceng Tin-Hungh, baaux ceng ninh nyei mengh. Ceng geh jienv mbuonx wuov dauh, ninh nyei mbuox heuc Ziouv,  oix zuqc yiem ninh nyei nza'hmien njien-youh.
68.28: O Tin-Hungh aah! Tov bun meih nyei qaqv cuotv. O Tin-Hungh aah! Tov longc meih nyei qaqv tengx yie mbuo hnangv meih weic yie mbuo zoux jiex nor.
68.33: Ceng geh jienv gu'nguaaic lungh wuov dauh, se geh jienv yiem loz-hnoi daaih nyei lungh. Mangc maah! Ninh bungx ninh nyei qiex cuotv, se hlo haic nyei qiex.
68.35: O Tin-Hungh aac, meih yiem meih nyei singx dinc za'gengh mbuoqc horngh haic, se I^saa^laa^en nyei Tin-Hungh, ninh bun ninh nyei baeqc fingx maaih qaqv henv. Oix zuqc ceng Tin-Hungh.
68.19: Ceng Ziouv, dongh hnoi-hnoi ndaam mbuo nyei kouv naanc wuov dauh. Se dongh Tin-Hungh njoux yie mbuo. Selaa
68.34: Zunh gorngv Tin-Hungh maaih qaqv, zoux hlo gunv I^saa^laa^en Mienh. Ninh nyei qaqv yaac yiem wuov lungh.
68.18: Meih faaux hlang nyei dorngx wuov zanc meih dorh zuqc caangv nyei mienh gan jienv mingh, yaac yiem mienh mbu'ndongx zipv zingh nyeic, liemh yiem hnyouv ngaengc nyei mienh zipv daaih, bun Ziouv Tin-Hungh yiem wuov norm dorngx.
68.22: Ziouv gorngv, “Yie oix dorh ninh mbuo yiem Mbaasaan nzuonx daaih, yaac bun ninh mbuo yiem ndo haic nyei koiv nzuonx,
68.23: weic bun meih mbuo comx jienv meih mbuo nyei win-wangv nyei nziaamv gu'nyuoz, meih mbuo nyei juv yaac duqv mbiec ninh mbuo nyei nziaamv.”
