68.13: Maiv gunv ninh mbuo corc bueix ba'gi yungh laanh mbu'ndongx, baeqc gopv nyei ndaatv buang jienv nyaanh, ndaatv nyei biei nzaatv jienv zien jiem youc-youc wuov.
68.9: O Tin-Hungh aah! Meih bun lungh duih domh mbiungc njiec. Meih nzipc nyei buonc ndau nqaai, meih bun nyiemz daaih.
68.26: “O I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei zeiv-fun aah! Oix zuqc yiem mienh camv gapv zunv nyei wuic mbu'ndongx ceng Tin-Hungh, se ceng Ziouv.  ”
68.5: Tin-Hungh yiem ninh nyei cing-nzengc dorngx zoux guh hanh fu'jueiv nyei die yaac beu jienv auv-guaav.
68.27: Gauh faix jiex nyei Mben^yaa^min Fingx mingh ndaangc. Gan nqa'haav daaih maaih Yu^ndaa Fingx nyei bieiv zeiv, maaih Se^mbu^lun nyei bieiv zeiv caux Napv^taa^li nyei bieiv zeiv.
68.14: Nernh Jiex Wuov Dauh bun yiem deic-bung wuov deix hungh diex nzaanx mingh nyei ziangh hoc, ninh bun sorng duih njiec Sanx^mon Mbong.
68.3: Mv baac tov bun kuv mienh a'hneiv, bun ninh mbuo yiem Tin-Hungh nyei nza'hmien, za'gengh njien-youh orn-lorqc haic.
68.7: O Tin-Hungh aah! Meih yiem meih nyei baeqc fingx nyei wuov ndaangc maengx cuotv mingh yangh jiex deic-bung-huaang wuov zanc, Selaa
68.10: Meih nyei baeqc fingx liepc nguaaz-gorn yiem wuov. O Tin-Hungh aah! Weic zuqc meih longx haic, meih liuc leiz ziangx bun mienh jomc mienh.
68.2: Tov zunc ninh mbuo biaux, hnangv douz-sioux zuqc nziaaux buonc nzaanx mingh nor. Tov bun orqv mienh yiem Tin-Hungh nyei nza'hmien zuqc mietc hnangv mueiz-nzing zuqc douz buov yuqc nor.
68.1: Tov Tin-Hungh jiez daaih, bun ninh nyei win-wangv nzaanx nzengc. Tov bun nzorng ninh wuov deix yiem ninh nyei wuov ndaangc maengx tiux biaux.
68.31: Maaih gong-zoh oix yiem I^yipv daaih. E^ti^o^bie Mienh oix siepv-siepv nyei sung buoz jouh Tin-Hungh.
68.6: Tin-Hungh bun kou-ndoqc mienh maaih biauv yiem, bun zuqc wuonx nyei mienh cuotv daaih duqv longx. Mv baac ngaengc ninh nyei mienh oix zuqc yiem deic-bung-haanz, ndau nqaai nzengc nyei dorngx.
68.8: ndau dorng jienv Tin-Hungh dongz, lungh yaac duih mbiungc njiec. Sinaai Mbong yiem Tin-Hungh nyei nza'hmien, se I^saa^laa^en nyei Tin-Hungh nyei nza'hmien, dongz.
68.24: O Tin-Hungh aac, mienh buatc meih nyei mienh mbaih jienv yangh jauv. Yie nyei Tin-Hungh, yie nyei Hungh Diex nyei mienh mingh bieqc singx dinc.
68.25: Baaux nzung nyei mienh yiem wuov ndaangc maengx, patv daanh baah nyei mienh yiem nqa'haav, mborqv nzoz nyei m'sieqv dorn yiem mbu'ndongx.
68.29: Weic meih yiem Ye^lu^saa^lem nyei biauv zuangx hungh diex dorh zingh nyeic bun meih.
68.11: Ziouv hatc waac, maaih domh guanh m'sieqv dorn dorh naaiv deix kuv fienx mingh zunh gorngv,
68.32: O lungh ndiev maanc guoqv aah! Oix zuqc baaux nzung ceng Tin-Hungh, oix zuqc baaux nzung ceng Ziouv. Selaa
68.16: Ningv camv nyei mbong aah! Meih weic haaix diuc mangc buatc korv-fiqv Tin-Hungh oix longc benx ninh yiem nyei dorngx, se dongh Ziouv oix yietc liuz yiem nyei mbong?

45.15: Mienh dorh ninh mbuo njien-youh orn-lorqc nyei bieqc hungh diex nyei dinc.
45.12: Tailaqv Mienh oix daaih fungx zingh nyeic tov meih tengx. Baeqc fingx gu'nyuoz gauh butv zoih jiex nyei mienh oix longc nyungc-nyungc jaaix nyei ga'naaiv bun meih a'hneiv.
45.13: Hungh sieqv yiem gu'nyuoz zorng jienv njang-laangc haic. Ninh nyei zorng-zuqv longc jiem-finx zorpc jienv ndatv daaih.
45.5: Meih nyei forng laic, yaac yiem meih nyei hungh diex nyei win-wangv nyei mba'nziu. Fingx-fingx mienh king njiec meih nyei zaux-ndiev.
45.11: Weic zuqc meih nzueic haic hungh diex oix meih aqv. Ninh se meih nyei ziouv, meih ziouc oix zuqc mbuoqc ninh gunv.
45.14: Ninh zuqv jienv longc ziex nyungc setv congx daaih nyei lui-ndaauv, mienh ziouc dorh ninh mingh taux hungh diex wuov. Mbienz doic wuov deix maiv bueix jiex dorn nyei sieqv-dorn doic yaac gan jienv ninh mingh hungh diex nyei nza'hmien.
45.3: Henv haic nyei hungh diex aah! Zorqv meih nyei nzuqc ndaauv tapv paiv sai jienv jaaiv. Meih zoux hlo yaac maaih njang-laangc.
45.10: O sieqv aah! Meih oix zuqc hnamv longx yaac baeng m'normh muangx. Maiv dungx jangx meih ganh nyei mienh fai meih nyei die nyei biauv.
45.2: Beiv lungh ndiev mienh, meih gauh nzueic jiex. Meih gorngv waac mbiaangc, kuh muangx. Weic naaiv Tin-Hungh yietc liuz ceix fuqv bun meih.
45.1: Yie nyei hnyouv maaih longx haic nyei jauv mienz cuotv. Yie weic hungh diex doqc naaiv diuh nzung. Yie nyei mbietc hnangv fiev nzaangc liouc nyei mienh nyei batv nor.
45.4: Weic zien leiz caux suonc nyei jauv caux baengh fim nyei sic meih zoux hlo geh jienv maaz cuotv mingh hingh jiex. Tov bun meih nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz zoux cuotv mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.
45.6: O Tin-Hungh aah! Meih nyei weic oix yietc liuz yiem taux maanc gouv maanc doic. Meih oix baengh fim nyei gunv meih nyei baeqc fingx.
45.8: Meih nyei lui ndaang haic, maaih mu^yorc caux aa^lo ndie-ndaang caux gaan^mbun nyei qiex ndaang. Yiem zaangz-nyaah zorng nyei hungh dinc mienh patv daanh baah bun meih a'hneiv.
45.9: Maaih deix hungh diex nyei sieqv yiem meih taaih nyei m'sieqv dorn mbu'ndongx. Hungh maac zorng jienv yiem Ofi daaih nyei jiem souv jienv hungh diex nyei mbiaauc maengx.
45.7: Zoux kuv sic nyei meih hnamv, zoux orqv nyei meih nzorng. Weic naaiv, Tin-Hungh, dongh meih nyei Tin-Hungh, ginv meih daaih ceix orn-lorqc bun meih gauh camv jiex meih nyei yietc zungv doic.
45.17: Yie nyei nzung oix bun doic jiex doic ceng meih nyei mengh. Zuangx mienh ziouc yietc liuz ceng meih taux maanc gouv maanc doic.
45.16: Meih oix duqv dorn camv nzipc jienv meih nyei ong-taaix nyei weic, meih oix liepc ninh mbuo gunv gormx deic-bung.

83.15: tov hnangv naaic longc meih nyei domh nziaaux zunc ninh mbuo, yaac longc meih nyei domh mbiungc-nziaaux haeqv ninh mbuo gamh nziex haic.
83.18: Tov bun ninh mbuo hiuv duqv kungx meih ganh hnangv, dongh maaih mbuox heuc Ziouv,  se Yiem Hlang Jiex gunv lungh ndiev Wuov Dauh.
83.12: Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Mbuo oix zuqc zorqv Tin-Hungh nyei miev-ciangv weic benx mbuo ganh nyei buonc.”
83.13: O yie nyei Tin-Hungh aac, tov bun ninh mbuo hnangv nziaaux-zunc nyei nie-mbung, yaac hnangv cuqv-maux zuqc nziaaux buonc nor.
83.5: Ninh mbuo dongh hnyouv daav za'eix, yaac liepc jiez ngaengc waac caux meih doix-dekc.
83.11: Tov bun ninh mbuo zoux hlo nyei mienh zuqc hnangv Olepv caux Se^epc, ninh mbuo nyei zuangx hungh dorn yaac zuqc hnangv Ze^mbaa caux Saanx^mun^naa.
83.14: Hnangv douz buov qui gemh, yaac hnangv douz-mbietc zieqc jienv mbong,
83.3: Ninh mbuo daav guv guaix nyei za'eix hoic meih nyei baeqc fingx. Ninh mbuo lomh nzoih caangh laangh zoux bun meih beu jienv nyei mienh.
83.10: dongh yiem En^ndo zuqc mietc, benx ndau nyei buonx.
83.2: Mangc maah! Meih nyei win-wangv faanv. Nzorng meih wuov deix cau jiez m'nqorngv daaih aqv.
83.1: Tin-Hungh aac, tov meih maiv dungx sekv-sekv nyei yiem. O Tin-Hungh aac, tov maiv dungx kungx nqapc jienv nzuih, maiv ko lo.
83.4: Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Daaih maah! Mbuo zorqv ninh mbuo yietc guoqv mienh mietc nzengc, ziouc maiv maaih haaix dauh haih jangx duqv I^saa^laa^en wuov norm mbuox.”
83.6: Se maaih E^ndom Mienh caux I^saa^maa^en Mienh, Mo^apc Mienh caux Haagaa Mienh,
83.8: Atc^si^lie Mienh yaac caux ninh mbuo gapv jienv doic. Ninh mbuo tengx qaqv Lotv nyei zeiv-fun.
83.9: Tov zoux bun ninh mbuo hnangv meih zoux bun Mi^ndien Mienh, yaac hnangv yiem Kison Ndaaih zoux bun Si^se^laa caux Yaa^mbin,
83.7: maaih Ge^mbaan Mienh, Ammon Mienh, caux Aa^maa^lekv Mienh, maaih Fi^li^saa^die Mienh caux Tailaqv Mienh.
83.17: Tov bun ninh mbuo yietc liuz nyaiv yaac gamh nziex, bun ninh mbuo baaic hmien yaac zuqc mietc.
83.16: O Ziouv aac, tov bun ninh mbuo zuqc baaic hmien nyaiv nzengc weic bun ninh mbuo daaih lorz meih.

92.15: weic bun cing Ziouv  se zien nyei. Ninh se yie nyei La'bieiv, yiem ninh maiv maaih haaix nyungc maiv horpc.
92.12: Kuv mienh oix hnangv daau nor hiaangx, yaac hlo daaih hnangv yiem Le^mbaa^norn nyei si^ndaa zongh ndiangx nor.
92.13: Ninh mbuo hnangv zuangx yiem zaangc Ziouv nyei biauv nyei ndiangx, yiem yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh nyei laatc gu'nyuoz hiaangx jiez daaih.
92.5: O Ziouv aac, meih zoux nyei gong za'gengh hlo haic, meih nyei hnyouv hnamv nyei sic yaac ndo.
92.11: Yie nyei m'zing duqv buatc yie nyei win-wangv suei. Yie nyei m'normh muangx haiz oix mborqv yie wuov deix orqv mienh zuqc mietc.
92.14: Ninh mbuo hnyangx-jeiv gox mv baac corc ziangh biouv, haaix zanc yaac nyiemz, maeng nyei,
92.3: Longc ziepc diuh finx patv nyei jaa-sic caux domh daanh baah, fiuv-daanh baah patv puix nzung nyei pou.
92.10: Meih bun yie henv hnangv hieh ngongh nor, meih longc siang-youh dox jienv yie.
92.2: Lungh ndorm zunh yaangh meih ziepc zuoqv hnamv mienh, lungh muonz zanc zunh yaangh meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnyouv.
92.1: O Yiem Hlang Jiex nyei Ziouv  aac, mienh dor-ziec, baaux nzung ceng meih nyei mengh se longx haic.
92.4: O Ziouv aac, meih zoux nyei sic bun yie a'hneiv, meih nyei buoz zoux nyei gong bun yie njien-youh nyei baaux nzung.
92.6: Mienh hnam mienh maiv haih hiuv, mienh hngongx mienh maiv haih mengh baeqc,
92.8: Mv baac Ziouv aac, meih yietc liuz duqv zoux hlo jiex.
92.9: O Ziouv aac, meih nyei win-wangv, meih nyei win-jaa zungv oix zuqc mietc. Orqv mienh yietc zungv oix zuqc nzaanx.
92.7: maiv gunv mienh waaic mienh hnangv miev baetv cuotv, yietc zungv orqv mienh yaac duqv longx jienv faaux, ninh mbuo za'gengh oix zuqc mietc taux yietc liuz.

64.10: Kuv mienh ziouc kaux Ziouv njien-youh yaac oix ndaauh kaux ninh. Hnyouv zingx nyei mienh yaac oix ceng ninh.
64.2: Tov meih tengx yie bingx jienv beic ndiev daav za'eix wuov deix orqv mienh, caux wuov guanh ceux lunc nyei mienh.
64.1: Tin-Hungh aah! Yie tauv domh qiex nyei ziangh hoc tov muangx yie nyei qiex. Tov meih beu jienv yie nyei maengc, maiv zuqc win-wangv hoic.
64.5: Ninh mbuo laanh kuinx laanh ei ninh mbuo waaic nyei za'eix zoux. Ninh mbuo beic ndiev caangh laangh zaeng hlaang hlopv mienh. Ninh mbuo hnamv daaih, “Haaix dauh haih mangc duqv buatc yie mbuo?”
64.6: Haaix dauh haih wetv cuotv yie mbuo zoux nyei waaic sic? Yie mbuo hnamv cuotv guaix haic nyei za'eix.” Mienh nyei hnyouv caux eix za'gengh ndo haic.
64.8: Weic zuqc ninh mbuo ganh nyei mbietc oix hoic ninh mbuo zuqc baaic. Da'faanh buatc ninh mbuo nyei mienh ziouc huangx m'nqorngv.
64.9: Zuangx mienh ziouc gamh nziex haic, oix zunh yaangh Tin-Hungh zoux nyei gong, yaac hnamv taux ninh zoux nyei sic.
64.4: Ninh mbuo bingx jienv buonv maiv zoux dorngc nyei mienh, liemh zeih buonv ninh, ninh mbuo yaac maiv gamh nziex.
64.3: Ninh mbuo nzioux ganh nyei mbietc hnangv nzuqc ndaauv nor laic, ninh mbuo gorngv cuotv im haic nyei waac hnangv ziangx haic nyei forng.
64.7: Mv baac Tin-Hungh oix longc forng-cang buonv ninh mbuo, ninh mbuo ziouc liemh zeih zuqc mun.

22.21: Tov njoux yie biaux ndutv sienh nyei nzuih baengx, njoux yie leih ndutv hieh ngongh nyei jorng.
22.15: Yie nyei qaqv nqaai nzengc hnangv hlengx nie-mor-huv nor, yie nyei mbietc naetv jienv nzuih dungz. Meih zorqv yie guangc jienv hnangv ga'naaiv-daic.
22.12: Win-wangv camv hnangv ngongh gouv nor weih gormx yie, yaac hnangv Mbaasaan henv haic nyei ngongh gouv ninh mbuo weih jienv biei bung.
22.17: Yie nyei mbungv yie zungv haih saauv nzengc, ninh mbuo bungx m'zing nuqv-nuqv nyei mangc yaac jatv yie.
22.30: Doic-doic zeiv-fun oix fu-sux ninh. Mienh oix zorqv Ziouv nyei sic gorngv mbuox hoz doic mienh.
22.20: Tov njoux yie nyei maengc biaux ndutv nzuqc ndaauv. Tov njoux yie nyei maengc leih ndutv naaiv deix juv.
22.4: Yie mbuo nyei ong-taaix kaux meih, ninh mbuo bangc meih, meih yaac njoux ninh mbuo.
22.28: Ziouv  maaih hungh lingc, yaac gunv maanc guoqv.
22.19: O Ziouv aah! Tov meih maiv dungx leih go yie. Tengx yie wuov dauh Ziouv aah! Siepv-siepv nyei daaih tengx yie.
22.18: Ninh mbuo bun nqoi yie nyei lui-houx, yaac weic yie nyei lui ndouv mangc gaax haaix dauh duqv.
22.22: Yie oix zunh meih nyei mengh mbuox yie nyei gorx-youz. Yie oix yiem gapv zunv nyei wuic mbu'ndongx ceng meih.
22.23: Gamh nziex Ziouv nyei mienh aah! Oix zuqc ceng ninh. Yaakopv nyei zuangx zeiv-fun aah! Oix zuqc taaih ninh. I^saa^laa^en nyei yietc zungv hoz doic zeiv-fun aah! Oix zuqc gamh nziex ninh.
22.13: Ninh mbuo se hnangv njunh jienv nyei sienh morngx nzuih baengx oix betv yie.
22.9: Se dongh meih bun yie yiem maa nyei ga'sie cuotv seix, yie hopv maa nyei nyorx nyei ziangh hoc, meih yaac goux jienv yie.
22.26: Mienh jomc mienh duqv nyanc beuv. Haaix dauh lorz Ziouv zungv oix ceng ninh. Tov bun meih mbuo yietc liuz ziangh jienv.
22.5: Ninh mbuo heuc meih, ziouc duqv njoux aqv. Ninh mbuo kaux meih, ninh mbuo yaac maiv piatv.
22.27: Jomc lungh ndiev norm-norm dorngx nyei mienh oix jangx Ziouv ziouc huin nzuonx daaih lorz ninh. Maanc guoqv nyei maanc fingx oix yiem ninh nyei nza'hmien baaix ninh.
22.14: Yie zuqc dox cuotv hnangv wuom nor. Yie nyei yietc zungv mbungv-daaux piatv nzengc. Yie nyei mba'nziu se hnangv mueiz-nzing, yiem yie nyei la'kuotv yuqc nzengc.
22.3: Mv baac meih zueiz weic benx Cing-Nzengc Wuov Dauh. Meih se I^saa^laa^en Mienh ceng wuov dauh.
22.7: Da'faanh buatc yie nyei mienh jatv yie, ninh mbuo zuo nzuih baengx bun yie, yaac huangx m'nqorngv gorngv,
22.10: Yiem yie cuotv seix daaih yie kaux meih. Yiem yie nyei maa yungz yie daaih, meih zoux yie nyei Tin-Hungh.
22.2: O yie nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Lungh hnoi zanc yie heuc, meih yaac maiv dau yie. Lungh muonz zanc yie maiv dingh liouh nyei heuc yaac maiv duqv hitv kuonx.
22.1: Yie nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Yie nyei Tin-Hungh! Meih weic haaix diuc guangc yie? Meih weic haaix diuc leih go, maiv njoux yie, maiv haiz yie njunh nyei waac?
22.31: Ninh mbuo oix zunh ninh zoux baengh fim nyei jauv mbuox maiv gaengh cuotv seix nyei mienh, “Ninh njoux ninh nyei mienh aqv.”
22.6: Mv baac yie se hnangv norm gaeng-mau, maiv zeiz mienh. Yie zuqc mienh huotv, zuqc mienh mangc piex.
22.8: “Ninh kaux Ziouv,    bun Ziouv njoux ninh maah! Bun Ziouv  tengx ninh, weic zuqc Ziouv a'hneiv haic ninh.”
22.24: Weic zuqc ninh maiv mangc piex yaac maiv youx siouc kouv nyei mienh zuqc siouc nyei kouv naanc. Ninh maiv buang jienv hmien maiv mangc ninh mbuo, mienh heuc jienv tov nyei ziangh hoc, ninh yaac muangx.
22.25: Yiem mienh camv gapv zunv nyei dorngx yie ceng nyei waac yiem meih daaih. Yiem taaih meih nyei mienh nyei nza'hmien yie oix jaauv sung yie laengz nyei ngaengc waac.
22.29: Yiem lungh ndiev zoux maux nyei mienh oix yiem ninh nyei nza'hmien gueic njiec baaix. Da'faanh nzuonx benx nie-mbung nyei mienh, se maiv haih tengx ganh maaih maengc ziangh nyei mienh, oix gueic njiec baaix ninh.
22.11: Tov meih maiv dungx leih go yie, weic zuqc zeqc naanc taux fatv aqv, yaac maiv maaih haaix dauh tengx.
22.16: Maaih guanh orqv mienh huing jienv yie, hnangv guanh juv weih gormx yie nor. Ninh mbuo yaac nzopv yie nyei buoz-zaux.

60.12: Yie mbuo kaux Tin-Hungh yie mbuo ziouc duqv hingh jiex. Se dongh ninh oix caaiv yie mbuo nyei win-wangv njiec.
60.5: Tov dau yie mbuo, longc meih nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz njoux yie mbuo, tengx meih hnamv nyei mienh duqv njoux.
60.11: Tov meih tengx yie mbuo mborqv win-wangv, weic zuqc baamh mienh tengx se maiv lamh longc.
60.3: Meih bun meih nyei baeqc fingx zuqc diev kouv. Meih bun yie mbuo hopv diuv nquin, yangh jauv lingh lingh king-king nyei.
60.10: O Tin-Hungh aah! Meih maiv zeiz guangc yie mbuo fai? O Tin-Hungh aah! Meih maiv caux yie mbuo nyei jun-baeng guanh cuotv mingh mborqv jaax fai?
60.2: Meih bun ndau dongz, mbaaix nqoi mi'aqv. Tov zorc mbaaix nyei dorngx weic zuqc ndau lungh lungh laih laih nyei.
60.1: Tin-Hungh aah! Meih guangc yie mbuo, mborqv baaic yie mbuo mi'aqv. Meih qiex jiez yie mbuo, tov bun yie mbuo nzuonx daaih hnangv loz wuov nor.
60.4: Meih cie jienv geh bun taaih meih wuov deix mienh daaih gapv zunv leih buonv juang-zinx nyei mienh. Selaa
60.6: Tin-Hungh yiem ninh nyei singx dinc gorngv, “Yie oix a'hneiv nyei zorqv Sekem bun nqoi, yaac ndorqc Sukc^kotv Horngz paaiv bun nqoi.
60.8: Mo^apc se yie nyei nzaaux buoz-zaux bunh. Yie yaac zoi yie nyei heh njiec E^ndom. Yie heuc jienv gorngv, ‘Fi^li^saa^die aah! Yie hingh jiex meih aqv.’+”
60.9: Haaix dauh oix dorh yie mingh taux wuov norm weih wuonv nyei zingh? Haaix dauh oix dorh yie mingh taux E^ndom Deic-Bung?
60.7: Gi^le^aatc se yie nyei, Maa^natv^se yaac yie nyei. E^faa^im se yie mborqv jaax nyei muoc. Yu^ndaa se yie nyei hungh biaav.

116.15: Ziux Ziouv  mangc, ninh nyei cing-nzengc baeqc fingx daic se weih jaaix.
116.18: Yie oix yiem ninh nyei zuangx baeqc fingx nyei nza'hmien jaauv sung yie caux Ziouv laengz nyei ngaengc waac,
116.12: Yie haih zorqv haaix nyungc winh bun Ziouv weic ninh ceix nyei yietc zungv en?
116.13: Yie bouh jiez njoux en nyei zaanv, yaac heuc jienv Ziouv  nyei mbuox.
116.19: se yiem zaangc Ziouv nyei biauv, laatc gu'nyuoz, Ye^lu^saa^lem Zingh mbu'ndongx. Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.
116.5: Ziouv maaih en-zingh yaac baengh fim nyei. Yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh maaih hnyouv korv-lienh mienh.
116.11: Yie hnyouv lunc jienv nyei ziangh hoc yie gorngv, “Zuangx mienh kungx gorngv-baeqc hnangv.”
116.14: Yie oix yiem ninh nyei zuangx baeqc fingx nyei nza'hmien jaauv sung yie caux Ziouv laengz nyei ngaengc waac.
116.3: Zuqc daic nyei hlaang zaeng weih gormx yie. Yiemh gen zuqc kouv nyei jauv zorqv jienv yie. Yie buangh zuqc domh naanc zingh, zuqc nzauh kouv.
116.10: Yie corc sienx maiv gunv yie gorngv, “Yie zuqc domh naanc zingh.”
116.2: Ninh baeng m'normh muangx yie, yie ziouc yietc seix jouh ninh.
116.1: Yie hnamv Ziouv  weic zuqc ninh muangx yie nyei qiex caux yie jouh nyei waac.
116.4: Wuov zanc yie heuc Ziouv  nyei mbuox, “O Ziouv aac, tov meih njoux cuotv yie nyei maengc.”
116.6: Ziouv beu jienv maiv hiuv camv nyei mienh. Yie zuqc kouv haic nyei ziangh hoc ninh njoux yie.
116.8: Ziouv aac, meih njoux yie maiv zuqc daic, bun yie nyei m'zing maiv liouc wuom-mueic, bun yie nyei zaux yaac maiv ndiqv zuqc ndorpc.
116.9: Yie yiem Ziouv  nyei nza'hmien, yangh ziangh jienv nyei mienh nyei jauv.
116.7: O yie nyei hnyouv aac, meih oix zuqc aengx baengh orn aqv, weic zuqc Ziouv za'gengh zoux longx bun meih.
116.17: Yie oix dor-ziec weic fongc horc ziec bun meih, yaac oix heuc jienv gorngv Ziouv nyei mbuox.
116.16: O Ziouv  aac, yie se meih nyei bou, yie se meih nyei bou, meih nyei m'sieqv bou nyei dorn. Meih jaiv nqoi ndoh yie nyei limc.

24.10: Naaiv dauh njang-laangc nyei Hungh dongh haaix dauh? Se Nernh Jiex nyei Ziouv.  Dongh naaiv dauh zoux njang-laangc nyei Hungh. Selaa
24.2: Ninh ceix baamh gen jiez daaih yiem koiv gu'nguaaic, se liepc jienv yiem wuom gu'nguaaic.
24.1: Ndau-beih caux yiem ndau-beih nyei maanc muotc benx Ziouv nyei. Lungh ndiev caux lungh ndiev nyei maanc mienh yaac ninh nyei.
24.5: Ninh oix duqv Ziouv  ceix fuqv. Njoux ninh wuov dauh Tin-Hungh yaac oix bun cing ninh zoux duqv horpc.
24.6: Se dongh naaiv nyungc mienh daaih lorz ninh, daaih yiem Yaakopv nyei Tin-Hungh nyei nza'hmien. Selaa
24.8: Naaiv dauh njang-laangc nyei Hungh dongh haaix dauh? Se dongh maaih qaqv henv haic nyei Ziouv,  dongh mborqv jaax henv nyei Ziouv.
24.9: Koi nqoi laatc gaengh maah! Koi nqoi loz-hnoi nyei gaengh. Maaih njang-laangc nyei Hungh oix bieqc daaih.
24.4: Se dongh zoux nyei sic caux hnamv nyei jauv cing-nzengc nyei mienh, dongh maiv jiez hnyouv zoux jaav nyei sic, yaac maiv la'guaih houv jaav waac.
24.3: Haaix dauh maaih leiz faaux Ziouv nyei mbong? Haaix dauh haih souv jienv yiem ninh nyei cing-nzengc dorngx?
24.7: Koi nqoi laatc gaengh maah! Koi nqoi loz-hnoi nyei gaengh. Maaih njang-laangc nyei Hungh oix bieqc daaih.

97.12: Meih mbuo kuv mienh aah! Oix zuqc kaux Ziouv  njien-youh, yaac oix zuqc dor-ziec ninh nyei cing-nzengc mengh.
97.5: Mbong yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien yuqc hnangv mueiz-nzing nor, se yiem lungh ndiev nyei Ziouv nyei nza'hmien.
97.11: Njang ziux jienv kuv mienh, hnyouv zingx nyei mienh maaih njien-youh.
97.3: Maaih douz yiem ninh nyei wuov ndaangc maengx buov qui weih gormx ninh wuov deix win-wangv.
97.10: Meih mbuo hnamv Ziouv nyei mienh oix zuqc nzorng orqv nyei sic. Ninh beu jienv ninh nyei cing-nzengc mienh nyei maengc. Ninh njoux ninh mbuo biaux ndutv orqv mienh nyei buoz-ndiev.
97.2: Maaih mbuonx caux hmatv jieqv nyei hmuangx weih gormx ninh, zoux horpc nyei jauv caux baengh fim nyei jauv zoux ninh nyei weic nyei gorn-ndoqv.
97.1: Ziouv zoux hungh, bun lungh ndiev ndau-beih njien-youh, bun zuangx koiv-nzou a'hneiv.
97.4: Ninh nyei mba'lingc bun lungh ndiev njang nzengc. Ndau-beih buatc ziouc dongz nzengc.
97.6: Lungh bun cing Tin-Hungh se baengh fim nyei, maanc fingx yaac buatc ninh nyei njang-laangc.
97.8: O Tin-Hungh aac, Si^on muangx haiz meih dunx nyei sic ziouc a'hneiv. Yu^ndaa Mienh yaac orn-lorqc.
97.9: O Ziouv aac, meih se Yiem Hlang Jiex, gunv lungh ndiev Wuov Dauh. Meih yaac yiem gauh hlang jiex maanc zienh.
97.7: Bun yietc zungv baaix miuc-fangx nyei mienh zuqc nyaiv, dongh ceng maiv lamh longc nyei miuc-fangx nyei mienh. Bun maanc zienh puoqv njiec Tin-Hungh nyei nza'hmien.

130.2: Ziouv aac, tov meih muangx yie nyei sing-qiex. Tov baeng m'normh muangx yie heuc jienv jouh nyei waac.
130.1: O Ziouv aac, yie yiem siem nyei dorngx heuc jienv meih.
130.5: Yie zuov Ziouv, yie nyei hnyouv zuov jienv. Yie yaac kaux ninh nyei waac maaih lamh hnamv dorngx.
130.6: Yie nyei hnyouv zuov Ziouv gauh camv jiex siouv gaeng mienh zuov lungh njang, gauh camv jiex siouv gaeng mienh zuov lungh njang.
130.8: Ninh yaac oix zuoqc I^saa^laa^en Mienh biaux ndutv yietc zungv zoux dorngc nyei zuiz.
130.4: Mv baac meih guangc mienh nyei zuiz weic bun mienh taaih meih.
130.3: O Ziouv aac, se gorngv meih nipc jienv yie nyei zuiz, Ziouv aac, haaix dauh haih biaux duqv ndutv, maiv zuqc dingc zuiz?
130.7: O I^saa^laa^en Mienh aac, oix zuqc kaux Ziouv maaih lamh hnamv dorngx, weic zuqc Ziouv ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh, ninh yaac maaih hnyouv zuoqc mienh taux daauh.

55.21: Ninh nyei nzuih gauh mbiaangc jiex ngongh nyorx hmei, mv baac hnyouv gu'nyuoz mborqv jienv jaax yiem. Ninh nyei waac gauh mau jiex hmei, mv baac hnangv baeng cuotv daaih nyei nzuqc ndaauv nor.
55.15: Ninh mbuo jangx maiv zaaic nyei ziangh hoc tov bun ninh mbuo zuqc mietc. Bun ninh mbuo liemh nangh nyei zuqc njiec mingh yiem yiemh gen, weic zuqc ninh mbuo nyei biauv gu'nyuoz caux ninh mbuo nyei hnyouv orqv haic.
55.12: Se maiv zeiz win-wangv jatv yie. Hnangv naaic yie diev duqv nyei. Yaac maiv zeiz nzorng yie nyei mienh ceng-hlo cuoqv yie. Hnangv naaic yie haih bingx ninh.
55.17: Maiv gunv lungh ndorm lungh muonz fai lungh aanx yie njunh jienv gorngv yie kouv nyei jauv, ninh zungv muangx haiz yie nyei qiex.
55.20: Caux yie zoux doic nyei mienh sung ninh nyei buoz mborqv ninh nyei loz-gaeng doic, yaac baamz ninh laengz nyei ngaengc waac.
55.4: Yie nyei hnyouv gu'nyuoz za'gengh! mun haic. Zuqc daic nyei jauv haeqv yie gamh nziex gau.
55.19: Tin-Hungh, dongh yiem loz-hnoi zueiz jienv weic gunv wuov dauh, oix baeng m'normh muangx yie aengx zatv ninh mbuo njiec, weic zuqc ninh mbuo maiv kangv goiv hnyouv yienc eix, yaac maiv gamh nziex Tin-Hungh. Selaa
55.18: Ninh njoux yie nyei maengc leih ndutv caux yie mborqv jaax nyei mienh, bun yie duqv baengh orn, weic zuqc caux yie mborqv jaax wuov deix camv haic.
55.22: Zorqv meih nyei kouv naanc fungx bun Ziouv, ninh zungv oix baav jienv meih. Ninh yietc liuz maiv bun kuv mienh zuqc ndanc dongz.
55.23: Mv baac Tin-Hungh aah! Meih oix zorqv orqv mienh zoi njiec taux yiemh gen. Daix mienh nyei mienh caux maaic mienh nyei mienh zungv maiv ziangh taux ndaamv-seix. Mv baac yie ganh aeqv, yie oix kaux meih.
55.13: Mv baac se meih, dongh caux yie wuov horngh mienh, se caux yie zoux doic mienh, zuoqc haic nyei loz-gaeng doic.
55.9: O Ziouv aah! Tov bun ninh mbuo nyei za'eix waaic aengx bun ninh mbuo nyei waac lunc nzengc, weic zuqc yie buatc yiem zingh gu'nyuoz maaih qangv maanh zoux doqc nyei sic.
55.5: Yie gengh! gamh nziex, sin zinx nyanh nyanh nyei. Gamh nziex gau, siangx cuotv hanc-namx nyei.
55.14: Zinh ndaangc yie mbuo laanh caux laanh gorngv waac zuoqc haic, yie mbuo caux mienh camv yiem zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei biauv yangh jiex mingh jiex daaih.
55.3: Weic haiz win-wangv nyei qiex, yaac weic orqv mienh zeix yie, weic zuqc ninh mbuo zorqv zeqc naanc jaa bun yie, ninh mbuo qiex jiez, nzorng yie.
55.7: Yie oix youh jienv mingh go nyei dorngx, mingh yiem wuov deic-bung-huaang. Selaa
55.10: Ninh mbuo ziangh hnoi ziangh muonz yiem zingh laatc gu'nguaaic youh jienv mingh huing gormx. Yiem zingh gu'nyuoz maaih baamz zuiz nyei sic caux waaic sic buangv nzengc.
55.2: Tov muangx yie yaac dau yie oc. Yie hnyouv faanv lunc nzengc.
55.1: Tin-Hungh aah! Tov baeng m'normh muangx yie daux gaux nyei waac. Maiv dungx bingx, maiv muangx yie tov nyei waac.
55.6: Yie gorngv, “Feix duqv yie maaih ndaatv hnangv baeqc gopv nor, yie ziouc ndaix mingh lorz dorngx hitv.
55.8: Yie oix gaanv jienv lorz dorngx bingx, biaux ndutv domh nziaaux-jieqv caux mbiungc.”
55.11: Yiem zingh gu'nyuoz maaih zoux waaic nyei jauv. Hei zaangc maaih hoic mienh, pienx mienh nyei sic buangv nzengc.
55.16: Mv baac yie jouh Tin-Hungh,   Ziouv  zungv oix njoux yie.

41.12: Meih baav jienv yie weic zuqc yie hnyouv zingx, meih yaac bun yie yietc liuz yiem meih nyei nza'hmien.
41.13: Ceng Ziouv, I^saa^laa^en nyei Tin-Hungh. Oix zuqc ceng yiem loz-hnoi taux maanc gouv maanc doic.   Aamen caux Aamen.
41.5: Yie nyei win-wangv gorngv doqc yie. Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Ninh taux haaix zanc cingx daic ni? Ninh nyei mbuox taux haaix zanc cingx zuqc mietc?”
41.11: Yie ziouc hiuv duqv meih a'hneiv yie, weic zuqc yie nyei win-wangv maiv haih hingh jiex yie.
41.3: Ninh butv baengc bueix jienv coux nyei ziangh hoc Ziouv  oix goux ninh. Maaih baengc wuov zanc meih zungv oix zorc ninh longx daaih.
41.10: O Ziouv aah! Tov meih korv-lienh yie, bun yie longx, tengx yie jiez sin daaih, haih jaauv win bun ninh mbuo.
41.2: Ziouv beu jienv ninh, bun ninh maaih maengc ziangh. Yiem wuov norm deic-bung mienh oix heuc ninh zoux “Duqv fuqv nyei mienh.” Tov maiv dungx zorqv ninh jiu bun win-wangv sueih ganh nyei hnyouv hanc zoux.
41.1: Maaih hnyouv jangx mienh jomc mienh, wuov dauh maaih njien-youh aqv. Zuqc kouv nyei hnoi-nyieqc Ziouv oix njoux ninh.
41.4: Yie gorngv, “O Ziouv aah! Tov korv-lienh yie, tov zorc yie longx, weic zuqc yie baamz zuiz dorngc meih.
41.6: Haaix dauh daaih mangc yie, kungx gorngv jaav waac hnangv. Ninh nyei hnyouv nzauz maiv benx nyei jauv. Cuotv mingh taux haaix, ninh zunh jienv mingh.
41.8: Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Ninh zuqc ciouv haic nyei baengc hoic ninh aqv. Ninh bueix jienv coux yietc liuz maiv duqv aengx jiez sin.”
41.9: Liemh yie gauh zuoqc jiex nyei loz-gaeng doic, se yie bungx hnyouv wuov dauh, dongh caux yie juangc hnaangx nyanc nyei mienh, yaac mbienv hnyouv bun yie.
41.7: Nzorng yie wuov deix yietc zungv longc waac-sapv gorngv taux yie, ninh mbuo laaic yie duqv buangh gauh ciouv jiex nyei sic.

115.15: Tov bun meih mbuo duqv Ziouv nyei fuqv, se Zeix Lungh Zeix Ndau Wuov Dauh nyei fuqv.
115.18: Mv baac yie mbuo oix ceng Ziouv  yiem naaiv mingh taux yietc liuz. Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.
115.12: Ziouv jangx yie mbuo. Ninh oix ceix fuqv bun yie mbuo. Ninh oix ceix fuqv bun I^saa^laa^en nyei zeiv-fun. Ninh oix ceix fuqv bun Aalon nyei zeiv-fun.
115.13: Ninh oix ceix fuqv bun taaih Ziouv nyei zuangx mienh, liemh zoux hlo zoux faix.
115.5: Naaiv deix miuc-fangx maaih nzuih mv baac maiv haih gorngv waac, maaih m'zing mv baac mangc maiv buatc,
115.11: Taaih Ziouv nyei zuangx mienh aah! Oix zuqc kaux Ziouv. Ninh tengx ninh mbuo yaac zoux ninh mbuo nyei torngv-baaih.
115.14: Tov Ziouv bun meih mbuo caux meih mbuo nyei zeiv-fun jaa hiaangx jienv faaux.
115.3: Yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh yiem gu'nguaaic lungh, ziux ninh buatc horpc nyei ninh ziouc zoux.
115.10: O Aalon nyei zeiv-fun aac, oix zuqc kaux Ziouv. Ninh tengx ninh mbuo yaac zoux ninh mbuo nyei torngv-baaih.
115.2: Maanc fingx mienh weic haaix diuc oix gorngv, “Ninh mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh yiem haaix?”
115.1: O Ziouv aac, njang-laangc maiv zeiz bun yie mbuo, maiv zeiz bun yie mbuo, se oix zuqc bun meih ganh nyei mengh duqv njang-laangc, weic zuqc meih za'gengh hnamv mienh yaac ziepc zuoqv nyei zoux.
115.4: Ninh mbuo nyei miuc-fangx longc jiem longc nyaanh zoux daaih. Se mienh nyei buoz zoux cuotv daaih nyei.
115.6: maaih m'normh mv baac muangx maiv haiz, maaih mba'zorng mv baac maiv haih hnomv,
115.8: Zoux naaiv deix miuc-fangx nyei mienh ziouc hnangv naaiv deix miuc-fangx nor. Da'faanh kaux miuc-fangx nyei mienh yaac fih hnangv nyei.
115.9: O I^saa^laa^en Mienh aac, oix zuqc kaux Ziouv.  Ninh tengx ninh mbuo yaac zoux ninh mbuo nyei torngv-baaih.
115.7: maaih buoz mv baac maiv haih hluo, maaih zaux mv baac maiv haih yangh jauv. Ninh mbuo nyei jaang-hoh yaac maiv haih cuotv qiex mbui.
115.17: Daic mingh nyei mienh maiv ceng Ziouv, njiec taux sekv nzieqc nyei dorngx wuov deix yaac maiv ceng.
115.16: Lungh se Ziouv  nyei lungh, mv baac ndau ninh ceix bun baamh mienh.

106.21: Ninh mbuo la'kuqv ninh mbuo nyei Njoux Ziouv, Tin-Hungh, dongh yiem I^yipv zoux hlo haic nyei sic,
106.15: Ziux ninh mbuo tov nyei ninh ceix bun ninh mbuo, mv baac bun ninh mbuo butv baengc-ngaaiz.
106.23: Weic naaiv ninh gorngv ninh oix mietc ninh nyei baeqc fingx. Kaux bangc maaih ninh ginv daaih wuov dauh Mose dorng jienv Tin-Hungh tengx ninh mbuo gorngv, yaac bun ninh ga'qiex fiu, maiv mietc ninh mbuo.
106.47: O Ziouv,  yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh aac, tov njoux yie mbuo. Tov siou yie mbuo yiem maanc guoqv mbu'ndongx nzuonx, weic bun yie mbuo haih dor-ziec meih nyei cing-nzengc mbuox, yaac a'hneiv nyei ceng.
106.20: Ninh mbuo zorqv Tin-Hungh nyei njang-laangc tiuv nyanc miev nyei ngongh gouv nyei miuc-fangx.
106.18: Maaih douz yiem ninh mbuo nyei guanh mbu'ndongx cuotv daaih, douz-mbietc buov nzengc orqv mienh.
106.33: Weic naaiv ninh mbuo bun Mose nyei hnyouv mun, ninh ziouc qiex beqv gorngv cuotv ninh maiv horpc zuqc gorngv nyei waac.
106.43: Ninh njoux ninh nyei baeqc fingx ziex nzunc, mv baac ninh mbuo duqv-eix ngaengc jienv Tin-Hungh ziouc laaix ganh nyei zuiz ndortv njiec aiv.
106.48: Ceng Ziouv, I^saa^laa^en nyei Tin-Hungh, yiem yietc liuz taux yietc liuz. Zuangx mienh oix zuqc lomh nzoih gorngv, “Aamen”. Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.
106.22: yiem Haam nyei deic zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei jauv, yiem Koiv-Siqv zoux peix fuc nyei sic.
106.42: Ninh mbuo nyei win-wangv yaac zeix ninh mbuo, ninh mbuo ziouc zuqc yiem ninh mbuo nyei hatc maaz ga'ndiev.
106.31: Ninh hnangv naaiv zoux, Ziouv funx ninh zoux duqv horpc, yaac funx taux maanc gouv maanc doic.
106.4: O Ziouv aac, meih zoux longx bun meih nyei baeqc fingx wuov zanc, tov jangx yie. Meih daaih njoux ninh mbuo nyei ziangh hoc tov tengx yie,
106.29: Ninh mbuo zoux nyei sic cuoqv Ziouv qiex jiez haic, ziouc maaih domh wuon-baengc yiem ninh mbuo mbu'ndongx butv cuotv.
106.9: Ninh hatc Koiv-Siqv, koiv ziouc nqaai mi'aqv. Ninh dorh ninh mbuo jiex ndo nyei dorngx hnangv jiex deic-bung-huaang nor.
106.37: Ninh mbuo zorqv ninh mbuo ganh nyei naamh nyouz ziec bun mienv.
106.5: weic bun yie buatc meih ginv daaih nyei mienh duqv bungx-zuoqc, yaac bun yie a'hneiv meih nyei baeqc fingx duqv daaih nyei njien-youh, yaac duqv caux meih nzipc daaih nyei buonc juangc jienv ceng.
106.3: Da'faanh ei jienv baengh fim nyei jauv zoux wuov deix, se zanc-zanc zoux horpc nyei mienh, maaih orn-lorqc.
106.39: Hnangv naaic ninh mbuo ganh zoux nyei jauv bun ninh mbuo maaih uix, yiem ninh mbuo zoux nyei sic ninh mbuo hnangv maaic buonv-sin nyei m'sieqv dorn.
106.6: Yie mbuo caux yie mbuo nyei ong-taaix fih hnangv nyei baamz zuiz. Yie mbuo zoux dorngc, zoux orqv nyei sic.
106.8: Maiv gunv hnangv naaic, ninh weic ganh nyei mengh njoux ninh mbuo, weic bun ninh mbuo hiuv duqv ninh nyei domh qaqv.
106.46: Ninh bun yietc zungv caangv ninh nyei mienh wuov deix korv-lienh ninh mbuo.
106.7: Yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung wuov zanc, yie mbuo nyei ong-taaix maiv mengh baeqc meih zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic. Ninh mbuo maiv jangx taux meih ndongc haaix ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv ninh mbuo. Ninh mbuo zungv yiem wuov Koiv-Siqv ga'hlen, ngaengc Yiem Hlang Jiex Wuov Dauh.
106.32: Ninh mbuo yiem Me^li^mbaa Wuom cuoqv Ziouv  qiex jiez. Laaix ninh mbuo, Mose yaac zuqc kouv aqv.
106.25: Ninh mbuo yiem ganh nyei ndopv-liuh ngopv, yaac maiv muangx Ziouv  nyei waac.
106.17: ndau nqoi, naqv Ndaataan yaac biopv ndipc Aa^mbi^lam yietc guanh mienh.
106.12: Wuov zanc ninh mbuo sienx ninh nyei waac, ninh mbuo yaac baaux nzung ceng ninh.
106.34: Ninh mbuo maiv ei Ziouv hatc nyei waac mietc wuov deix ganh fingx mienh.
106.30: Wuov zanc Fi^ne^hatc souv jiez daaih dingc zoux dorngc nyei mienh nyei zuiz, domh wuon-baengc ziouc dingh mi'aqv.
106.11: Wuom yiemx ninh mbuo nyei win-jaa, zungv maiv zengc yietc dauh aqv.
106.28: Nqa'haav yiem Be^o ninh mbuo bieqc Mbaa^an zienh yaac nyanc ziec bun maiv maaih maengc nyei zienh nyei ga'naaiv.
106.44: Maiv gunv hnangv naaic, ninh haiz ninh mbuo heuc jienv tov nyei waac, ninh ziouc jangx ninh mbuo nyei kouv naanc.
106.45: Ninh jangx jienv ninh laengz nyei ngaengc waac, ziux ninh ndongc naaic ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv ninh ziouc goiv za'eix.
106.19: Yiem Holepv Mbong ninh mbuo zoux dauh ngongh gouv dorn, yaac baaix dox daaih nyei miuc-fangx.
106.35: Daaux nzuonx zorpc jienv caux wuov deix fingx yiem, yaac hoqc zoux hnangv ninh mbuo nor zoux.
106.41: Ninh ziouc zorqv ninh mbuo jiu bun yiem camv-fingx mienh nyei buoz-ndiev, nzorng ninh mbuo wuov deix ziouc duqv gunv ninh mbuo.
106.13: Mv baac maiv lauh ninh mbuo la'kuqv ninh zoux nyei sic, ninh mbuo maiv longc hnyouv zuov ninh njaaux nyei za'eix.
106.40: Weic naaiv Ziouv ziouc qiex jiez ninh nyei baeqc fingx, yaac youx haic ninh nzipc nyei buonc.
106.26: Weic naaiv ninh sung jienv buoz houv waac gorngv ninh oix bun ninh mbuo yiem deic-bung-huaang ndortv nzengc.
106.14: Yiem wuov deic-bung-huaang ninh mbuo cei duqv kouv haic, ziouc yiem wuov seix Tin-Hungh.
106.27: Bun ninh mbuo nyei zeiv-fun nzaanx mingh yiem maanc fingx mbu'ndongx, bun ninh mbuo faatv nzaanx yiem buangv norm-norm guoqv.
106.38: Ninh mbuo daix maiv zoux dorngc nyei mienh, se bun ganh nyei naamh nyouz nyei nziaamv liouc cuotv, dongh ninh mbuo longc ziec bun Kaa^naa^an nyei miuc-fangx. Wuov deix nziaamv ziouc bun deic-bung maaih uix.
106.36: Tin-Hungh nyei mienh fu-sux wuov deix mienh nyei miuc-fangx ziouc benx koux hlopv jienv ninh mbuo.
106.10: Ninh njoux ninh mbuo biaux ndutv ninh mbuo nyei win-wangv nyei buoz-ndiev, yiem win-jaa nyei buoz-ndiev njoux ninh mbuo cuotv daaih.
106.2: Haaix dauh haih gorngv Ziouv zoux hlo haic nyei sic? Fai haaix dauh haih biux mengh puix duqv ceng ninh nyei yietc zungv?
106.1: Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.    Oix zuqc dor-ziec Ziouv  weic zuqc ninh se longx haic, ninh yietc liuz ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh.
106.24: Ninh mbuo yaac mangc piex wuov norm kuh yiem nyei deic-bung, ninh mbuo maiv sienx Tin-Hungh laengz nyei waac.
106.16: Yiem ndopv-liuh ciangv gu'nyuoz mienh mueic jieqv Mose caux Ziouv  nyei cing-nzengc mienh, Aalon, wuov zanc,

38.21: O Ziouv aah! Tov maiv dungx guangc yie. O yie nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Maiv dungx leih go yie.
38.15: O Ziouv aah! Yie zuov jienv meih. O Ziouv,  yie nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Meih zungv oix dau yie.
38.12: Oix zorqv yie nyei maengc wuov deix zaeng ninh mbuo nyei mungz. Oix hoic yie wuov deix kungx gorngv hnangv haaix nor haih bun yie zuqc baaic, ninh mbuo ziangh hnoi daav za'eix nduov yie.
38.17: Weic zuqc yie zungv oix ndorpc haic aqv. Yie yaac zanc-zanc mun jienv yiem.
38.20: Longc orqv sic jaauv yie zoux nyei kuv sic wuov deix caux yie doix-dekc, weic zuqc yie kungx lorz zoux horpc nyei jauv hnangv.
38.4: Yie zoux dorngc nyei zuiz yiemx gauh hlang jiex yie nyei m'nqorngv, yaac hnangv ga'naaiv hniev jiex ndaangc yie nyei qaqv.
38.19: Yie nyei win-wangv youc camv youc henv. Nzorng yie mv baac maiv maaih gorn-baengx nyei mienh yaac maaih camv.
38.18: Yie nyiemc yie nyei zuiz, yie weic yie nyei zuiz nzauh.
38.22: Njoux yie wuov dauh Ziouv aah! Tov siepv-siepv nyei daaih tengx yie.
38.13: Mv baac yie hnangv m'normh ndung nyei mienh muangx maiv haiz. Yaac hnangv ga'naaiv-hngongx, maiv haih gorngv waac.
38.9: Ziouv aah! Yie nyei hnyouv oix longc nyei meih hiuv nzengc mi'aqv. Yie njunh jienv nyei qiex bingx maiv mbueiz meih.
38.5: Laaix yie zoux hngongx nyei sic yie mun nyei dorngx zueix yaac huv.
38.14: Yie hnangv yietc dauh muangx maiv haiz nyei mienh, nzuih maiv haih dau.
38.3: Weic zuqc meih nouz yie, yie nyei sin cingx maiv wangc siangx. Laaix yie nyei zuiz yie benx baengc mi'aqv.
38.7: Yie nyei jaaiv jorm hnangv douz buov jienv nor, yie nyei sin maiv maaih yietc norm dorngx wangc siangx.
38.10: Yie nyei mba'nziu dongz seix nyei, yie nyei qaqv yaac mau jienv njiec. Liemh yie nyei m'zing zungv maiv njang aqv.
38.2: Weic zuqc meih nyei forng-cang buonv bieqc yie gu'nyuoz, meih nyei buoz njiec daaih ngatv jienv yie.
38.1: O Ziouv aah! Maiv dungx qiex jiez, hemx yie, yaac maiv dungx nouz yie, dingc yie nyei zuiz.
38.6: Yie zuqc kouv, ndoqv njiec, zungv mbaapv njiec ndau. Ziangh hnoi ziangh muonz nzauh nyiemv jienv yiem.
38.8: Yie suei nzengc, kouv taux ndiev. Yie nyei hnyouv mun, njunh jienv yiem.
38.11: Laaix yie nyei zeqc naanc yie nyei doic caux gorx-youz simv yie go, yie nyei cien-ceqv yaac simv yie go haic.
38.16: Weic zuqc yie daux gaux gorngv, “Yie nyei zaux caaiv piatv nyei ziangh hoc, maiv dungx bun ninh mbuo jatv yie fai ceng-hlo.”

121.2: Tengx yie wuov dauh se Ziouv,  dongh Zeix Lungh Zeix Ndau Wuov Dauh.
121.1: Yie cau hmien mangc mbong, tengx yie wuov dauh oix yiem haaix daaih?
121.5: Ziouv  beu jienv meih,   Ziouv yiem meih nyei mbiaauc bung tengx meih torngv laangh.
121.6: Lungh hnoi zanc mba'hnoi maiv hoic meih, lungh muonz zanc hlaax yaac maiv hoic meih.
121.8: Meih bieqc bieqc cuotv-cuotv, Ziouv oix beu jienv meih yiem naaiv mingh taux yietc liuz.
121.4: Beu I^saa^laa^en wuov dauh zungv maiv njormh da'hngatv yaac maiv bueix m'njormh.
121.3: Ninh zungv maiv bun meih nyei zaux caaiv piatv, beu meih wuov dauh maiv njormh da'hngatv.
121.7: Ziouv oix beu jienv meih, maiv bun zuqc haaix nyungc zeqc naanc. Ninh oix beu jienv meih nyei maengc.

94.21: Ninh mbuo gapv zunv hoic kuv mienh nyei maengc yaac dingc daix maiv zoux dorngc nyei mienh.
94.15: Siemv nyei jauv ziouc aengx nzuonx daaih gan baengh fim nyei leiz. Yietc zungv hnyouv zingx nyei mienh yaac oix gan.
94.12: O Ziouv aac, meih mborqv njaaux nyei mienh maaih orn-lorqc, se meih longc meih nyei leiz-latc njaaux nyei mienh.
94.17: Se gorngv Ziouv  maiv tengx yie, yie zungv siepv-siepv nyei mingh yiem sekv nzieqc nyei deic-bung.
94.20: Waaic haic nyei gunv sic jien haih caux meih jiu tong nyei fai? Ninh mbuo longc leiz-nyeic zoux waaic nyei sic.
94.4: Ninh mbuo bungx waac-maux. Yietc zungv zoux orqv nyei mienh ceng-hlo.
94.19: Yie maaih you-nzauh kuonx hnyouv nyei sic camv nyei ziangh hoc, meih orn yie nyei hnyouv bun yie njien-youh.
94.18: Yie gorngv, “Yie nyei zaux caaiv piatv mi'aqv.” O Ziouv aac, wuov zanc meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv yie ziouc baav jienv yie.
94.22: Mv baac Ziouv se yie kaux wuonv nyei dorngx, yie nyei Tin-Hungh, se yie ndaauh kaux nyei la'bieiv.
94.23: Ninh oix ziux ninh mbuo zoux dorngc nyei zuiz winh bun ninh mbuo, weic ninh mbuo zoux nyei orqv sic mietc ninh mbuo.   Ziouv, yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh, oix mietc nzengc ninh mbuo.
94.13: Yiem ninh zuqc kouv nyei hnoi-nyieqc meih bun ninh duqv fong deix, zuov wetv ziangx kuotv bun orqv mienh zuqc mietc.
94.9: Tin-Hungh zeix m'normh, ninh ganh muangx maiv haiz fai? Ninh zeix m'zing, ninh ganh mangc maiv buatc?
94.5: O Ziouv aac, ninh mbuo njiec qaqv zeix meih nyei baeqc fingx yaac hoic meih nzipc nyei buonc.
94.14: Weic zuqc Ziouv zungv maiv guangc ninh ganh nyei baeqc fingx, ninh maiv leih guangc ninh nzipc daaih nyei buonc.
94.3: Ziouv aac, orqv mienh oix a'hneiv ndongc haaix lauh? Oix ndongc haaix lauh?
94.7: Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Ziouv  maiv buatc. Yaakopv nyei Tin-Hungh maiv hnamv taux.”
94.10: Ninh mborqv njaaux maanc guoqv mienh, ninh maiv zeiz oix dingc ninh mbuo nyei zuiz? Ninh njaaux baamh mienh, ninh ganh maiv maaih wuonh zaang fai?
94.2: Siemv lungh ndiev nyei Jien aah! Daaih maah! Daaih bun zoux maux nyei mienh duqv ziux ninh mbuo horpc zuqc duqv nyei buonc.
94.1: O Ziouv aac, meih se jaauv win nyei Tin-Hungh. Jaauv win nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Tov ziux cuotv njang daaih maah!
94.6: Ninh mbuo daix auv-guaav caux yiem deic-bung nyei ganh fingx mienh, yaac daix guh hanh fu'jueiv.
94.8: Yiem baeqc fingx mbu'ndongx nyei mienh hngongx mienh aah! Oix zuqc hiuv aqv. Meih mbuo mbanc haic nyei mienh aah! Meih mbuo taux haaix zanc cingx guai?
94.11: Ziouv hiuv duqv baamh mienh hnamv nyei sic kungx hnangv tauv yietc nzunc qiex.
94.16: Maaih haaix dauh weic yie jiez daaih ngaengc orqv mienh? Haaix dauh weic yie ngaengc jienv zoux orqv nyei mienh?

135.21: Oix zuqc yiem Si^on ceng Ziouv,  se yiem Ye^lu^saa^lem Zingh nyei Ziouv.  Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.
135.15: Ganh fingx mienh nyei miuc-fangx longc jiem longc nyaanh zoux, se mienh nyei buoz zoux daaih.
135.18: Zoux naaiv deix miuc-fangx nyei mienh ziouc hnangv naaiv deix miuc-fangx nor. Da'faanh kaux miuc-fangx nyei mienh yaac fih hnangv nyei.
135.12: Ninh yaac zorqv ninh mbuo nyei deic-bung jiu bun ninh nyei baeqc fingx, I^saa^laa^en Mienh, benx ninh mbuo nzipc nyei buonc.
135.13: O Ziouv aac, meih nyei mengh yietc liuz yiem. O Ziouv aac, mienh oix jangx meih nyei mengh dauh taux maanc doic.
135.19: O I^saa^laa^en nyei zeiv-fun aah! Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv. O Aalon nyei zeiv-fun aah! Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.
135.5: Yie hiuv duqv Ziouv  se hlo haic, yie mbuo nyei Ziouv se gauh hlo jiex zuangx zienh.
135.20: O Lewi nyei zeiv-fun aah! Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv. Taaih Ziouv nyei mienh aah! Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.
135.11: Ninh daix Aa^mo^lai Mienh nyei Si^honx Hungh, caux Mbaasaan Deic nyei Okc Hungh, caux Kaa^naa^an nyei yietc zungv hungh diex.
135.14: Ziouv oix tengx ninh nyei baeqc fingx caengx sic, yaac korv-lienh ninh nyei zuangx bou.
135.3: Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv weic zuqc Ziouv  se longx haic. Baaux nzung ceng ninh nyei mengh, weic zuqc ninh korv-lienh mienh.
135.10: Ninh mietc ziex! ziex fingx mienh, aengx daix henv haic nyei hungh diex.
135.2: se meih mbuo souv jienv Ziouv nyei biauv, yiem yie mbuo nyei Tin-Hungh nyei biauv nyei laatc gu'nyuoz nyei mienh.
135.1: Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv.    Oix zuqc ceng Ziouv  nyei mengh.   Ziouv nyei zuangx bou aah! Oix zuqc ceng,
135.4: Weic zuqc Ziouv ginv Yaakopv weic ninh ganh, ginv I^saa^laa^en benx ninh ganh nyei buonc.
135.6: Ziouv yiem gu'nguaaic lungh, yiem ga'ndiev ndau, yiem koiv gu'nyuoz caux yietc zungv ndo nyei dorngx, sueih ganh nyei eix oix zoux haaix nyungc ziouc zoux aqv.
135.8: Se dongh ninh daix yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung nyei daauh toi dorn, liemh mienh, liemh saeng-kuv.
135.9: O I^yipv Mienh aah! Ninh yiem meih mbuo mbu'ndongx zoux jangx-hoc caux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic dingc Faalo Hungh caux ninh nyei zuangx jien nyei zuiz.
135.7: Ninh bun mbuonx yiem lungh gorn faaux, ninh bun mba'lingc gan mbiungc daaih, yaac dorh nziaaux yiem ninh siou nyei dorngx cuotv daaih.
135.17: Ninh mbuo maaih m'normh mv baac ninh mbuo muangx maiv haiz, ninh mbuo nyei nzuih maiv maaih yietc deix tauv nyei qiex.
135.16: Naaiv deix miuc-fangx maaih nzuih mv baac maiv haih gorngv waac, maaih m'zing mv baac mangc maiv buatc.

126.2: Yie mbuo nyei nzuih ziouc qaqv jatv, yie mbuo nyei mbietc yaac njien-youh nyei heuc. Wuov zanc maanc guoqv mienh gorngv, “Ziouv weic ninh mbuo zoux hlo haic nyei sic.”
126.1: Ziouv bun Si^on nzuonx daaih duqv longx hnangv loz wuov zanc, yie mbuo hnangv mbeix buatc nor.
126.5: Tov bun liouc jienv wuom-mueic zuangx nyei mienh duqv njien-youh nyei heuc jienv siou.
126.6: Liouc jienv wuom-mueic dorh nyim cuotv mingh zuangx nyei mienh, oix njien-njien youh youh nyei heuc, dorh jienv ninh nyei mbiauh zeiv nzuonx.
126.4: O Ziouv aac, tov bun yie mbuo nzuonx daaih duqv longx hnangv loz wuov nor, hnangv Negepc nyei wuom liouc njiec ndoqv-nzuonx.
126.3: Ziouv weic yie mbuo zoux hlo haic nyei sic, yie mbuo ziouc njien-youh haic.

36.12: Mangc maah! Zoux orqv nyei mienh king njiec bueix jienv wuov. Ninh mbuo zuqc fongv ndorpc mingh, maiv haih aengx jiez sin daaih.
36.5: O Ziouv aac, meih ziepc zuoqv hnamv mienh nyei hnyouv se mbaengc lungh hlang. Meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnyouv mbaengc ndaamv-lungh.
36.11: Tov maiv dungx bun zoux maux nyei mienh nyei zaux caaiv yie, yaac maiv dungx bun mienh waaic mienh nyei buoz zunc yie biaux.
36.3: Ninh nyei nzuih gorngv orqv nyei waac, gorngv-baeqc nduov mienh. Cong-mengh nyei jauv caux kuv sic ninh dingh, maiv zoux aqv.
36.10: Tov meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv jienv mingh dongh hiuv duqv meih wuov deix, yaac baengh fim nyei zoux bun hnyouv zingx nyei mienh.
36.2: Ninh ceng ninh ganh nyei haah baah buang, laaic maiv maaih haaix dauh haih hiuv fai nzorng ninh nyei zuiz.
36.1: Zuiz yiem orqv mienh nyei hnyouv ndo nyei dorngx caux orqv mienh gorngv. Ziux ninh nyei m'zing mangc, ninh maiv zuqc gamh nziex Tin-Hungh.
36.4: Ninh bueix jienv coux hnamv cuotv zoux waaic nyei sic. Ninh dingc hnyouv zoux maiv benx nyei jauv, ninh yaac maiv nqemh zoux orqv nyei sic.
36.6: Meih se baengh fim hnangv Tin-Hungh nyei zuangx mbong. Meih dunx sic se hnangv ndo haic nyei koiv. O Ziouv aac, mienh maanh caux saeng-kuv meih yaac njoux.
36.8: Ninh mbuo nyanc yiem meih nyei biauv bungx-zuoqc nyei ga'naaiv beuv, meih yaac bun ninh mbuo hopv meih nyei orn-lorqc ndaaih nyei wuom.
36.9: Weic zuqc yiem wuov maaih ziangh maengc nyei wuom-zingv. Yiem meih nyei njang yie mbuo duqv buatc njang.
36.7: O Tin-Hungh aac, meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh se za'gengh jaaix haic. Baamh mienh hlo-hlo faix-faix yiem meih nyei ndaatv-ndiev nyei dongh linh.

53.2: Tin-Hungh yiem tin-dorngh mangc njiec, mangc baamh mienh. Oix mangc gaax, maaih haaix dauh maaih cong-mengh, maaih haaix dauh lorz Tin-Hungh.
53.1: Mienh hngongx mienh yiem hnyouv gorngv, “Maiv maaih Tin-Hungh lorqc.” Ninh mbuo waaic haic, zoux gamh nziev haic nyei zuiz, maiv maaih yietc dauh zoux longx.
53.5: Ninh mbuo yiem wuov za'gengh! gamh nziex haic. Maiv maaih jiex ndongc naaiv gamh nziex. Weic zuqc Tin-Hungh oix zorqv dongh liepc ciangv daaih mborqv meih wuov deix mienh nyei mbungv faatv nzaanx nzengc. Meih oix bun ninh mbuo zuqc nyaiv weic zuqc Tin-Hungh nqemh ninh mbuo.
53.6: Tov bun I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei njoux en yiem Si^on cuotv. Tin-Hungh bun ninh nyei baeqc fingx nzuonx daaih duqv longx hnangv zinh ndaangc wuov zanc, Yaakopv nyei zeiv-fun ziouc maaih orn-lorqc, I^saa^laa^en Mienh oix njien-youh.
53.4: Zoux orqv nyei mienh maiv hiuv haaix nyungc fai? Ninh mbuo naqv yie nyei baeqc fingx hnangv ninh mbuo nyanc hnaangx nor. Ninh mbuo yaac maiv tov Tin-Hungh.
53.3: Mouz dauh mienh tuix nqaang, dauh dauh fih hnangv nyei waaic nzengc. Maiv maaih haaix dauh zoux longx, yietc dauh yaac maiv maaih.

10.15: Tov meih wuotv mienh waaic mienh caux orqv mienh nyei buoz nauv. Tov wetv cuotv ninh nyei waaic sic taux maiv maaih yietc deix.
10.18: weic bun guh hanh fu'jueiv caux zuqc zeix wuov deix duqv baengh fim, weic bun baamh mienh maiv haih zoix aengx haeqv ninh mbuo gamh nziex.
10.12: O Ziouv aah! Daaih maah! Tov meih sung buoz tengx, maiv dungx la'kuqv kouv naanc nyei mienh.
10.13: Orqv mienh weic haaix diuc nqemh Tin-Hungh? Orqv mienh yiem hnyouv hnamv, “Ninh maiv longc yie nyei sic.”
10.5: Orqv mienh zoux nyei jauv zanc-zanc duqv longx, meih siemv zuiz nyei jauv hlang haic, orqv mienh maiv bieqc hnyouv. Ninh huotv ninh nyei yietc zungv win-wangv.
10.11: Orqv mienh yiem hnyouv hnamv, “Tin-Hungh la'kuqv mi'aqv. Ninh bingx jienv ninh nyei hmien, yietc liuz maiv mangc aqv.”
10.14: Mv baac meih buatc nyei, meih zungv hiuv duqv mienh zuqc kouv naanc, hnyouv nzauh nyei sic, ziouc njiec buoz tengx. Maiv lamh kaux dorngx nyei mienh zorqv ganh jiu bun meih, weic zuqc meih m'daaih tengx guh hanh fu'jueiv.
10.3: Orqv mienh ceng ganh hnyouv hanc zoux nyei sic, mauv ga'naaiv nyei mienh zioux yaac mangc piex Ziouv.
10.10: Maiv maaih dorngx kaux nyei mienh zuqc zatv njiec, ninh mbuo zuqc orqv mienh nyei qaqv hoic ninh mbuo ndortv jienv njiec.
10.2: Orqv mienh zoux maux zeix mienh jomc mienh. Tov bun ninh mbuo daav cuotv nyei za'eix hoic zuqc ninh mbuo ganh.
10.1: Ziouv aah! Meih weic haaix diuc leih yie mbuo ndongc naaiv go? Yie mbuo zuqc kouv naanc meih weic haaix diuc bingx?
10.4: Mienh waaic mienh hnyouv maux ziouc maiv lorz ninh. Orqv mienh kungx hnamv maiv maaih Tin-Hungh.
10.6: Ninh yiem hnyouv hnamv, “Yie yietc liuz maiv zuqc kouv, doic jiex doic yie maiv buangh zeqc naanc.”
10.8: Ninh yiem laangz gu'nyuoz mbueiz nyei dorngx, yiem bingx nyei dorngx daix maiv zoux dorngc nyei mienh. Ninh nyei m'zing cienh mangc maiv maaih dorngx kaux nyei mienh.
10.9: Ninh bingx jienv yiem mbueiz nyei dorngx, hnangv sienh yiem ninh nyei kuotv. Ninh bingx jienv oix caangv doh naanc mienh, ninh baeng ninh nyei mungz guaatv mienh jomc mienh mingh.
10.7: Zioux mienh, nduov mienh, hoic mienh nyei waac buangv nzengc ninh nyei nzuih. Yiem ninh nyei mbietc ga'ndiev maaih doqc nyei, orqv nyei waac.
10.17: O Ziouv aac, meih muangx haiz nyiemc ganh zoux faix nyei mienh oix jouh nyei waac. Meih oix liepc wuonv ninh mbuo nyei hnyouv yaac baeng m'normh muangx ninh mbuo tov nyei waac,
10.16: Ziouv yietc liuz zoux hungh taux maanc gouv maanc doic. Maanc fingx mienh yiem ninh nyei ndau-beih zuqc mietc nzengc.

2.12: Oix zuqc puoqv njiec ninh nyei nza'hmien. Maiv zei aeqv, nziex ninh qiex jiez, meih mbuo ziouc haih zuqc mietc, weic zuqc ninh nyei ga'qiex haih siepv-siepv nyei baetv cuotv. Da'faanh ndaauh kaux ninh wuov deix maaih orn-lorqc.
2.5: Ninh qiex jiez jienv caux ninh mbuo gorngv waac, ninh nouz haic ziouc haeqv ninh mbuo gamh nziex. Ninh gorngv,
2.11: Oix zuqc gamh nziex jienv fu-sux Ziouv, oix zuqc za'gengh taaih ninh.
2.3: Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Mbuo oix zuqc cutv dangx ninh mbuo ndoh nyei limc, yaac jaiv nqoi ninh mbuo ndoh mbuo nyei hlaang.”
2.10: O zuangx hungh diex aah! Hnangv naaic oix zuqc maaih cong-mengh. O gunv lungh ndiev nyei mienh aah! Oix zuqc muangx naaiv deix donv nyei waac.
2.2: Lungh ndiev nyei zuangx hungh diex dongh hnyouv caangh laangh, gunv maanc guoqv nyei mienh lomh nzoih daav za'eix ngaengc Ziouv caux ninh longc youh orn daaih nyei hungh diex.
2.1: Maanc guoqv nyei mienh weic haaix diuc faanv lunc? Maanc fingx mienh weic haaix diuc daav maiv lamh longc nyei za'eix?
2.4: Ziouv yiem gu'nguaaic lungh zueiz jienv weic jatv ninh mbuo, yaac huotv ninh mbuo.
2.6: “Yie zungv liepc yie ginv daaih nyei hungh, yiem yie nyei cing-nzengc mbong, Si^on.”
2.8: Gunv tov yie maah! Yie ziouc zorqv maanc guoqv jiu bun meih nzipc, zorqv nzengc lungh ndiev jiu benx meih nyei buonc.
2.9: Meih ziouc longc hlieqv-biaav mborqv ninh mbuo huv, yaac zong ninh mbuo hnangv zong nie-mor huv muonc nzengc nor.’+”
2.7: Hungh diex gorngv, “Yie oix zunh Ziouv njiec nyei lingc. “Ninh gorngv mbuox yie, ‘Meih zoux yie nyei dorn, ih hnoi yie benx meih nyei die.

134.3: Tov Ziouv, dongh Zeix Lungh Zeix Ndau Wuov Dauh, yiem Si^on ceix fuqv bun meih mbuo.
134.2: Hungx jienv cing-nzengc nyei dorngx sung buoz ceng Ziouv.
134.1: Ziouv  nyei zuangx bou daaih maah! Dongh lungh muonz zanc souv jienv Ziouv nyei biauv nyei mienh, meih mbuo gunv ceng Ziouv  aqv.

143.12: Weic zuqc meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv yie, tov meih jamv guangc yie nyei win-wangv, yaac mietc nzengc yie nyei yietc zungv win-jaa, weic zuqc yie zoux meih nyei bou.
143.5: Yie jangx taux loz-hnoi, yie fei-fangv meih zoux nyei yietc zungv sic, yaac hnamv taux meih nyei buoz zoux nyei gong.
143.11: O Ziouv aac, tov weic meih nyei mengh beu yie nyei maengc. Tov longc meih baengh fim nyei za'eix dorh yie yiem kuonx naanh cuotv daaih.
143.3: Yie nyei win-wangv zunc yie, caaiv yie njiec taux ndau. Ninh bun yie yiem hmuangx nyei dorngx, hnangv daic mingh lauh haic nyei mienh nor.
143.10: Tov meih njaaux yie ei meih nyei eix, weic zuqc meih se yie nyei Tin-Hungh. Tov bun meih longx haic nyei Singx Lingh dorh yie yangh baengh nyei jauv.
143.2: Tov maiv dungx siemv yie, meih nyei bou, weic zuqc ziux meih mangc, maiv maaih yietc dauh ziangh jienv nyei mienh zoux duqv horpc nzengc.
143.1: O Ziouv  aac, tov muangx yie daux gaux, tov baeng m'normh muangx yie jouh nyei waac. Weic zuqc meih ziepc zuoqv nyei, baengh fim nyei, tov dau yie.
143.4: Weic naaiv yie nyei hnyouv mau jienv njiec, yie nyei hnyouv gengh kouv taux ndiev.
143.6: Yie hungx jienv meih sung buoz. Yie ngorc meih ndongc ndau-nqaai ngorc mbiungc. Selaa
143.8: Tov bun yie lungh ndorm nziouv duqv haiz meih ziepc zuoqv hnamv yie weic zuqc yie kaux meih. Tov meih bun yie hiuv duqv horpc yangh nyei jauv, weic zuqc yie daux gaux nyei waac faaux taux meih.
143.9: O Ziouv aac, tov meih njoux yie biaux ndutv yie nyei win-wangv. Yie bingx jienv meih weic zoux yie ndaauh kaux nyei dorngx.
143.7: O Ziouv aac, tov siepv-siepv nyei dau yie. Yie nyei hnyouv maiv lamh hnamv dorngx. Tov meih maiv dungx bingx meih nyei hmien, maiv mangc yie, nziex yie haih hnangv mingh yiem yiemh gen wuov deix mienh.

59.15: Ninh mbuo hnangv juv nor, saau jienv mingh lorz hnaangx nyanc. Se gorngv maiv duqv nyanc beuv ninh ziangh muonz njunh.
59.12: Laaix ninh mbuo nyei nzuih nyei zuiz, caux ninh mbuo nyei nzuih meix gorngv nyei waac, tov bun ninh mbuo zoux maux nyei sic benx hlaang hlopv ninh mbuo. Laaix ninh mbuo zioux caux gorngv-baeqc,
59.13: tov meih qiex jiez, bun ninh mbuo zuqc mietc, mietc taux ninh mbuo zutc nzengc. Zuangx mienh ziouc hiuv duqv Tin-Hungh gunv I^saa^laa^en Mienh, zungv gunv taux jomc lungh gorn.  Selaa
59.5: Ziouv, Nernh Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh, zoux I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei Tin-Hungh. Tov jiez daaih dingc maanc fingx nyei zuiz. Maiv dungx korv-lienh daav orqv za'eix nyei mienh. Selaa
59.11: O Ziouv, yie mbuo nyei torngv-baaih aah! Maiv dungx daix ninh mbuo. Nziex yie nyei baeqc fingx haih la'kuqv. Tov longc meih nyei qaqv bun ninh mbuo faatv nzaanx, bun ninh mbuo zuqc baaic.
59.14: Ninh mbuo hnoi-hnoi lungh maanz-hmuangx nzuonx daaih, hnangv juv nor njunh, yaac saau gormx zingh gu'nyuoz.
59.3: Mangc maah! Ninh mbuo bingx jienv zuov oix zorqv yie nyei maengc. Ciouv nyei mienh gapv zunv oix mborqv yie. O Ziouv aah! Maiv zeiz weic yie zoux dorngc fai yie zoux nyei haaix nyungc zuiz,
59.10: Yie nyei Tin-Hungh ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv yie, oix daaih tengx yie. Yie nyei Tin-Hungh oix bun yie duqv buatc yie nyei win-wangv suei.
59.2: Njoux yie biaux ndutv zoux orqv sic wuov deix, se njoux yie biaux ndutv daix mienh nyei mienh.
59.1: Yie nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Tov njoux yie biaux ndutv yie nyei win-wangv. Tov beu yie biaux ndutv oix mborqv yie wuov deix mienh.
59.4: maiv gunv yie maiv zoux haaix nyungc dorngc, ninh mbuo tiux daaih liuc leiz mborqv yie. Tov gaanv daaih tengx yie. Tov daaih mangc maah!
59.6: Ninh mbuo hnoi-hnoi lungh maanz-hmuangx nzuonx daaih, hnangv juv nor njunh, yaac saau gormx zingh gu'nyuoz.
59.8: Mv baac Ziouv aah! Meih jatv ninh mbuo. Meih huotv maanc fingx.
59.9: Meih zoux yie nyei Qaqv. Yie zuov jienv meih. O Tin-Hungh aah! Meih zoux yie wuonv haic nyei dorngx.
59.7: Ninh mbuo nyei nzuih qaqv gorngv maiv benx nyei waac. Ninh mbuo hnangv maaih nzuqc ndaauv yiem ninh mbuo nyei nzuih meix, weic zuqc ninh mbuo hnamv, “Haaix dauh haih muangx haiz yie mbuo?”
59.17: O yie nyei Qaqv aah! Yie oix baaux nzung ceng meih. O Tin-Hungh aah! Meih zoux yie wuonv nyei laauh, dongh bun cing meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv yie wuov dauh Tin-Hungh.
59.16: Mv baac yie oix baaux nzung ceng meih nyei qaqv. Lungh ndorm yie oix baaux nzung mbui nyei ceng meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv mienh. Weic zuqc meih zoux yie wuonv haic nyei dorngx, yie zuqc zeqc naanc nyei hnoi-nyieqc meih zoux yie kaux nyei dorngx.

141.10: Tov bun orqv mienh ndortv njiec ninh mbuo ganh zaeng nyei mungz, mv baac tov bun yie duqv biaux ndutv mingh.
141.2: Tov bun yie daux gaux nyei waac hnangv hung yiem meih nyei nza'hmien. Yie sung jienv nyei buoz hnangv lungh maanz-hmuangx ziec nyei ga'naaiv.
141.1: O Ziouv aac, yie heuc jienv meih. Tov siepv-siepv nyei daaih tengx yie. Yie heuc meih nyei ziangh hoc, tov baeng m'normh muangx yie nyei sing-qiex.
141.5: Tov bun kuv mienh mborqv yie. Naaiv se weih zoux longx. Tov bun ninh gorngv-hemx yie, se hnangv zorqv youh dox yie nyei m'nqorngv. Tov bun yie nyei m'nqorngv maiv nqemh. Weic zuqc yie daux gaux nyei waac zanc-zanc ngaengc jienv orqv mienh nyei orqv sic.
141.6: Ninh mbuo nyei siemv zuiz jien zuqc zoi njiec la'bieiv-mbaengx wuov zanc, mienh ziouc hoqc hiuv Ziouv nyei waac se zien nyei.
141.8: O Ziouv Tin-Hungh aac, yie nyei m'zing mangc jienv meih. Yie ndaauh kaux meih. Maiv dungx guangc yie, bun yie maiv lamh kaux dorngx.
141.9: Tov beu jienv yie biaux ndutv ninh mbuo zaeng weic hlopv yie nyei koux, caux orqv mienh zaeng nyei hlaang.
141.4: Tov bun yie maiv maaih hnyouv zoux orqv sic, bun yie maiv dungx caux zoux orqv nyei mienh juangc jienv zoux waaic sic, yaac maiv dungx bun yie nyanc ninh mbuo kuv haic nyei lai-hnaangx.
141.3: O Ziouv aac, tov gunv yie nyei nzuih hnangv zuov gaengh mienh zuov gaengh nor. Tov goux jienv yie nyei nzuih meix nyei gaengh.
141.7: Hnangv mienh laih ndau cenv muonc nzengc, ninh mbuo nyei mbungv oix zuqc nzaanx mingh taux yiemh gen nyei kuotv-ndaangc.

85.12: Ziouv oix zorqv longx nyei ga'naaiv bun yie mbuo. Yie mbuo nyei deic-bung ziouc aengx cuotv gaeng-zuangx longx.
85.13: Baengh fim nyei jauv oix yiem ninh nyei wuov ndaangc mingh, weic liuc leiz jauv bun ninh nyei zaux caaiv.
85.5: Meih oix qiex jiez yie mbuo taux yietc liuz fai? Oix nouz yie mbuo taux maanc gouv maanc doic fai?
85.11: Ziepc zuoqv nyei jauv oix yiem ndau cuotv, baengh fim nyei jauv oix yiem wuov lungh mangc njiec.
85.3: Meih dingh njiec, maiv qiex jiez ninh mbuo, meih huin nzuonx, maiv nouz ninh mbuo aqv.
85.10: Ziepc zuoqv hnamv nyei jauv caux hnyouv zingx nyei jauv oix faang-buangh, baengh fim caux baengh orn oix zom jaax.
85.2: Meih guangc meih nyei baeqc fingx nyei zuiz-nipc, zorqv nqoi ninh mbuo zoux dorngc nyei yietc zungv zuiz. Selaa
85.1: Ziouv aac, meih ceix en bun meih nyei deic-bung. Meih bun Yaakopv nzuonx daaih duqv longx hnangv loz wuov nor.
85.4: Yie mbuo nyei Njoux Ziouv, Tin-Hungh aah! Tov bun yie mbuo duqv longx hnangv loz wuov nor. Tov guangc nqoi maiv dungx qiex jiez yie mbuo.
85.6: Meih maiv bun yie mbuo aengx fingv jiez daaih weic bun yie mbuo kaux meih duqv njien-youh fai?
85.8: Yie oix muangx Ziouv Tin-Hungh gorngv nyei waac. Se gorngv ninh nyei baeqc fingx, se ninh nyei cing-nzengc baeqc fingx, maiv aengx nzuonx mingh zoux hngongx nyei jauv, ninh laengz bun ninh mbuo duqv baengh orn.
85.9: Ninh nyei njoux en ndongc haaix zungv yiem nitv fatv taaih ninh wuov deix mienh, weic bun ninh nyei njang-laangc yiem yie mbuo nyei deic-bung.
85.7: O Ziouv aac, tov bun cing meih ziepc zuoqv nyei hnamv yie mbuo, aengx zorqv meih nyei njoux en ceix bun yie mbuo.
